原始题号:update_pics1/output_0_0. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; h = midpoint h c b; d = on_line d o h, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e c c o, on_tline e a a o ? cyclic a o e d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; e,d,a are on the same line; ed=ea; fe∥ab; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ab, ab∥cd => dc∥ef; ef∥ab, e,d,a are on the same line, b,c,f are on the same line, dc∥ef => de/da = cf/cb; de/da = cf/cb, ed=ea => ae/ad = cf/cb. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll e d a; cong e d e a; para f e a b; coll b c f ? eqratio e a d a c f b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, para m n a b => eqratio6 m a m d n b n c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，且MN平行于AB，那么MA:MD = NB:NC。. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_0_1. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; h = midpoint h c b; d = on_line d o h, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e c c o, on_tline e a a o ? cyclic a o e d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; e,d,a are on the same line; ed=ea; fe∥ab; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ab, ab∥cd => dc∥ef; ef∥ab, e,d,a are on the same line, b,c,f are on the same line, dc∥ef => de/da = cf/cb; de/da = cf/cb, ed=ea => ae/ad = cf/cb. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll e d a; cong e d e a; para f e a b; coll b c f ? eqratio d a e a b c c f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, para m n a b => eqratio6 m a m d n b n c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，且MN平行于AB，那么MA:MD = NB:NC。. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_0_3. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; h = midpoint h c b; d = on_line d o h, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e c c o, on_tline e a a o ? cyclic a o e d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; e,d,a are on the same line; ed=ea; fe∥ab; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ab, ab∥cd => dc∥ef; ef∥ab, e,d,a are on the same line, b,c,f are on the same line, dc∥ef => de/cf = da/cb; de/cf = da/cb, ed=ea => ea/cf = da/bc. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll e d a; cong e d e a; para f e a b; coll b c f ? eqratio c f e a b c d a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, para m n a b => eqratio6 m a m d n b n c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，且MN平行于AB，那么MA:MD = NB:NC。. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_8. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df. 步骤: ac=ce, ea=ac => ea=ec; ea=ec => ∠eac=∠ace; ∠eac=∠ace, ce∥df => ∠eac equals the intersection angle of ac and df. 生成题目的FL: cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f ? eqangle a e a c a c d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df. 步骤: ac=ce, ea=ac => ea=ec; ea=ec => ∠eac=∠ace; ∠eac=∠ace, ce∥df => ∠eac equals the intersection angle of ac and df. 生成题目的FL: cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f ? eqangle a c a e d f a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ae=ac; ce=ca; ce∥df. 步骤: ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ae/ac; da=ab, ab=bd, ce=ca => da/db = ce/ca; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ∠bad=∠aec; ∠bad=∠aec, ce∥df => ∠bad equals the intersection angle of ae and df. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a e a c; cong c e c a; para c e d f ? eqangle a b a d a e d f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_14. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ae=ac; ce=ca. 步骤: ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ae/ac; da=ab, ab=bd, ce=ca => da/db = ce/ca; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ∠bae equals the intersection angle of bd and ac. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a e a c; cong c e c a ? eqangle a b a e b d a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_72. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; be⟂ac; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; b,e,g are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; f,b,a are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => ∠bfd=∠ega; da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bea=∠bdf; b,e,g are on the same line, ∠bdf=∠bea => ∠bdf=∠gea; ∠bfd=∠ega, ∠bdf=∠gea => ∠fbd=∠eag; ∠fbd=∠eag, a,b,f are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠bae equals the intersection angle of bd and ac. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll b e g; coll a g c ? eqangle a b a e b d a c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_15. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ae=ac; ce=ca. 步骤: ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ae/ac; da=ab, ab=bd, ce=ca => da/db = ce/ca; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ∠bae equals the intersection angle of bd and ac. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a e a c; cong c e c a ? eqangle a e a b a c b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_73. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; be⟂ac; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; b,e,g are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; f,b,a are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => ∠bfd=∠ega; da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bea=∠bdf; b,e,g are on the same line, ∠bdf=∠bea => ∠bdf=∠gea; ∠bfd=∠ega, ∠bdf=∠gea => ∠fbd=∠eag; ∠fbd=∠eag, a,b,f are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠bae equals the intersection angle of bd and ac. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll b e g; coll a g c ? eqangle a e a b a c b d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_16. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ac=ae; ac=ce; ce∥df. 步骤: ba=bd, ac=ae => ba/bd = ac/ae; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ec/ea; ba/bd = ac/ae, da/db = ec/ea => the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to ∠dac; the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to ∠dac, ce∥df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to ∠dac. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a c a e; cong a c c e; para c e d f ? eqangle a b d f a d a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_18. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ac=ae; ac=ce; ce∥df. 步骤: ba=bd, ac=ae => ba/bd = ac/ae; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ec/ea; ba/bd = ac/ae, da/db = ec/ea => ∠dae equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠dae equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠dae=∠bdf. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a c a e; cong a c c e; para c e d f ? eqangle a d a e b d d f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac. 步骤: ba=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => ba/bd = ea/ec; da=ab, ab=bd, ca=ce => da/db = ca/ce; ba/bd = ea/ec, da/db = ca/ce => ∠bac=∠dae. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c ? eqangle a b a c a d a e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_21. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac. 步骤: ba=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => ba/bd = ea/ec; da=ab, ab=bd, ca=ce => da/db = ca/ce; ba/bd = ea/ec, da/db = ca/ce => ∠bac=∠dae. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c ? eqangle a c a b a e a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_22. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df. 步骤: ba=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => ba/bd = ea/ec; da=ab, ab=bd, ca=ce => da/db = ca/ce; ba/bd = ea/ec, da/db = ca/ce => the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, ce∥df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f ? eqangle a b d f b d a e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_23. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df. 步骤: ba=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => ba/bd = ea/ec; da=ab, ab=bd, ca=ce => da/db = ca/ce; ba/bd = ea/ec, da/db = ca/ce => the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, ce∥df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f ? eqangle d f a b a e b d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_24. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; fd=ec, ac=ce => ac=df; ba=bd, ca=ce => ba/bd = ca/ce; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ea/ec; ba/bd = ca/ce, da/db = ea/ec => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠bac=∠bdf; ab=bd, ac=df, ∠bac=∠bdf => ∠abc=∠dbf. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle a b b c b d b f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; fd=ec, ac=ce => ac=df; ba=bd, ca=ce => ba/bd = ca/ce; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ea/ec; ba/bd = ca/ce, da/db = ea/ec => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠bac=∠bdf; ab=bd, ac=df, ∠bac=∠bdf => ∠abc=∠dbf. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle b c a b b f b d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_26. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; fd=ec, ac=ce => ac=df; ba=bd, ca=ce => ba/bd = ca/ce; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ea/ec; ba/bd = ca/ce, da/db = ea/ec => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠bac=∠bdf; ab=bd, ac=df, ∠bac=∠bdf => ∠abd=∠cbf. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle a b b d b c b f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_27. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; fd=ec, ac=ce => ac=df; ba=bd, ca=ce => ba/bd = ca/ce; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ea/ec; ba/bd = ca/ce, da/db = ea/ec => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠bac=∠bdf; ab=bd, ac=df, ∠bac=∠bdf => ∠abd=∠cbf. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle b d a b b f b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; fd=ec, ac=ce => ac=df; ba=bd, ca=ce => ba/bd = ca/ce; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ea/ec; ba/bd = ca/ce, da/db = ea/ec => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠bac=∠bdf; ab=bd, ac=df, ∠bac=∠bdf => ∠bca=∠bfd. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle b c a c b f d f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_17. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; fb=fc; fa=fb. 步骤: fb=fc, fa=fb => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠bca=∠bfd. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; cong f b f c; cong f a f b ? eqangle b c a c b f d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_29. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; fd=ec, ac=ce => ac=df; ba=bd, ca=ce => ba/bd = ca/ce; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ea/ec; ba/bd = ca/ce, da/db = ea/ec => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠bac=∠bdf; ab=bd, ac=df, ∠bac=∠bdf => ∠bca=∠bfd. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle a c b c d f b f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_18. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; fb=fc; fa=fb. 步骤: fb=fc, fa=fb => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠bca=∠bfd. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; cong f b f c; cong f a f b ? eqangle a c b c d f b f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bd; da=ab; ac=ce; ea=ac; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; fd=ec, ac=ce => ac=df; ba=bd, ca=ce => ba/bd = ca/ce; da=ab, ab=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => da/db = ea/ec; ba/bd = ca/ce, da/db = ea/ec => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠bac equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠bac=∠bdf; ab=bd, ac=df, ∠bac=∠bdf => cb=fb. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b d; cong d a a b; cong a c c e; cong e a a c; para c e d f; para c f e d ? cong c b f b. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_31. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=ab; ba=bd; ae=ac; ce=ca; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ae/ac; da=ab, ab=bd, ce=ca => da/db = ce/ca; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ab/ad = ea/ec; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ∠bae equals the intersection angle of ad and ce; fd=ec, ab/ad = ea/ec, da=ab => ae=df; ∠bae equals the intersection angle of ad and ce, ce∥df => ∠bae=∠adf; da=ab, ae=df, ∠bae=∠adf => ∠abe=∠daf. 生成题目的FL: cong d a a b; cong b a b d; cong a e a c; cong c e c a; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle a b b e a d a f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=ab; ba=bd; ae=ac; ce=ca; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ae/ac; da=ab, ab=bd, ce=ca => da/db = ce/ca; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ab/ad = ea/ec; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ∠bae equals the intersection angle of ad and ce; fd=ec, ab/ad = ea/ec, da=ab => ae=df; ∠bae equals the intersection angle of ad and ce, ce∥df => ∠bae=∠adf; da=ab, ae=df, ∠bae=∠adf => ∠abe=∠daf. 生成题目的FL: cong d a a b; cong b a b d; cong a e a c; cong c e c a; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle b e a b a f a d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_40. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=ab; ba=bd; ea=ac; ac=ce. 步骤: ba=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => ba/bd = ea/ec; da=ab, ab=bd, ca=ce => da/db = ca/ce; ba/bd = ea/ec, da/db = ca/ce => ∠bac=∠dae; da=ab, ea=ac, ∠bac=∠dae => ∠bad equals the intersection angle of bc and de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a a b; cong b a b d; cong e a a c; cong a c c e ? eqangle a b a d b c d e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_44. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=ab; ba=bd; ea=ac; ac=ce. 步骤: ba=bd, ac=ce, ea=ac => ba/bd = ea/ec; da=ab, ab=bd, ca=ce => da/db = ca/ce; ba/bd = ea/ec, da/db = ca/ce => ∠bac=∠dae; da=ab, ea=ac, ∠bac=∠dae => cb=ed. 生成题目的FL: cong d a a b; cong b a b d; cong e a a c; cong a c c e ? cong c b e d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_45. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=ab; ab=bd; ae=ac; ce=ca; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: da=ab, ab=bd => db=da; ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ae/ac; ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ac/ae; da=db, ce=ca => da/db = ce/ca; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ab/ad = ea/ec; fd=ec, ab/ad = ea/ec, da=ab => ae=df; da=db, ab/ad = ea/ec, da=ab => da/db = ec/ea; ba/bd = ac/ae, da/db = ec/ea => ∠dae equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠dae equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠dae=∠bdf; db=da, ae=df, ∠dae=∠bdf => ∠bda equals the intersection angle of bf and de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a a b; cong a b b d; cong a e a c; cong c e c a; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle b d a d b f d e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_1_46. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; m = midpoint m b a; o = circle o a b c; n = on_line n o m, on_circle n o a ? eqangle c a c n c n c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=ab; ab=bd; ae=ac; ce=ca; ce∥df; cf∥ed. 步骤: da=ab, ab=bd => db=da; ce∥df, cf∥de => fd=ec; ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ae/ac; ba=bd, ae=ac => ba/bd = ac/ae; da=db, ce=ca => da/db = ce/ca; ba/bd = ae/ac, da/db = ce/ca => ab/ad = ea/ec; fd=ec, ab/ad = ea/ec, da=ab => ae=df; da=db, ab/ad = ea/ec, da=ab => da/db = ec/ea; ba/bd = ac/ae, da/db = ec/ea => ∠dae equals the intersection angle of bd and ce; ∠dae equals the intersection angle of bd and ce, ce∥df => ∠dae=∠bdf; db=da, ae=df, ∠dae=∠bdf => ∠bda equals the intersection angle of bf and de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a a b; cong a b b d; cong a e a c; cong c e c a; para c e d f; para c f e d ? eqangle a d b d d e b f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_4. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cb=ba; ba=ac; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: cb=cd, cb=ba, ba=ac => ca=cd; ca=cd => ∠cad=∠adc; ∠cad=∠adc, b,d,c are on the same line => ∠cad equals the intersection angle of ad and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong c b b a; cong b a a c; cong c b c d; coll b d c ? eqangle a c a d a d b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cb=ba; ba=ac; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: cb=cd, cb=ba, ba=ac => ca=cd; ca=cd => ∠cad=∠adc; ∠cad=∠adc, b,d,c are on the same line => ∠cad equals the intersection angle of ad and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong c b b a; cong b a a c; cong c b c d; coll b d c ? eqangle a d a c b c a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_6. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd. 生成题目的FL: coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? cong c d f d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M. 使用的知识点(中文): 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_8. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => fa⟂fe; ab⟂ad, fa⟂fe => the intersection angle of ab and fe is equal to ∠daf; the intersection angle of ab and fe is equal to ∠daf, f,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and ef is equal to ∠dac. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle a b e f a d a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => fa⟂fe; ab⟂ad, fa⟂fe => the intersection angle of ab and fe is equal to ∠daf; the intersection angle of ab and fe is equal to ∠daf, f,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and ef is equal to ∠dac. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle e f a b a c a d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => fa⟂fe; ab⟂ad, fa⟂fe => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of ad and fe; ∠baf equals the intersection angle of ad and fe, f,a,c are on the same line => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of ad and ef. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle a b a c a d e f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_11. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => fa⟂fe; ab⟂ad, fa⟂fe => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of ad and fe; ∠baf equals the intersection angle of ad and fe, f,a,c are on the same line => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of ad and ef. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle a c a b e f a d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_12. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ac, ab⟂ad => ∠dab=∠efa; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd; ∠dab=∠efa, ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd => ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd; ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd, f,a,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of ef and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle a d a c e f b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_13. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ac, ab⟂ad => ∠dab=∠efa; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd; ∠dab=∠efa, ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd => ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd; ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd, f,a,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of ef and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle a c a d b c e f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_14. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => ed=fd; ed=fd => ∠dfe=∠fed; ∠dfe=∠fed, d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ∠dfe equals the intersection angle of ef and bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle d f e f e f b c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_17. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; ∠dfc=∠fcd, f,a,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of df and ac is equal to ∠acb. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle a c d f b c a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_18. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ab⟂ad, ef⟂ac => ∠efc=∠bad; ba=ac => ∠bca=∠abc; d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, f,c,a are on the same line, ∠bca=∠abc => ∠ecf=∠abd; ∠efc=∠bad, ∠ecf=∠abd => ef/ec = da/db. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll d e c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqratio f e e c a d b d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_22. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ab⟂ad, ef⟂ac => ∠efc=∠bad; ba=ac => ∠bca=∠abc; d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, f,c,a are on the same line, ∠bca=∠abc => ∠ecf=∠abd; ∠efc=∠bad, ∠ecf=∠abd => fe/fc = ad/ab; fe/fc = ad/ab, cb=cd, cb=ba => fe/fc = da/dc. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll d e c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqratio f e f c a d d c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_23. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ab⟂ad, ef⟂ac => ∠efc=∠bad; ba=ac => ∠bca=∠abc; d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, f,c,a are on the same line, ∠bca=∠abc => ∠ecf=∠abd; ∠efc=∠bad, ∠ecf=∠abd => fe/fc = ad/ab; fe/fc = ad/ab, cb=cd, cb=ba => fe/fc = da/dc. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll d e c; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqratio f c f e d c a d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cb=ba; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf=∠dfa; ∠baf=∠dfa => ab∥fd. 生成题目的FL: cong c b b a; coll b d c; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? para a b d f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_29. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac => ∠acb=∠cba; f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠acb=∠cba, ∠dfc=∠fcd => ∠dfa=∠dba; ∠dfa=∠dba => f,a,b,d are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; coll b d c; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? cyclic f a b d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cb=ba, cb=cd, cd=fd => df=ba; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf=∠dfa; df=ba, ∠baf=∠dfa => ∠fda=∠abf; ∠baf=∠dfa => ab∥fd; ∠fda=∠abf, ab∥df => ∠bad=∠abf. 生成题目的FL: cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle a b a d a b b f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_31. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cb=ba, cb=cd, cd=fd => df=ba; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf=∠dfa; df=ba, ∠baf=∠dfa => ∠fda=∠abf; ∠baf=∠dfa => ab∥fd; ∠fda=∠abf, ab∥df => ∠bad=∠abf. 生成题目的FL: cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqangle a d a b b f a b. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cb=ba, cb=cd, cd=fd => df=ba; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf=∠dfa; df=ba, ∠baf=∠dfa => ∠daf=∠bfa; ∠daf=∠bfa, f,a,c are on the same line => ad∥bf. 生成题目的FL: cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? para a d b f. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_42_34. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; d = midpoint d b a; c = on_circle c b a, on_circle c a b; e = on_line e a c, on_circle e d a; f = on_circle f d a, on_line f b c ? cong a e e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; eb=ec; ed=eb; ef=eb; df⟂cd. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ed=eb => f,b,d,c are on the same circle; f,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠fbc=∠fdc; ∠fbc=∠fdc, df⟂cd => bc⟂bf; ad⟂bc, bc⟂bf => da∥bf. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; cong e b e c; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; perp d f c d ? para a d b f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp C D E F, ncoll A B E => para A B E F; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线都垂直于同一条直线，那么这两条直线平行; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_33. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cb=ba; cb=cd; b,d,c are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cb=ba, cb=cd, cd=fd => df=ba; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf=∠dfa; df=ba, ∠baf=∠dfa => ad=fb. 生成题目的FL: cong c b b a; cong c b c d; coll b d c; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? cong a d f b. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; b,d,c are on the same line; cb=cd; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; f,c,a are on the same line, d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd => ∠fce=∠dfa; ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ac, ab⟂ad => ∠dab=∠efa; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd; ∠dab=∠efa, ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd => ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd; d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, a,f,c are on the same line, ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd => ∠fec=∠daf; ∠fce=∠dfa, ∠fec=∠daf => cf/ce = fd/fa; cf/ce = fd/fa, cd=fd => cf/ce = dc/af. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; coll b d c; cong c b c d; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqratio f c e c d c a f. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_35. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; b,d,c are on the same line; cb=cd; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; f,c,a are on the same line, d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd => ∠fce=∠dfa; ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ac, ab⟂ad => ∠dab=∠efa; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd; ∠dab=∠efa, ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd => ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd; d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, a,f,c are on the same line, ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd => ∠fec=∠daf; ∠fce=∠dfa, ∠fec=∠daf => cf/ce = fd/fa; cf/ce = fd/fa, cd=fd => cf/ce = dc/af. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; coll b d c; cong c b c d; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqratio e c f c a f d c. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_36. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; b,d,c are on the same line; cb=cd; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; f,c,a are on the same line, d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd => ∠fce=∠dfa; ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ac, ab⟂ad => ∠dab=∠efa; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd; ∠dab=∠efa, ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd => ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd; d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, a,f,c are on the same line, ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd => ∠fec=∠daf; ∠fce=∠dfa, ∠fec=∠daf => fc/fd = ce/fa; fc/fd = ce/fa, cd=fd => cf/cd = ec/af. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; coll b d c; cong c b c d; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqratio f c d c e c a f. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_37. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; b,d,c are on the same line; cb=cd; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; f,c,a are on the same line, d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd => ∠fce=∠dfa; ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ac, ab⟂ad => ∠dab=∠efa; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd; ∠dab=∠efa, ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd => ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd; d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, a,f,c are on the same line, ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd => ∠fec=∠daf; ∠fce=∠dfa, ∠fec=∠daf => fc/fd = ce/fa; fc/fd = ce/fa, cd=fd => cf/cd = ec/af. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; coll b d c; cong c b c d; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqratio d c f c a f e c. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_38. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; b,d,c are on the same line; cb=cd; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; f,c,a are on the same line, d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠dfc=∠fcd => ∠fce=∠dfa; ba=ac, cb=ba, cb=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δbad; c is the circumcenter of Δbad, b,d,c are on the same line => ab⟂ad; f,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ac, ab⟂ad => ∠dab=∠efa; cb=ba => ∠bac=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠acb => ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd; ∠dab=∠efa, ∠baf equals the intersection angle of fa and bd => ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd; d,e,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, a,f,c are on the same line, ∠daf equals the intersection angle of fe and bd => ∠fec=∠daf; ∠fce=∠dfa, ∠fec=∠daf => ef/ec = ad/af. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; coll b d c; cong c b c d; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? eqratio f e e c a d a f. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_2_42. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; q = midpoint q c b; s = midpoint s a d; j = midpoint j s q; m = mirror m o j; i = on_line i a d, on_line i b c ? perp s m b c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=ac; cb=ba; b,d,c are on the same line; cb=cd; d,e,c are on the same line; dc=de; f,a,c are on the same line; ef⟂ac. 步骤: ba=ac => ∠acb=∠cba; f,c,a are on the same line, ac⟂ef => cf⟂fe; d,c,e are on the same line, dc=de => d is the midpoint of c and e; cf⟂fe, d is the midpoint of c and e => cd=fd; cd=fd => ∠dfc=∠fcd; f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠acb=∠cba, ∠dfc=∠fcd => ∠dfa=∠dba; cb=cd, cb=ba, ba=ac => ca=cd; ca=cd => ∠cad=∠adc; b,d,c are on the same line, f,c,a are on the same line, ∠cad=∠adc => ∠adb=∠fad; ∠dfa=∠dba, ∠adb=∠fad => fd/ba = fa/bd; fd/ba = fa/bd, cb=ba, cb=cd, cd=fd => fa=bd. 生成题目的FL: cong b a a c; cong c b b a; coll b d c; cong c b c d; coll d e c; cong d c d e; coll f a c; perp e f a c ? cong f a b d. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_2. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, e,a,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠bad=∠ecb. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqangle a b a d c e b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_17. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, a,g,d are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line => ∠dab=∠bce. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c h e ? eqangle a b a d c e b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_3. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, e,a,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠bad=∠ecb. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqangle a d a b b c c e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_4. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and db is equal to ∠efd; the intersection angle of ea and db is equal to ∠efd, e,a,b are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line => ∠abc equals the intersection angle of ce and ad. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqangle a b b c c e a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and db is equal to ∠efd; the intersection angle of ea and db is equal to ∠efd, e,a,b are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line => ∠abc equals the intersection angle of ce and ad. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqangle b c a b a d c e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_6. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => cd/cf = ae/af. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqratio d c f c e a f a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_26. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cda=∠cea; ∠cda=∠cea => d,e,a,c are on the same circle; d,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠dea=∠dca; ∠dea=∠dca, e,a,b are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ab is equal to ∠bca. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b ? eqangle d e a b b c a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_51. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: c,b,d are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adc=∠aec; ∠adc=∠aec => a,e,d,c are on the same circle; a,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠aed=∠acd; ∠aed=∠acd, a,e,b are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and de is equal to ∠acb. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b ? eqangle d e a b b c a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_27. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cda=∠cea; ∠cda=∠cea => d,e,a,c are on the same circle; d,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠dea=∠dca; ∠dea=∠dca, e,a,b are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ab is equal to ∠bca. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b ? eqangle a b d e a c b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_50. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: c,b,d are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adc=∠aec; ∠adc=∠aec => a,e,d,c are on the same circle; a,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠aed=∠acd; ∠aed=∠acd, a,e,b are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and de is equal to ∠acb. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b ? eqangle a b d e a c b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cda=∠cea; ∠cda=∠cea => d,e,a,c are on the same circle; d,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠dec=∠dac. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b ? eqangle d e c e a d a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_40. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,b,c are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bdf=∠bef; ∠bdf=∠bef => d,e,f,b are on the same circle; d,e,f,b are on the same circle => ∠deb=∠dfb; ∠deb=∠dfb, e,a,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line => ∠eda=∠abf. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqangle d e a d a b b f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_42. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => fc/fa = fd/fe; d,b,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bda=∠aef; e,a,b are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠eaf; ∠bda=∠aef, ∠bad=∠eaf => db/fe = ab/af; fc/fa = fd/fe, db/fe = ab/af => df/db = fc/ab. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqratio d f d b f c a b. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
