原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_46. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠fea=∠bec; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; f,d,a are on the same line, e,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠fae=∠bce; ∠fea=∠bec, ∠fae=∠bce => fe/fa = be/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio f e f a e b b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_47. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠fea=∠bec; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; f,d,a are on the same line, e,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠fae=∠bce; ∠fea=∠bec, ∠fae=∠bce => fe/fa = be/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio f a f e b c e b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_48. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠fea=∠bec; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; f,d,a are on the same line, e,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠fae=∠bce; ∠fea=∠bec, ∠fae=∠bce => ef/eb = fa/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio f e e b f a b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_49. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠fea=∠bec; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; f,d,a are on the same line, e,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠fae=∠bce; ∠fea=∠bec, ∠fae=∠bce => ef/eb = fa/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio e b f e b c f a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_50. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠fea=∠bec; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; f,d,a are on the same line, e,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠fae=∠bce; ∠fea=∠bec, ∠fae=∠bce => ef/ea = eb/ec. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio f e e a e b e c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_56. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: d,b,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bda=∠ceb; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, e,a,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠bad=∠ecb; ∠bda=∠ceb, ∠bad=∠ecb => bd/be = ba/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio d b e b a b b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_58. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: d,b,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bda=∠ceb; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, e,a,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠bad=∠ecb; ∠bda=∠ceb, ∠bad=∠ecb => bd/be = da/ec. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio d b e b d a e c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_59. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: d,b,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bda=∠ceb; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, e,a,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠bad=∠ecb; ∠bda=∠ceb, ∠bad=∠ecb => bd/be = da/ec. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio e b d b e c d a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_60. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠bec; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and db is equal to ∠efd; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ea and db is equal to ∠efd, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠ebc; ∠cdf=∠bec, ∠cfd=∠ebc => cd/ce = cf/cb. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqratio d c e c f c b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_64. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => fc/fa = fd/fe; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad => ∠cfa=∠efd; fc/fa = fd/fe, ∠cfa=∠efd => cf/ca = df/de. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; eqangle c e a d c e a d; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqratio f c a c d f d e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_65. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => fc/fa = fd/fe; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad => ∠cfa=∠efd; fc/fa = fd/fe, ∠cfa=∠efd => cf/ca = df/de. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; eqangle c e a d c e a d; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqratio a c f c d e d f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_67. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => fc/fa = fd/fe; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad => ∠cfa=∠efd; fc/fa = fd/fe, ∠cfa=∠efd => fc/fd = ac/de. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; eqangle c e a d c e a d; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqratio d f f c d e a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_76. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,b,c are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bdf=∠bef; ∠bdf=∠bef => d,e,f,b are on the same circle; d,e,f,b are on the same circle => ∠deb=∠dfb; d,f,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ∠deb=∠dfb => ∠bfd=∠aed; d,c,b are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cda=∠cea; ∠cda=∠cea => d,e,a,c are on the same circle; d,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠dec=∠dac; d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ∠dac=∠dec => the intersection angle of df and ac is equal to ∠def; ∠bfd=∠aed, the intersection angle of df and ac is equal to ∠def => the intersection angle of fb and ac is equal to ∠aef; the intersection angle of fb and ac is equal to ∠aef, e,a,b are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of bf and ac is equal to the intersection angle of ab and ce. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqangle b f a c a b c e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_77. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,b,c are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bdf=∠bef; ∠bdf=∠bef => d,e,f,b are on the same circle; d,e,f,b are on the same circle => ∠deb=∠dfb; d,f,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ∠deb=∠dfb => ∠bfd=∠aed; d,c,b are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cda=∠cea; ∠cda=∠cea => d,e,a,c are on the same circle; d,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠dec=∠dac; d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ∠dac=∠dec => the intersection angle of df and ac is equal to ∠def; ∠bfd=∠aed, the intersection angle of df and ac is equal to ∠def => the intersection angle of fb and ac is equal to ∠aef; the intersection angle of fb and ac is equal to ∠aef, e,a,b are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of bf and ac is equal to the intersection angle of ab and ce. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqangle a c b f c e a b. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_78. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; ∠bad=∠bad; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; d,f,a are on the same line; f,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => dc/ea = fc/fa; d,b,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bda=∠aef; e,a,b are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠eaf; ∠bda=∠aef, ∠bad=∠eaf => ab/af = ad/ae; f,d,a are on the same line, e,a,b are on the same line, ∠bad=∠bad => ∠baf=∠ead; ab/af = ad/ae, ∠baf=∠ead => fb/fa = ed/ea; dc/ea = fc/fa, fb/fa = ed/ea => fc/fb = dc/de. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; eqangle a b a d a b a d; coll e a b; perp c e a b; coll d f a; coll f e c ? eqratio f c f b d c d e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_80. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: d,b,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bda=∠aef; e,a,b are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠eaf; ∠bda=∠aef, ∠bad=∠eaf => db/fe = ab/af; d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => fc/fa = fd/fe; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad => ∠cfa=∠efd; fc/fa = fd/fe, ∠cfa=∠efd => ac/af = ed/ef; db/fe = ab/af, ac/af = ed/ef => ab/ac = db/de. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; eqangle c e a d c e a d; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio a b a c d b d e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_82. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠fea=∠bec; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; f,d,a are on the same line, e,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠fae=∠bce; ∠fea=∠bec, ∠fae=∠bce => ef/eb = fa/bc; d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => fc/fa = fd/fe; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad => ∠cfa=∠efd; fc/fa = fd/fe, ∠cfa=∠efd => ac/af = ed/ef; ef/eb = fa/bc, ac/af = ed/ef => eb/ed = cb/ca. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; eqangle c e a d c e a d; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio e b d e b c a c. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_3_83. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; g = foot g d a b; f = foot f d a c; c1 = on_circle c1 o d, on_line c1 d g; b1 = on_circle b1 o d, on_line b1 d f ? para c1 c b1 b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,b,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,a,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad; f,e,c are on the same line; d,f,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠fea=∠bec; e,b,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ce => ea⟂fe; d,f,a are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => df⟂db; ea⟂fe, df⟂db => the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db; f,d,a are on the same line, e,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ea and df is equal to the intersection angle of fe and db, f,e,c are on the same line, d,b,c are on the same line => ∠fae=∠bce; ∠fea=∠bec, ∠fae=∠bce => ef/eb = fa/bc; d,c,b are on the same line, d,f,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠cdf=∠fea; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efa; ∠cdf=∠fea, ∠cfd=∠efa => fc/fa = fd/fe; f,e,c are on the same line, f,d,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ad => ∠cfa=∠efd; fc/fa = fd/fe, ∠cfa=∠efd => ac/af = ed/ef; ef/eb = fa/bc, ac/af = ed/ef => eb/ed = cb/ca. 生成题目的FL: coll d b c; perp a d b c; coll e a b; perp c e a b; eqangle c e a d c e a d; coll f e c; coll d f a ? eqratio d e e b a c b c. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_0. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c ? para d e b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_0. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a ? para d e b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_1. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; b,d,a are on the same line; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: df=da, da=db => db=df; db=df => ∠dbf=∠bfd; ∠dbf=∠bfd, b,d,a are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line => ∠abc equals the intersection angle of bc and df. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; coll b d a; cong d f d a; coll b f c ? eqangle a b b c b c d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_2. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; b,d,a are on the same line; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: df=da, da=db => db=df; db=df => ∠dbf=∠bfd; ∠dbf=∠bfd, b,d,a are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line => ∠abc equals the intersection angle of bc and df. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; coll b d a; cong d f d a; coll b f c ? eqangle b c a b d f b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; da=db; b,d,a are on the same line; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, df=da => d is the circumcenter of Δabf; b,a,d are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line, ab⟂ac => da⟂ae; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, da⟂ae => ∠eab=∠afb; ∠eab=∠afb, e,c,a are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line => ∠cab equals the intersection angle of af and bc. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong d a d b; coll b d a; cong d f d a; coll b f c; coll e c a ? eqangle a c a b a f b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; da=db; b,d,a are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, df=da => d is the circumcenter of Δabf; da=db, df=da => db=df; b,a,d are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line, ab⟂ac => da⟂ae; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, da⟂ae => ∠eab=∠afb; db=df => ∠dbf=∠bfd; b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; e,c,a are on the same line, ∠eab=∠afb, b,f,c are on the same line, ∠dbf=∠bfd, b,d,a are on the same line, bc∥de => ∠edf=∠eaf; ∠edf=∠eaf => e,d,a,f are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong d a d b; coll b d a; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a; coll b f c ? cyclic e d a f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; de∥bc, b,d,a are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => ab/ad = ac/ae; ab/ad = ac/ae, df=da, ea=ec => ba/fd = ca/ce. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a ? eqratio b a f d c a e c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_11. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; de∥bc, b,d,a are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => ab/ad = ac/ae; ab/ad = ac/ae, df=da, ea=ec => ba/fd = ca/ce. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a ? eqratio f d b a e c c a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_17. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; de∥bc, b,d,a are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => ba/bc = da/de; ba/bc = da/de, df=da => ba/bc = df/de. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a ? eqratio b c b a e d f d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_18. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; de∥bc, e,c,a are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ca/cb = ea/ed; ca/cb = ea/ed, ea=ec => ca/cb = ec/ed. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c ? eqratio c a b c e c e d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_19. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; de∥bc, e,c,a are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ca/cb = ea/ed; ca/cb = ea/ed, ea=ec => ca/cb = ec/ed. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c ? eqratio b c c a e d e c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,a,c are on the same line, b,a,d are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ec⟂bd; da=db, df=da => d is the circumcenter of Δabf; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, b,d,a are on the same line => bf⟂fa; ec⟂bd, bf⟂fa => the intersection angle of ec and bf is equal to the intersection angle of bd and fa; the intersection angle of ec and bf is equal to the intersection angle of bd and fa, e,c,a are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠acb=∠baf. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b d a; cong d a d b; cong d f d a; coll b f c; coll e c a ? eqangle a c b c a b a f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_21. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,a,c are on the same line, b,a,d are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ec⟂bd; da=db, df=da => d is the circumcenter of Δabf; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, b,d,a are on the same line => bf⟂fa; ec⟂bd, bf⟂fa => the intersection angle of ec and bf is equal to the intersection angle of bd and fa; the intersection angle of ec and bf is equal to the intersection angle of bd and fa, e,c,a are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠acb=∠baf. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b d a; cong d a d b; cong d f d a; coll b f c; coll e c a ? eqangle b c a c a f a b. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_22. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; b,d,a are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; b,f,c are on the same line; df=da. 步骤: da=db, df=da => d is the circumcenter of Δabf; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, b,d,a are on the same line => bf⟂fa; b,c,f are on the same line, bf⟂fa => cf⟂fa; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; cf⟂fa, e is the midpoint of a and c => ce=fe. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; coll b d a; coll e c a; cong e a e c; coll b f c; cong d f d a ? cong c e f e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_23. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: df=da, da=db => db=df; db=df => ∠dbf=∠bfd; b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠dbf=∠bfd, b,f,c are on the same line, bc∥de => ∠ade=∠edf; df=da, ∠ade=∠edf => ∠dae=∠efd; ∠dae=∠efd, b,d,a are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => ∠bac=∠efd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a; coll b f c ? eqangle a b a c e f d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_24. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: df=da, da=db => db=df; db=df => ∠dbf=∠bfd; b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠dbf=∠bfd, b,f,c are on the same line, bc∥de => ∠ade=∠edf; df=da, ∠ade=∠edf => ∠dae=∠efd; ∠dae=∠efd, b,d,a are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => ∠bac=∠efd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a; coll b f c ? eqangle a c a b d f e f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: df=da, da=db => db=df; db=df => ∠dbf=∠bfd; b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠dbf=∠bfd, b,f,c are on the same line, bc∥de => ∠ade=∠edf; df=da, ∠ade=∠edf => ∠dae=∠efd; ∠dae=∠efd, b,d,a are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and ef is equal to the intersection angle of ac and df. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a; coll b f c ? eqangle a b e f a c d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_27. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: df=da, da=db => db=df; db=df => ∠dbf=∠bfd; b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠dbf=∠bfd, b,f,c are on the same line, bc∥de => ∠ade=∠edf; df=da, ∠ade=∠edf => ∠aed=∠def; ∠aed=∠def, e,c,a are on the same line, de∥bc => ∠acb equals the intersection angle of bc and ef. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a; coll b f c ? eqangle a c b c b c e f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; da=db; e,c,a are on the same line; ea=ec; df=da; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: df=da, da=db => db=df; db=df => ∠dbf=∠bfd; b,d,a are on the same line, da=db => d is the midpoint of a and b; e,c,a are on the same line, ea=ec => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠dbf=∠bfd, b,f,c are on the same line, bc∥de => ∠ade=∠edf; df=da, ∠ade=∠edf => ∠aed=∠def; ∠aed=∠def, e,c,a are on the same line, de∥bc => ∠acb equals the intersection angle of bc and ef. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; cong d a d b; coll e c a; cong e a e c; cong d f d a; coll b f c ? eqangle b c a c e f b c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_29. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; da=db; b,d,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; df=da; e,c,a are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, df=da => d is the circumcenter of Δabf; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, b,d,a are on the same line => bf⟂fa; b,c,f are on the same line, bf⟂fa => ∠afb=∠cfa; b,a,d are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line, ab⟂ac => da⟂ae; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, da⟂ae => ∠eab=∠afb; b,c,f are on the same line, ∠eab=∠afb, e,c,a are on the same line => ∠abf=∠caf; ∠afb=∠cfa, ∠abf=∠caf => af/ab = cf/ca. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong d a d b; coll b d a; coll b f c; cong d f d a; coll e c a ? eqratio f a b a c f c a. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_36. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; da=db; b,d,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; df=da; e,c,a are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, df=da => d is the circumcenter of Δabf; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, b,d,a are on the same line => bf⟂fa; b,c,f are on the same line, bf⟂fa => ∠afb=∠cfa; b,a,d are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line, ab⟂ac => da⟂ae; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, da⟂ae => ∠eab=∠afb; b,c,f are on the same line, ∠eab=∠afb, e,c,a are on the same line => ∠abf=∠caf; ∠afb=∠cfa, ∠abf=∠caf => ba/bf = ac/af. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong d a d b; coll b d a; coll b f c; cong d f d a; coll e c a ? eqratio b f b a f a c a. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_4_37. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o a; p = on_circle p o a; f = foot f p a d; g = foot g p a b; h = foot h p b c; e = foot e p c d; i = on_line i f g, on_line i h e ? cyclic p g i h. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; da=db; b,d,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; df=da; e,c,a are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, df=da => d is the circumcenter of Δabf; b,a,d are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line, ab⟂ac => da⟂ae; d is the circumcenter of Δabf, da⟂ae => ∠eab=∠afb; b,c,f are on the same line, ∠eab=∠afb, e,c,a are on the same line => ∠bac=∠cfa; b,c,f are on the same line => ∠bca=∠fca; ∠bac=∠cfa, ∠bca=∠fca => ba/bc = af/ac. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong d a d b; coll b d a; coll b f c; cong d f d a; coll e c a ? eqratio b a b c f a c a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_5_39. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; h = orthocenter h a b c; o = circle o a b c; c1 = on_circle c1 o c, on_line c1 c h; a1 = on_circle a1 o a, on_line a1 a h ? cong b a1 b c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ae=ab; be=bc. 步骤: ac=ab, ae=ab, ad=ab => b,e,d,c are on the same circle; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠ceb=∠cdb; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bde=∠bce; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠dbc=∠dec; be=bc => ∠bce=∠ceb; ∠ceb=∠cdb, ∠bce=∠ceb, ∠bde=∠bce => ∠bde=∠cdb; ∠bde=∠cdb, ∠dbc=∠dec => the intersection angle of bd and ce is equal to ∠dcb. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong a e a b; cong b e b c ? eqangle b d c e c d b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_5_40. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; h = orthocenter h a b c; o = circle o a b c; c1 = on_circle c1 o c, on_line c1 c h; a1 = on_circle a1 o a, on_line a1 a h ? cong b a1 b c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ae=ab; be=bc. 步骤: ac=ab, ae=ab, ad=ab => b,e,d,c are on the same circle; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠ceb=∠cdb; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bde=∠bce; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠dbc=∠dec; be=bc => ∠bce=∠ceb; ∠ceb=∠cdb, ∠bce=∠ceb, ∠bde=∠bce => ∠bde=∠cdb; ∠bde=∠cdb, ∠dbc=∠dec => the intersection angle of bd and ce is equal to ∠dcb. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong a e a b; cong b e b c ? eqangle c e b d b c c d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_5_49. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; h = orthocenter h a b c; o = circle o a b c; c1 = on_circle c1 o c, on_line c1 c h; a1 = on_circle a1 o a, on_line a1 a h ? cong b a1 b c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ae=ab; be=bc; c,d,f are on the same line; bf=bc. 步骤: ac=ab, ae=ab, ad=ab => b,e,d,c are on the same circle; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠ceb=∠cdb; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bde=∠bce; b,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bed=∠bcd; be=bc => ∠bce=∠ceb; d,c,f are on the same line, ∠ceb=∠cdb, ∠bce=∠ceb, ∠bde=∠bce => ∠bde=∠fdb; bf=bc => ∠bcf=∠cfb; f,d,c are on the same line, ∠bcf=∠cfb, ∠bed=∠bcd => ∠bed=∠dfb; ∠bde=∠fdb, ∠bed=∠dfb => de=df. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong a e a b; cong b e b c; coll c d f; cong b f b c ? cong d e d f. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_9_24. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; p = midpoint p b a; q = midpoint q c b; d = on_tline d b a c; r = midpoint r d c; s = midpoint s a d; o = on_line o p r, on_line o q s ? cong o s o r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=ab; ed∥ba; b,e,c are on the same line; fd∥ca; f,b,c are on the same line. 步骤: de∥ab, df∥ac => ∠edf=∠bac; f,b,c are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line, df∥ac => ∠efd=∠bca; ∠edf=∠bac, ∠efd=∠bca => ab/ac = de/df; ab/ac = de/df, ca=ab => de=df. 生成题目的FL: cong c a a b; para e d b a; coll b e c; para f d c a; coll f b c ? cong d e d f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠dca=∠bcd; a,c,e are on the same line; de⟂ac; b,c,f are on the same line; df⟂bc. 步骤: c,a,e are on the same line, c,f,b are on the same line, df⟂bc, de⟂ac => ∠dec=∠cfd; c,a,e are on the same line, c,f,b are on the same line, ∠dca=∠bcd => ∠dce=∠fcd; ∠dec=∠cfd, ∠dce=∠fcd => de=df. 生成题目的FL: eqangle c d a c b c c d; coll a c e; perp d e a c; coll b c f; perp d f b c ? cong d e d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ba=be; ea=ab; bc=cf; fb=bc. 步骤: ba=be, bc=cf, fb=bc => ba/be = fb/fc; ea=ab, ab=be, cb=cf => ea/eb = cb/cf; ba/be = fb/fc, ea/eb = cb/cf => ∠bae=∠cbf; ∠bae=∠cbf, ab∥cd => the intersection angle of cd and ae is equal to ∠cbf. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; cong b a b e; cong e a a b; cong b c c f; cong f b b c ? eqangle c d a e b c b f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_23. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ba=be; ea=ab; bc=bf; bc=cf. 步骤: ba=be, bc=bf => ba/be = bc/bf; ea=ab, ab=be, bc=cf, fb=bc => ea/eb = fc/fb; ba/be = bc/bf, ea/eb = fc/fb => the intersection angle of ae and bf is equal to the intersection angle of be and cf. 生成题目的FL: cong b a b e; cong e a a b; cong b c b f; cong b c c f ? eqangle b f a e c f b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_24. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ab=be; ea=ab; fb=bc; cf=cb. 步骤: ba=be, bf=bc => ba/be = bf/bc; ea=ab, ab=be, cf=cb => ea/eb = cf/cb; ba/be = bf/bc, ea/eb = cf/cb => ∠abf=∠ebc; ab=be, fb=bc, ∠abf=∠ebc => ∠baf=∠bec; ∠baf=∠bec, ab∥cd => the intersection angle of cd and af is equal to ∠bec. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; cong a b b e; cong e a a b; cong f b b c; cong c f c b ? eqangle c d a f b e c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ab=be; ea=ab; fb=bc; cf=cb. 步骤: ba=be, bf=bc => ba/be = bf/bc; ea=ab, ab=be, cf=cb => ea/eb = cf/cb; ba/be = bf/bc, ea/eb = cf/cb => ∠abf=∠ebc; ab=be, fb=bc, ∠abf=∠ebc => ∠baf=∠bec; ∠baf=∠bec, ab∥cd => the intersection angle of cd and af is equal to ∠bec. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; cong a b b e; cong e a a b; cong f b b c; cong c f c b ? eqangle a f c d c e b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=be; ea=ab; fb=bc; cf=cb. 步骤: ba=be, bf=bc => ba/be = bf/bc; ea=ab, ab=be, cf=cb => ea/eb = cf/cb; ba/be = bf/bc, ea/eb = cf/cb => ∠abf=∠ebc; ab=be, fb=bc, ∠abf=∠ebc => fa=ce. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b e; cong e a a b; cong f b b c; cong c f c b ? cong f a c e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_31. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; ab=be; ea=ab; bc=cf; fb=bc. 步骤: ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab=be, cd=ab => dc=eb; bc=cf, fb=bc => fb=fc; ba=be, fb=fc => ba/be = fb/fc; ea=ab, ab=be, cb=cf => ea/eb = cb/cf; ba/be = fb/fc, ea/eb = cb/cf => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠ebf; the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠ebf, ab∥cd => ∠dcf=∠ebf; dc=eb, fb=fc, ∠dcf=∠ebf => ∠cdf=∠bef. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; cong a b b e; cong e a a b; cong b c c f; cong f b b c ? eqangle c d d f b e e f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; ab=be; ea=ab; bc=cf; fb=bc. 步骤: ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab=be, cd=ab => dc=eb; bc=cf, fb=bc => fb=fc; ba=be, fb=fc => ba/be = fb/fc; ea=ab, ab=be, cb=cf => ea/eb = cb/cf; ba/be = fb/fc, ea/eb = cb/cf => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠ebf; the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠ebf, ab∥cd => ∠dcf=∠ebf; dc=eb, fb=fc, ∠dcf=∠ebf => ∠cdf=∠bef. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; cong a b b e; cong e a a b; cong b c c f; cong f b b c ? eqangle d f c d e f b e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_33. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; ab=be; ea=ab; bc=cf; fb=bc. 步骤: ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab=be, cd=ab => dc=eb; bc=cf, fb=bc => fb=fc; ba=be, fb=fc => ba/be = fb/fc; ea=ab, ab=be, cb=cf => ea/eb = cb/cf; ba/be = fb/fc, ea/eb = cb/cf => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠ebf; the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠ebf, ab∥cd => ∠dcf=∠ebf; dc=eb, fb=fc, ∠dcf=∠ebf => the intersection angle of cd and be is equal to ∠dfe. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; cong a b b e; cong e a a b; cong b c c f; cong f b b c ? eqangle c d b e d f e f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; ab=be; ea=ab; bc=cf; fb=bc. 步骤: ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab=be, cd=ab => dc=eb; bc=cf, fb=bc => fb=fc; ba=be, fb=fc => ba/be = fb/fc; ea=ab, ab=be, cb=cf => ea/eb = cb/cf; ba/be = fb/fc, ea/eb = cb/cf => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠ebf; the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠ebf, ab∥cd => ∠dcf=∠ebf; dc=eb, fb=fc, ∠dcf=∠ebf => the intersection angle of cd and be is equal to ∠dfe. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; cong a b b e; cong e a a b; cong b c c f; cong f b b c ? eqangle b e c d e f d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_46. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; c,d,e are on the same line; cd=ce; b,e,f are on the same line; af=ab. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠dbc=∠dfc; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; f,b,e are on the same line, ∠bdc=∠bfc, ∠cdb=∠dbc, ∠dbc=∠dfc => ∠dfc=∠cfe; ∠dfc=∠cfe, c,d,e are on the same line => cd/ce = fd/fe; cd/ce = fd/fe, cd=ce => fd=fe. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; coll c d e; cong c d c e; coll b e f; cong a f a b ? cong f d f e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_36. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠dfe=∠bce; ce=cb => ∠cbe=∠bec; ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠def=∠bec; ∠dfe=∠bce, ∠def=∠bec => cb/ce = fd/fe; cb/ce = fd/fe, ce=cb => fd=fe. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? cong f d f e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_38. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; ea=ab; ba=be; bc=cf; fb=bc. 步骤: ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => da=bc; ea=ab, cd=ab => dc=ea; da=bc, bc=cf => cf=ad; ba=be, bc=cf, fb=bc => ba/be = fc/fb; ea=ab, ab=be, bc=bf => ea/eb = bc/bf; ba/be = fc/fb, ea/eb = bc/bf => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bc; the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠ead=∠dcf; dc=ea, cf=ad, ∠ead=∠dcf => ∠cdf=∠aed. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; cong e a a b; cong b a b e; cong b c c f; cong f b b c ? eqangle c d d f a e d e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_39. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; ea=ab; ba=be; bc=cf; fb=bc. 步骤: ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => da=bc; ea=ab, cd=ab => dc=ea; da=bc, bc=cf => cf=ad; ba=be, bc=cf, fb=bc => ba/be = fc/fb; ea=ab, ab=be, bc=bf => ea/eb = bc/bf; ba/be = fc/fb, ea/eb = bc/bf => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bc; the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠ead=∠dcf; dc=ea, cf=ad, ∠ead=∠dcf => ∠cdf=∠aed. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; cong e a a b; cong b a b e; cong b c c f; cong f b b c ? eqangle d f c d d e a e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_45. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad∥bc; ab∥cd; ea=ab; ab=be; fb=bc; bc=cf. 步骤: ea=ab, ab=be => eb=ea; ad∥bc, ab∥cd => da=bc; da=bc, fb=bc => bf=ad; ba=be, bc=cf, fb=bc => ba/be = fc/fb; ea=eb, bc=bf => ea/eb = bc/bf; ba/be = fc/fb, ea/eb = bc/bf => the intersection angle of ae and bc is equal to ∠ebf; ∠ebf equals the intersection angle of ae and bc, bc∥ad => ∠ebf=∠ead; eb=ea, bf=ad, ∠ebf=∠ead => ∠bea=∠fed. 生成题目的FL: para a d b c; para a b c d; cong e a a b; cong a b b e; cong f b b c; cong b c c f ? eqangle b e a e e f d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_6_46. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; o = circle o a b c; p = foot p o a c; q = foot q o a b; m = on_line m o q, on_circle m o a; n = on_line n o p, on_circle n o a; e = on_line e a c, on_line e n m; d = on_line d a b, on_line d n m ? eqangle d a d e e d e a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad∥bc; ab∥cd; ea=ab; ab=be; fb=bc; bc=cf. 步骤: ea=ab, ab=be => eb=ea; ad∥bc, ab∥cd => da=bc; da=bc, fb=bc => bf=ad; ba=be, bc=cf, fb=bc => ba/be = fc/fb; ea=eb, bc=bf => ea/eb = bc/bf; ba/be = fc/fb, ea/eb = bc/bf => the intersection angle of ae and bc is equal to ∠ebf; ∠ebf equals the intersection angle of ae and bc, bc∥ad => ∠ebf=∠ead; eb=ea, bf=ad, ∠ebf=∠ead => ∠bea=∠fed. 生成题目的FL: para a d b c; para a b c d; cong e a a b; cong a b b e; cong f b b c; cong b c c f ? eqangle a e b e d e e f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_7_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; f = free f; p = circle p a b f; o = circle o a b c; e = on_circle e p a, on_line e a c; d = on_circle d o b, on_line d b f ? para c d e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ab=ac; d,c,b are on the same line; dc=db; a,f,b are on the same line. 步骤: a,f,b are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ac⟂af; ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂dc; ac⟂af, da⟂dc => ∠fad=∠acd; ∠fad=∠acd, a,f,b are on the same line, d,c,b are on the same line => ∠bad=∠acb. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong a b a c; coll d c b; cong d c d b; coll a f b ? eqangle a b a d a c b c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_7_11. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; f = free f; p = circle p a b f; o = circle o a b c; e = on_circle e p a, on_line e a c; d = on_circle d o b, on_line d b f ? para c d e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ab=ac; d,c,b are on the same line; dc=db; a,f,b are on the same line. 步骤: a,f,b are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ac⟂af; ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂dc; ac⟂af, da⟂dc => ∠fad=∠acd; ∠fad=∠acd, a,f,b are on the same line, d,c,b are on the same line => ∠bad=∠acb. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong a b a c; coll d c b; cong d c d b; coll a f b ? eqangle a d a b b c a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_7_12. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; f = free f; p = circle p a b f; o = circle o a b c; e = on_circle e p a, on_line e a c; d = on_circle d o b, on_line d b f ? para c d e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ab⟂ac; d,c,b are on the same line; dc=db. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, bc⟂ad, ab⟂ac => ∠cab=∠adc; ab=ac => ∠acb=∠cba; d,c,b are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cba=∠acd; ∠cab=∠adc, ∠cba=∠acd => ca/cb = ad/ac. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; perp a b a c; coll d c b; cong d c d b ? eqratio a c c b d a a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_7_13. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; f = free f; p = circle p a b f; o = circle o a b c; e = on_circle e p a, on_line e a c; d = on_circle d o b, on_line d b f ? para c d e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ab⟂ac; d,c,b are on the same line; dc=db. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, bc⟂ad, ab⟂ac => ∠cab=∠adc; ab=ac => ∠acb=∠cba; d,c,b are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cba=∠acd; ∠cab=∠adc, ∠cba=∠acd => ca/cb = ad/ac. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; perp a b a c; coll d c b; cong d c d b ? eqratio c b a c a c d a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_7_14. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; f = free f; p = circle p a b f; o = circle o a b c; e = on_circle e p a, on_line e a c; d = on_circle d o b, on_line d b f ? para c d e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ab⟂ac; d,c,b are on the same line; dc=db; ce=ca; c,e,b are on the same line; af=ad; a,f,b are on the same line. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, bc⟂ad, ab⟂ac => ∠cab=∠adc; ab=ac => ∠acb=∠cba; d,c,b are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cba=∠acd; ∠cab=∠adc, ∠cba=∠acd => cb/ca = ac/ad; cb/ca = ac/ad, ce=ac, ab=ac, af=da => cb/ce = ab/af; cb/ce = ab/af, c,e,b are on the same line, a,f,b are on the same line => ca∥ef. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; perp a b a c; coll d c b; cong d c d b; cong c e c a; coll c e b; cong a f a d; coll a f b ? para a c e f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio O A A C O B B D, coll O A C, coll O B D, ncoll A B C, sameside A O C B O D => para A B C D; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 若OA:AC = OB:BD，且O、A、C共线，O、B、D共线，A、B、C不共线，且A、O、C和B、O、D在同侧，则AB平行于CD【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_7_15. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; f = free f; p = circle p a b f; o = circle o a b c; e = on_circle e p a, on_line e a c; d = on_circle d o b, on_line d b f ? para c d e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ab=ac; d,c,b are on the same line; dc=db; ca=ce; c,e,b are on the same line; ad=af; a,f,b are on the same line. 步骤: ca=ce, ad=af => ca/ce = ad/af; a,f,b are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ac⟂af; ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂dc; ac⟂af, da⟂dc => ∠fad=∠acd; c,e,b are on the same line, a,f,b are on the same line, ∠fad=∠acd, d,c,b are on the same line => ∠ace=∠fad; ca/ce = ad/af, ∠ace=∠fad => ∠cae=∠fda. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong a b a c; coll d c b; cong d c d b; cong c a c e; coll c e b; cong a d a f; coll a f b ? eqangle a c a e d f a d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_7_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; f = free f; p = circle p a b f; o = circle o a b c; e = on_circle e p a, on_line e a c; d = on_circle d o b, on_line d b f ? para c d e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ab=ac; d,c,b are on the same line; dc=db; ca=ce; c,e,b are on the same line; ad=af; a,f,b are on the same line. 步骤: ca=ce, ad=af => ca/ce = ad/af; a,f,b are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ac⟂af; ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂dc; ac⟂af, da⟂dc => ∠fad=∠acd; c,e,b are on the same line, a,f,b are on the same line, ∠fad=∠acd, d,c,b are on the same line => ∠ace=∠fad; ca/ce = ad/af, ∠ace=∠fad => ∠aec=∠afd; ∠aec=∠afd, c,e,b are on the same line, a,f,b are on the same line => ∠eab equals the intersection angle of bc and df. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong a b a c; coll d c b; cong d c d b; cong c a c e; coll c e b; cong a d a f; coll a f b ? eqangle a b a e d f b c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
