原始题号:update_pics1/output_7_22. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; f = free f; p = circle p a b f; o = circle o a b c; e = on_circle e p a, on_line e a c; d = on_circle d o b, on_line d b f ? para c d e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ab=ac; d,c,b are on the same line; dc=db; ca=ce; c,e,b are on the same line; ad=af; a,f,b are on the same line. 步骤: ca=ce, ad=af => ca/ce = ad/af; a,f,b are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ac⟂af; ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂dc; ac⟂af, da⟂dc => ∠fad=∠acd; c,e,b are on the same line, a,f,b are on the same line, ∠fad=∠acd, d,c,b are on the same line => ∠ace=∠fad; ca/ce = ad/af, ∠ace=∠fad => ac/ae = da/df. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong a b a c; coll d c b; cong d c d b; cong c a c e; coll c e b; cong a d a f; coll a f b ? eqratio a e a c d f d a. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_8_4. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; g = foot g c a b; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o c, on_line d c g; e = foot e d a c; f = foot f d b c ? cyclic a e f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; b,a,e are on the same line; ae=ab; fa∥ce; c,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line => d,a,e are on the same line; af∥ce, c,f,d are on the same line, d,a,e are on the same line => fd/fc = ad/ae; fd/fc = ad/ae, ae=ab => fd/fc = ad/ab. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; coll b a e; cong a e a b; para f a c e; coll c f d ? eqratio f d c f d a b a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_8_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; g = foot g c a b; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o c, on_line d c g; e = foot e d a c; f = foot f d b c ? cyclic a e f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; b,a,e are on the same line; ae=ab; fa∥ce; c,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line => d,a,e are on the same line; af∥ce, c,f,d are on the same line, d,a,e are on the same line => fd/fc = ad/ae; fd/fc = ad/ae, ae=ab => fd/fc = ad/ab. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; coll b a e; cong a e a b; para f a c e; coll c f d ? eqratio c f f d b a d a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_8_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; g = foot g c a b; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o c, on_line d c g; e = foot e d a c; f = foot f d b c ? cyclic a e f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,a are on the same line; b,a,e are on the same line; ae=ab; fa∥ce; c,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,a are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line => d,a,e are on the same line; af∥ce, c,f,d are on the same line, d,a,e are on the same line => cd/cf = ed/ea; cd/cf = ed/ea, ae=ab => cd/cf = ed/ba. 生成题目的FL: coll b d a; coll b a e; cong a e a b; para f a c e; coll c f d ? eqratio c f c d b a e d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_8_18. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; g = foot g c a b; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o c, on_line d c g; e = foot e d a c; f = foot f d b c ? cyclic a e f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ae=ab; b,a,e are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ae=ab => ae=ac; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; ∠aec=∠eca, b,a,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to ∠eca. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a e a b; coll b a e ? eqangle a b c e c e a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_42. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; bf⟂bd; cf⟂cd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fbc=∠bac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, cf⟂cd => ∠bcf=∠bac; ∠fbc=∠bac, ∠bcf=∠bac => ∠bcf=∠fbc; ∠bcf=∠fbc => fb=fc. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b f b d; perp c f c d ? cong f b f c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_8_33. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; g = foot g c a b; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o c, on_line d c g; e = foot e d a c; f = foot f d b c ? cyclic a e f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; cd⟂ac; ae=ab; b,a,e are on the same line; c,f,d are on the same line; fa∥ce. 步骤: ac=ab, ae=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcbe; ac=ab, ae=ab => ae=ac; a is the circumcenter of Δcbe, b,a,e are on the same line => bc⟂ce; c,f,d are on the same line, cd⟂ac, bc⟂ce => ∠bce=∠fca; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; e,b,a are on the same line, ∠aec=∠eca, ce∥af => ∠bec=∠fac; ∠bce=∠fca, ∠bec=∠fac => bc/be = fc/fa. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; perp c d a c; cong a e a b; coll b a e; coll c f d; para f a c e ? eqratio b c b e c f f a. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_8_43. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; g = foot g c a b; o = circle o a b c; d = on_circle d o c, on_line d c g; e = foot e d a c; f = foot f d b c ? cyclic a e f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; b,d,a are on the same line; cd⟂ac; ae=ab; b,a,e are on the same line; c,f,d are on the same line; fa∥ce. 步骤: ac=ab, ae=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcbe; c,f,d are on the same line, ac⟂cd => ac⟂cf; a is the circumcenter of Δcbe, ac⟂cf => ∠fcb=∠ceb; b,d,a are on the same line, c,f,d are on the same line, ∠fcb=∠ceb, b,a,e are on the same line, ce∥af => ∠dbc=∠afd; b,d,a are on the same line, ∠fcb=∠ceb, c,f,d are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce∥af => ∠dcb=∠fad; ∠dbc=∠afd, ∠dcb=∠fad => db/dc = df/da. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll b d a; perp c d a c; cong a e a b; coll b a e; coll c f d; para f a c e ? eqratio b d c d f d d a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_9_17. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; p = midpoint p b a; q = midpoint q c b; d = on_tline d b a c; r = midpoint r d c; s = midpoint s a d; o = on_line o p r, on_line o q s ? cong o s o r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=ab; ab=bc; db=dc; da=db. 步骤: ca=ab, ab=bc => cb=ca; db=dc, da=db => da=dc; cb=ca, da=dc, db=dc => ∠bca=∠bdc. 生成题目的FL: cong c a a b; cong a b b c; cong d b d c; cong d a d b ? eqangle b c a c b d c d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_9_18. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; p = midpoint p b a; q = midpoint q c b; d = on_tline d b a c; r = midpoint r d c; s = midpoint s a d; o = on_line o p r, on_line o q s ? cong o s o r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=ab; ab=bc; db=dc; da=db. 步骤: ca=ab, ab=bc => cb=ca; db=dc, da=db => da=dc; cb=ca, da=dc, db=dc => ∠bca=∠bdc. 生成题目的FL: cong c a a b; cong a b b c; cong d b d c; cong d a d b ? eqangle a c b c c d b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_9_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; p = midpoint p b a; q = midpoint q c b; d = on_tline d b a c; r = midpoint r d c; s = midpoint s a d; o = on_line o p r, on_line o q s ? cong o s o r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bc; db=dc; da=db; b,e,c are on the same line; ed∥ba. 步骤: db=dc, da=db => da=dc; ab=bc, da=dc => ∠cbd=∠dba; b,e,c are on the same line, ∠cbd=∠dba, ab∥de => ∠ebd=∠bde; ∠ebd=∠bde => eb=ed. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b c; cong d b d c; cong d a d b; coll b e c; para e d b a ? cong e b e d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_57_27. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d a c b; e = on_line e b c; f = on_circle f d a, angle_bisector f a c e ? cong a f f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; dc∥ab; b,e,d are on the same line; c,e,a are on the same line. 步骤: ad∥bc, b,e,d are on the same line, c,e,a are on the same line => bc/da = eb/ed; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => bc=da; bc/da = eb/ed, bc=da => eb=ed. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; para d c a b; coll b e d; coll c e a ? cong e b e d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_9_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; p = midpoint p b a; q = midpoint q c b; d = on_tline d b a c; r = midpoint r d c; s = midpoint s a d; o = on_line o p r, on_line o q s ? cong o s o r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=ab; db=dc; ed∥ba; b,e,c are on the same line; fd∥ca; f,b,c are on the same line. 步骤: de∥ab, df∥ac => ∠edf=∠bac; f,b,c are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line, df∥ac => ∠efd=∠bca; ∠edf=∠bac, ∠efd=∠bca => ab/ac = de/df; ab/ac = de/df, ca=ab => de=df; ca=ab, db=dc => ∠cad=∠dab; ∠cad=∠dab, ac∥df, ab∥de => ∠fda=∠ade; de=df, ∠fda=∠ade => af=ae. 生成题目的FL: cong c a a b; cong d b d c; para e d b a; coll b e c; para f d c a; coll f b c ? cong a f a e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_9_35. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; p = midpoint p b a; q = midpoint q c b; d = on_tline d b a c; r = midpoint r d c; s = midpoint s a d; o = on_line o p r, on_line o q s ? cong o s o r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=bc; ca=ab; db=dc; da=db; b,e,c are on the same line; ed∥ba; f,b,c are on the same line; fd∥ca. 步骤: db=dc, da=db => da=dc; ab=bc, da=dc => ∠dcb=∠bad; ab=bc, da=dc => ∠cbd=∠dba; f,b,c are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dcb => ∠bad=∠dcf; ca=ab => ∠acb=∠cba; ab=bc, db=dc, da=db => ∠cba=∠bda; f,b,c are on the same line, ∠acb=∠cba, ∠cba=∠bda, ac∥df => ∠bda=∠dfc; ∠bad=∠dcf, ∠bda=∠dfc => ba/bd = dc/df; b,e,c are on the same line, ∠cbd=∠dba, ab∥de => ∠ebd=∠bde; ∠ebd=∠bde => eb=ed; de∥ab, df∥ac => ∠edf=∠bac; f,b,c are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line, df∥ac => ∠efd=∠bca; ∠edf=∠bac, ∠efd=∠bca => ab/ac = de/df; ba/bd = dc/df, db=dc, eb=ed, ab/ac = de/df, ca=ab => ba/bd = bd/be. 生成题目的FL: cong a b b c; cong c a a b; cong d b d c; cong d a d b; coll b e c; para e d b a; coll f b c; para f d c a ? eqratio a b b d b d b e. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_21. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, bc⟂ab => ∠abc=∠eba; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; b,c,e are on the same line, ∠aec=∠eca => ∠acb=∠bea; ∠abc=∠eba, ∠acb=∠bea => ∠bac=∠eab. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; coll b c e; cong a e a c ? eqangle a b a c a e a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_22. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, bc⟂ab => ∠abc=∠eba; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; b,c,e are on the same line, ∠aec=∠eca => ∠acb=∠bea; ∠abc=∠eba, ∠acb=∠bea => ∠bac=∠eab. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; coll b c e; cong a e a c ? eqangle a c a b a b a e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_24. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd⟂ad; c,d,f are on the same line; af=ac. 步骤: f,c,d are on the same line, cd⟂ad => ∠adc=∠fda; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; f,c,d are on the same line, ∠acf=∠cfa => ∠acd=∠dfa; ∠adc=∠fda, ∠acd=∠dfa => ∠dac=∠fad. 生成题目的FL: perp c d a d; coll c d f; cong a f a c ? eqangle a d a c a f a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_25. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd⟂ad; c,d,f are on the same line; af=ac. 步骤: f,c,d are on the same line, cd⟂ad => ∠adc=∠fda; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; f,c,d are on the same line, ∠acf=∠cfa => ∠acd=∠dfa; ∠adc=∠fda, ∠acd=∠dfa => ∠dac=∠fad. 生成题目的FL: perp c d a d; coll c d f; cong a f a c ? eqangle a c a d a d a f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_26. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd⟂ad; c,d,f are on the same line; af=ac. 步骤: f,c,d are on the same line, cd⟂ad => ∠adc=∠fda; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; f,c,d are on the same line, ∠acf=∠cfa => ∠acd=∠dfa; ∠adc=∠fda, ∠acd=∠dfa => dc=df. 生成题目的FL: perp c d a d; coll c d f; cong a f a c ? cong d c d f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_27. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac; c,d,f are on the same line; af=ac. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, bc⟂ab => ∠abc=∠eba; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; b,c,e are on the same line, ∠aec=∠eca => ∠acb=∠bea; ∠abc=∠eba, ∠acb=∠bea => bc=be; b,c,e are on the same line, bc=be => b is the midpoint of c and e; f,c,d are on the same line, cd⟂ad => ∠adc=∠fda; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; f,c,d are on the same line, ∠acf=∠cfa => ∠acd=∠dfa; ∠adc=∠fda, ∠acd=∠dfa => dc=df; c,d,f are on the same line, dc=df => d is the midpoint of c and f; b is the midpoint of c and e, d is the midpoint of c and f => bd∥ef. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; coll b c e; cong a e a c; coll c d f; cong a f a c ? para b d e f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_28. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; ∠adb=∠acb, ∠dba=∠adb => ∠dba=∠acb; bc⟂ab, ∠dba=∠acb => ∠bac=∠cbd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b ? eqangle a b a c b c b d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_29. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; ∠adb=∠acb, ∠dba=∠adb => ∠dba=∠acb; bc⟂ab, ∠dba=∠acb => ∠bac=∠cbd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b ? eqangle a c a b b d b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_30. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; ∠adb=∠acb, ∠dba=∠adb => ∠dba=∠acb; bc⟂ab, ∠dba=∠acb => ∠abc equals the intersection angle of ac and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b ? eqangle a b b c a c b d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_31. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; ∠adb=∠acb, ∠dba=∠adb => ∠dba=∠acb; bc⟂ab, ∠dba=∠acb => ∠abc equals the intersection angle of ac and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b ? eqangle b c a b b d a c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_32. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab; af=ac; c,d,f are on the same line. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠abd=∠acd; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ad=ab => ∠abd=∠bda; ∠acf=∠cfa, c,d,f are on the same line, ∠abd=∠acd, ∠abd=∠bda, ∠bda=∠bca => ∠bca equals the intersection angle of cd and fa; ∠cba=∠cda, ∠bca equals the intersection angle of cd and fa => ∠bad=∠caf. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b; cong a f a c; coll c d f ? eqangle a b a d a c a f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_33. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab; af=ac; c,d,f are on the same line. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠abd=∠acd; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ad=ab => ∠abd=∠bda; ∠acf=∠cfa, c,d,f are on the same line, ∠abd=∠acd, ∠abd=∠bda, ∠bda=∠bca => ∠bca equals the intersection angle of cd and fa; ∠cba=∠cda, ∠bca equals the intersection angle of cd and fa => ∠bad=∠caf. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b; cong a f a c; coll c d f ? eqangle a d a b a f a c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_34. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab; ae=ac; b,c,e are on the same line. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠dba=∠dca; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; ∠dba=∠dca, ∠dba=∠adb, ∠adb=∠acb, ∠aec=∠eca, b,c,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠dca; ∠cba=∠cda, the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠dca => ∠bad=∠eac. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b; cong a e a c; coll b c e ? eqangle a b a d a e a c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_35. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab; ae=ac; b,c,e are on the same line. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠dba=∠dca; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; ∠dba=∠dca, ∠dba=∠adb, ∠adb=∠acb, ∠aec=∠eca, b,c,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠dca; ∠cba=∠cda, the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠dca => ∠bad=∠eac. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b; cong a e a c; coll b c e ? eqangle a d a b a c a e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_38. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab; c,d,f are on the same line; af=ac. 步骤: bc⟂ab, cd⟂ad => ∠abc=∠adc; f,c,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠adc => ∠abc=∠adf; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠dba=∠dca; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; f,c,d are on the same line, ∠acf=∠cfa, ∠dba=∠dca, ∠dba=∠adb, ∠adb=∠acb => ∠acb=∠afd; ∠abc=∠adf, ∠acb=∠afd => ab/ad = bc/df; ab/ad = bc/df, ad=ab => bc=df. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b; coll c d f; cong a f a c ? cong b c d f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_39. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ad=ab; cd⟂ad; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac. 步骤: ad=ab => ∠abd=∠bda; cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; c,b,e are on the same line, ∠abd=∠bda, ∠bda=∠bca, ∠aec=∠eca => ∠aec=∠abd; c,b,e are on the same line, ∠acb=∠adb => ∠ace=∠adb; ∠aec=∠abd, ∠ace=∠adb => ea/ec = ba/bd; ea/ec = ba/bd, ae=ac => ca/ce = ba/bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong a d a b; perp c d a d; coll b c e; cong a e a c ? eqratio c a c e b a b d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_40. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ad=ab; cd⟂ad; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac. 步骤: ad=ab => ∠abd=∠bda; cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; c,b,e are on the same line, ∠abd=∠bda, ∠bda=∠bca, ∠aec=∠eca => ∠aec=∠abd; c,b,e are on the same line, ∠acb=∠adb => ∠ace=∠adb; ∠aec=∠abd, ∠ace=∠adb => ea/ec = ba/bd; ea/ec = ba/bd, ae=ac => ca/ce = ba/bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong a d a b; perp c d a d; coll b c e; cong a e a c ? eqratio c e c a b d b a. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_41. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ad=ab; cd⟂ad; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac. 步骤: ad=ab => ∠abd=∠bda; cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; c,b,e are on the same line, ∠abd=∠bda, ∠bda=∠bca, ∠aec=∠eca => ∠aec=∠abd; c,b,e are on the same line, ∠acb=∠adb => ∠ace=∠adb; ∠aec=∠abd, ∠ace=∠adb => ae/ab = ec/bd; ae/ab = ec/bd, ae=ac => ac/ab = ce/bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong a d a b; perp c d a d; coll b c e; cong a e a c ? eqratio c a b a c e b d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_42. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ad=ab; cd⟂ad; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac. 步骤: ad=ab => ∠abd=∠bda; cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; c,b,e are on the same line, ∠abd=∠bda, ∠bda=∠bca, ∠aec=∠eca => ∠aec=∠abd; c,b,e are on the same line, ∠acb=∠adb => ∠ace=∠adb; ∠aec=∠abd, ∠ace=∠adb => ae/ab = ec/bd; ae/ab = ec/bd, ae=ac => ac/ab = ce/bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong a d a b; perp c d a d; coll b c e; cong a e a c ? eqratio b a c a b d c e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_43. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac; c,d,f are on the same line; af=ac. 步骤: cd⟂ad, bc⟂ab => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠abd=∠acd; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ad=ab => ∠abd=∠bda; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; c,b,e are on the same line, c,d,f are on the same line, ∠abd=∠acd, ∠abd=∠bda, ∠bda=∠bca, ∠aec=∠eca => ∠aec=∠acf; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; c,b,e are on the same line, d,f,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠cfa, ∠dba=∠dca, ∠dba=∠adb, ∠adb=∠acb => ∠ace=∠afc; ∠aec=∠acf, ∠ace=∠afc => ae/ac = ce/cf; ae/ac = ce/cf, ae=ac => ec=cf. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b; coll b c e; cong a e a c; coll c d f; cong a f a c ? cong e c c f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_44. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac; c,d,f are on the same line; af=ac. 步骤: bc⟂ab, cd⟂ad => ∠cba=∠adc; bc⟂ab, cd⟂ad => ∠cba=∠cda; f,c,d are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, ∠adc=∠cba => ∠adf=∠eba; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠dba=∠dca; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; f,c,d are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, ∠aec=∠eca, ∠adb=∠acb, ∠dba=∠adb, ∠dba=∠dca, ∠acf=∠cfa => ∠afd=∠bea; ∠adf=∠eba, ∠afd=∠bea => ∠dae=∠fab. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b; coll b c e; cong a e a c; coll c d f; cong a f a c ? eqangle a d a e a f a b. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_10_45. 原题FL: p a b = triangle p a b; o = midpoint o b a; a1 = on_line a1 p a, on_circle a1 o a; b1 = on_line b1 p b, on_circle b1 o a; o1 = circle o1 p a1 b1 ? perp o a1 a1 o1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd⟂ad; ad=ab; b,c,e are on the same line; ae=ac; c,d,f are on the same line; af=ac. 步骤: bc⟂ab, cd⟂ad => ∠cba=∠adc; bc⟂ab, cd⟂ad => ∠cba=∠cda; f,c,d are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, ∠adc=∠cba => ∠adf=∠eba; ae=ac => ∠aec=∠eca; ∠cba=∠cda => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠adb=∠acb; d,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠dba=∠dca; ad=ab => ∠dba=∠adb; af=ac => ∠acf=∠cfa; f,c,d are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, ∠aec=∠eca, ∠adb=∠acb, ∠dba=∠adb, ∠dba=∠dca, ∠acf=∠cfa => ∠afd=∠bea; ∠adf=∠eba, ∠afd=∠bea => ∠dae=∠fab. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp c d a d; cong a d a b; coll b c e; cong a e a c; coll c d f; cong a f a c ? eqangle a e a d a b a f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_0. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; ∠bcd=∠bfd, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of be and df. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqangle b c c d b e d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_1. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; ∠bcd=∠bfd, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of be and df. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqangle c d b c d f b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_6. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠dbe=∠dcf. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqangle b d b e c d c f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_7. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠dbe=∠dcf. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqangle b e b d c f c d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_24. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line. 步骤: cd=ce, cd=cb => cb=ce; cb=ce => ∠cbe=∠bec; ∠cbe=∠bec, c,d,e are on the same line => ∠cbe equals the intersection angle of be and cd. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e ? eqangle b c b e b e c d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_25. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line. 步骤: cd=ce, cd=cb => cb=ce; cb=ce => ∠cbe=∠bec; ∠cbe=∠bec, c,d,e are on the same line => ∠cbe equals the intersection angle of be and cd. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e ? eqangle b e b c c d b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_27. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line. 步骤: ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; bd⟂ac, bd⟂be => ac∥be. 生成题目的FL: cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e ? para a c b e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_28. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab => af=ac; af=ac => ∠afc=∠fca; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; ∠afc=∠fca, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be => ∠afc equals the intersection angle of cf and be. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b ? eqangle a f c f c f b e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_37. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ab, ac=ad, cd=cb => ∠bac=∠cad; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; ∠bac=∠cad, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be => ∠abe=∠cad. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e ? eqangle b e a b a d a c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_40. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ab, ac=ad, cd=cb => ∠bac=∠cad; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; af=ab => ∠afb=∠fba; ∠bac=∠cad, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be, ∠afb=∠fba, b,e,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of fa and be is equal to the intersection angle of da and be; the intersection angle of fa and be is equal to the intersection angle of da and be => fa∥da. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? para a f a d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_41. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ab, ac=ad, cd=cb => ∠bac=∠bcd; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; af=ab => ∠afb=∠fba; ∠bcd=∠bfd, b,e,f are on the same line, ∠bac=∠bcd, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be, ∠afb=∠fba => the intersection angle of fa and be is equal to the intersection angle of fd and be; the intersection angle of fa and be is equal to the intersection angle of fd and be => fa∥fd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? para a f d f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_42. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; cd=cb; ad=ab; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line, bd⟂be => cf⟂cd; bd⟂be, cf⟂cd => the intersection angle of bd and cf is equal to the intersection angle of be and cd; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; the intersection angle of bd and cf is equal to the intersection angle of be and cd, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be => the intersection angle of bd and cf is equal to ∠acd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong c d c b; cong a d a b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqangle b d c f a c c d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_44. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line, bd⟂be => ∠dbe=∠fcd; ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ab, ac=ad, cd=cb => ∠bac=∠bcd; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; ∠bac=∠bcd, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be => ∠abe=∠bcd; ∠dbe=∠fcd, ∠abe=∠bcd => ∠dba=∠fcb. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqangle b d a b c f b c. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_45. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line, bd⟂be => ∠dbe=∠fcd; ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ab, ac=ad, cd=cb => ∠bac=∠bcd; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; ∠bac=∠bcd, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be => ∠abe=∠bcd; ∠dbe=∠fcd, ∠abe=∠bcd => ∠dba=∠fcb. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqangle a b b d b c c f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_47. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; cd=cb, cd=ce => cb=ce; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line, bd⟂be => ∠dbe=∠fcd; cb=ce => ∠cbe=∠bec; c,d,e are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, ∠bcd=∠bfd, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠fdc=∠deb; ∠dbe=∠fcd, ∠fdc=∠deb => fc/fd = db/de. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqratio c f f d b d d e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_48. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; cd=cb, cd=ce => cb=ce; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line, bd⟂be => ∠dbe=∠fcd; cb=ce => ∠cbe=∠bec; c,d,e are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, ∠bcd=∠bfd, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠fdc=∠deb; ∠dbe=∠fcd, ∠fdc=∠deb => fc/fd = db/de. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqratio f d c f d e b d. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_49. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; cd=cb, cd=ce => cb=ce; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line, bd⟂be => ∠dbe=∠fcd; cb=ce => ∠cbe=∠bec; c,d,e are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, ∠bcd=∠bfd, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠fdc=∠deb; ∠dbe=∠fcd, ∠fdc=∠deb => cf/bd = df/de. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqratio c f b d f d d e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_61. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ab, ac=ad, cd=cb => ∠bac=∠bcd; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; af=ab => ∠afb=∠fba; ∠bac=∠bcd, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be, ∠afb=∠fba, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠caf=∠bcd; ac=ab, af=ab => af=ac; af=ac => ∠afc=∠fca; ac=ab, af=ab, ad=ab => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; ∠afc=∠fca, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be, ∠bdc=∠bfc, b,e,f are on the same line => ∠bdc=∠cfa; ∠caf=∠bcd, ∠bdc=∠cfa => ca/cf = bc/bd; ca/cf = bc/bd, ac=ab, cd=cb, cd=ce => ba/cf = ce/bd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? eqratio b a c f c e b d. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 6

原始题号:update_pics1/output_11_63. 原题FL: a b o = triangle a b o; m = on_line m a b; p = foot p m a o; q = foot q m b o; d = foot d b a o; c = foot c a b o; t = foot t q a o; k = foot k p b o; s = on_line s q t, on_line s p k ? perp o s p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; cd=cb; cd=ce; c,d,e are on the same line; af=ab; b,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ab, ac=ad, cd=cb => ∠bac=∠cad; ad=ab, cd=cb => bd⟂ac; cd=cb, cd=ce => c is the circumcenter of Δdbe; c is the circumcenter of Δdbe, c,d,e are on the same line => bd⟂be; af=ab => ∠afb=∠fba; ∠bac=∠cad, bd⟂ac, bd⟂be, ∠afb=∠fba, b,e,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of fa and be is equal to the intersection angle of da and be; the intersection angle of fa and be is equal to the intersection angle of da and be => fa∥da; af∥ad => f,d,a are on the same line. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong c d c b; cong c d c e; coll c d e; cong a f a b; coll b e f ? coll f d a. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B A C => coll A B C; eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线平行，那么它们没有公共点，除非它们是同一条直线。【平行线的性质】; 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_0. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; ef=eb; b,a,f are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,b,f,c are on the same circle => ∠dfb=∠dcb; ∠dfb=∠dcb, b,a,f are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of df and ab is equal to ∠acb. 生成题目的FL: coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; cong e f e b; coll b a f ? eqangle d f a b a c b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_1. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; ef=eb; b,a,f are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,b,f,c are on the same circle => ∠dfb=∠dcb; ∠dfb=∠dcb, b,a,f are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of df and ab is equal to ∠acb. 生成题目的FL: coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; cong e f e b; coll b a f ? eqangle a b d f b c a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_6. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; ef=eb; b,a,f are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,b,f,c are on the same circle => ∠dbf=∠dcf; ∠dbf=∠dcf, b,a,f are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of bd and ac is equal to the intersection angle of ab and cf. 生成题目的FL: coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; cong e f e b; coll b a f ? eqangle b d a c a b c f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_7. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; ef=eb; b,a,f are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,b,f,c are on the same circle => ∠dbf=∠dcf; ∠dbf=∠dcf, b,a,f are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of bd and ac is equal to the intersection angle of ab and cf. 生成题目的FL: coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; cong e f e b; coll b a f ? eqangle a c b d c f a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_12. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; ef=eb; b,a,f are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,c,a are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠acb=∠cba => ∠dcb=∠cbf; d,b,f,c are on the same circle, ∠dcb=∠cbf => db=cf. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; cong e f e b; coll b a f ? cong d b c f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_34. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; ef=eb; b,a,f are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,b,f,c are on the same circle => ∠dfb=∠dcb; ∠cba=∠acb, ∠dfb=∠dcb, b,a,f are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of df and ba is equal to ∠cba; the intersection angle of df and ba is equal to ∠cba => df∥bc. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; cong e f e b; coll b a f ? para d f b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_35. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed. 步骤: ab=ac, eb=ec => ∠ace=∠eba; ec=ed => ∠edc=∠dce; c,d,a are on the same line, ∠ace=∠eba, ∠edc=∠dce => ∠eda=∠eba; ∠eda=∠eba => e,d,b,a are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d ? cyclic e d b a. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_36. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; eb=ec; b,a,f are on the same line; ef=eb. 步骤: ef=eb => ∠ebf=∠bfe; ab=ac, eb=ec => ∠ace=∠eba; b,f,a are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠bfe, ∠ace=∠eba => ∠ace=∠afe; ∠ace=∠afe => e,f,a,c are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; cong e b e c; coll b a f; cong e f e b ? cyclic e f a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_37. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; ef=eb; b,a,f are on the same line. 步骤: ab=ac, eb=ec => ∠ace=∠eba; ec=ed => ∠edc=∠dce; c,d,a are on the same line, ∠ace=∠eba, ∠edc=∠dce => ∠eda=∠eba; ef=eb => ∠ebf=∠bfe; c,d,a are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠bfe, b,a,f are on the same line, ∠ace=∠eba => the intersection angle of da and ec is equal to the intersection angle of ba and ef; ∠eda=∠eba, the intersection angle of da and ec is equal to the intersection angle of ba and ef => ∠dec=∠bef. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; cong e f e b; coll b a f ? eqangle d e c e b e e f. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_43. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; b,a,f are on the same line; ef=eb. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,b,f,c are on the same circle => ∠dfb=∠dcb; c,d,a are on the same line, b,f,a are on the same line, ∠dfb=∠dcb, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠adf=∠dfa; ∠adf=∠dfa => ad=af. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; coll b a f; cong e f e b ? cong a d a f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_44. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; d,a,c are on the same line; ec=ed; eb=ec; ef=eb; b,a,f are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,c,a are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠acb=∠cba => ∠dcb=∠cbf; d,b,f,c are on the same circle, ∠dcb=∠cbf => db=cf; ec=ed, db=cf, ef=eb => ∠edb=∠ecf. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; coll d a c; cong e c e d; cong e b e c; cong e f e b; coll b a f ? eqangle d e b d c e c f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_52. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠abc=∠bca; ab=ac; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; b,a,f are on the same line; ef=eb. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,b,f,c are on the same circle => ∠dfb=∠dcb; b,f,a are on the same line, ∠abc=∠bca, ∠dfb=∠dcb, d,a,c are on the same line => ∠afd=∠abc; c,d,a are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb, ∠dfb=∠dcb, b,a,f are on the same line => ∠adf=∠acb; ∠afd=∠abc, ∠adf=∠acb => fa/fd = ba/bc; fa/fd = ba/bc, ab=ac => fa/fd = ca/cb. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b b c b c a c; cong a b a c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; coll b a f; cong e f e b ? eqratio a f d f a c b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_54. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠abc=∠bca; ab=ac; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; b,a,f are on the same line; ef=eb. 步骤: eb=ec, ef=eb, ec=ed => d,b,f,c are on the same circle; d,b,f,c are on the same circle => ∠dfb=∠dcb; b,f,a are on the same line, ∠abc=∠bca, ∠dfb=∠dcb, d,a,c are on the same line => ∠afd=∠abc; c,d,a are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb, ∠dfb=∠dcb, b,a,f are on the same line => ∠adf=∠acb; ∠afd=∠abc, ∠adf=∠acb => af/ab = fd/bc; af/ab = fd/bc, ab=ac => af/ac = df/bc. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b b c b c a c; cong a b a c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; coll b a f; cong e f e b ? eqratio a f a c d f b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_56. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; b,a,f are on the same line; ef=eb. 步骤: ab=ac, eb=ec => ∠ace=∠eba; ab=ac, eb=ec => ∠eca=∠abe; ec=ed => ∠edc=∠dce; a,d,c are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠ace=∠eba, ∠edc=∠dce => ∠edc=∠ebf; ef=eb => ∠ebf=∠bfe; d,c,a are on the same line, b,f,a are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠bfe, ∠eca=∠abe => ∠ecd=∠efb; ∠edc=∠ebf, ∠ecd=∠efb => ed/eb = dc/bf; ed/eb = dc/bf, eb=ec, ec=ed => dc=bf. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; coll b a f; cong e f e b ? cong d c b f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_12_57. 原题FL: m b c = triangle m b c; i = incenter i m b c; i_b = on_tline i_b c c i, on_line i_b b i; i_c = on_tline i_c b b i, on_line i_c c i; a = midpoint a i_b i_c; o = circumcenter o b i c ? perp a b b o. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; d,a,c are on the same line; eb=ec; ec=ed; b,a,f are on the same line; ef=eb. 步骤: ef=eb => ∠ebf=∠bfe; ab=ac, eb=ec => ∠ace=∠eba; ab=ac, eb=ec => ∠eac=∠bae; ec=ed => ∠edc=∠dce; c,d,a are on the same line, b,f,a are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠bfe, ∠ace=∠eba, ∠edc=∠dce => ∠eda=∠afe; d,a,c are on the same line, b,a,f are on the same line, ∠eac=∠bae => ∠ead=∠fae; ∠eda=∠afe, ∠ead=∠fae => ∠dea=∠aef. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; coll d a c; cong e b e c; cong e c e d; coll b a f; cong e f e b ? eqangle d e a e a e e f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_2. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ce⟂bc; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, bc⟂ce => bc⟂cf; bc⟂cf, df⟂bd => ∠cbd=∠cfd; ∠cbd=∠cfd, c,f,e are on the same line => ∠cbd equals the intersection angle of ce and df. 生成题目的FL: perp c e b c; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqangle b c b d c e d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_16. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; ce⟂bc; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, ce⟂bc, df⟂bd => ∠bdf=∠bcf; ∠bdf=∠bcf => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bfd=∠bcd; ∠bfd=∠bcd, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠bfd=∠bca. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; perp c e b c; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqangle b f d f b c a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_52_37. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = foot e b a c; f = foot f c a b ? eqangle a b a c e f e d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂ac; bd⟂bc; ce⟂de. 步骤: ad⟂ac, bd⟂bc => ∠dbc=∠dac; ∠dbc=∠dac => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; ce⟂de, bd⟂bc => ∠dbc=∠dec; ∠dbc=∠dec => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle, b,c,d,e are on the same circle => b,c,a,e are on the same circle; b,c,a,e are on the same circle => ∠cbe=∠cae. 生成题目的FL: perp a d a c; perp b d b c; perp c e d e ? eqangle b e b c a e a c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
