原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_31. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠eba=∠eca. 生成题目的FL: perp c e b c; perp a e a b ? eqangle a b b e a c c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_52_24. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = foot e b a c; f = foot f c a b ? eqangle a b a c e f e d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂ac; bd⟂bc; ce⟂de. 步骤: ad⟂ac, bd⟂bc => ∠dbc=∠dac; ∠dbc=∠dac => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; ce⟂de, bd⟂bc => ∠dbc=∠dec; ∠dbc=∠dec => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle, b,c,d,e are on the same circle => b,c,a,e are on the same circle; b,c,a,e are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace. 生成题目的FL: perp a d a c; perp b d b c; perp c e d e ? eqangle a b b e a c c e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_32. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd=ba; ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, bc⟂ce => bc⟂cf; bc⟂cf, df⟂bd => the intersection angle of bc and fd is equal to the intersection angle of cf and bd; c,f,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of bc and fd is equal to the intersection angle of cf and bd => ∠bcf=∠fdb; bd=ba => ∠bda=∠dab; ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠ceb=∠cab; c,f,e are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line, ∠bda=∠dab, ∠ceb=∠cab => the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to ∠bdc; ∠bcf=∠fdb, the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to ∠bdc => ∠cbe=∠fdc; ∠cbe=∠fdc, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠cbe equals the intersection angle of df and ac. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong b d b a; perp c e b c; perp a e a b; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqangle b c b e d f a c. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_33. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd=ba; ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, bc⟂ce => bc⟂cf; bc⟂cf, df⟂bd => the intersection angle of bc and fd is equal to the intersection angle of cf and bd; c,f,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of bc and fd is equal to the intersection angle of cf and bd => ∠bcf=∠fdb; bd=ba => ∠bda=∠dab; ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠ceb=∠cab; c,f,e are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line, ∠bda=∠dab, ∠ceb=∠cab => the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to ∠bdc; ∠bcf=∠fdb, the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to ∠bdc => ∠cbe=∠fdc; ∠cbe=∠fdc, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠cbe equals the intersection angle of df and ac. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong b d b a; perp c e b c; perp a e a b; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqangle b e b c a c d f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_34. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd=ba; ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, bc⟂ce => bc⟂cf; bc⟂cf, df⟂bd => the intersection angle of bc and fd is equal to the intersection angle of cf and bd; c,f,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of bc and fd is equal to the intersection angle of cf and bd => ∠bcf=∠fdb; bd=ba => ∠bda=∠dab; ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠ceb=∠cab; c,f,e are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line, ∠bda=∠dab, ∠ceb=∠cab => the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to ∠bdc; ∠bcf=∠fdb, the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to ∠bdc => ∠cbe=∠fdc; ∠cbe=∠fdc, c,d,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ac. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong b d b a; perp c e b c; perp a e a b; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqangle b c d f b e a c. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_35. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd=ba; ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, bc⟂ce => bc⟂cf; bc⟂cf, df⟂bd => the intersection angle of bc and fd is equal to the intersection angle of cf and bd; c,f,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of bc and fd is equal to the intersection angle of cf and bd => ∠bcf=∠fdb; bd=ba => ∠bda=∠dab; ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠ceb=∠cab; c,f,e are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line, ∠bda=∠dab, ∠ceb=∠cab => the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to ∠bdc; ∠bcf=∠fdb, the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to ∠bdc => ∠cbe=∠fdc; ∠cbe=∠fdc, c,d,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ac. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong b d b a; perp c e b c; perp a e a b; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqangle d f b c a c b e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_36. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd=ba; ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, bc⟂ce => bc⟂cf; bc⟂cf, ae⟂ab => the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to the intersection angle of cf and ba; c,f,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to the intersection angle of cf and ba => ∠bcf=∠eab; bd=ba => ∠bda=∠dab; c,f,e are on the same line, ce⟂bc, df⟂bd => ∠bdf=∠bcf; ∠bdf=∠bcf => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bfc=∠bdc; c,f,e are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line, ∠bda=∠dab, ∠bfc=∠bdc => ∠cfb equals the intersection angle of ba and cd; ∠bcf=∠eab, ∠cfb equals the intersection angle of ba and cd => ∠cbf equals the intersection angle of ae and cd; ∠cbf equals the intersection angle of ae and cd, c,d,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to the intersection angle of bf and ac. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong b d b a; perp c e b c; perp a e a b; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqangle b c a e b f a c. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_39. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, ce⟂bc, df⟂bd => ∠bdf=∠bcf; ∠bdf=∠bcf => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bfc=∠bdc; ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠ceb=∠cab; c,f,e are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line, ∠ceb=∠cab => the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to the intersection angle of cd and ba; ∠bdc=∠bfc, the intersection angle of cf and be is equal to the intersection angle of cd and ba => ∠fbe=∠dba. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; perp c e b c; perp a e a b; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqangle b e b f a b b d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_40. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd=ba; ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, ce⟂bc, df⟂bd => ∠bdf=∠bcf; ∠bdf=∠bcf => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bfc=∠bdc; bd=ba => ∠bda=∠dab; ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠bec=∠bac; f,e,c are on the same line, ∠bfc=∠bdc, c,d,a are on the same line, ∠bda=∠dab, ∠bec=∠bac => ∠bef=∠efb; ∠bef=∠efb => be=bf. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong b d b a; perp c e b c; perp a e a b; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? cong b e b f. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_41. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd=ba; ae⟂ab; ce⟂bc; df⟂bd; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: df⟂bd, ae⟂ab => ∠bdf=∠bae; ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠aeb=∠acb; c,f,e are on the same line, ce⟂bc, df⟂bd => ∠bdf=∠bcf; ∠bdf=∠bcf => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bfd=∠bcd; ∠aeb=∠acb, ∠bfd=∠bcd, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠dfb=∠aeb; ∠bdf=∠bae, ∠dfb=∠aeb => bd/ba = df/ae; bd/ba = df/ae, bd=ba => df=ae. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong b d b a; perp a e a b; perp c e b c; perp d f b d; coll c f e ? cong d f a e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_13_42. 原题FL: o a = segment o a; p = on_circle p a o; q = intersection_cc q a o p; r = lc_tangent r p a, on_circle r o p ? cong p q p r. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd=ba; ce⟂bc; ae⟂ab; c,f,e are on the same line; df⟂bd. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, ce⟂bc, df⟂bd => ∠bdf=∠bcf; ∠bdf=∠bcf => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bfc=∠bdc; c,d,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ∠bfc=∠bdc => ∠bda=∠bfe; ce⟂bc, ae⟂ab => ∠bae=∠bce; ∠bae=∠bce => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠bec=∠bac; c,d,a are on the same line, f,e,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠bec => ∠bad=∠bef; ∠bda=∠bfe, ∠bad=∠bef => db/da = fb/fe; bd=ba => ∠bda=∠dab; f,e,c are on the same line, ∠bfc=∠bdc, c,d,a are on the same line, ∠bda=∠dab, ∠bec=∠bac => ∠bef=∠efb; ∠bef=∠efb => be=bf; db/da = fb/fe, bd=ba, be=bf => ab/ad = eb/ef. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong b d b a; perp c e b c; perp a e a b; coll c f e; perp d f b d ? eqratio b a d a b e f e. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_0. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ea; ea=ed; ef=ea; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ea, ef=ea, ea=ed => c,d,a,f are on the same circle; c,d,a,f are on the same circle => ∠cad=∠cfd; ∠cad=∠cfd, b,c,f are on the same line => ∠cad equals the intersection angle of bc and df. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e a; cong e a e d; cong e f e a; coll b c f ? eqangle a c a d b c d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_34. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa. 步骤: db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠cad equals the intersection angle of bc and df. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; coll a b f; cong f b f a ? eqangle a c a d b c d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_18. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ea; ef=ea; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ef=ea, ec=ea => ec=ef; ec=ef => ∠ecf=∠cfe; ∠ecf=∠cfe, b,c,f are on the same line => ∠ecb equals the intersection angle of bc and ef. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e a; cong e f e a; coll b c f ? eqangle c e b c b c e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_19. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ea; ef=ea; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ef=ea, ec=ea => ec=ef; ec=ef => ∠ecf=∠cfe; ∠ecf=∠cfe, b,c,f are on the same line => ∠ecb equals the intersection angle of bc and ef. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e a; cong e f e a; coll b c f ? eqangle b c c e e f b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_30. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ea=ed; ec=ea. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ea=ed, ec=ea => ec=ed; ac=ad, ec=ed => cd⟂ae. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong e a e d; cong e c e a ? perp c d a e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_31. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ea=ed; ec=ea. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ea=ed, ec=ea => ec=ed; ac=ad, ec=ed => ∠ace=∠eda. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong e a e d; cong e c e a ? eqangle a c c e d e a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_39. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ea=ed; ec=ea; ef=ea; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ad, ea=ed, ec=ea => ∠cad=∠aed; ec=ea, ef=ea, ea=ed => c,d,a,f are on the same circle; c,d,a,f are on the same circle => ∠cad=∠cfd; ∠cad=∠aed, ∠cad=∠cfd, b,c,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and df is equal to ∠aed; ea=ed, ef=ea => ef=ed; ef=ed => ∠efd=∠fde; the intersection angle of bc and df is equal to ∠aed, ∠efd=∠fde => the intersection angle of bc and ef is equal to the intersection angle of ae and df. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong e a e d; cong e c e a; cong e f e a; coll b c f ? eqangle b c e f a e d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_40. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ea=ed; ec=ea; ef=ea; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ad, ea=ed, ec=ea => ∠cad=∠aed; ec=ea, ef=ea, ea=ed => c,d,a,f are on the same circle; c,d,a,f are on the same circle => ∠cad=∠cfd; ∠cad=∠aed, ∠cad=∠cfd, b,c,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and df is equal to ∠aed; ea=ed, ef=ea => ef=ed; ef=ed => ∠efd=∠fde; the intersection angle of bc and df is equal to ∠aed, ∠efd=∠fde => the intersection angle of bc and ef is equal to the intersection angle of ae and df. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong e a e d; cong e c e a; cong e f e a; coll b c f ? eqangle e f b c d f a e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_41. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ea=ed; ec=ea; ef=ea; b,c,f are on the same line. 步骤: ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ad, ea=ed, ec=ea => ∠cad=∠aed; ec=ea, ef=ea, ea=ed => c,d,a,f are on the same circle; c,d,a,f are on the same circle => ∠cad=∠cfd; ∠cad=∠aed, ∠cad=∠cfd, b,c,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and df is equal to ∠aed; ea=ed, ef=ea => ef=ed; ef=ed => ∠efd=∠fde; the intersection angle of bc and df is equal to ∠aed, ∠efd=∠fde => the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠efd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong e a e d; cong e c e a; cong e f e a; coll b c f ? eqangle b c a e e f d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_86. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; cg=cd, cd=cb => cg=cb; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; cg=cb => ∠cgb=∠gbc; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠cgb=∠gbc => ∠cbg=∠abf; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa => ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd; ∠cbg=∠abf, ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd => ∠bcd=∠baf. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle b c c d a b a f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_14_49. 原题FL: o x l = triangle o x l; a = foot a l o x; y = free y; b = foot b l o y; p = mirror p l a; q = mirror q l b; q1 = on_line q1 l a, on_line q1 o y; p1 = on_line p1 o x, on_line p1 l b ? cyclic o p q p1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ad=ab; ec=ea; ea=ed; b,c,f are on the same line; ef=ea. 步骤: ac=ab => ∠acb=∠cba; ec=ea, ef=ea, ea=ed => c,d,a,f are on the same circle; c,d,a,f are on the same circle => ∠cad=∠cfd; c,d,a,f are on the same circle => ∠cda=∠cfa; c,d,a,f are on the same circle => ∠acd=∠afd; b,c,f are on the same line, ∠acb=∠cba, ∠cad=∠cfd => ∠adf=∠fba; ad=ab, ac=ab => ac=ad; ac=ad => ∠acd=∠cda; b,c,f are on the same line, ∠cda=∠cfa, ∠acd=∠cda, ∠acd=∠afd => ∠afd=∠bfa; ∠adf=∠fba, ∠afd=∠bfa => ad/ab = fd/fb; ad/ab = fd/fb, ad=ab => df=bf. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a d a b; cong e c e a; cong e a e d; coll b c f; cong e f e a ? cong d f b f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_2. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: b,e,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ce⟂be; b,d,f are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, bd⟂ac => bf⟂cd; ce⟂be, bf⟂cd => the intersection angle of ce and bf is equal to the intersection angle of be and cd; the intersection angle of ce and bf is equal to the intersection angle of be and cd, b,f,d are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and bd is equal to ∠bac. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll b f d ? eqangle c e b d a b a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_15. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; b,f,d are on the same line; c,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdf=∠feb; c,e,f are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efb; ∠cdf=∠feb, ∠cfd=∠efb => fc/fd = fb/fe. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll b f d; coll c e f ? eqratio f d c f e f b f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_16. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; b,e,a are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cbe=∠dcb; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ∠ecb=∠cbd. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b ? eqangle c e b c b c b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_27. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; e,b,a are on the same line; ae=ad. 步骤: ac=ab => ∠acb=∠cba; a,e,b are on the same line, a,d,c are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cbe=∠dcb; b,e,a are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠cae=∠dab; ac=ab, ae=ad, ∠cae=∠dab => the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ce and ab; a,e,b are on the same line, a,c,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and ab is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd => ∠ceb=∠cdb; ∠cbe=∠dcb, ∠ceb=∠cdb => ∠bce=∠dbc. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; coll e b a; cong a e a d ? eqangle c e b c b c b d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_22. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,e,f are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠bef; b,e,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebf; ∠adb=∠bef, ∠abd=∠ebf => ad/ab = fe/fb; ad/ab = fe/fb, ab=ac => ad/ac = fe/fb. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll c e f; coll b f d ? eqratio d a c a e f b f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_24. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,e,f are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠bef; b,e,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebf; ∠adb=∠bef, ∠abd=∠ebf => ad/fe = ba/bf; ad/fe = ba/bf, ab=ac => da/ef = ca/bf. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll c e f; coll b f d ? eqratio d a e f c a b f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_32. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠eac; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠cea; ∠bad=∠eac, ∠adb=∠cea, ab=ac => ad=ae. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b ? cong a d a e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C, cong A B P Q => contri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角和夹边以外的一个边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等。. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_33. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; ∠cdb=∠ceb => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; b,c,d,e are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bed; ∠bcd=∠bed, c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠bca equals the intersection angle of ab and de. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b ? eqangle b c a c a b d e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_54. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cdb=∠ceb; ∠cdb=∠ceb => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; b,c,d,e are on the same circle => ∠bce=∠bde; ∠bce=∠bde, a,c,e are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line => ∠bca equals the intersection angle of ab and de. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c ? eqangle b c a c a b d e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_34. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; ∠cdb=∠ceb => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; b,c,d,e are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bed; ∠bcd=∠bed, c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠bca equals the intersection angle of ab and de. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b ? eqangle a c b c d e a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_56. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cdb=∠ceb; ∠cdb=∠ceb => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; b,c,d,e are on the same circle => ∠bce=∠bde; ∠bce=∠bde, a,c,e are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line => ∠cba equals the intersection angle of ac and de. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c ? eqangle b c a b a c d e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_49. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; b,f,d are on the same line; c,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdf=∠feb; c,e,f are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efb; ∠cdf=∠feb, ∠cfd=∠efb => cd/cf = be/bf; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; b,e,a are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cbe=∠dcb; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => be=cd; cd/cf = be/bf, cd=be => cd/cf = cd/bf; cd/cf = cd/bf => fc/fb = fb/fc. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll b f d; coll c e f ? eqratio c f b f b f c f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_19. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line; e,f,c are on the same line; f,d,b are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cae=∠dab; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => ce/bd = fc/fb; ac=ab, ae=ad, ∠cae=∠dab => ec=db; ce/bd = fc/fb, ec=db => cf=bf. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a; coll e f c; coll f d b ? cong c f b f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_55. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; the intersection angle of bd and ce is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ce; b,f,d are on the same line; c,e,f are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdf=∠feb; c,e,f are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠cfd=∠efb; ∠cdf=∠feb, ∠cfd=∠efb => fc/fb = fd/fe; b,d,f are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, the intersection angle of bd and ce is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ce => ∠dfe=∠bfc; fc/fb = fd/fe, ∠dfe=∠bfc => fd/fc = ed/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; eqangle b d c e b d c e; coll b f d; coll c e f ? eqratio c f f d b c e d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_56. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ∠cba=∠acb; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,e,f are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠bef; b,e,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebf; ∠adb=∠bef, ∠abd=∠ebf => ba/bf = bd/be; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; b,e,a are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cbe=∠dcb; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ec/eb = db/dc; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ce=bd; ba/bf = bd/be, ab=ac, ec/eb = db/dc, ce=bd => ce/cd = ba/bf; b,e,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ce⟂be; b,d,f are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, bd⟂ac => bf⟂cd; ce⟂be, bf⟂cd => ∠ecd=∠ebf; c,a,d are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ∠ecd=∠ebf, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠ecd=∠abf; ce/cd = ba/bf, ∠ecd=∠abf => the intersection angle of ce and ab is equal to the intersection angle of de and af. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; eqangle b c a b a c b c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll c e f; coll b f d ? eqangle c e a b d e a f. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_64. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; ab=ac; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,e,f are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠bef; b,e,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebf; ∠adb=∠bef, ∠abd=∠ebf => da/ef = bd/be; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠cea; b,e,a are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cbe=∠dcb; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ec/eb = db/dc; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ce=bd; c,d,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠eac; ∠bad=∠eac, ∠adb=∠cea, ab=ac => ad=ae; da/ef = bd/be, ec/eb = db/dc, ce=bd, ea=da => db/dc = ea/ef; c,a,d are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠bdc=∠fea; db/dc = ea/ef, ∠bdc=∠fea => bd/bc = ae/af; bd/bc = ae/af, ad=ae => bd/bc = ad/af. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; cong a b a c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll c e f; coll b f d ? eqratio b d b c d a f a. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C, cong A B P Q => contri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角和夹边以外的一个边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等。. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_66. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; ab=ac; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,e,f are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠bef; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠bdc=∠fea; b,e,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebf; ∠adb=∠bef, ∠abd=∠ebf => da/ef = bd/be; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠cea; b,e,a are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cbe=∠dcb; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ec/eb = db/dc; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ce=bd; c,d,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠eac; ∠bad=∠eac, ∠adb=∠cea, ab=ac => ad=ae; da/ef = bd/be, ec/eb = db/dc, ce=bd, ea=da => db/dc = ea/ef; db/dc = ea/ef, ∠bdc=∠fea => bd/ae = bc/af; bd/ae = bc/af, ad=ae => db/da = bc/fa. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; cong a b a c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll c e f; coll b f d ? eqratio b d d a b c f a. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C, cong A B P Q => contri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角和夹边以外的一个边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等。. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_67. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cba=∠acb; ab=ac; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,e,f are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠bef; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠bdc=∠fea; b,e,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebf; ∠adb=∠bef, ∠abd=∠ebf => da/ef = bd/be; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠cea; b,e,a are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cbe=∠dcb; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ec/eb = db/dc; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ce=bd; c,d,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠eac; ∠bad=∠eac, ∠adb=∠cea, ab=ac => ad=ae; da/ef = bd/be, ec/eb = db/dc, ce=bd, ea=da => db/dc = ea/ef; db/dc = ea/ef, ∠bdc=∠fea => bd/ae = bc/af; bd/ae = bc/af, ad=ae => db/da = bc/fa. 生成题目的FL: eqangle b c a b a c b c; cong a b a c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll c e f; coll b f d ? eqratio d a b d f a b c. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C, cong A B P Q => contri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角和夹边以外的一个边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等。. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_15_70. 原题FL: q r p = triangle q r p; o1 = circle o1 q r p; s = on_circle s o1 q; y = on_line y q s; o = circle o y p q; x = on_circle x o q; i = on_line i r s, on_line i y x ? eqangle i r i x p r p x. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ∠cba=∠acb; c,d,a are on the same line; bd⟂ac; b,e,a are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,e,f are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠bef; b,e,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebf; ∠adb=∠bef, ∠abd=∠ebf => da/ef = bd/be; c,d,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠eac; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠adb=∠cea; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, ce⟂ab, bd⟂ac => ∠cdb=∠ceb; ∠bad=∠eac, ∠adb=∠cea, ab=ac => ad=ae; b,e,a are on the same line, c,a,d are on the same line, ∠cba=∠acb => ∠cbe=∠dcb; ∠cdb=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dcb => ce=bd; da/ef = bd/be, ea=da, ce=bd => ea/ef = ec/eb; e,b,a are on the same line, e,c,f are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠aef=∠ceb; ea/ef = ec/eb, ∠aef=∠ceb => ∠eaf=∠ecb; ∠eaf=∠ecb, b,e,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to the intersection angle of af and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; eqangle b c a b a c b c; coll c d a; perp b d a c; coll b e a; perp c e a b; coll c e f; coll b f d ? eqangle a b c e a f b c. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C, cong A B P Q => contri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角和夹边以外的一个边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等。. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a ? para b c d e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_26. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ∠eba=∠dca; b,g,d are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => gd/gb = dc/be; gd/gb = dc/be, cd=ca => gd/gb = ca/be. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll b g d; coll e g c ? eqratio g d b g c a b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_27. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ∠eba=∠dca; b,g,d are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => gd/gb = dc/be; gd/gb = dc/be, cd=ca => gd/gb = ca/be. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll b g d; coll e g c ? eqratio b g g d b e c a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_29. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ∠eba=∠dca; b,g,d are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => dg/dc = bg/be; dg/dc = bg/be, cd=ca => gd/ca = bg/be. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll b g d; coll e g c ? eqratio c a g d b e b g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_30. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ∠eba=∠dca; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, e,g,c are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => cg/cd = eg/eb; cg/cd = eg/eb, cd=ca => cg/ca = eg/eb. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio g c c a e g b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_60. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; ∠eca=∠dab; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac => af/ac = ef/ec. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll e f a; coll f d c ? eqratio f a c a e f e c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_61. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; ∠eca=∠dab; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac => af/ac = ef/ec. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll e f a; coll f d c ? eqratio c a f a e c e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_62. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; ∠eca=∠dab; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,c,a are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => ab/ad = cb/cg; ab/ad = cb/cg, ad=ac => ab/ac = cb/cg. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio b a c a b c g c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_66. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca. 步骤: ad=ac, cd=ca => dc=da; dc=da => ∠dca=∠cad; ∠dca=∠cad, b,c,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of cd and ab is equal to ∠bad. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a ? eqangle c d a b a b a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_67. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca. 步骤: ad=ac, cd=ca => dc=da; dc=da => ∠dca=∠cad; ∠dca=∠cad, b,c,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of cd and ab is equal to ∠bad. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a ? eqangle a b c d a d a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_68. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca => be=bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b ? cong b e b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_69. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => dc/da = eb/ec; dc/da = eb/ec, ad=ac, cd=ca => eb=ec. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b ? cong e b e c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_27. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; be⟂ab; ce⟂ac; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, ce⟂ac => ∠ecd=∠cbd; ∠ebd=∠bcd, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ecd=∠cbd => ∠ecb=∠cbe; ∠ecb=∠cbe => eb=ec. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; perp b e a b; perp c e a c; cong a c a d; coll a c d ? cong e b e c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_70. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac, dc=ca => ef/ec = fa/dc; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, be∥cd => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; be∥cd, ce∥ad => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; c,e,g are on the same line, ce∥ad => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,g,d are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => bd/bg = ba/bc; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => bd/bg = ec/eg; be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca, bd/bg = ba/bc, bd/bg = ec/eg => ec/eg = cd/cf; ef/ec = fa/dc, ec/eg = cd/cf => ef/eg = fa/fc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e f a; coll f d c; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio e f e g f a f c. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_71. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac, dc=ca => ef/ec = fa/dc; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, be∥cd => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; be∥cd, ce∥ad => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; c,e,g are on the same line, ce∥ad => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,g,d are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => bd/bg = ba/bc; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => bd/bg = ec/eg; be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca, bd/bg = ba/bc, bd/bg = ec/eg => ec/eg = cd/cf; ef/ec = fa/dc, ec/eg = cd/cf => ef/eg = fa/fc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e f a; coll f d c; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio e g e f f c f a. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_72. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac, dc=ca => ef/ec = fa/dc; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, be∥cd => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; be∥cd, ce∥ad => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; c,e,g are on the same line, ce∥ad => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,g,d are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => bd/bg = ba/bc; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => bd/bg = ec/eg; be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca, bd/bg = ba/bc, bd/bg = ec/eg => ec/eg = cd/cf; ef/ec = fa/dc, ec/eg = cd/cf => fe/fa = eg/fc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e f a; coll f d c; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio e f f a e g f c. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_73. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac, dc=ca => ef/ec = fa/dc; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, be∥cd => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; be∥cd, ce∥ad => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; c,e,g are on the same line, ce∥ad => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,g,d are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => bd/bg = ba/bc; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => bd/bg = ec/eg; be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca, bd/bg = ba/bc, bd/bg = ec/eg => ec/eg = cd/cf; ef/ec = fa/dc, ec/eg = cd/cf => fe/fa = eg/fc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e f a; coll f d c; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio f a e f f c e g. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_74. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac, dc=ca => ef/ec = fa/dc; e,c,g are on the same line, ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠beg=∠dcg; b,d,g are on the same line, e,c,g are on the same line => ∠bge=∠dgc; ∠beg=∠dcg, ∠bge=∠dgc => eb/eg = cd/cg; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => dc/da = eb/ec; eb/eg = cd/cg, dc/da = eb/ec, ad=ac, cd=ca => ec/eg = cd/cg; ef/ec = fa/dc, ec/eg = cd/cg => ef/eg = fa/gc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e f a; coll f d c; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio e f e g f a g c. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_76. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: dc=ca => fa/dc = fa/dc; c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,c,a are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => ba/bc = ad/cg; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠dca => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; ba/bc = ad/cg, ad=ac, be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca => cd/cf = cd/cg; fa/dc = fa/dc, cd/cf = cd/cg => fc=gc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? cong f c g c. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_77. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac, dc=ca => ef/ec = fa/dc; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => dg/dc = bg/be; be∥cd, ce∥ad => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => dc/da = eb/ec; dg/dc = bg/be, cd=ca, dc/da = eb/ec, ad=ac => ec/bg = dc/dg; ef/ec = fa/dc, ec/bg = dc/dg => ef/bg = fa/gd. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e f a; coll f d c; coll b g d; coll e g c ? eqratio e f b g f a g d. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_78. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,f,a are on the same line; f,d,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac, dc=ca => ef/ec = fa/dc; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line => dg/dc = bg/be; be∥cd, ce∥ad => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => dc/da = eb/ec; dg/dc = bg/be, cd=ca, dc/da = eb/ec, ad=ac => ec/bg = dc/dg; ef/ec = fa/dc, ec/bg = dc/dg => ef/bg = fa/gd. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e f a; coll f d c; coll b g d; coll e g c ? eqratio b g e f g d f a. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_79. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => fc∥eb; fc∥eb, e,f,a are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => af/ac = ae/ab; ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ce∥ad; ce∥ad, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => af/ad = ef/ec; af/ac = ae/ab, af/ad = ef/ec, ad=ac => ef/ec = ae/ab; e,g,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠gcb=∠dab; b,d,g are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠gbc=∠dba; ∠gcb=∠dab, ∠gbc=∠dba => bg/bc = bd/ba; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ce∥ad => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => dc/da = eb/ec; bg/bc = bd/ba, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca, dc/da = eb/ec, ad=ac => ec/bg = ba/bd; ef/ec = ae/ab, ec/bg = ba/bd => ef/bg = ea/bd. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio e f b g e a b d. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_83. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,g,d are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => bd/bg = ba/bc; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠dca => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; bd/bg = ba/bc, be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca => cd/cf = bd/bg; cd/cf = bd/bg, b,g,d are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line => bc∥gf; bc∥gf, b,c,a are on the same line => ab∥fg. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? para a b f g. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio O A A C O B B D, coll O A C, coll O B D, ncoll A B C, sameside A O C B O D => para A B C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 若OA:AC = OB:BD，且O、A、C共线，O、B、D共线，A、B、C不共线，且A、O、C和B、O、D在同侧，则AB平行于CD【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_62. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; ef=ea; ∠fca=∠bcd; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb => g,a,b,c are on the same circle; g,a,b,c are on the same circle, eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,f,g,c are on the same circle; a,f,g,c are on the same circle => ∠fga=∠fca; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠agc; a,b,d are on the same line, ∠fga=∠fca, ∠fca=∠bcd, ∠abc=∠agc, g,d,c are on the same line => ∠dag=∠fga; ∠dag=∠fga => ad∥gf; ad∥gf, a,d,b are on the same line => ab∥fg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e f e a; eqangle c f a c b c c d; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? para a b f g. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_84. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => ac/ad = cb/ce; ac/ad = cb/ce, ad=ac => cb=ce; ad=ac, cd=ca => dc=da; dc=da => ∠dca=∠cad; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠dca=∠cad, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠dcb=∠ace; cd=ca, cb=ce, ∠dcb=∠ace => ∠cdb=∠cae; ∠cdb=∠cae, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠cdb=∠bae. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b ? eqangle c d b d a b a e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_85. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => ac/ad = cb/ce; ac/ad = cb/ce, ad=ac => cb=ce; ad=ac, cd=ca => dc=da; dc=da => ∠dca=∠cad; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠dca=∠cad, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠dcb=∠ace; cd=ca, cb=ce, ∠dcb=∠ace => ∠cdb=∠cae; ∠cdb=∠cae, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠cdb=∠bae. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b ? eqangle b d c d a e a b. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
