原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_93. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: e,g,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠gcb=∠dab; b,d,g are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠gbc=∠dba; ∠gcb=∠dab, ∠gbc=∠dba => bg/bc = bd/ba; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => ac/ad = cb/ce; ac/ad = cb/ce, ad=ac => cb=ce; ad=ac, cd=ca => dc=da; dc=da => ∠dca=∠cad; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠dca=∠cad, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠dcb=∠ace; cd=ca, cb=ce, ∠dcb=∠ace => bd=ea; bg/bc = bd/ba, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca, bd=ea => bg/be = ae/ab. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio b g b e e a b a. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_94. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: e,g,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠gcb=∠dab; b,d,g are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠gbc=∠dba; ∠gcb=∠dab, ∠gbc=∠dba => bg/bc = bd/ba; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => ac/ad = cb/ce; ac/ad = cb/ce, ad=ac => cb=ce; ad=ac, cd=ca => dc=da; dc=da => ∠dca=∠cad; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠dca=∠cad, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠dcb=∠ace; cd=ca, cb=ce, ∠dcb=∠ace => bd=ea; bg/bc = bd/ba, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca, bd=ea => bg/be = ae/ab. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio b e b g b a e a. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_95. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, e,g,c are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => cg/cd = eg/eb; c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,c,a are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => ba/bc = ad/cg; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, be∥cd => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; be∥cd, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; cg/cd = eg/eb, cd=ca, ba/bc = ad/cg, ad=ac, be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc => ca/cf = eb/eg; ad=ac => ∠acd=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, e,c,g are on the same line, ∠acd=∠cda, cd∥be, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠acf=∠beg; ca/cf = eb/eg, ∠acf=∠beg => ∠afc=∠bge; ∠afc=∠bge, e,f,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ae and cd is equal to ∠bda. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqangle a e c d b d a d. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

eqangle c d a e a d b d. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_97. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, e,g,c are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => cg/cd = eg/eb; c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,c,a are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => ba/bc = ad/cg; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, be∥cd => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; be∥cd, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; cg/cd = eg/eb, cd=ca, ba/bc = ad/cg, ad=ac, be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc => ca/cf = eb/eg; ad=ac => ∠acd=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, e,c,g are on the same line, ∠acd=∠cda, cd∥be, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠acf=∠beg; ca/cf = eb/eg, ∠acf=∠beg => ac/be = af/bg; ac/be = af/bg, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca => ca/cb = fa/bg. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio c a b c f a b g. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_99. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, e,g,c are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => cg/cd = eg/eb; c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,c,a are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => ba/bc = ad/cg; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, be∥cd => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; be∥cd, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; cg/cd = eg/eb, cd=ca, ba/bc = ad/cg, ad=ac, be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc => ca/cf = eb/eg; ad=ac => ∠acd=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, e,c,g are on the same line, ∠acd=∠cda, cd∥be, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠acf=∠beg; ca/cf = eb/eg, ∠acf=∠beg => fa/fc = gb/ge. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio f a f c b g e g. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_100. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; cd=ca; ad=ac; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => be∥cd; be∥cd, e,g,c are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => cg/cd = eg/eb; c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,c,a are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => ba/bc = ad/cg; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, be∥cd => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; be∥cd, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; cg/cd = eg/eb, cd=ca, ba/bc = ad/cg, ad=ac, be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc => ca/cf = eb/eg; ad=ac => ∠acd=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, e,c,g are on the same line, ∠acd=∠cda, cd∥be, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠acf=∠beg; ca/cf = eb/eg, ∠acf=∠beg => fa/fc = gb/ge. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c d c a; cong a d a c; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? eqratio f c f a e g b g. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_101. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eca=∠dab; ∠eba=∠dca; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,c,a are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => ba/bc = ad/cg; f,d,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠dca => ∠eba=∠fca; f,e,a are on the same line, c,b,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠fac; ∠eba=∠fca, ∠eab=∠fac => be/ba = cf/ca; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => cd/ca = be/bc; ba/bc = ad/cg, ad=ac, be/ba = cf/ca, cd/ca = be/bc, cd=ca => ca/cf = cd/cg; ad=ac => ∠acd=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, e,g,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠cda, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠acf=∠dcg; ca/cf = cd/cg, ∠acf=∠dcg => ca/cd = af/dg; ca/cd = af/dg, cd=ca => af=dg. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; eqangle b e b a c d c a; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? cong a f d g. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_16_102. 原题FL: b c r = triangle b c r; o = circle o b c r; s = on_circle s o b; a = on_line a b r, on_line a c s; m = foot m a r s; n = foot n a b c ? eqangle a b a m a n a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ad=ac; cd=ca; ∠eba=∠dca; ∠eca=∠dab; f,d,c are on the same line; e,f,a are on the same line; e,g,c are on the same line; b,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line => fc∥eb; fc∥eb, b,c,a are on the same line, e,f,a are on the same line => ac/ab = fc/be; c,e,g are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab, b,c,a are on the same line => da∥gc; da∥gc, b,c,a are on the same line, b,g,d are on the same line => ab/ad = cb/cg; ∠eba=∠dca, b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bec=∠cda; b,c,a are on the same line, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠bce=∠cad; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => dc/da = eb/ec; ∠bec=∠cda, ∠bce=∠cad => ac/ad = cb/ce; ac/ab = fc/be, ab/ad = cb/cg, ad=ac, dc/da = eb/ec, cd=ca => cg/cb = cf/ce; cd=ca => ∠cda=∠dac; e,g,c are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, ∠cda=∠dac, ∠eca=∠dab => ∠gcb=∠fce; cg/cb = cf/ce, ∠gcb=∠fce => cb/ce = bg/ef; cb/ce = bg/ef, ac/ad = cb/ce, ad=ac => bg=ef. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong a d a c; cong c d c a; eqangle b e b a c d c a; eqangle c e c a a d a b; coll f d c; coll e f a; coll e g c; coll b g d ? cong b g e f. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_2. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; db∥ca; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca. 步骤: d,c,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => df∥eb; ef∥ac, bd∥ac => db∥ef; df∥eb, db∥ef => df=eb. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; para d b c a; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a ? cong d f e b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_15. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,g,e are on the same line; f,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; cf∥ea, c,g,e are on the same line, f,g,a are on the same line => cg/cf = eg/ea; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; cg/cf = eg/ea, cf=ea => cg/ae = eg/ea. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll c g e; coll f g a ? eqratio c g a e g e a e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_16. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,g,e are on the same line; f,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; cf∥ea, c,g,e are on the same line, f,g,a are on the same line => cg/cf = eg/ea; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; cg/cf = eg/ea, cf=ea => cg/ae = eg/ea. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll c g e; coll f g a ? eqratio a e c g a e g e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_17. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; f,g,a are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; cf∥ea, f,g,a are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => fg/fc = ag/ae; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; fg/fc = ag/ae, cf=ea => fg/ae = ag/ae. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll f g a; coll c g e ? eqratio f g a e g a a e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_18. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; f,g,a are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; cf∥ea, f,g,a are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => fg/fc = ag/ae; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; fg/fc = ag/ae, cf=ea => fg/ae = ag/ae. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll f g a; coll c g e ? eqratio a e f g a e g a. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_29. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; db∥ca; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; d,h,e are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => df∥eb; df∥eb, d,h,e are on the same line, b,h,f are on the same line => dh/df = eh/eb; ef∥ac, bd∥ac => db∥ef; df∥eb, db∥ef => df=eb; dh/df = eh/eb, df=eb => dh/be = eh/eb. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; para d b c a; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll d h e; coll b h f ? eqratio d h b e h e b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_53. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db∥ca; dc∥ab; b,a,e are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,d,f are on the same line; d,h,e are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ac, bd∥ac => db∥ef; db∥ef, d,h,e are on the same line, b,h,f are on the same line => eh/ef = dh/db; d,c,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => df∥eb; db∥ef, df∥eb => fe=bd; eh/ef = dh/db, fe=bd => he/bd = dh/db. 生成题目的FL: para d b c a; para d c a b; coll b a e; para f e c a; coll c d f; coll d h e; coll b h f ? eqratio h e b d d h b d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_54. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db∥ca; dc∥ab; b,a,e are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,d,f are on the same line; d,h,e are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ac, bd∥ac => db∥ef; db∥ef, d,h,e are on the same line, b,h,f are on the same line => eh/ef = dh/db; d,c,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => df∥eb; db∥ef, df∥eb => fe=bd; eh/ef = dh/db, fe=bd => he/bd = dh/db. 生成题目的FL: para d b c a; para d c a b; coll b a e; para f e c a; coll c d f; coll d h e; coll b h f ? eqratio b d h e b d d h. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_55. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,g,e are on the same line; f,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; cf∥ea, c,g,e are on the same line, f,g,a are on the same line => cf/ea = gc/ge; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; cf/ea = gc/ge, cf=ea => gc=ge. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll c g e; coll f g a ? cong g c g e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_56. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; f,g,a are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; cf∥ea, f,g,a are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => fc/ae = gf/ga; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; fc/ae = gf/ga, cf=ea => gf=ga. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll f g a; coll c g e ? cong g f g a. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_59. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; db∥ca; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,g,e are on the same line; f,g,a are on the same line; d,h,e are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => df∥eb; cf∥ea, c,g,e are on the same line, f,g,a are on the same line => cf/ea = gc/ge; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; c,g,e are on the same line, cf/ea = gc/ge, cf=ea => g is the midpoint of c and e; df∥eb, d,h,e are on the same line, b,h,f are on the same line => df/eb = hd/he; ef∥ac, bd∥ac => db∥ef; df∥eb, db∥ef => df=eb; d,h,e are on the same line, df/eb = hd/he, df=eb => h is the midpoint of d and e; g is the midpoint of c and e, h is the midpoint of d and e => gh∥cd. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; para d b c a; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll c g e; coll f g a; coll d h e; coll b h f ? para g h c d. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_60. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; db∥ca; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,g,e are on the same line; f,g,a are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line; d,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => df∥eb; cf∥ea, c,g,e are on the same line, f,g,a are on the same line => cf/ea = gc/ge; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; c,g,e are on the same line, cf/ea = gc/ge, cf=ea => g is the midpoint of c and e; df∥eb, b,h,f are on the same line, d,h,e are on the same line => fd/be = hf/hb; ef∥ac, bd∥ac => db∥ef; df∥eb, db∥ef => df=eb; b,h,f are on the same line, fd/be = hf/hb, df=eb => h is the midpoint of b and f; g is the midpoint of c and e, h is the midpoint of b and f => cg/ce = bh/bf; cg/ce = bh/bf, fd/be = hf/hb, df=eb => cg/ce = fh/fb. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; para d b c a; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll c g e; coll f g a; coll b h f; coll d h e ? eqratio c g c e f h b f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_17_62. 原题FL: a b c = r_triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; o = midpoint o c b; m = foot m b a o; g = on_line g b m, on_circle g o a; f = on_line f c a, on_line f b m; e = on_line e a d, on_line e b m ? cong e a e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ab; db∥ca; b,a,e are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,g,e are on the same line; f,g,a are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line; d,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => cf∥ea; c,d,f are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, cd∥ab => df∥eb; cf∥ea, c,g,e are on the same line, f,g,a are on the same line => cf/ea = gc/ge; cf∥ea, ef∥ac => cf=ea; c,g,e are on the same line, cf/ea = gc/ge, cf=ea => g is the midpoint of c and e; df∥eb, b,h,f are on the same line, d,h,e are on the same line => fd/be = hf/hb; ef∥ac, bd∥ac => db∥ef; df∥eb, db∥ef => df=eb; b,h,f are on the same line, fd/be = hf/hb, df=eb => h is the midpoint of b and f; g is the midpoint of c and e, h is the midpoint of b and f => gc/hb = ce/bf; gc/hb = ce/bf, fd/be = hf/hb, df=eb => cg/fh = ce/bf. 生成题目的FL: para d c a b; para d b c a; coll b a e; coll c d f; para f e c a; coll c g e; coll f g a; coll b h f; coll d h e ? eqratio c g f h c e b f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_27. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: eb∥ad; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => eh∥ai; c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line, c,g,f are on the same line => g,h,i are on the same line; eh∥ai, e,g,a are on the same line, g,h,i are on the same line => ge/gh = ga/gi. 生成题目的FL: para e b a d; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h; coll i d a; coll c i f ? eqratio g h e g i g g a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_28. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: eb∥ad; ea∥bd; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => eh∥ai; c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line, c,g,f are on the same line => g,h,i are on the same line; eh∥ai, e,g,a are on the same line, g,h,i are on the same line => eg/ea = hg/hi; ae∥bd, be∥ad => ea=db; eg/ea = hg/hi, ea=db => eg/bd = hg/hi. 生成题目的FL: para e b a d; para e a b d; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h; coll i d a; coll c i f ? eqratio e g b d g h i h. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_33. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: eb∥ad; ea∥bd; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => eh∥ai; c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line, c,g,f are on the same line => g,h,i are on the same line; eh∥ai, e,g,a are on the same line, g,h,i are on the same line => ag/ae = ig/ih; ae∥bd, be∥ad => ea=db; ag/ae = ig/ih, ea=db => ga/bd = ig/ih. 生成题目的FL: para e b a d; para e a b d; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h; coll i d a; coll c i f ? eqratio b d g a i h i g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_34. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ca=cb; eb∥ad; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => eh∥ai; e,b,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => bh∥ai; c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line, c,g,f are on the same line => g,h,i are on the same line; eh∥ai, e,g,a are on the same line, g,h,i are on the same line => ge/ga = eh/ai; c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line => c,h,i are on the same line; bh∥ai, b,c,a are on the same line, c,h,i are on the same line => cb/ca = bh/ai; ge/ga = eh/ai, cb/ca = bh/ai, ca=cb => ge/ga = he/hb. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c a c b; para e b a d; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h; coll i d a; coll c i f ? eqratio e g g a e h b h. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_44. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea∥bd; eb∥ad; b,d,f are on the same line; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line. 步骤: e,g,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ae∥bd => eg∥bf; c,f,h are on the same line, c,g,f are on the same line => h,g,f are on the same line; eg∥bf, b,e,h are on the same line, h,g,f are on the same line => eh/eb = gh/gf; be∥ad, ae∥bd => be=ad; eh/eb = gh/gf, be=ad => eh/da = gh/gf. 生成题目的FL: para e a b d; para e b a d; coll b d f; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h ? eqratio e h d a g h g f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_45. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea∥bd; eb∥ad; b,d,f are on the same line; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line. 步骤: e,g,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ae∥bd => eg∥bf; c,f,h are on the same line, c,g,f are on the same line => h,g,f are on the same line; eg∥bf, b,e,h are on the same line, h,g,f are on the same line => eh/eb = gh/gf; be∥ad, ae∥bd => be=ad; eh/eb = gh/gf, be=ad => eh/da = gh/gf. 生成题目的FL: para e a b d; para e b a d; coll b d f; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h ? eqratio d a e h g f g h. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_46. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea∥bd; eb∥ad; b,d,f are on the same line; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line. 步骤: e,g,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ae∥bd => eg∥bf; c,f,h are on the same line, c,g,f are on the same line => h,g,f are on the same line; eg∥bf, b,e,h are on the same line, h,g,f are on the same line => he/hg = eb/gf; be∥ad, ae∥bd => be=ad; he/hg = eb/gf, be=ad => he/hg = da/gf. 生成题目的FL: para e a b d; para e b a d; coll b d f; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h ? eqratio e h g h d a g f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_48. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea∥bd; eb∥ad; b,d,f are on the same line; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line. 步骤: e,g,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ae∥bd => eg∥bf; c,f,h are on the same line, c,g,f are on the same line => h,g,f are on the same line; eg∥bf, b,e,h are on the same line, h,g,f are on the same line => bh/be = fh/fg; be∥ad, ae∥bd => be=ad; bh/be = fh/fg, be=ad => bh/da = fh/fg. 生成题目的FL: para e a b d; para e b a d; coll b d f; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h ? eqratio b h d a f h g f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_76. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ca=cb; eb∥ad; c,f,h are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,c,a are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of b and a; c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line => c,h,i are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => bh∥ai; bh∥ai, b,c,a are on the same line, c,h,i are on the same line => cb/ca = ch/ci; c,h,i are on the same line, cb/ca = ch/ci, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of h and i; c is the midpoint of b and a, c is the midpoint of h and i => bi∥ah. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c a c b; para e b a d; coll c f h; coll b e h; coll c i f; coll i d a ? para b i a h. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_77. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ca=cb; ea∥bd; b,d,f are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; e,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,c,a are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of b and a; e,g,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ae∥bd => ga∥fb; ga∥fb, c,g,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => ca/cb = cg/cf; c,g,f are on the same line, ca/cb = cg/cf, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of f and g; c is the midpoint of b and a, c is the midpoint of f and g => bg∥af. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c a c b; para e a b d; coll b d f; coll c g f; coll e g a ? para b g a f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_78. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ca=cb; ea∥bd; eb∥ad; b,d,f are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; e,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,g,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ae∥bd => ga∥fb; ga∥fb, c,g,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => ca/cb = cg/cf; c,g,f are on the same line, ca/cb = cg/cf, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of f and g; b,c,a are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of b and a; c is the midpoint of b and a, be∥ad, ae∥bd => c,e,d are on the same line; c is the midpoint of b and a, be∥ad, ae∥bd => ce=cd; c,e,d are on the same line, ce=cd => c is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of f and g, c is the midpoint of e and d => fe∥gd. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c a c b; para e a b d; para e b a d; coll b d f; coll c g f; coll e g a ? para e f d g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, para A C B D, para A D B C => midp M C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 在平行四边形中，对角线互相平分。【平行四边形对角线性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_79. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ca=cb; eb∥ad; ea∥bd; c,f,h are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line => c,h,i are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => bh∥ai; bh∥ai, b,c,a are on the same line, c,h,i are on the same line => cb/ca = ch/ci; c,h,i are on the same line, cb/ca = ch/ci, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of h and i; b,c,a are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of b and a; c is the midpoint of b and a, be∥ad, ae∥bd => c,e,d are on the same line; c is the midpoint of b and a, be∥ad, ae∥bd => ce=cd; c,e,d are on the same line, ce=cd => c is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of h and i, c is the midpoint of e and d => hd∥ie. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c a c b; para e b a d; para e a b d; coll c f h; coll b e h; coll c i f; coll i d a ? para d h e i. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, para A C B D, para A D B C => midp M C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 在平行四边形中，对角线互相平分。【平行四边形对角线性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_80. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ca=cb; eb∥ad; c,f,h are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,c,a are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of b and a; c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line => c,h,i are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => bh∥ai; bh∥ai, b,c,a are on the same line, c,h,i are on the same line => cb/ca = ch/ci; c,h,i are on the same line, cb/ca = ch/ci, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of h and i; c is the midpoint of b and a, c is the midpoint of h and i => bi=ah. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c a c b; para e b a d; coll c f h; coll b e h; coll c i f; coll i d a ? cong b i a h. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp M A B, midp M C D => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 对角线互相平分的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_86. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ca=cb; eb∥ad; ea∥bd; c,f,h are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line => c,h,i are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => bh∥ai; bh∥ai, b,c,a are on the same line, c,h,i are on the same line => cb/ca = ch/ci; c,h,i are on the same line, cb/ca = ch/ci, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of h and i; b,c,a are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of b and a; c is the midpoint of b and a, be∥ad, ae∥bd => c,e,d are on the same line; c is the midpoint of b and a, be∥ad, ae∥bd => ce=cd; c,e,d are on the same line, ce=cd => c is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of h and i, c is the midpoint of e and d => he=id. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c a c b; para e b a d; para e a b d; coll c f h; coll b e h; coll c i f; coll i d a ? cong h e i d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, para A C B D, para A D B C => midp M C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp M A B, midp M C D => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 在平行四边形中，对角线互相平分。【平行四边形对角线性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 对角线互相平分的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_18_96. 原题FL: a o = segment a o; b = on_circle b o a; c = on_line c a b; e = intersection_tt e b b o c c o; d = intersection_lt d c e a a o ? cong o e o d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,a are on the same line; ca=cb; eb∥ad; ea∥bd; b,d,f are on the same line; e,g,a are on the same line; c,g,f are on the same line; b,e,h are on the same line; c,f,h are on the same line; i,d,a are on the same line; c,i,f are on the same line. 步骤: b,e,h are on the same line, i,d,a are on the same line, be∥ad => bh∥ai; c,f,h are on the same line, c,i,f are on the same line => c,h,i are on the same line; bh∥ai, b,c,a are on the same line, c,h,i are on the same line => cb/ch = ba/hi; bh∥ai, b,c,a are on the same line, c,h,i are on the same line => cb/ca = ch/ci; e,g,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ae∥bd => ga∥fb; ga∥fb, c,g,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => cg/ca = gf/ab; ga∥fb, c,g,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line => ca/cb = cg/cf; cg/ca = gf/ab, ca/cb = cg/cf, ca=cb => cf/cb = gf/ba; ch/cb = ih/ba, cf/cb = gf/ba => ch/cf = ih/gf; ch/cf = ih/gf, cb/ca = ch/ci, ca=cb => ci/cf = ih/gf. 生成题目的FL: coll b c a; cong c a c b; para e b a d; para e a b d; coll b d f; coll e g a; coll c g f; coll b e h; coll c f h; coll i d a; coll c i f ? eqratio c i c f i h g f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_14. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, a,g,d are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => the intersection angle of ad and ce is equal to ∠cba. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c h e ? eqangle a d c e b c a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_15. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, a,g,d are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => the intersection angle of ad and ce is equal to ∠cba. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c h e ? eqangle c e a d a b b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_26. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adb=∠bec; b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebc; ∠adb=∠bec, ∠abd=∠ebc => ad/ab = ce/cb. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b ? eqratio a d a b c e b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_48. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: c,b,d are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adc=∠aec; ∠adc=∠aec => a,e,d,c are on the same circle; a,e,d,c are on the same circle => ∠dac=∠dec. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b ? eqangle a d a c d e c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_61. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠gdb=∠geb; ∠gdb=∠geb => b,g,e,d are on the same circle; b,g,e,d are on the same circle => ∠bgd=∠bed; ∠bgd=∠bed, a,g,d are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠gba=∠ade. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c g e ? eqangle a b b g d e a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_62. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adb=∠bec; b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebc; ∠adb=∠bec, ∠abd=∠ebc => ba/bc = bd/be; a,g,d are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠gdc=∠ceb; c,e,g are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line => ∠gcd=∠ecb; ∠gdc=∠ceb, ∠gcd=∠ecb => gd/be = cg/cb; ba/bc = bd/be, gd/be = cg/cb => db/dg = ab/cg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c g e ? eqratio b d g d a b c g. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_63. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adb=∠bec; b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebc; ∠adb=∠bec, ∠abd=∠ebc => ba/bc = bd/be; a,g,d are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠gdc=∠ceb; c,e,g are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line => ∠gcd=∠ecb; ∠gdc=∠ceb, ∠gcd=∠ecb => gd/be = cg/cb; ba/bc = bd/be, gd/be = cg/cb => db/dg = ab/cg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c g e ? eqratio g d b d c g a b. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_66. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; fa=fc; fa=fb; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; a,b,e are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line, ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, b,d,c are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc => ∠eah=∠gae; c,e,h are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => e,h,g are on the same line; ∠eah=∠gae, e,h,g are on the same line => eh/eg = ah/ag. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll c h e; cong f h f c ? eqratio h e g e a h a g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_70. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; fa=fc; fa=fb; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; fh=fc. 步骤: fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; a,g,d are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠agh=∠gha; ∠agh=∠gha => ag=ah. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll c e h; cong f h f c ? cong a g a h. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_71. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; fa=fc; fa=fb; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; b,d,c are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, a,g,d are on the same line => ∠adb=∠aeh; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; b,d,c are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc => ∠abd=∠ahe; ∠adb=∠aeh, ∠abd=∠ahe => ad/ab = ae/ah; a,g,d are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠agh=∠gha; ∠agh=∠gha => ag=ah; ad/ab = ae/ah, ag=ah => ad/ab = ae/ag. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c g e; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll c h e; cong f h f c ? eqratio a d a b a e a g. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_72. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; fa=fc; fa=fb; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; b,d,c are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, a,g,d are on the same line => ∠adb=∠aeh; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; b,d,c are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc => ∠abd=∠ahe; ∠adb=∠aeh, ∠abd=∠ahe => ad/ab = ae/ah; a,g,d are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠agh=∠gha; ∠agh=∠gha => ag=ah; ad/ab = ae/ah, ag=ah => ad/ab = ae/ag. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c g e; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll c h e; cong f h f c ? eqratio a b a d a g a e. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_73. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; fa=fc; fa=fb; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; b,d,c are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, a,g,d are on the same line => ∠adb=∠aeh; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; b,d,c are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc => ∠abd=∠ahe; ∠adb=∠aeh, ∠abd=∠ahe => ad/ae = ab/ah; a,g,d are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠agh=∠gha; ∠agh=∠gha => ag=ah; ad/ae = ab/ah, ag=ah => ad/ae = ab/ag. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c g e; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll c h e; cong f h f c ? eqratio a d a e a b a g. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_76. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; fa=fc; fa=fb; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc; a,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; b,d,c are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, a,g,d are on the same line => ∠adb=∠aeh; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; b,d,c are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc => ∠abd=∠ahe; ∠adb=∠aeh, ∠abd=∠ahe => da/db = ea/eh. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll c h e; cong f h f c; coll a g d ? eqratio b d a d h e a e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_77. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; fa=fc; fa=fb; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc; a,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; b,d,c are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, a,g,d are on the same line => ∠adb=∠aeh; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; b,d,c are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc => ∠abd=∠ahe; ∠adb=∠aeh, ∠abd=∠ahe => ad/ae = bd/he. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll c h e; cong f h f c; coll a g d ? eqratio a d a e b d h e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_78. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; fa=fc; fa=fb; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc; a,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; b,d,c are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, a,g,d are on the same line => ∠adb=∠aeh; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; b,d,c are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc => ∠abd=∠ahe; ∠adb=∠aeh, ∠abd=∠ahe => ad/ae = bd/he. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll c h e; cong f h f c; coll a g d ? eqratio a e a d h e b d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_81. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; fa=fc; fa=fb; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; a,g,d are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae => ∠gdc=∠hea; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; c,e,g are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc, c,h,e are on the same line => ∠gcd=∠hae; ∠gdc=∠hea, ∠gcd=∠hae => gd/he = gc/ha; a,g,d are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠agh=∠gha; ∠agh=∠gha => ag=ah; gd/he = gc/ha, ag=ah => gd/he = gc/ga. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll c h e; cong f h f c ? eqratio g d h e c g a g. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_82. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; fa=fc; fa=fb; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; a,g,d are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae => ∠gdc=∠hea; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; c,e,g are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc, c,h,e are on the same line => ∠gcd=∠hae; ∠gdc=∠hea, ∠gcd=∠hae => gd/he = gc/ha; a,g,d are on the same line, c,e,h are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠agh=∠gha; ∠agh=∠gha => ag=ah; gd/he = gc/ha, ag=ah => gd/he = gc/ga. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll c h e; cong f h f c ? eqratio h e g d a g c g. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_91. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠gdc=∠aeg; a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch; c,e,g are on the same line, c,b,d are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line, ∠gae equals the intersection angle of bd and ch, c,h,e are on the same line => ∠gcd=∠eag; ∠gdc=∠aeg, ∠gcd=∠eag => gd/ge = gc/ga. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll c h e ? eqratio g d g e c g a g. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_93. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adb=∠gea; a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; b,d,c are on the same line, c,e,g are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, c,h,e are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ega; ∠adb=∠gea, ∠abd=∠ega => ad/ae = bd/ge. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll c h e ? eqratio a d a e b d g e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_94. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adb=∠gea; a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; b,d,c are on the same line, c,e,g are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, c,h,e are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ega; ∠adb=∠gea, ∠abd=∠ega => ad/ae = bd/ge. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll c h e ? eqratio a e a d g e b d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_95. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab; fa=fc; fa=fb; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; c,h,e are on the same line; fh=fc. 步骤: a,b,e are on the same line, c,h,e are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ∠aeh=∠gea; a,g,d are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ag⟂bd; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab => ch⟂ae; ag⟂bd, ch⟂ae => the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae; fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠ahc=∠abc; c,e,h are on the same line, c,e,g are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of ag and ch is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ae, b,d,c are on the same line, a,e,b are on the same line, ∠ahc=∠abc => ∠ahe=∠ega; ∠aeh=∠gea, ∠ahe=∠ega => eh=eg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll c h e; cong f h f c ? cong e h e g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_96. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,b are on the same line; fa=fc; fa=fb; fh=fc; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠abh=∠ach; b,a,e are on the same line, ∠abh=∠ach, c,h,e are on the same line => ∠ebh=∠ace; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ∠abh=∠ach => ∠ehb=∠cae; ∠ebh=∠ace, ∠ehb=∠cae => be/bh = ce/ca. 生成题目的FL: coll a e b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; cong f h f c; coll c h e ? eqratio b e b h c e a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_97. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,b are on the same line; fa=fc; fa=fb; fh=fc; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠abh=∠ach; b,a,e are on the same line, ∠abh=∠ach, c,h,e are on the same line => ∠ebh=∠ace; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ∠abh=∠ach => ∠ehb=∠cae; ∠ebh=∠ace, ∠ehb=∠cae => be/bh = ce/ca. 生成题目的FL: coll a e b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; cong f h f c; coll c h e ? eqratio b h b e a c c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_98. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,b are on the same line; fa=fc; fa=fb; fh=fc; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠abh=∠ach; b,a,e are on the same line, ∠abh=∠ach, c,h,e are on the same line => ∠ebh=∠ace; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ∠abh=∠ach => ∠ehb=∠cae; ∠ebh=∠ace, ∠ehb=∠cae => eb/ec = bh/ac. 生成题目的FL: coll a e b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; cong f h f c; coll c h e ? eqratio b e c e b h a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
