原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_101. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,b are on the same line; fa=fc; fa=fb; fh=fc; c,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fc, fh=fc, fa=fb => a,h,b,c are on the same circle; a,h,b,c are on the same circle => ∠abh=∠ach; b,a,e are on the same line, ∠abh=∠ach, c,h,e are on the same line => ∠ebh=∠ace; c,e,h are on the same line, a,b,e are on the same line, ∠abh=∠ach => ∠ehb=∠cae; ∠ebh=∠ace, ∠ehb=∠cae => he/hb = ae/ac. 生成题目的FL: coll a e b; cong f a f c; cong f a f b; cong f h f c; coll c h e ? eqratio b h h e a c a e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_102. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠abc=∠abc; b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adb=∠bec; b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebc; ∠adb=∠bec, ∠abd=∠ebc => ba/bc = bd/be; b,a,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠abc=∠abc => ∠abc=∠ebd; ba/bc = bd/be, ∠abc=∠ebd => ab/ac = db/de. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b b c a b b c; coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b ? eqratio a b a c b d e d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_19_103. 原题FL: m a b = iso_triangle m a b; o = circle o a b m; d = on_line d m o, on_line d a b; e = on_tline e a a o, on_pline e m a o ? cong m e m d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠abc=∠abc; b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; a,e,b are on the same line; ce⟂ab. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ce⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠adb=∠bec; b,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line => ∠abd=∠ebc; ∠adb=∠bec, ∠abd=∠ebc => ba/bc = bd/be; b,a,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠abc=∠abc => ∠abc=∠ebd; ba/bc = bd/be, ∠abc=∠ebd => ab/ac = db/de. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b b c a b b c; coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll a e b; perp c e a b ? eqratio a c a b e d b d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_12. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=cb; ce=cb; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => cg=ce; cg=ce => ∠cge=∠gec; ∠cge=∠gec, c,d,g are on the same line => the intersection angle of cd and eg is equal to ∠gec. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle c d e g e g c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_32. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠abd equals the intersection angle of bg and cd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle a b b d b g c d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_33. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠abd equals the intersection angle of bg and cd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle b d a b c d b g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_34. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ae=ab; af=ab; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ae=ab, af=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δbef; a is the circumcenter of Δbef, bc⟂ab => ∠cbe=∠bfe; ∠cbe=∠bfe, f,b,d are on the same line => ∠cbe equals the intersection angle of bd and ef. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong a e a b; cong a f a b; coll f b d ? eqangle b c b e b d e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_35. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ae=ab; af=ab; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ae=ab, af=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δbef; a is the circumcenter of Δbef, bc⟂ab => ∠cbe=∠bfe; ∠cbe=∠bfe, f,b,d are on the same line => ∠cbe equals the intersection angle of bd and ef. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong a e a b; cong a f a b; coll f b d ? eqangle b e b c e f b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_48. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ae=ab; ce=cb; af=ab; f,b,d are on the same line; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ae=ab, af=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δbef; a is the circumcenter of Δbef, bc⟂ab => ∠cbe=∠bfe; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; cd=cb, cg=cd, ce=cb => g,b,d,e are on the same circle; g,b,d,e are on the same circle => ∠gdb=∠geb; ∠cbe=∠bfe, f,b,d are on the same line, ∠cdb=∠dbc, ∠gdb=∠geb, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠geb=∠feb; ∠geb=∠feb => eg∥fe. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong a e a b; cong c e c b; cong a f a b; coll f b d; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? para e g e f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_49. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ce=cb; ae=ab. 步骤: ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠aec=∠cba; ∠aec=∠cba, bc⟂ab => ∠abc=∠aec; ∠abc=∠aec => a,c,b,e are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b ? cyclic a c b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_50. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠aec=∠cba; ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠cea=∠abc; ∠aec=∠cba, bc⟂ab, ∠cea=∠abc => ce⟂ae; cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ce⟂ae, bg⟂fb => the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and fb; the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and fb, f,b,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g; coll f b d ? eqangle c e b g a e b d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_51. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠aec=∠cba; ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠cea=∠abc; ∠aec=∠cba, bc⟂ab, ∠cea=∠abc => ce⟂ae; cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ce⟂ae, bg⟂fb => the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and fb; the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and fb, f,b,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g; coll f b d ? eqangle b g c e b d a e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_52. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ce=cb; ae=ab. 步骤: ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠aec=∠cba; ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠cea=∠abc; ce=cb, ae=ab => be⟂ac; ∠aec=∠cba, bc⟂ab, ∠cea=∠abc => ce⟂ae; ce⟂ae, be⟂ac => ∠eca=∠aeb. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b ? eqangle c e a c a e b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_65. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δged; c is the circumcenter of Δged, c,d,g are on the same line => eg⟂de; bc⟂ab, eg⟂de => the intersection angle of ab and de is equal to the intersection angle of bc and eg. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle d e a b e g b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_66. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δged; c is the circumcenter of Δged, c,d,g are on the same line => eg⟂de; bc⟂ab, eg⟂de => the intersection angle of ab and eg is equal to the intersection angle of bc and de. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle a b e g b c d e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_67. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δged; c is the circumcenter of Δged, c,d,g are on the same line => eg⟂de; bc⟂ab, eg⟂de => the intersection angle of ab and eg is equal to the intersection angle of bc and de. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle e g a b d e b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_68. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ce=cb, ae=ab => be⟂ac; bg⟂fb, be⟂ac => the intersection angle of bg and ac is equal to ∠fbe; the intersection angle of bg and ac is equal to ∠fbe, f,b,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bg and ac is equal to ∠dbe. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g; coll f b d ? eqangle b g a c b d b e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_69. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ce=cb, ae=ab => be⟂ac; bg⟂fb, be⟂ac => the intersection angle of bg and ac is equal to ∠fbe; the intersection angle of bg and ac is equal to ∠fbe, f,b,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bg and ac is equal to ∠dbe. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g; coll f b d ? eqangle a c b g b e b d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_70. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δged; ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => g,b,d,e are on the same circle; c is the circumcenter of Δged, c,d,g are on the same line => eg⟂de; bg⟂fb, eg⟂de => the intersection angle of bg and de is equal to the intersection angle of fb and eg; ae=ab, af=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δbef; a is the circumcenter of Δbef, bc⟂ab => ∠cbe=∠bfe; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; g,b,d,e are on the same circle => ∠gdb=∠geb; ∠cbe=∠bfe, f,b,d are on the same line, ∠cdb=∠dbc, ∠gdb=∠geb, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠geb=∠feb; ∠geb=∠feb => eg∥fe; the intersection angle of bg and de is equal to the intersection angle of fb and eg, f,b,d are on the same line, eg∥ef => the intersection angle of bg and de is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ef. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle b g d e b d e f. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_71. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δged; ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => g,b,d,e are on the same circle; c is the circumcenter of Δged, c,d,g are on the same line => eg⟂de; bg⟂fb, eg⟂de => the intersection angle of bg and de is equal to the intersection angle of fb and eg; ae=ab, af=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δbef; a is the circumcenter of Δbef, bc⟂ab => ∠cbe=∠bfe; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; g,b,d,e are on the same circle => ∠gdb=∠geb; ∠cbe=∠bfe, f,b,d are on the same line, ∠cdb=∠dbc, ∠gdb=∠geb, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠geb=∠feb; ∠geb=∠feb => eg∥fe; the intersection angle of bg and de is equal to the intersection angle of fb and eg, f,b,d are on the same line, eg∥ef => the intersection angle of bg and de is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ef. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle d e b g e f b d. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_72. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ce=cb, ae=ab => be⟂ac; bg⟂fb, be⟂ac => ∠gbe equals the intersection angle of fb and ac; ∠gbe equals the intersection angle of fb and ac, f,b,d are on the same line => ∠gbe equals the intersection angle of bd and ac. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g; coll f b d ? eqangle b g b e b d a c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_75. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, ae=ab => be⟂ac; ce=cb, cd=cb, cg=cd => c is the circumcenter of Δged; c is the circumcenter of Δged, c,d,g are on the same line => eg⟂de; be⟂ac, eg⟂de => the intersection angle of ac and de is equal to ∠beg. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle d e a c e g b e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_78. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; cg=cd, cd=cb => cg=cb; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd, bc⟂ab => ∠abc=∠gbf; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; cg=cb => ∠cgb=∠gbc; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠cgb=∠gbc => ∠cbg=∠bfa; ∠abc=∠gbf, ∠cbg=∠bfa => ∠abg equals the intersection angle of bg and af. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle a b b g b g a f. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_79. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; cg=cd, cd=cb => cg=cb; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd, bc⟂ab => ∠abc=∠gbf; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; cg=cb => ∠cgb=∠gbc; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠cgb=∠gbc => ∠cbg=∠bfa; ∠abc=∠gbf, ∠cbg=∠bfa => ∠abg equals the intersection angle of bg and af. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle b g a b a f b g. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_82. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => ∠gbf=∠fbg; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa => ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd; ∠gbf=∠fbg, ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd => the intersection angle of bg and af is equal to the intersection angle of fb and cd; the intersection angle of bg and af is equal to the intersection angle of fb and cd, f,b,d are on the same line => ∠gbd equals the intersection angle of af and cd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle b g b d a f c d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_84. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠cdb=∠dbc => ∠fbc=∠gba; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa => ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd; ∠fbc=∠gba, ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd => the intersection angle of ab and cd is equal to the intersection angle of bc and af. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle a b c d b c a f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_85. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠cdb=∠dbc => ∠fbc=∠gba; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa => ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd; ∠fbc=∠gba, ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd => the intersection angle of ab and cd is equal to the intersection angle of bc and af. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle c d a b a f b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_88. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; cg=cd, cd=cb => cg=cb; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; cg=cb => ∠cgb=∠gbc; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠cgb=∠gbc => ∠cbg=∠abf; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; f,b,d are on the same line, c,g,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, ∠abf=∠bfa => ∠afb=∠cgb; ∠cbg=∠abf, ∠afb=∠cgb => ba/bf = bc/bg; ba/bf = bc/bg, gc=bc => ba/bf = gc/gb. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqratio a b f b c g b g. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_92. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠aec=∠cba; ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠cea=∠abc; ∠aec=∠cba, bc⟂ab, ∠cea=∠abc => ce⟂ae; cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa => ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd, bg⟂fb => cd⟂af; ce⟂ae, cd⟂af => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to the intersection angle of ae and cd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle c e a f a e c d. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle A B P Q C D U V, perp P Q U V => perp A B C D; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 若AB与PQ的夹角和CD与UV的夹角一致，且PQ垂直UV，则AB垂直CD; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_93. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠aec=∠cba; ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠cea=∠abc; ∠aec=∠cba, bc⟂ab, ∠cea=∠abc => ce⟂ae; cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa => ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd, bg⟂fb => cd⟂af; ce⟂ae, cd⟂af => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to the intersection angle of ae and cd. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle a f c e c d a e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle A B P Q C D U V, perp P Q U V => perp A B C D; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 若AB与PQ的夹角和CD与UV的夹角一致，且PQ垂直UV，则AB垂直CD; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_94. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ce=cb; ae=ab; f,b,d are on the same line; af=ab; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠aec=∠cba; ce=cb, ae=ab => ∠cea=∠abc; ∠aec=∠cba, bc⟂ab, ∠cea=∠abc => ce⟂ae; cg=cd, cd=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbgd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, bc⟂ab => ∠abg=∠bdg; af=ab => ∠abf=∠bfa; f,b,d are on the same line, ∠abg=∠bdg, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠bfa => ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd; c is the circumcenter of Δbgd, c,d,g are on the same line => bg⟂bd; f,b,d are on the same line, bg⟂bd => bg⟂fb; ∠bfa equals the intersection angle of bg and cd, bg⟂fb => cd⟂af; ce⟂ae, cd⟂af => ∠ecd=∠eaf. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong c e c b; cong a e a b; coll f b d; cong a f a b; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? eqangle c e c d a e a f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle A B P Q C D U V, perp P Q U V => perp A B C D; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 若AB与PQ的夹角和CD与UV的夹角一致，且PQ垂直UV，则AB垂直CD; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 6

原始题号:update_pics1/output_20_100. 原题FL: e c d = r_triangle e c d; o = midpoint o d c; a = on_tline a c c d, on_tline a e e o; f = on_line f c a, on_line f d e ? cong a e a f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; cd=cb; ae=ab; ce=cb; af=ab; f,b,d are on the same line; cg=cd; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: ae=ab, af=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δbef; a is the circumcenter of Δbef, bc⟂ab => ∠cbe=∠bfe; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; cd=cb, cg=cd, ce=cb => g,b,d,e are on the same circle; g,b,d,e are on the same circle => ∠gdb=∠geb; ∠cbe=∠bfe, f,b,d are on the same line, ∠cdb=∠dbc, ∠gdb=∠geb, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠geb=∠feb; ∠geb=∠feb => eg∥fe; eg∥ef => f,e,g are on the same line. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; cong c d c b; cong a e a b; cong c e c b; cong a f a b; coll f b d; cong c g c d; coll c d g ? coll f e g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B A C => coll A B C; eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线平行，那么它们没有公共点，除非它们是同一条直线。【平行线的性质】; 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_0. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? para d g a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_1. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => df∥ab. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c ? para d f a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_15. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line => bc/bd = ca/dg; bc/bd = ca/dg, db=dc => cb/cd = ca/dg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? eqratio c d b c d g c a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_16. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line => cb/ca = db/dg; cb/ca = db/dg, db=dc => cb/ca = dc/dg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? eqratio b c c a c d d g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_17. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line => cb/ca = db/dg; cb/ca = db/dg, db=dc => cb/ca = dc/dg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? eqratio c a b c d g c d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_18. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,g,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ab/ac = gb/gd; ab/ac = gb/gd, gb=ga => ab/ac = ga/gd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? eqratio b a c a g a d g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_20. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, c,f,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ce/cb = cf/cd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll c f e; cong f e f c ? eqratio c e b c c f c d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_26. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, b,d,c are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bc/be = dc/df. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll c f e; cong f e f c ? eqratio b c b e c d d f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_27. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, b,d,c are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bc/be = dc/df. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll c f e; cong f e f c ? eqratio b e b c d f c d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_28. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; i,b,a are on the same line; d,i,h are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => hi=hd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll i b a; coll d i h ? cong h i h d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_29. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; i,b,a are on the same line; d,i,h are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => gh/gf = ih/id; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; gh/gf = ih/id, hg=hf, hg/hf = hi/hd => fh/fg = dh/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll i b a; coll d i h ? eqratio f h f g d h d i. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_30. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; i,b,a are on the same line; d,i,h are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => gh/gf = ih/id; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; gh/gf = ih/id, hg=hf, hg/hf = hi/hd => fh/fg = dh/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll i b a; coll d i h ? eqratio f g f h d i d h. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_31. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; i,b,a are on the same line; d,i,h are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hi = gf/id; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; hg/hi = gf/id, hg=hf, hg/hf = hi/hd => hf/hd = fg/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll i b a; coll d i h ? eqratio f h d h f g d i. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_34. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; h is the midpoint of f and g, h is the midpoint of d and i => fi∥gd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? para f i d g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_35. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; h is the midpoint of f and g, h is the midpoint of d and i => fi=gd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? cong f i g d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp M A B, midp M C D => cong A C B D; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 对角线互相平分的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_36. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; i,b,a are on the same line; d,i,h are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; d is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of f and g => db/hf = bc/fg; db/hf = bc/fg, db=dc, hg=fh => bd/hg = bc/fg; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hi = gf/id; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; bd/hg = bc/fg, hg/hi = fg/di => bd/hi = bc/di; bd/hi = bc/di, db=dc, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => dc/dh = bc/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll i b a; coll d i h ? eqratio c d d h b c d i. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_37. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; i,b,a are on the same line; d,i,h are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; d is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of f and g => db/hf = bc/fg; db/hf = bc/fg, db=dc, hg=fh => bd/hg = bc/fg; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hi = gf/id; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; bd/hg = bc/fg, hg/hi = fg/di => bd/hi = bc/di; bd/hi = bc/di, db=dc, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => dc/dh = bc/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll i b a; coll d i h ? eqratio d h c d d i b c. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_38. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; d is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of f and g => db/hf = bc/fg; db/hf = bc/fg, db=dc, hg=fh => bd/hg = bc/fg; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line => bc/ba = bd/bg; bd/hg = bc/fg, bc/ba = bd/bg => fg/ba = gh/gb; fg/ba = gh/gb, hg=hf, gb=ga => fg/ba = fh/ga. 生成题目的FL: coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll b d c; cong d b d c ? eqratio f g b a f h g a. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_39. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; d is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of f and g => db/hf = bc/fg; db/hf = bc/fg, db=dc, hg=fh => bd/hg = bc/fg; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line => bc/ba = bd/bg; bd/hg = bc/fg, bc/ba = bd/bg => fg/ba = gh/gb; fg/ba = gh/gb, hg=hf, gb=ga => fg/ba = fh/ga. 生成题目的FL: coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll b d c; cong d b d c ? eqratio b a f g g a f h. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_40. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; d is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of f and g => db/hf = bc/fg; db/hf = bc/fg, db=dc, hg=fh => bd/hg = bc/fg; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line => cb/ca = db/dg; bd/hg = bc/fg, cb/ca = db/dg => fg/ca = gh/gd; fg/ca = gh/gd, hg=hf => fg/ca = fh/dg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f ? eqratio f g c a f h d g. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_41. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; d is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of f and g => db/hf = bc/fg; db/hf = bc/fg, db=dc, hg=fh => bd/hg = bc/fg; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line => cb/ca = db/dg; bd/hg = bc/fg, cb/ca = db/dg => fg/ca = gh/gd; fg/ca = gh/gd, hg=hf => fg/ca = fh/dg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f ? eqratio c a f g d g f h. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_42. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; d is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of f and g => db/hf = bc/fg; db/hf = bc/fg, db=dc, hg=fh => bd/hg = bc/fg; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, c,f,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => cb/ce = cd/cf; cb/ce = cd/cf, bd=cd, fe=cf => cb/ce = bd/fe; bd/hg = bc/fg, cb/ce = bd/fe => fg/ce = hg/fe; fg/ce = hg/fe, hg=hf, fe=fc => fg/ce = fh/fc. 生成题目的FL: coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll b d c; cong d b d c ? eqratio f g c e f h c f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_44. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; d is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of f and g => db/hf = bc/fg; db/hf = bc/fg, db=dc, hg=fh => bd/hg = bc/fg; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, b,d,c are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bc/be = dc/df; bc/be = dc/df, bd=cd => bc/be = db/df; bd/hg = bc/fg, bc/be = db/df => fg/be = hg/df; fg/be = hg/df, hg=hf => fg/be = fh/fd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll f g h; cong h g h f ? eqratio f g b e f h d f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_46. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; g is the midpoint of b and a, f is the midpoint of c and e => gb/fc = ba/ce; gb/fc = ba/ce, gb=ga, fe=cf => bg/fe = ba/ce; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, c,f,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ec/eb = fc/fd; fc/fd = ec/eb, fe=cf => fe/fd = ec/eb; bg/fe = ba/ce, fe/fd = ec/eb => bg/df = ba/be; bg/df = ba/be, gb=ga => ga/df = ba/be. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? eqratio g a d f b a b e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_47. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; g is the midpoint of b and a, f is the midpoint of c and e => gb/fc = ba/ce; gb/fc = ba/ce, gb=ga, fe=cf => bg/fe = ba/ce; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, c,f,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ec/eb = fc/fd; fc/fd = ec/eb, fe=cf => fe/fd = ec/eb; bg/fe = ba/ce, fe/fd = ec/eb => bg/df = ba/be; bg/df = ba/be, gb=ga => ga/df = ba/be. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? eqratio d f g a b e b a. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_48. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; g is the midpoint of b and a, f is the midpoint of c and e => gb/fc = ba/ce; gb/fc = ba/ce, gb=ga, fe=cf => bg/fe = ba/ce; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,g,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ab/ac = gb/gd; bg/fe = ba/ce, gb/gd = ab/ac => fe/dg = ce/ca; fe/dg = ce/ca, fe=fc => cf/dg = ce/ca. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? eqratio c f d g c e c a. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_51. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; dg∥ac, b,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line => cb/ca = db/dg; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, b,d,c are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bc/be = dc/df; bc/be = dc/df, bd=cd => bc/be = db/df; cb/ca = db/dg, bc/be = db/df => ca/be = dg/df. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a ? eqratio b e c a d f d g. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_52. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; g is the midpoint of b and a, h is the midpoint of d and i => gb/hd = ba/di; gb/hd = ba/di, gb=ga => ga/dh = ba/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio g a d h b a d i. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_53. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; g is the midpoint of b and a, h is the midpoint of d and i => gb/hd = ba/di; gb/hd = ba/di, gb=ga => ga/dh = ba/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio d h g a d i b a. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_54. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; f is the midpoint of c and e, h is the midpoint of d and i => cf/dh = ce/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio c f d h c e d i. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_55. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; f is the midpoint of c and e, h is the midpoint of d and i => cf/dh = ce/di. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio d h c f d i c e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_56. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; h is the midpoint of f and g, h is the midpoint of d and i => fi∥gd; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; fi∥dg, dg∥ac => ca∥fi; i,b,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => e,a,i are on the same line; ca∥fi, c,f,e are on the same line, e,a,i are on the same line => ec/ef = ea/ei; ec/ef = ea/ei, fe=fc => ce/cf = ea/ei. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio c e c f e a i e. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_60. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; h is the midpoint of f and g, h is the midpoint of d and i => fi∥gd; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; fi∥dg, dg∥ac => ca∥fi; i,b,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => e,a,i are on the same line; ca∥fi, c,f,e are on the same line, e,a,i are on the same line => ce/cf = ae/ai. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio c e c f e a i a. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_61. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; h is the midpoint of f and g, h is the midpoint of d and i => fi∥gd; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; fi∥dg, dg∥ac => ca∥fi; i,b,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => e,a,i are on the same line; ca∥fi, c,f,e are on the same line, e,a,i are on the same line => ce/cf = ae/ai. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio c f c e i a e a. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 3
