原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_65. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; gb=ga; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: f,g,h are on the same line, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of f and g; b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; h is the midpoint of f and g, h is the midpoint of d and i => fi∥gd; h is the midpoint of f and g, h is the midpoint of d and i => fi=gd; b,g,a are on the same line, gb=ga => g is the midpoint of b and a; d is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => dg∥ca; fi∥dg, dg∥ac => ca∥fi; i,b,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => e,a,i are on the same line; ca∥fi, e,a,i are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => ae/ac = ie/if; ae/ac = ie/if, fi=gd => ae/ac = ie/dg. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; cong g b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio e a c a i e d g. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp M C D => para A C B D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp M A B, midp M C D => cong A C B D; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 若M是AB的中点，且M也是CD的中点，那么AC平行于BD; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 对角线互相平分的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_69. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, c,f,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ec/eb = fc/fd; fc/fd = ec/eb, fe=cf => fe/fd = ec/eb; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; f is the midpoint of c and e, h is the midpoint of d and i => cf/dh = ce/di; cf/dh = ce/di, fe=cf, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => fe/hi = ce/di; fe/fd = ec/eb, fe/hi = ce/di => be/di = df/hi; be/di = df/hi, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => be/di = df/dh. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio b e d i d f d h. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_21_70. 原题FL: b c d = triangle b c d; e = foot e b c d; a = free a; f = foot f a c d; g = midpoint g b a ? cong f g g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line; fe=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; f,g,h are on the same line; hg=hf; d,i,h are on the same line; i,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, db=dc => d is the midpoint of b and c; c,f,e are on the same line, fe=fc => f is the midpoint of c and e; d is the midpoint of b and c, f is the midpoint of c and e => df∥be; eb∥fd, c,f,e are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ec/eb = fc/fd; fc/fd = ec/eb, fe=cf => fe/fd = ec/eb; i,b,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, df∥be, b,e,a are on the same line => gi∥fd; gi∥fd, f,g,h are on the same line, d,i,h are on the same line => hg/hf = hi/hd; d,i,h are on the same line, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => h is the midpoint of d and i; f is the midpoint of c and e, h is the midpoint of d and i => cf/dh = ce/di; cf/dh = ce/di, fe=cf, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => fe/hi = ce/di; fe/fd = ec/eb, fe/hi = ce/di => be/di = df/hi; be/di = df/hi, hg/hf = hi/hd, hg=hf => be/di = df/dh. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; cong d b d c; coll b e a; coll c f e; cong f e f c; coll b g a; coll f g h; cong h g h f; coll d i h; coll i b a ? eqratio d i b e d h d f. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_22_66. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_tline d b a b; e = intersection_lt e c d a a b ? cong e c c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; b,e,a are on the same line; fe∥ad; f,a,c are on the same line; f,h,e are on the same line; d,h,c are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ad, ad∥bc => bc∥ef; bc∥ef, b,e,a are on the same line, f,a,c are on the same line => ab/ac = be/fc; f,h,e are on the same line, ef∥ad => fh∥ad; fh∥ad, f,a,c are on the same line, d,h,c are on the same line => fc/fh = ac/ad; ab/ac = be/fc, fc/fh = ac/ad => ab/ad = be/fh. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; coll b e a; para f e a d; coll f a c; coll f h e; coll d h c ? eqratio b a d a b e f h. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_7. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; ce=cd; c,b,e are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cd => ca/cb = ce/cd; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca/cb = ce/cd, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠dec; ∠cab=∠dec, c,b,e are on the same line => ∠cab equals the intersection angle of de and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c e c d; coll c b e ? eqangle a c a b d e b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; ce=cd; c,b,e are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cd => ca/cb = ce/cd; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca/cb = ce/cd, ∠acb=∠dce => ac/ab = ec/ed; ac/ab = ec/ed, ca=cb, ce=cd => bc/ba = dc/de. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c e c d; coll c b e ? eqratio a b c b e d d c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_11. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; ce=cd; c,b,e are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cd => ca/cb = ce/cd; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca/cb = ce/cd, ∠acb=∠dce => ca/ce = ab/ed; ca/ce = ab/ed, ca=cb, ce=cd => cb/cd = ab/ed. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c e c d; coll c b e ? eqratio c b d c a b e d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_14. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; c,b,e are on the same line; ce=cd. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cd => ca/cb = ce/cd; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca/cb = ce/cd, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠dec; a,c,d are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line, ∠cab=∠dec => ∠ade=∠abe; ∠ade=∠abe => e,d,a,b are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; coll c b e; cong c e c d ? cyclic e d a b. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_15. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; cd=ce; c,b,e are on the same line; e,a,f are on the same line; d,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, cd=ce => ca/cb = cd/ce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ab∥de; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => fa/fe = fb/fd. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c d c e; coll c b e; coll e a f; coll d b f ? eqratio a f e f b f d f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_19. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; cd=ce; c,b,e are on the same line; e,a,f are on the same line; d,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, cd=ce => ca/cb = cd/ce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠ace=∠dcb; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ab∥de; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => ae/bd = fa/fb; ca=cb, ce=cd, ∠ace=∠dcb => ea=db; ae/bd = fa/fb, ea=db => af=bf. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c d c e; coll c b e; coll e a f; coll d b f ? cong a f b f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line; e,f,c are on the same line; f,d,b are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cae=∠dab; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => ec/db = fe/fd; ac=ab, ae=ad, ∠cae=∠dab => ec=db; ec/db = fe/fd, ec=db => ef=df. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a; coll e f c; coll f d b ? cong e f d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_21. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; cd=ce; c,b,e are on the same line; e,a,f are on the same line; d,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, cd=ce => ca/cb = cd/ce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ab∥de; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => fa/fe = ab/ed. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c d c e; coll c b e; coll e a f; coll d b f ? eqratio a f e f a b e d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; cd=ce; c,b,e are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, cd=ce => ca/cb = cd/ce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ab∥de; ab∥de, c,d,a are on the same line, c,b,e are on the same line => ca/cb = ad/be; ca/cb = ad/be, ca=cb => ad=be. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c d c e; coll c b e ? cong a d b e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_26. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; c,b,e are on the same line; ce=cd. 步骤: ce=cd => ∠ced=∠edc; e,c,b are on the same line, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ced=∠edc => ∠deb=∠ade; e,c,b are on the same line, a,d,c are on the same line => ∠ace=∠dcb; e,c,b are on the same line, a,d,c are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca=cb, ce=cd, ∠ace=∠dcb => ∠cae=∠dbc; c,d,a are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line, ∠cae=∠dbc => ∠dae=∠dbe; ∠deb=∠ade, ∠dae=∠dbe => ∠edb=∠aed; ca=cb, cd=ce => ca/cb = cd/ce; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠edb=∠aed, ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠abd=∠eab. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; coll c b e; cong c e c d ? eqangle a b b d a e a b. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_27. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; c,b,e are on the same line; ce=cd. 步骤: ce=cd => ∠ced=∠edc; e,c,b are on the same line, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ced=∠edc => ∠deb=∠ade; e,c,b are on the same line, a,d,c are on the same line => ∠ace=∠dcb; e,c,b are on the same line, a,d,c are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; ca=cb, ce=cd, ∠ace=∠dcb => ∠cae=∠dbc; c,d,a are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line, ∠cae=∠dbc => ∠dae=∠dbe; ∠deb=∠ade, ∠dae=∠dbe => ∠edb=∠aed; ca=cb, cd=ce => ca/cb = cd/ce; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠edb=∠aed, ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠abd=∠eab. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; coll c b e; cong c e c d ? eqangle b d a b a b a e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; ce=cd; c,b,e are on the same line; e,a,f are on the same line; d,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cd => ca/cb = ce/cd; ca=cb, ce=cd => ca/cb = cd/ce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠ace=∠dcb; ca/cb = ce/cd, ∠acb=∠dce => ac/ab = ec/ed; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ab∥de; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => ab/af = ed/ef; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => ae/bd = fa/fb; ca=cb, ce=cd, ∠ace=∠dcb => ea=db; ed/ef = ab/af, ae/bd = fa/fb, ea=db => ed/ef = ba/bf; ec/ed = ac/ab, ed/ef = ba/bf => ec/ef = ca/bf; ec/ef = ca/bf, ce=cd, ca=cb, ae/bd = fa/fb, ea=db => dc/ef = cb/af. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c e c d; coll c b e; coll e a f; coll d b f ? eqratio d c e f c b a f. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_29. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; ce=cd; c,b,e are on the same line; e,a,f are on the same line; d,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cd => ca/cb = ce/cd; ca=cb, ce=cd => ca/cb = cd/ce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠ace=∠dcb; ca/cb = ce/cd, ∠acb=∠dce => ac/ab = ec/ed; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ab∥de; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => ab/af = ed/ef; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => ae/bd = fa/fb; ca=cb, ce=cd, ∠ace=∠dcb => ea=db; ed/ef = ab/af, ae/bd = fa/fb, ea=db => ed/ef = ba/bf; ec/ed = ac/ab, ed/ef = ba/bf => ec/ef = ca/bf; ec/ef = ca/bf, ce=cd, ca=cb, ae/bd = fa/fb, ea=db => dc/ef = cb/af. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c e c d; coll c b e; coll e a f; coll d b f ? eqratio e f d c a f c b. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_23_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d a c; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c b; g = on_pline g d a f, on_pline g f a c ? para c e g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; cd=ce; c,b,e are on the same line; e,a,f are on the same line; d,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, cd=ce => ca/cb = cd/ce; ca=cb, cd=ce => ca/cb = ce/cd; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠acb=∠dce; a,d,c are on the same line, e,c,b are on the same line => ∠ace=∠dcb; ca/cb = cd/ce, ∠acb=∠dce => ∠cab=∠cde; ∠cab=∠cde, c,d,a are on the same line => ab∥de; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => fe/fa = ed/ab; ab∥de, e,a,f are on the same line, d,b,f are on the same line => ea/db = fe/fd; ca/cb = ce/cd, ∠acb=∠dce => ca/ce = ab/ed; ca=cb, ce=cd, ∠ace=∠dcb => ea=db; fe/fa = ed/ab, ca/ce = ab/ed, ca=cb, ce=cd, ea/db = fe/fd, ea=db => cd/ca = fd/fa; cd/ca = fd/fa, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠dfc=∠cfa; ∠dfc=∠cfa, d,b,f are on the same line, e,a,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of bd and cf is equal to the intersection angle of cf and ae. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong c d c e; coll c b e; coll e a f; coll d b f ? eqangle b d c f c f a e. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 d b d c a b a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqangle6 a b a d a d a c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比，那么这个点在角平分线上。【角平分线的逆定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bac=∠cba; ca=cb; fa∥bc; fb∥ac. 步骤: ∠cba=∠bac, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠fab=∠abf; ∠fab=∠abf => fa=fb; fa=fb, ca=cb => ab⟂cf. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a c b c a b; cong c a c b; para f a b c; para f b a c ? perp a b c f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_2. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, dc=da => d is the midpoint of c and a; b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; d is the midpoint of c and a, e is the midpoint of c and b => de∥ab. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong d c d a; coll b c e; cong e b e c ? para d e a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_3. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, dc=da => d is the midpoint of c and a; h,a,f are on the same line, ha=hf => h is the midpoint of a and f; d is the midpoint of c and a, h is the midpoint of a and f => dh∥cf. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong d c d a; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? para d h c f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_4. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; b,g,f are on the same line, gf=gb => g is the midpoint of b and f; e is the midpoint of c and b, g is the midpoint of b and f => eg∥cf. 生成题目的FL: coll b c e; cong e b e c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? para e g c f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: b,g,f are on the same line, gf=gb => g is the midpoint of b and f; h,a,f are on the same line, ha=hf => h is the midpoint of a and f; g is the midpoint of b and f, h is the midpoint of a and f => gh∥ba. 生成题目的FL: coll b g f; cong g f g b; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? para g h a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_6. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, dc=da => d is the midpoint of c and a; b,g,f are on the same line, gf=gb => g is the midpoint of b and f; d is the midpoint of c and a, g is the midpoint of b and f => cd/ca = bg/bf; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; cd/ca = bg/bf, dc=da, ca=fb => da/bf = bg/bf. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong d c d a; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? eqratio d a b f b g b f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_7. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, dc=da => d is the midpoint of c and a; b,g,f are on the same line, gf=gb => g is the midpoint of b and f; d is the midpoint of c and a, g is the midpoint of b and f => cd/ca = bg/bf; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; cd/ca = bg/bf, dc=da, ca=fb => da/bf = bg/bf. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong d c d a; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? eqratio b f d a b f b g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_12. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; da=dc; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: c,a,d are on the same line, g,b,f are on the same line, bf∥ac => cd∥gb; da=dc, gf=gb => da/dc = gf/gb; af∥bc, c,d,a are on the same line, b,g,f are on the same line, da/dc = gf/gb => dg∥cb; cd∥gb, dg∥bc => cd=gb. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong d a d c; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? cong c d g b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_13. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,e are on the same line; ec=eb; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: ec=eb, ha=hf => ec/eb = ha/hf; bf∥ac, b,c,e are on the same line, h,a,f are on the same line, ec/eb = ha/hf => eh∥ca; c,b,e are on the same line, a,h,f are on the same line, af∥bc => ce∥ha; eh∥ac, ce∥ha => ca=he. 生成题目的FL: coll b c e; cong e c e b; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? cong c a h e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_17. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,d,a are on the same line; da=dc; fa∥bc; fb∥ac; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: da=dc, gf=gb => da/dc = gf/gb; af∥bc, c,d,a are on the same line, b,g,f are on the same line, da/dc = gf/gb => dg∥af; c,a,d are on the same line, g,b,f are on the same line, bf∥ac => da∥fg; dg∥af, da∥fg => af=gd. 生成题目的FL: coll c d a; cong d a d c; para f a b c; para f b a c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? cong a f g d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_18. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cab=∠abc; ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; da=dc; fa∥bc; fb∥ac; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: ∠abc=∠cab, bc∥af => ∠baf=∠cab; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ∠bfa=∠acb; ∠baf=∠cab, ∠bfa=∠acb => bf=bc; ∠baf=∠cab, ∠bfa=∠acb => af=ac; ∠cba=∠bac, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠fab=∠abf; ∠fab=∠abf => fa=fb; bf=bc, ca=cb, af=ac, fa=fb => ∠bcf=∠fca; da=dc, gf=gb => da/dc = gf/gb; af∥bc, c,d,a are on the same line, b,g,f are on the same line, da/dc = gf/gb => dg∥cb; ∠bcf=∠fca, dg∥bc => the intersection angle of dg and cf is equal to ∠fca. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a b a b b c; cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong d a d c; para f a b c; para f b a c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? eqangle d g c f c f a c. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A C C B, cong C B B D, cong B D D A, cong D A A C => eqangle B C B A B A B D; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 四条边都相等的四边形是菱形，若四边形ACBD为菱形，则∠ABC=∠ABD【菱形的每一条对角线平分一组对角】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_19. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cab=∠abc; ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; da=dc; fa∥bc; fb∥ac; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: ∠abc=∠cab, bc∥af => ∠baf=∠cab; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ∠bfa=∠acb; ∠baf=∠cab, ∠bfa=∠acb => bf=bc; ∠baf=∠cab, ∠bfa=∠acb => af=ac; ∠cba=∠bac, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠fab=∠abf; ∠fab=∠abf => fa=fb; bf=bc, ca=cb, af=ac, fa=fb => ∠bcf=∠fca; da=dc, gf=gb => da/dc = gf/gb; af∥bc, c,d,a are on the same line, b,g,f are on the same line, da/dc = gf/gb => dg∥cb; ∠bcf=∠fca, dg∥bc => the intersection angle of dg and cf is equal to ∠fca. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a b a b b c; cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong d a d c; para f a b c; para f b a c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? eqangle c f d g a c c f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A C C B, cong C B B D, cong B D D A, cong D A A C => eqangle B C B A B A B D; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 四条边都相等的四边形是菱形，若四边形ACBD为菱形，则∠ABC=∠ABD【菱形的每一条对角线平分一组对角】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cab=∠abc; fa∥bc; fb∥ac; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: b,g,f are on the same line, gf=gb => g is the midpoint of b and f; h,a,f are on the same line, ha=hf => h is the midpoint of a and f; g is the midpoint of b and f, h is the midpoint of a and f => gh∥ba; h,a,f are on the same line, g,b,f are on the same line, ∠abc=∠cab, bc∥af, ac∥bf, ab∥gh => ∠bah=∠bgh; ∠bah=∠bgh => h,b,g,a are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a b a b b c; para f a b c; para f b a c; coll b g f; cong g f g b; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? cyclic h b g a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_21. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cab=∠abc; c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, dc=da => d is the midpoint of c and a; b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; d is the midpoint of c and a, e is the midpoint of c and b => de∥ab; c,d,a are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, ∠cab=∠abc, ab∥de => ∠dab=∠deb; ∠dab=∠deb => b,d,a,e are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a b a b b c; coll c d a; cong d c d a; coll b c e; cong e b e c ? cyclic b d a e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_23. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, dc=da => d is the midpoint of c and a; b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; d is the midpoint of c and a, e is the midpoint of c and b => de∥ab; de∥ab, c,d,a are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line => ca/cb = cd/ce; ca/cb = cd/ce, ca=cb => cd=ce. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll c d a; cong d c d a; coll b c e; cong e b e c ? cong c d c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_33. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cab=∠abc; c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, dc=da => d is the midpoint of c and a; b,g,f are on the same line, gf=gb => g is the midpoint of b and f; d is the midpoint of c and a, g is the midpoint of b and f => cd/ca = bg/bf; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ∠bfa=∠acb; bf∥ac, af∥bc => bc=af; ∠abc=∠cab, bc∥af => ∠baf=∠cab; ∠baf=∠cab, ∠bfa=∠acb => bf=bc; cd/ca = bg/bf, dc=da, ca=fb, bf=bc, bc=af => ad/af = bg/bc; c,d,a are on the same line, b,g,f are on the same line, ac∥bf, af∥bc => ∠daf=∠gbc; ad/af = bg/bc, ∠daf=∠gbc => ∠adf=∠bgc; ∠adf=∠bgc, c,d,a are on the same line, b,g,f are on the same line, bf∥ac => df∥cg. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a b a b b c; coll c d a; cong d c d a; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? para d f c g. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_36. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cab=∠abc; c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; b,g,f are on the same line; gf=gb. 步骤: c,d,a are on the same line, dc=da => d is the midpoint of c and a; b,g,f are on the same line, gf=gb => g is the midpoint of b and f; d is the midpoint of c and a, g is the midpoint of b and f => cd/ca = bg/bf; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ∠bfa=∠acb; bf∥ac, af∥bc => bc=af; ∠abc=∠cab, bc∥af => ∠baf=∠cab; ∠baf=∠cab, ∠bfa=∠acb => bf=bc; cd/ca = bg/bf, dc=da, ca=fb, bf=bc, bc=af => ad/af = bg/bc; c,d,a are on the same line, b,g,f are on the same line, ac∥bf, af∥bc => ∠daf=∠gbc; ad/af = bg/bc, ∠daf=∠gbc => fa/cb = fd/cg; fa/cb = fd/cg, bc=af => fd=cg. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a b a b b c; coll c d a; cong d c d a; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll b g f; cong g f g b ? cong f d c g. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_41. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; ∠bac=∠cba; b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; h,a,f are on the same line, ha=hf => h is the midpoint of a and f; e is the midpoint of c and b, h is the midpoint of a and f => be/bc = ah/af; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; ∠cba=∠bac, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠fab=∠abf; ∠fab=∠abf => fa=fb; be/bc = ah/af, eb=ec, ca=fb, ca=cb, ha=hf, fa=fb => ah/ac = be/bf; h,a,f are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, af∥bc, ac∥bf => ∠hac=∠ebf; ah/ac = be/bf, ∠hac=∠ebf => ∠ahc=∠bef; ∠ahc=∠bef, h,a,f are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, af∥bc => ch∥ef. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; eqangle a b a c b c a b; coll b c e; cong e b e c; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? para c h e f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_42. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; ∠bac=∠cba; b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; h,a,f are on the same line, ha=hf => h is the midpoint of a and f; e is the midpoint of c and b, h is the midpoint of a and f => be/bc = ah/af; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; ∠cba=∠bac, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠fab=∠abf; ∠fab=∠abf => fa=fb; be/bc = ah/af, eb=ec, ca=fb, ca=cb, ha=hf, fa=fb => ah/ac = be/bf; h,a,f are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, af∥bc, ac∥bf => ∠hac=∠ebf; ah/ac = be/bf, ∠hac=∠ebf => ha/hc = eb/ef; c,b,e are on the same line, a,h,f are on the same line, af∥bc => ce∥ha; ec=eb, ha=hf => ec/eb = ha/hf; bf∥ac, b,c,e are on the same line, h,a,f are on the same line, ec/eb = ha/hf => eh∥ca; ce∥ha, eh∥ac => ha=ce; ha/hc = eb/ef, ha=ce, eb=ec => ce/ch = ec/ef. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; eqangle a b a c b c a b; coll b c e; cong e b e c; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? eqratio c e c h c e e f. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_43. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; ∠bac=∠cba; b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; h,a,f are on the same line, ha=hf => h is the midpoint of a and f; e is the midpoint of c and b, h is the midpoint of a and f => be/bc = ah/af; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; ∠cba=∠bac, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠fab=∠abf; ∠fab=∠abf => fa=fb; be/bc = ah/af, eb=ec, ca=fb, ca=cb, ha=hf, fa=fb => ah/ac = be/bf; h,a,f are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, af∥bc, ac∥bf => ∠hac=∠ebf; ah/ac = be/bf, ∠hac=∠ebf => ha/hc = eb/ef; c,b,e are on the same line, a,h,f are on the same line, af∥bc => ce∥ha; ec=eb, ha=hf => ec/eb = ha/hf; bf∥ac, b,c,e are on the same line, h,a,f are on the same line, ec/eb = ha/hf => eh∥ca; ce∥ha, eh∥ac => ha=ce; ha/hc = eb/ef, ha=ce, eb=ec => ce/ch = ec/ef. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; eqangle a b a c b c a b; coll b c e; cong e b e c; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? eqratio c h c e e f c e. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_44. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; ∠bac=∠cba; b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; h,a,f are on the same line, ha=hf => h is the midpoint of a and f; e is the midpoint of c and b, h is the midpoint of a and f => be/bc = ah/af; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; ∠cba=∠bac, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠fab=∠abf; ∠fab=∠abf => fa=fb; be/bc = ah/af, eb=ec, ca=fb, ca=cb, ha=hf, fa=fb => ah/ac = be/bf; h,a,f are on the same line, b,c,e are on the same line, af∥bc, ac∥bf => ∠hac=∠ebf; ah/ac = be/bf, ∠hac=∠ebf => ca/fb = ch/fe; ca/fb = ch/fe, ca=fb => ch=fe. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; eqangle a b a c b c a b; coll b c e; cong e b e c; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? cong c h f e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_24_45. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d b a c; e = on_line e a c, angle_bisector e c b a; f = intersection_lc f e d b; g = on_tline g f d f ? para f g a c. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; ∠bac=∠cba; b,c,e are on the same line; eb=ec; fb∥ac; fa∥bc; h,a,f are on the same line; ha=hf. 步骤: b,c,e are on the same line, eb=ec => e is the midpoint of c and b; h,a,f are on the same line, ha=hf => h is the midpoint of a and f; e is the midpoint of c and b, h is the midpoint of a and f => be/bc = ah/af; bf∥ac, af∥bc => ca=fb; ∠cba=∠bac, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠fab=∠abf; ∠fab=∠abf => fa=fb; be/bc = ah/af, eb=ec, ca=fb, ca=cb, ha=hf, fa=fb => ce/ca = fh/fb; c,b,e are on the same line, h,a,f are on the same line, bc∥af, ac∥bf => ∠eca=∠hfb; ce/ca = fh/fb, ∠eca=∠hfb => ∠cea=∠fhb; ∠cea=∠fhb, b,c,e are on the same line, h,a,f are on the same line, af∥bc => ae∥bh. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; eqangle a b a c b c a b; coll b c e; cong e b e c; para f b a c; para f a b c; coll h a f; cong h a h f ? para a e b h. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_24. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => eg/ed = ag/af; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; eg/ed = ag/af, fa=ec => eg/ed = ga/ce. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio g e d e g a c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => eg/ed = ag/af; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; eg/ed = ag/af, fa=ec => eg/ed = ga/ce. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio d e g e c e g a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_26. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => ge/ga = ed/af; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; ge/ga = ed/af, fa=ec => ge/ga = ed/ec. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio g e g a d e c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_27. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => ge/ga = ed/af; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; ge/ga = ed/af, fa=ec => ge/ga = ed/ec. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio g a g e c e d e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => dg/de = fg/fa; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; dg/de = fg/fa, fa=ec => dg/de = fg/ce. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio d g d e f g c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_29. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => dg/de = fg/fa; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; dg/de = fg/fa, fa=ec => dg/de = fg/ce. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio d e d g c e f g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => ge/gd = ea/df; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; ge/gd = ea/df, ea=fc => ge/gd = fc/fd. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio g e d g c f d f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_31. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => ge/gd = ea/df; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; ge/gd = ea/df, ea=fc => ge/gd = fc/fd. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio d g g e d f c f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; d,e,g are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, d,e,g are on the same line, f,a,g are on the same line => eg/ea = dg/df; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; eg/ea = dg/df, ea=fc => ge/cf = dg/df. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll d e g; coll f a g ? eqratio g e c f d g d f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; f,a,g are on the same line; d,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, f,a,g are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line => ag/ae = fg/fd; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; ag/ae = fg/fd, ea=fc => ga/cf = fg/fd. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll f a g; coll d e g ? eqratio g a c f f g d f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_35. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce; f,a,g are on the same line; d,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥df; b,a,e are on the same line, d,c,f are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥df, f,a,g are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line => ag/ae = fg/fd; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; ag/ae = fg/fd, ea=fc => ga/cf = fg/fd. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e; coll f a g; coll d e g ? eqratio c f g a d f f g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_36. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, b,h,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => bf/bh = ba/be; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; bf/bh = ba/be, ba=dc => bf/bh = cd/be. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio b f b h c d b e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_37. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, b,h,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => bf/bh = ba/be; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; bf/bh = ba/be, ba=dc => bf/bh = cd/be. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio b h b f b e c d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_38. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, b,h,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => bf/ba = bh/be; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; bf/ba = bh/be, ba=dc => bf/cd = bh/be. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio b f c d b h b e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_39. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, b,h,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => bf/ba = bh/be; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; bf/ba = bh/be, ba=dc => bf/cd = bh/be. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio c d b f b e b h. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_40. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, b,h,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => fb/fh = ab/ae; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; fb/fh = ab/ae, ba=dc, ea=fc => fb/fh = cd/cf. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio b f f h c d c f. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_41. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, b,h,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => fb/fh = ab/ae; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; fb/fh = ab/ae, ba=dc, ea=fc => fb/fh = cd/cf. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio f h b f c f c d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_42. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, e,b,a are on the same line, b,h,f are on the same line => ab/af = eb/eh; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; ab/af = eb/eh, ba=dc, fa=ec => cd/ce = eb/eh. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio c d c e b e e h. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_43. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, e,b,a are on the same line, b,h,f are on the same line => ab/af = eb/eh; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; ab/af = eb/eh, ba=dc, fa=ec => cd/ce = eb/eh. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio c e c d e h b e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_52. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce. 步骤: d,c,f are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ad∥bc, cd∥ab => ∠adf=∠cbe; f,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, af∥ce, cd∥ab => ∠afd=∠ceb; ∠adf=∠cbe, ∠afd=∠ceb => da/df = bc/be; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => bc=da; da/df = bc/be, bc=da => da/df = da/be. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e ? eqratio d a d f d a b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_53. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce. 步骤: d,c,f are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ad∥bc, cd∥ab => ∠adf=∠cbe; f,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, af∥ce, cd∥ab => ∠afd=∠ceb; ∠adf=∠cbe, ∠afd=∠ceb => da/df = bc/be; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => bc=da; da/df = bc/be, bc=da => da/df = da/be. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e ? eqratio d f d a b e d a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_54. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce. 步骤: d,c,f are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ad∥bc, cd∥ab => ∠adf=∠cbe; f,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, af∥ce, cd∥ab => ∠afd=∠ceb; ∠adf=∠cbe, ∠afd=∠ceb => fa/fd = ec/eb; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; fa/fd = ec/eb, fa=ec => ce/df = ec/eb. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e ? eqratio c e d f c e b e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_55. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce. 步骤: d,c,f are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ad∥bc, cd∥ab => ∠adf=∠cbe; f,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, af∥ce, cd∥ab => ∠afd=∠ceb; ∠adf=∠cbe, ∠afd=∠ceb => fa/fd = ec/eb; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; fa/fd = ec/eb, fa=ec => ce/df = ec/eb. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e ? eqratio d f c e b e c e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_56. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line; d,e,g are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; af∥ce, ea∥fc => ea=fc; fa=ce => fb/fa = fb/fa; c,d,f are on the same line, e,c,h are on the same line, cd∥ab, ce∥af => ∠fch=∠baf; f,b,h are on the same line, e,c,h are on the same line, ce∥af => ∠fhc=∠bfa; ∠fch=∠baf, ∠fhc=∠bfa => cf/ab = ch/af; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; e,b,a are on the same line, g,a,f are on the same line, cd∥ab, ce∥af => ∠dce=∠eag; g,d,e are on the same line, g,a,f are on the same line, ce∥af => ∠dec=∠ega; ∠dce=∠eag, ∠dec=∠ega => cd/ae = ce/ag; cf/ab = ch/af, ba=dc, fa=ec, cd/ae = ce/ag, ea=fc => af/ag = fa/ch; fb/fa = fb/fa, af/ag = fa/ch => ga=ch. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f; coll f a g; coll d e g; coll c e h; coll b h f ? cong g a c h. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_57. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; fa=ce => fb/fa = fb/fa; d,c,f are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ad∥bc, cd∥ab => ∠adf=∠cbe; f,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, af∥ce, cd∥ab => ∠afd=∠ceb; ∠adf=∠cbe, ∠afd=∠ceb => fa/fd = ec/eb; fa/fd = ec/eb, fa=ec => fa/be = fa/fd; fb/fa = fb/fa, fa/be = fa/fd => be=df. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f ? cong b e d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_60. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line; d,e,g are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, e,b,a are on the same line, b,h,f are on the same line => ab/af = eb/eh; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => bc=da; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; af∥ce, ea∥fc => fa=ec; f,a,g are on the same line, af∥ce => fg∥ce; fg∥ce, c,d,f are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line => fg/fd = ce/cd; ab/af = eb/eh, ba=dc, fa=ec, fg/fd = ce/cd => fg/fd = eh/eb; d,c,f are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ad∥bc, cd∥ab => ∠adf=∠cbe; f,d,c are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, af∥ce, cd∥ab => ∠afd=∠ceb; ∠adf=∠cbe, ∠afd=∠ceb => da/df = bc/be; da/df = bc/be, bc=da => df/bc = be/bc; fg/fd = eh/eb, df/bc = be/bc => fg=eh. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f; coll f a g; coll d e g; coll c e h; coll b h f ? cong f g e h. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_61. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line; d,e,g are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: f,a,g are on the same line, af∥ce => fg∥ce; fg∥ce, c,d,f are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line => dc/de = cf/ge; e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, b,h,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => bf/ba = fh/ae; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; bf/ba = fh/ae, ba=dc, ea=fc => bf/cd = fh/fc; dc/de = cf/ge, bf/cd = fh/fc => ge/fh = de/bf. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f; coll f a g; coll d e g; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio g e f h d e b f. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_62. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc∥ba; da∥bc; e,b,a are on the same line; fa∥ce; c,d,f are on the same line; f,a,g are on the same line; d,e,g are on the same line; c,e,h are on the same line; b,h,f are on the same line. 步骤: f,a,g are on the same line, af∥ce => fg∥ce; fg∥ce, c,d,f are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line => dc/de = cf/ge; e,c,h are on the same line, af∥ce => fa∥he; fa∥he, b,h,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => bf/ba = fh/ae; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => ba=dc; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; bf/ba = fh/ae, ba=dc, ea=fc => bf/cd = fh/fc; dc/de = cf/ge, bf/cd = fh/fc => ge/fh = de/bf. 生成题目的FL: para d c b a; para d a b c; coll e b a; para f a c e; coll c d f; coll f a g; coll d e g; coll c e h; coll b h f ? eqratio f h g e b f d e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_25_63. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a c d e; g f = square c b g f ? perp d b f a. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; dc∥ba; e,b,a are on the same line; c,d,f are on the same line; fa∥ce. 步骤: ad∥bc, cd∥ab => bc=da; b,a,e are on the same line, f,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ea∥fc; ea∥fc, af∥ce => ea=fc; c,d,f are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line, bc∥ad, cd∥ab => ∠bcf=∠dae; bc=da, ea=fc, ∠bcf=∠dae => the intersection angle of bc and ad is equal to the intersection angle of bf and de; the intersection angle of bc and ad is equal to the intersection angle of bf and de, ad∥bc => bf∥de. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; para d c b a; coll e b a; coll c d f; para f a c e ? para b f d e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
