原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_1. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => dc=ba. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a ? cong d c b a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_4. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: b,f,c are on the same line, fb=fc => f is the midpoint of b and c; b,g,a are on the same line, ga=gb => g is the midpoint of b and a; f is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => fg∥ca. 生成题目的FL: coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? para f g a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_5. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: e,d,c are on the same line; ec=ed; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc. 步骤: b,f,c are on the same line, fb=fc => f is the midpoint of b and c; e,d,c are on the same line, ec=ed => e is the midpoint of c and d; f is the midpoint of b and c, e is the midpoint of c and d => fe∥bd. 生成题目的FL: coll e d c; cong e c e d; coll b f c; cong f b f c ? para e f b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_6. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, ga=gb => g is the midpoint of b and a; d,h,a are on the same line, ha=hd => h is the midpoint of a and d; g is the midpoint of b and a, h is the midpoint of a and d => gh∥bd. 生成题目的FL: coll b g a; cong g a g b; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? para g h b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_7. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: e,d,c are on the same line; ec=ed; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: e,d,c are on the same line, ec=ed => e is the midpoint of c and d; d,h,a are on the same line, ha=hd => h is the midpoint of a and d; e is the midpoint of c and d, h is the midpoint of a and d => eh∥ca. 生成题目的FL: coll e d c; cong e c e d; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? para e h a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_8. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: b,f,c are on the same line, fb=fc => f is the midpoint of b and c; d,h,a are on the same line, ha=hd => h is the midpoint of a and d; f is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of a and d => bf/bc = dh/da; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => da=bc; bf/bc = dh/da, fb=fc, da=bc => cf/cb = hd/bc. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? eqratio f c b c h d b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_9. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: b,f,c are on the same line, fb=fc => f is the midpoint of b and c; d,h,a are on the same line, ha=hd => h is the midpoint of a and d; f is the midpoint of b and c, h is the midpoint of a and d => bf/bc = dh/da; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => da=bc; bf/bc = dh/da, fb=fc, da=bc => cf/cb = hd/bc. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? eqratio b c f c b c h d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_10. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; e,d,c are on the same line; ec=ed; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, ga=gb => g is the midpoint of b and a; e,d,c are on the same line, ec=ed => e is the midpoint of c and d; g is the midpoint of b and a, e is the midpoint of c and d => bg/ba = de/dc; bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => dc=ba; bg/ba = de/dc, dc=ba => bg/ba = ed/ba. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; coll e d c; cong e c e d; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? eqratio b g b a e d b a. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_11. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; e,d,c are on the same line; ec=ed; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, ga=gb => g is the midpoint of b and a; e,d,c are on the same line, ec=ed => e is the midpoint of c and d; g is the midpoint of b and a, e is the midpoint of c and d => bg/ba = de/dc; bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => dc=ba; bg/ba = de/dc, dc=ba => bg/ba = ed/ba. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; coll e d c; cong e c e d; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? eqratio b a b g b a e d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_12. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥da. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; coll e d c; cong e d e c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? para e g a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_13. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; fb=fc, ha=hd => fb/fc = ha/hd; cd∥ab, b,f,c are on the same line, d,h,a are on the same line, fb/fc = ha/hd => fh∥ba. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? para f h a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_14. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; fb=fc, ha=hd => fb/fc = ha/hd; cd∥ab, b,f,c are on the same line, d,h,a are on the same line, fb/fc = ha/hd => fh∥cd; f,b,c are on the same line, h,d,a are on the same line, ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => fc∥dh; fh∥cd, fc∥dh => fh=dc. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? cong f h d c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_15. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: e,c,d are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => ed∥ag; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥da; ed∥ag, eg∥ad => ed=ag. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; coll e d c; cong e d e c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? cong e d a g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_16. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: e,d,c are on the same line; ec=ed; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: e,d,c are on the same line, ec=ed => e is the midpoint of c and d; d,h,a are on the same line, ha=hd => h is the midpoint of a and d; e is the midpoint of c and d, h is the midpoint of a and d => eh∥ca; b,f,c are on the same line, fb=fc => f is the midpoint of b and c; b,g,a are on the same line, ga=gb => g is the midpoint of b and a; f is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => fg∥ca; eh∥ac, fg∥ac => fg∥he; g is the midpoint of b and a, h is the midpoint of a and d => gh∥bd; f is the midpoint of b and c, e is the midpoint of c and d => fe∥bd; gh∥bd, ef∥bd => fe∥hg; fg∥he, fe∥hg => fg=he. 生成题目的FL: coll e d c; cong e c e d; coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll b g a; cong g a g b; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? cong f g h e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_17. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: e,d,c are on the same line; ec=ed; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, ga=gb => g is the midpoint of b and a; d,h,a are on the same line, ha=hd => h is the midpoint of a and d; g is the midpoint of b and a, h is the midpoint of a and d => gh∥bd; b,f,c are on the same line, fb=fc => f is the midpoint of b and c; e,d,c are on the same line, ec=ed => e is the midpoint of c and d; f is the midpoint of b and c, e is the midpoint of c and d => fe∥bd; gh∥bd, ef∥bd => fe∥hg; e is the midpoint of c and d, h is the midpoint of a and d => eh∥ca; f is the midpoint of b and c, g is the midpoint of b and a => fg∥ca; eh∥ac, fg∥ac => fg∥he; fe∥hg, fg∥he => hg=fe. 生成题目的FL: coll e d c; cong e c e d; coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll b g a; cong g a g b; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? cong h g f e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_18. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥da; e,c,d are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => ed∥ag; eg∥ad, ed∥ag => eg=ad. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; coll e d c; cong e d e c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? cong e g a d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_19. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: f,b,c are on the same line, h,d,a are on the same line, ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => fc∥dh; bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; fb=fc, ha=hd => fb/fc = ha/hd; cd∥ab, b,f,c are on the same line, d,h,a are on the same line, fb/fc = ha/hd => fh∥cd; fc∥dh, fh∥cd => dh=fc. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? cong d h f c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_20. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; b,f,c are on the same line; fb=fc; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; fb=fc, ha=hd => fb/fc = ha/hd; cd∥ab, b,f,c are on the same line, d,h,a are on the same line, fb/fc = ha/hd => fh∥ba; d,h,a are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥fh, ab⟂da => fh⟂hd; d,h,a are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab⟂da, ab∥cd => hd⟂dc; f,b,c are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥fh => cf⟂fh; fh⟂hd, hd⟂dc, cf⟂fh => fd=hc. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; coll b f c; cong f b f c; coll d h a; cong h a h d ? cong f d h c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_23. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥da; e,d,c are on the same line, bc⟂ab, bc⟂dc, ad∥bc, eg∥ad => ce⟂eg; b,g,a are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ad∥bc, eg∥ad => eg⟂gb; e,d,c are on the same line, bc⟂cd => bc⟂ce; ce⟂eg, eg⟂gb, bc⟂ce => cg=eb. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; coll e d c; cong e d e c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? cong c g e b. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_25. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc. 步骤: bc⟂ab, ab⟂da, bc⟂dc => ∠bad=∠bcd; ∠bad=∠bcd => b,d,c,a are on the same circle; b,d,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bac; ∠bdc=∠bac, bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => ∠dba=∠bac. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c ? eqangle b d a b a b a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_26. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc. 步骤: bc⟂ab, ab⟂da, bc⟂dc => ∠bad=∠bcd; ∠bad=∠bcd => b,d,c,a are on the same circle; b,d,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bac; ∠bdc=∠bac, bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => ∠dba=∠bac. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c ? eqangle a b b d a c a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_27. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; bc⟂ab, bc∥ad, bc⟂dc => ∠bad=∠bcd; ∠bad=∠bcd => b,d,c,a are on the same circle; b,d,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥da; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥cb; ∠bda=∠bca, eg∥ad, eg∥bc => the intersection angle of bd and eg is equal to the intersection angle of eg and ac. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; coll e d c; cong e d e c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? eqangle b d e g e g a c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_28. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; bc⟂ab, bc∥ad, bc⟂dc => ∠bad=∠bcd; ∠bad=∠bcd => b,d,c,a are on the same circle; b,d,c,a are on the same circle => ∠bda=∠bca; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥da; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥cb; ∠bda=∠bca, eg∥ad, eg∥bc => the intersection angle of bd and eg is equal to the intersection angle of eg and ac. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; coll e d c; cong e d e c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? eqangle e g b d a c e g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_44. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, ga=gb => g is the midpoint of b and a; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥da; bc⟂ab, ad∥bc, eg∥ad => eg⟂ba; g is the midpoint of b and a, eg⟂ba => eb=ea. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; coll e d c; cong e d e c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? cong e b e a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_43. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fba=∠bca; ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bca => ∠bca=∠bde; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, b,e,a are on the same line, ∠bca=∠bde => eb=ea. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? cong e b e a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, coll M B C, eqangle A B A C O B O M => midp M B C; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，M、B、C共线，且∠BAC = ∠BOM，那么M是BC的中点。【定理18的逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_45. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; ec=ed; e,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => da=bc; e,c,d are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠eda=∠bce; ec=ed, da=bc, ∠eda=∠bce => ∠dea=∠bec; ∠dea=∠bec, e,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ∠bae=∠eba. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; cong e c e d; coll e d c ? eqangle a b a e b e a b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_46. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; ec=ed; e,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => da=bc; e,c,d are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠eda=∠bce; ec=ed, da=bc, ∠eda=∠bce => ∠dea=∠bec; ∠dea=∠bec, e,d,c are on the same line, cd∥ab => ∠bae=∠eba. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; cong e c e d; coll e d c ? eqangle a e a b a b b e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_47. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; ab⟂da; bc⟂dc; ec=ed; e,d,c are on the same line; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => da=bc; e,c,d are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠eda=∠bce; ec=ed, da=bc, ∠eda=∠bce => ∠ead=∠cbe; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥da; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥cb; ∠ead=∠cbe, eg∥ad, eg∥bc => ∠aeg=∠geb. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp a b d a; perp b c d c; cong e c e d; coll e d c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? eqangle a e e g e g b e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_55. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd; fb=fc; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; fb=fc, ha=hd => fb/fc = ha/hd; cd∥ab, b,f,c are on the same line, d,h,a are on the same line, fb/fc = ha/hd => fh∥ba; f,b,c are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥fh => ∠bfh=∠hfc; fb=fc, ∠bfh=∠hfc => ∠bhf=∠fhc; ∠bhf=∠fhc, fh∥ab => ∠hba equals the intersection angle of ab and ch. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; coll d h a; cong h a h d; cong f b f c; coll b f c ? eqangle b h a b a b c h. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_56. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; d,h,a are on the same line; ha=hd; fb=fc; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; fb=fc, ha=hd => fb/fc = ha/hd; cd∥ab, b,f,c are on the same line, d,h,a are on the same line, fb/fc = ha/hd => fh∥ba; f,b,c are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥fh => ∠bfh=∠hfc; fb=fc, ∠bfh=∠hfc => ∠bhf=∠fhc; ∠bhf=∠fhc, fh∥ab => ∠hba equals the intersection angle of ab and ch. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; coll d h a; cong h a h d; cong f b f c; coll b f c ? eqangle a b b h c h a b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_57. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; fb=fc; b,f,c are on the same line; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => dc=ba; b,f,c are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥cd => ∠fba=∠dcf; fb=fc, dc=ba, ∠fba=∠dcf => ∠bfa=∠dfc; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥cb; ∠bfa=∠dfc, b,f,c are on the same line, eg∥bc => the intersection angle of eg and af is equal to the intersection angle of df and eg. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; coll e d c; cong e d e c; cong f b f c; coll b f c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? eqangle e g a f d f e g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_58. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; e,d,c are on the same line; ed=ec; fb=fc; b,f,c are on the same line; b,g,a are on the same line; ga=gb. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => dc=ba; b,f,c are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥cd => ∠fba=∠dcf; fb=fc, dc=ba, ∠fba=∠dcf => ∠bfa=∠dfc; ed=ec, ga=gb => ed/ec = ga/gb; ad∥bc, e,d,c are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, ed/ec = ga/gb => eg∥cb; ∠bfa=∠dfc, b,f,c are on the same line, eg∥bc => the intersection angle of eg and af is equal to the intersection angle of df and eg. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; coll e d c; cong e d e c; cong f b f c; coll b f c; coll b g a; cong g a g b ? eqangle a f e g e g d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_59. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; fb=fc; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => dc=ba; b,f,c are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥cd => ∠fba=∠dcf; fb=fc, dc=ba, ∠fba=∠dcf => ∠fab=∠cdf; ∠fab=∠cdf, cd∥ab => ∠fab equals the intersection angle of ab and df. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; cong f b f c; coll b f c ? eqangle a f a b a b d f. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_26_60. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_tline d b a b; e = on_line e a d, on_circle e c a; f = on_pline f e a b, on_circle f c e; g = foot g d a f ? cong a f f g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂ab; bc⟂dc; ab⟂da; fb=fc; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂dc, bc⟂ab => dc∥ab; ab⟂da, bc⟂ab => da∥bc; cd∥ab, ad∥bc => dc=ba; b,f,c are on the same line, bc⟂ab, ab∥cd => ∠fba=∠dcf; fb=fc, dc=ba, ∠fba=∠dcf => ∠fab=∠cdf; ∠fab=∠cdf, cd∥ab => ∠fab equals the intersection angle of ab and df. 生成题目的FL: perp b c a b; perp b c d c; perp a b d a; cong f b f c; coll b f c ? eqangle a b a f d f a b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_27_68. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = midpoint e a c; f = midpoint f b a; g = foot g a b c ? eqangle d f d e g f g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db∥ca; fe∥ca; c,f,b are on the same line; f,e,g are on the same line; d,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ac => fg∥ac; e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ac, bd∥ac => bd∥fg; fg∥ac, c,f,b are on the same line, d,a,g are on the same line, bd∥fg => fb/dg = cb/da. 生成题目的FL: para d b c a; para f e c a; coll c f b; coll f e g; coll d a g ? eqratio f b d g c b d a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, para m n a b => eqratio6 m a m d n b n c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，且MN平行于AB，那么MA:MD = NB:NC。. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_27_72. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = midpoint e a c; f = midpoint f b a; g = foot g a b c ? eqangle d f d e g f g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db∥ca; b,e,a are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,f,b are on the same line; f,e,g are on the same line; d,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ac, c,f,b are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => bc/ba = fc/ea; f,e,g are on the same line, bd∥ac, ef∥ac => eg∥bd; eg∥bd, b,e,a are on the same line, d,a,g are on the same line => ea/eg = ba/bd; bc/ba = fc/ea, ea/eg = ba/bd => fc/eg = bc/bd. 生成题目的FL: para d b c a; coll b e a; para f e c a; coll c f b; coll f e g; coll d a g ? eqratio f c e g c b d b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_27_73. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = midpoint e a c; f = midpoint f b a; g = foot g a b c ? eqangle d f d e g f g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db∥ca; b,e,a are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,f,b are on the same line; f,e,g are on the same line; d,a,g are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ac, c,f,b are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => bc/ba = fc/ea; f,e,g are on the same line, bd∥ac, ef∥ac => eg∥bd; eg∥bd, b,e,a are on the same line, d,a,g are on the same line => ea/eg = ba/bd; bc/ba = fc/ea, ea/eg = ba/bd => fc/eg = bc/bd. 生成题目的FL: para d b c a; coll b e a; para f e c a; coll c f b; coll f e g; coll d a g ? eqratio e g f c d b c b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_27_74. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = midpoint e a c; f = midpoint f b a; g = foot g a b c ? eqangle d f d e g f g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db∥ca; b,e,a are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,f,b are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ac, c,f,b are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => bf/be = fc/ea; bd∥ac, b,e,a are on the same line, d,e,c are on the same line => ae/ac = be/bd; bf/be = fc/ea, ae/ac = be/bd => cf/ca = bf/bd. 生成题目的FL: para d b c a; coll b e a; coll d e c; para f e c a; coll c f b ? eqratio f c c a f b d b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_27_75. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = midpoint e a c; f = midpoint f b a; g = foot g a b c ? eqangle d f d e g f g e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db∥ca; b,e,a are on the same line; d,e,c are on the same line; fe∥ca; c,f,b are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ac, c,f,b are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => bf/be = fc/ea; bd∥ac, b,e,a are on the same line, d,e,c are on the same line => ae/ac = be/bd; bf/be = fc/ea, ae/ac = be/bd => cf/ca = bf/bd. 生成题目的FL: para d b c a; coll b e a; coll d e c; para f e c a; coll c f b ? eqratio c a f c d b f b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_0. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; h,f,d are on the same line; hd=hf. 步骤: h,f,d are on the same line, hd=hf => h is the midpoint of f and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ga=ge => g is the midpoint of e and a; h is the midpoint of f and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fh/fd = eg/ea. 生成题目的FL: coll g e a; cong g a g e; coll h f d; cong h d h f ? eqratio f h d f g e e a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_1. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; h,f,d are on the same line; hd=hf. 步骤: h,f,d are on the same line, hd=hf => h is the midpoint of f and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ga=ge => g is the midpoint of e and a; h is the midpoint of f and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fh/fd = eg/ea. 生成题目的FL: coll g e a; cong g a g e; coll h f d; cong h d h f ? eqratio d f f h e a g e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_2. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; h,f,d are on the same line; hd=hf. 步骤: h,f,d are on the same line, hd=hf => h is the midpoint of f and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ga=ge => g is the midpoint of e and a; h is the midpoint of f and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fh/ge = df/ea. 生成题目的FL: coll g e a; cong g a g e; coll h f d; cong h d h f ? eqratio f h g e d f e a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_3. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; h,f,d are on the same line; hd=hf. 步骤: h,f,d are on the same line, hd=hf => h is the midpoint of f and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ga=ge => g is the midpoint of e and a; h is the midpoint of f and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fh/ge = df/ea. 生成题目的FL: coll g e a; cong g a g e; coll h f d; cong h d h f ? eqratio g e f h e a d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_4. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; bc⟂fe; g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; h,f,d are on the same line; hd=hf. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; ga=ge, hd=hf => ga/ge = hd/hf; ef∥ad, g,e,a are on the same line, h,d,f are on the same line, ga/ge = hd/hf => gh∥ad. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; perp b c f e; coll g e a; cong g a g e; coll h f d; cong h d h f ? para g h a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; ad⟂bc; f,c,b are on the same line; bc⟂fe; g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; h,f,d are on the same line; hd=hf. 步骤: h,f,d are on the same line, hd=hf => h is the midpoint of f and d; bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; ga=ge, hd=hf => ga/ge = hd/hf; ef∥ad, g,e,a are on the same line, h,d,f are on the same line, ga/ge = hd/hf => gh∥ad; f,c,b are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ad∥gh => gh⟂fd; h is the midpoint of f and d, gh⟂fd => gf=gd. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; perp a d b c; coll f c b; perp b c f e; coll g e a; cong g a g e; coll h f d; cong h d h f ? cong g f g d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_6. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; hd=hf; h,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; ga=ge, hd=hf => ga/ge = hd/hf; ef∥ad, g,e,a are on the same line, h,d,f are on the same line, ga/ge = hd/hf => gh∥ad; h,f,d are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ad∥gh => ∠dhg=∠ghf; hd=hf, ∠dhg=∠ghf => ∠hdg=∠gfh; ∠hdg=∠gfh, h,f,d are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of fg and bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; perp a d b c; coll b f c; perp b c f e; coll g e a; cong g a g e; cong h d h f; coll h f d ? eqangle b c d g f g b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_7. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; hd=hf; h,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; ga=ge, hd=hf => ga/ge = hd/hf; ef∥ad, g,e,a are on the same line, h,d,f are on the same line, ga/ge = hd/hf => gh∥ad; h,f,d are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ad∥gh => ∠dhg=∠ghf; hd=hf, ∠dhg=∠ghf => ∠hdg=∠gfh; ∠hdg=∠gfh, h,f,d are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of fg and bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; perp a d b c; coll b f c; perp b c f e; coll g e a; cong g a g e; cong h d h f; coll h f d ? eqangle d g b c b c f g. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_8. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; hd=hf; h,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; ga=ge, hd=hf => ga/ge = hd/hf; ef∥ad, g,e,a are on the same line, h,d,f are on the same line, ga/ge = hd/hf => gh∥ad; h,f,d are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ad∥gh => ∠dhg=∠ghf; hd=hf, ∠dhg=∠ghf => ∠dgh=∠hgf; ∠dgh=∠hgf, gh∥ad => ∠gda equals the intersection angle of ad and fg. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; perp a d b c; coll b f c; perp b c f e; coll g e a; cong g a g e; cong h d h f; coll h f d ? eqangle d g a d a d f g. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_28_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = foot e b a c; f = midpoint f c b; g = midpoint g d e ? perp f g d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; g,e,a are on the same line; ga=ge; hd=hf; h,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; ga=ge, hd=hf => ga/ge = hd/hf; ef∥ad, g,e,a are on the same line, h,d,f are on the same line, ga/ge = hd/hf => gh∥ad; h,f,d are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ad∥gh => ∠dhg=∠ghf; hd=hf, ∠dhg=∠ghf => ∠dgh=∠hgf; ∠dgh=∠hgf, gh∥ad => ∠gda equals the intersection angle of ad and fg. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; perp a d b c; coll b f c; perp b c f e; coll g e a; cong g a g e; cong h d h f; coll h f d ? eqangle a d d g f g a d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_12. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ha/hd = ab/df; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ha/hd = ab/df, ab=de, fd=fe => ha/hd = ed/ef. 生成题目的FL: para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio a h h d e d e f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_13. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ha/hd = ab/df; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ha/hd = ab/df, ab=de, fd=fe => ha/hd = ed/ef. 生成题目的FL: para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio h d a h e f e d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_14. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ah/ab = dh/df; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ah/ab = dh/df, ab=de, fd=fe => ah/ed = hd/ef. 生成题目的FL: para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio a h e d h d e f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_15. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ah/ab = dh/df; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ah/ab = dh/df, ab=de, fd=fe => ah/ed = hd/ef. 生成题目的FL: para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio e d a h e f h d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_16. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, f,h,b are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => bh/ba = fh/fd; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; bh/ba = fh/fd, ab=de, fd=fe => hb/ed = fh/fe. 生成题目的FL: para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio h b e d f h e f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_17. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, f,h,b are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => bh/ba = fh/fd; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; bh/ba = fh/fd, ab=de, fd=fe => hb/ed = fh/fe. 生成题目的FL: para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio e d h b e f f h. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => ga/gd = ac/de; ga/gd = ac/de, ca=cb => ga/gd = cb/ed. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; coll a g d; coll c g e ? eqratio a g g d c b e d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_29. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => ga/gd = ac/de; ga/gd = ac/de, ca=cb => ga/gd = cb/ed. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; coll a g d; coll c g e ? eqratio g d a g e d c b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => ag/ac = dg/de; ag/ac = dg/de, ca=cb => ag/cb = dg/de. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; coll a g d; coll c g e ? eqratio a g c b g d e d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_31. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => ag/ac = dg/de; ag/ac = dg/de, ca=cb => ag/cb = dg/de. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; coll a g d; coll c g e ? eqratio c b a g e d g d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, c,g,e are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line => cg/ca = eg/ed; cg/ca = eg/ed, ca=cb => cg/cb = eg/ed. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; coll c g e; coll a g d ? eqratio c g c b e g e d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_33. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, c,g,e are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line => cg/ca = eg/ed; cg/ca = eg/ed, ca=cb => cg/cb = eg/ed. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; coll c g e; coll a g d ? eqratio c b c g e d e g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ac/ab = ef/ed; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ac/ab = ef/ed, ca=cb, ab=de => cb/ed = ef/ed. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e ? eqratio c b e d e f e d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_35. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ac/ab = ef/ed; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ac/ab = ef/ed, ca=cb, ab=de => cb/ed = ef/ed. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e ? eqratio e d c b e d e f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_37. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; cb=ca; ea∥bd; ed∥ba; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe. 步骤: cb=ca, fd=fe => cb/ca = fd/fe; ae∥bd, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, cb/ca = fd/fe => cf∥bd; c,b,a are on the same line, f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => bc∥fd; cf∥bd, bc∥fd => bd=fc. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c b c a; para e a b d; para e d b a; coll e f d; cong f d f e ? cong b d f c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_38. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; cb=ca; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe. 步骤: c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => ca∥ef; cb=ca, fd=fe => cb/ca = fd/fe; ae∥bd, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, cb/ca = fd/fe => cf∥ae; ca∥ef, cf∥ae => ac=fe. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c b c a; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e ? cong a c f e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_39. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ah/ab = dh/df; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ab/de = ca/fd; ah/ab = dh/df, ab=de, fd=fe, ab/de = ca/fd, ca=cb => ah/ab = hd/cb; a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => ag/ac = dg/de; ag/ac = dg/de, ca=cb, ab=ed => gd/ab = ag/cb; ah/ab = hd/cb, gd/ab = ag/cb => ah/gd = hd/ag. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio a h g d h d a g. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_40. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ah/ab = dh/df; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ab/de = ca/fd; ah/ab = dh/df, ab=de, fd=fe, ab/de = ca/fd, ca=cb => ah/ab = hd/cb; a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => ag/ac = dg/de; ag/ac = dg/de, ca=cb, ab=ed => gd/ab = ag/cb; ah/ab = hd/cb, gd/ab = ag/cb => ah/gd = hd/ag. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio g d a h a g h d. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_41. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ah/ab = dh/df; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ab/de = ca/fd; ah/ab = dh/df, ab=de, fd=fe, ab/de = ca/fd, ca=cb => ah/ab = hd/cb; a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, c,g,e are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line => cg/ca = eg/ed; cg/ca = eg/ed, ca=cb, ab=ed => eg/ab = cg/cb; ah/ab = hd/cb, eg/ab = cg/cb => ah/eg = hd/cg. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio a h e g h d c g. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_42. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ah/ab = dh/df; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ab/de = ca/fd; ah/ab = dh/df, ab=de, fd=fe, ab/de = ca/fd, ca=cb => ah/ab = hd/cb; a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, c,g,e are on the same line, a,g,d are on the same line => cg/ca = eg/ed; cg/ca = eg/ed, ca=cb, ab=ed => eg/ab = cg/cb; ah/ab = hd/cb, eg/ab = cg/cb => ah/eg = hd/cg. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio e g a h c g h d. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_43. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, f,h,b are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => bh/ba = fh/fd; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ab/de = ca/fd; bh/ba = fh/fd, ab=de, fd=fe, ab/de = ca/fd, ca=cb => bh/ba = fh/cb; a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => ag/ac = dg/de; ag/ac = dg/de, ca=cb, ab=ed => gd/ab = ag/cb; bh/ba = fh/cb, gd/ab = ag/cb => fh/ag = hb/gd. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio f h a g h b g d. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_47. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; de∥ab, ae∥bd => bd=ea; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de, bd∥ae => ∠cbd=∠fea; cb=fe, bd=ea, ∠cbd=∠fea => ∠bcd=∠efa; ∠bcd=∠efa, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cd∥af. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e ? para c d a f. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_48. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; de∥ab, ae∥bd => bd=ea; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de, bd∥ae => ∠cbd=∠fea; cb=fe, bd=ea, ∠cbd=∠fea => dc=af. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e ? cong d c a f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_49. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => ce∥bf. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e ? para c e b f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_50. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ec=bf. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e ? cong e c b f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_51. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => ga/gc = ad/ce; a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ec=bf; ga/gc = ad/ce, ec=bf => ga/gc = ad/fb. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a g d; coll c g e ? eqratio a g c g a d f b. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
