原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_53. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ca∥ef; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; c,g,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cg∥bh; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => a,g,h are on the same line; cg∥bh, a,b,c are on the same line, a,g,h are on the same line => ac/ab = ag/ah; cb=ca, fd=fe => cb/ca = fd/fe; ae∥bd, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, cb/ca = fd/fe => cf∥ae; ca∥ef, cf∥ae => ac=fe; ac/ab = ag/ah, ac=fe, ab=de => ef/ed = ag/ah. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio e f e d a g a h. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_54. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ca∥ef; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; c,g,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cg∥bh; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => a,g,h are on the same line; cg∥bh, a,b,c are on the same line, a,g,h are on the same line => ac/ab = ag/ah; cb=ca, fd=fe => cb/ca = fd/fe; ae∥bd, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, cb/ca = fd/fe => cf∥ae; ca∥ef, cf∥ae => ac=fe; ac/ab = ag/ah, ac=fe, ab=de => ef/ed = ag/ah. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio e d e f a h a g. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_55. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; c,g,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cg∥bh; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => a,g,h are on the same line; cg∥bh, a,b,c are on the same line, a,g,h are on the same line => ac/ag = ab/ah; ac/ag = ab/ah, ca=cb, cb=fe, ab=de => cb/ag = ed/ah. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio c b a g e d a h. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_58. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ca∥ef; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; c,g,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cg∥bh; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => a,g,h are on the same line; cg∥bh, a,b,c are on the same line, a,g,h are on the same line => ac/ab = cg/bh; cb=ca, fd=fe => cb/ca = fd/fe; ae∥bd, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, cb/ca = fd/fe => cf∥ae; ca∥ef, cf∥ae => ac=fe; ac/ab = cg/bh, ac=fe, ab=de => ef/ed = cg/hb. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio e f e d c g h b. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_59. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ca∥ef; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; c,g,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cg∥bh; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => a,g,h are on the same line; cg∥bh, a,b,c are on the same line, a,g,h are on the same line => ac/ab = cg/bh; cb=ca, fd=fe => cb/ca = fd/fe; ae∥bd, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, cb/ca = fd/fe => cf∥ae; ca∥ef, cf∥ae => ac=fe; ac/ab = cg/bh, ac=fe, ab=de => ef/ed = cg/hb. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio e d e f h b c g. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_60. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; c,g,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cg∥bh; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => a,g,h are on the same line; cg∥bh, a,b,c are on the same line, a,g,h are on the same line => ca/cg = ba/bh; ca/cg = ba/bh, ca=cb, cb=fe, ab=de => cb/cg = ed/hb. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio c b c g e d h b. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_65. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; g,c,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => ge∥hf; g,c,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cg∥bh; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => d,g,h are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => a,g,h are on the same line; ge∥hf, d,g,h are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => dg/dh = ge/hf; ge∥hf, d,g,h are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => fd/fe = hd/hg; cg∥bh, a,b,c are on the same line, a,g,h are on the same line => ca/cb = ga/gh; dg/dh = ge/hf, ca/cb = ga/gh, ca=cb, fd/fe = hd/hg, fd=fe => gd/ga = eg/fh. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio g d a g e g f h. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_66. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; c,g,e are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; g,c,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => ge∥hf; g,c,e are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => cg∥bh; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => d,g,h are on the same line; a,g,d are on the same line, a,h,d are on the same line => a,g,h are on the same line; ge∥hf, d,g,h are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => dg/dh = ge/hf; ge∥hf, d,g,h are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => fd/fe = hd/hg; cg∥bh, a,b,c are on the same line, a,g,h are on the same line => ca/cb = ga/gh; dg/dh = ge/hf, ca/cb = ga/gh, ca=cb, fd/fe = hd/hg, fd=fe => gd/ga = eg/fh. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll c g e; coll a g d; coll f h b; coll a h d ? eqratio a g g d f h e g. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_67. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ed∥ba; ea∥bd; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: f,d,e are on the same line, de∥ab => ab∥df; ab∥df, a,h,d are on the same line, f,h,b are on the same line => ah/ad = bh/bf; a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ec=bf; bh/bf = ah/ad, ce=fb => hb/ce = ah/ad; a,b,c are on the same line, de∥ab => ac∥de; ac∥de, a,g,d are on the same line, c,g,e are on the same line => dg/da = eg/ec; hb/ce = ah/ad, dg/da = eg/ec => ah/gd = hb/eg. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e d b a; para e a b d; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll a h d; coll f h b ? eqratio a h g d h b e g. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_29_69. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d b c; e = midpoint e c a; f = midpoint f b a; g = parallelogram d a e g ? cong c f g b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,b,c are on the same line; ca=cb; ea∥bd; ed∥ba; e,f,d are on the same line; fd=fe; a,g,d are on the same line; c,g,e are on the same line; a,h,d are on the same line; f,h,b are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, h,d,a are on the same line, ae∥bd => ∠eag=∠bdh; a,b,c are on the same line, ca=cb => c is the midpoint of a and b; e,f,d are on the same line, fd=fe => f is the midpoint of e and d; c is the midpoint of a and b, f is the midpoint of e and d => ba/ed = cb/fe; de∥ab, ae∥bd => ab=de; de∥ab, ae∥bd => bd=ea; ba/ed = cb/fe, ab=de => cb=fe; c,b,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, ab∥de => ∠cbe=∠feb; cb=fe, ∠cbe=∠feb => ∠bce=∠efb; g,c,e are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, h,f,b are on the same line, h,d,a are on the same line, ∠bce=∠efb, a,b,c are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line, de∥ab => ∠ega=∠bhd; ∠eag=∠bdh, ∠ega=∠bhd => ea/bd = eg/bh; ea/bd = eg/bh, bd=ea => eg=bh. 生成题目的FL: coll a b c; cong c a c b; para e a b d; para e d b a; coll e f d; cong f d f e; coll a g d; coll c g e; coll a h d; coll f h b ? cong e g b h. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_0. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; fg=fc; b,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; ∠dge=∠dce, b,g,e are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠bca. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; cong f g f c; coll b g e ? eqangle d g b e b c a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_1. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; fg=fc; b,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; ∠dge=∠dce, b,g,e are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠bca. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; cong f g f c; coll b g e ? eqangle b e d g a c b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_2. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; fg=fc; b,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; ∠dge=∠dce, b,g,e are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of dg and bc is equal to the intersection angle of be and ac. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; cong f g f c; coll b g e ? eqangle d g b c b e a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_3. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; fg=fc; b,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; ∠dge=∠dce, b,g,e are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of dg and bc is equal to the intersection angle of be and ac. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; cong f g f c; coll b g e ? eqangle b c d g a c b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fc=fe; fg=fc; b,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: fc=fe, fg=fc => fg=fe; fg=fe => ∠fge=∠gef; ∠fge=∠gef, b,g,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of fg and be is equal to ∠bef. 生成题目的FL: cong f c f e; cong f g f c; coll b g e ? eqangle f g b e b e e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_21. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fc=fe; fg=fc; b,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: fc=fe, fg=fc => fg=fe; fg=fe => ∠fge=∠gef; ∠fge=∠gef, b,g,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of fg and be is equal to ∠bef. 生成题目的FL: cong f c f e; cong f g f c; coll b g e ? eqangle b e f g e f b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ab⟂ac; dc=db; a,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; a,e,c are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ae⟂ab; bc⟂ad, ae⟂ab => the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠dab; the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠dab, a,e,c are on the same line => ∠bca=∠dab. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; perp a b a c; cong d c d b; coll a e c ? eqangle b c a c a d a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_33. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; e,c,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂ad => bf⟂gd; e,a,c are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ec⟂ba; bf⟂gd, ec⟂ba => the intersection angle of bf and ec is equal to the intersection angle of gd and ba; the intersection angle of bf and ec is equal to the intersection angle of gd and ba, b,f,c are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line => ∠bca=∠dab. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll e c a; coll b f c; coll g d a ? eqangle b c a c a d a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_31. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ab⟂ac; dc=db; a,e,c are on the same line. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; a,e,c are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ae⟂ab; bc⟂ad, ae⟂ab => the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠dab; the intersection angle of bc and ae is equal to ∠dab, a,e,c are on the same line => ∠bca=∠dab. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; perp a b a c; cong d c d b; coll a e c ? eqangle a c b c a b a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_34. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; e,c,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂ad => bf⟂gd; e,a,c are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ec⟂ba; bf⟂gd, ec⟂ba => the intersection angle of bf and ec is equal to the intersection angle of gd and ba; the intersection angle of bf and ec is equal to the intersection angle of gd and ba, b,f,c are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line => ∠bca=∠dab. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll e c a; coll b f c; coll g d a ? eqangle a c b c a b a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ab=ac; dc=db; b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; a,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ac, bc⟂ad => the intersection angle of ad and bc is equal to ∠bae; fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; a,e,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg; the intersection angle of ad and bc is equal to ∠bae, the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg => ∠adg=∠abg; ∠adg=∠abg, b,g,e are on the same line => ∠adg=∠abe. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong a b a c; cong d c d b; coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? eqangle a d d g a b b e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_33. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ab=ac; dc=db; b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; a,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ac, bc⟂ad => the intersection angle of ad and bc is equal to ∠bae; fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; a,e,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg; the intersection angle of ad and bc is equal to ∠bae, the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg => ∠adg=∠abg; ∠adg=∠abg, b,g,e are on the same line => ∠adg=∠abe. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong a b a c; cong d c d b; coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? eqangle d g a d b e a b. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: ab=ac => ∠bca=∠abc; a,e,c are on the same line, ∠abc=∠bca => ∠abc equals the intersection angle of bc and ae; fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; a,e,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg; ∠abc equals the intersection angle of bc and ae, the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg => the intersection angle of ab and dg is equal to ∠cbg; the intersection angle of ab and dg is equal to ∠cbg, b,g,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and dg is equal to ∠cbe. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? eqangle a b d g b c b e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_36. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ab⟂ac; b,c,d are on the same line; dc=db. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, bc⟂ad, ab⟂ac => ∠bac=∠adb; ab=ac => ∠bca=∠abc; b,c,d are on the same line, ∠bca=∠abc => ∠bca=∠abd; ∠bac=∠adb, ∠bca=∠abd => ba/bc = ad/ab; ba/bc = ad/ab, ab=ac => ca/cb = ad/ac. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; perp a b a c; coll b c d; cong d c d b ? eqratio a c b c a d a c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_37. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ab⟂ac; b,c,d are on the same line; dc=db. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; d,c,b are on the same line, bc⟂ad, ab⟂ac => ∠bac=∠adb; ab=ac => ∠bca=∠abc; b,c,d are on the same line, ∠bca=∠abc => ∠bca=∠abd; ∠bac=∠adb, ∠bca=∠abd => ba/bc = ad/ab; ba/bc = ad/ab, ab=ac => ca/cb = ad/ac. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; perp a b a c; coll b c d; cong d c d b ? eqratio b c a c a c a d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_38. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,c,d are on the same line; dc=db; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; b,e,g are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => ∠dgb=∠bce; b,c,d are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line => ∠dbg=∠cbe; ∠dgb=∠bce, ∠dbg=∠cbe => dg/db = ec/eb; b,c,d are on the same line, dc=db => d is the midpoint of c and b; ab⟂ac, d is the midpoint of c and b => bd=ad; dg/db = ec/eb, bd=ad => dg/da = ec/eb. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b c d; cong d c d b; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? eqratio d g a d e c b e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_39. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,c,d are on the same line; dc=db; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; b,e,g are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => ∠dgb=∠bce; b,c,d are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line => ∠dbg=∠cbe; ∠dgb=∠bce, ∠dbg=∠cbe => dg/db = ec/eb; b,c,d are on the same line, dc=db => d is the midpoint of c and b; ab⟂ac, d is the midpoint of c and b => bd=ad; dg/db = ec/eb, bd=ad => dg/da = ec/eb. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b c d; cong d c d b; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? eqratio a d d g b e e c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_42. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; b,e,g are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => ∠dgb=∠bce; b,c,d are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line => ∠dbg=∠cbe; ∠dgb=∠bce, ∠dbg=∠cbe => gd/gb = ce/cb. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? eqratio d g b g e c b c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_43. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; b,e,g are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => ∠dgb=∠bce; b,c,d are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line => ∠dbg=∠cbe; ∠dgb=∠bce, ∠dbg=∠cbe => gd/gb = ce/cb. 生成题目的FL: coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? eqratio b g d g b c e c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_52. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,c,d are on the same line; dc=db; fd=fc; fc=fe; fg=fc; b,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠deg=∠dcg; ∠deg=∠dcg, b,g,e are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line => ∠deb=∠bcg; b,e,g are on the same line, d,c,b are on the same line, ∠deg=∠dcg => ∠bgc=∠edb; ∠deb=∠bcg, ∠bgc=∠edb => gb/gc = db/de; b,c,d are on the same line, dc=db => d is the midpoint of c and b; ab⟂ac, d is the midpoint of c and b => bd=ad; gb/gc = db/de, bd=ad => gb/gc = da/de. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b c d; cong d c d b; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; cong f g f c; coll b g e ? eqratio b g g c a d d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_53. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,c,d are on the same line; dc=db; fd=fc; fc=fe; fg=fc; b,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠deg=∠dcg; ∠deg=∠dcg, b,g,e are on the same line, b,c,d are on the same line => ∠deb=∠bcg; b,e,g are on the same line, d,c,b are on the same line, ∠deg=∠dcg => ∠bgc=∠edb; ∠deb=∠bcg, ∠bgc=∠edb => gb/gc = db/de; b,c,d are on the same line, dc=db => d is the midpoint of c and b; ab⟂ac, d is the midpoint of c and b => bd=ad; gb/gc = db/de, bd=ad => gb/gc = da/de. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b c d; cong d c d b; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; cong f g f c; coll b g e ? eqratio g c b g d e a d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_54. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ab=ac; dc=db; b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; a,e,c are on the same line, ab⟂ac, bc⟂ad => the intersection angle of ad and bc is equal to ∠bae; fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; a,e,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg; the intersection angle of ad and bc is equal to ∠bae, the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg => ∠adg=∠abg; b,e,g are on the same line, ∠adg=∠abg => ∠dab=∠dgb; ∠dab=∠dgb => a,d,g,b are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong a b a c; cong d c d b; coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? cyclic a d g b. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_30_55. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d c a b; e = on_tline e a b c, on_line e c d; f = midpoint f a e; g = midpoint g c b ? perp d g d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab=ac; ab⟂ac; dc=db; b,c,d are on the same line; a,e,c are on the same line; fd=fc; fc=fe; b,g,e are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: ab=ac, dc=db => bc⟂ad; a,e,c are on the same line, bc⟂ad, ab⟂ac => ∠eab equals the intersection angle of ad and bc; ab=ac => ∠bca=∠abc; a,e,c are on the same line, ∠abc=∠bca => ∠abc equals the intersection angle of bc and ae; fd=fc, fg=fc, fc=fe => d,e,g,c are on the same circle; d,e,g,c are on the same circle => ∠dge=∠dce; a,e,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠dge=∠dce, b,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg; ∠abc equals the intersection angle of bc and ae, the intersection angle of bc and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ae and bg => the intersection angle of ab and dg is equal to ∠cbg; ∠eab equals the intersection angle of ad and bc, the intersection angle of ab and dg is equal to ∠cbg => the intersection angle of ae and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ad and bg; the intersection angle of ae and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ad and bg, a,e,c are on the same line, b,g,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ac and dg is equal to the intersection angle of ad and be. 生成题目的FL: cong a b a c; perp a b a c; cong d c d b; coll b c d; coll a e c; cong f d f c; cong f c f e; coll b g e; cong f g f c ? eqangle a c d g a d b e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_1. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; cf⟂cd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, cf⟂cd => the intersection angle of be and cf is equal to ∠gdc; the intersection angle of be and cf is equal to ∠gdc, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠edc. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp c f c d; coll d g e ? eqangle a b c f d e c d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_2. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; cf⟂cd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, cf⟂cd => the intersection angle of be and cf is equal to ∠gdc; the intersection angle of be and cf is equal to ∠gdc, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠edc. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp c f c d; coll d g e ? eqangle c f a b c d d e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_3. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; cf⟂cd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, cf⟂cd => the intersection angle of be and cd is equal to the intersection angle of dg and cf; the intersection angle of be and cd is equal to the intersection angle of dg and cf, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and cd is equal to the intersection angle of de and cf. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp c f c d; coll d g e ? eqangle a b c d d e c f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_4. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; cf⟂cd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, cf⟂cd => the intersection angle of be and cd is equal to the intersection angle of dg and cf; the intersection angle of be and cd is equal to the intersection angle of dg and cf, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and cd is equal to the intersection angle of de and cf. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp c f c d; coll d g e ? eqangle c d a b c f d e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_5. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠abd equals the intersection angle of de and bf. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? eqangle a b b d d e b f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_6. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠abd equals the intersection angle of de and bf. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? eqangle b d a b b f d e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_7. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠abf=∠edb. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? eqangle a b b f d e b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_35. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => b,g,d,c are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? cyclic b g d c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_36. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; d,e,g are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠gdb => the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf; da=db => ∠bad=∠dba; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf, ∠bad=∠dba => the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg; the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf, the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg => ∠gda=∠bdg; ∠gda=∠bdg, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠eda=∠bde. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? eqangle d e a d b d d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_37. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; d,e,g are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠gdb => the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf; da=db => ∠bad=∠dba; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf, ∠bad=∠dba => the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg; the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf, the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg => ∠gda=∠bdg; ∠gda=∠bdg, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠eda=∠bde. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? eqangle a d d e d e b d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_38. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠gdb => the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf; da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fbc=∠bac; b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bac=∠fbc => the intersection angle of be and cg is equal to ∠fbc; the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf, the intersection angle of be and cg is equal to ∠fbc => ∠dgc=∠dbc; ∠dgc=∠dbc, d,g,e are on the same line, c,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ac is equal to ∠dbc. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e; coll c g a ? eqangle d e a c b d b c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_40. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; da=db => ∠bad=∠dba; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf, ∠bad=∠dba => the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg; da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fbc=∠bac; b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bac=∠fbc => the intersection angle of be and cg is equal to ∠fbc; the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg, the intersection angle of be and cg is equal to ∠fbc => the intersection angle of da and cg is equal to the intersection angle of dg and bc; the intersection angle of da and cg is equal to the intersection angle of dg and bc, c,g,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of de and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e; coll c g a ? eqangle a d a c d e b c. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=ad; cd=ca; ba=ae; be=ba. 步骤: cd=ca, be=ba => cd/ca = be/ba; ad=ac, ae=ab => ad/ac = ae/ab; cd/ca = be/ba, ad/ac = ae/ab => ∠dae=∠cab; ca=ad, ba=ae, ∠dae=∠cab => ∠cad equals the intersection angle of bc and de. 生成题目的FL: cong c a a d; cong c d c a; cong b a a e; cong b e b a ? eqangle a d a c d e b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_41. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; da=db => ∠bad=∠dba; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf, ∠bad=∠dba => the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg; da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fbc=∠bac; b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bac=∠fbc => the intersection angle of be and cg is equal to ∠fbc; the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg, the intersection angle of be and cg is equal to ∠fbc => the intersection angle of da and cg is equal to the intersection angle of dg and bc; the intersection angle of da and cg is equal to the intersection angle of dg and bc, c,g,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of de and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; coll d g e; coll c g a ? eqangle a c a d b c d e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_44. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => b,g,d,c are on the same circle; b,g,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bgd; ∠bcd=∠bgd, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of bg and de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle b c c d b g d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_45. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => b,g,d,c are on the same circle; b,g,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bgd; ∠bcd=∠bgd, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of bg and de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle c d b c d e b g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_46. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => b,g,d,c are on the same circle; b,g,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bgd; ∠bcd=∠bgd, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠cbg=∠cde. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle b c b g c d d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_20. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ed; ed=eb; eg=eb; g,a,c are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; ∠bdc=∠bgc, g,a,c are on the same line => ∠bdc equals the intersection angle of bg and ac. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e g e b; coll g a c ? eqangle b d c d b g a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_52. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => b,g,d,c are on the same circle; b,g,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; ∠bdc=∠bgc, c,g,a are on the same line => ∠dbg=∠dca. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle b d b g c d a c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_22. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ed; ed=eb; eg=eb; g,a,c are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; ∠bdc=∠bgc, g,a,c are on the same line => ∠dbg=∠dca. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e g e b; coll g a c ? eqangle b d b g c d a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_53. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => b,g,d,c are on the same circle; b,g,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; ∠bdc=∠bgc, c,g,a are on the same line => ∠dbg=∠dca. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle b g b d a c c d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_58. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; cf⟂cd; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => c,b,d,g are on the same circle; cf⟂cd, bf⟂bd => ∠fbd=∠fcd; ∠fbd=∠fcd => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; c,b,d,g are on the same circle, b,f,d,c are on the same circle => b,d,g,f are on the same circle; b,d,g,f are on the same circle => ∠bdg=∠bfg; ∠bdg=∠bfg, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠dbf equals the intersection angle of de and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; perp c f c d; coll d g e; coll c g a ? eqangle b d b f d e f g. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_59. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; cf⟂cd; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => c,b,d,g are on the same circle; cf⟂cd, bf⟂bd => ∠fbd=∠fcd; ∠fbd=∠fcd => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; c,b,d,g are on the same circle, b,f,d,c are on the same circle => b,d,g,f are on the same circle; b,d,g,f are on the same circle => ∠bdg=∠bfg; ∠bdg=∠bfg, d,g,e are on the same line => ∠dbf equals the intersection angle of de and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; perp c f c d; coll d g e; coll c g a ? eqangle b f b d f g d e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,f are on the same line; df⟂bc; a,d,g are on the same line; bg⟂ad. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,c,f are on the same line, df⟂bc, bg⟂ad => ∠bgd=∠bfd; ∠bgd=∠bfd => b,f,d,g are on the same circle; b,f,d,g are on the same circle => ∠bdf=∠bgf. 生成题目的FL: coll b c f; perp d f b c; coll a d g; perp b g a d ? eqangle b d d f b g f g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_64. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; cf⟂cd; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠abf=∠acb; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, ∠abf=∠acb, ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠gcb; ∠gdb=∠gcb => c,b,d,g are on the same circle; cf⟂cd, bf⟂bd => ∠fbd=∠fcd; ∠fbd=∠fcd => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; c,b,d,g are on the same circle, b,f,d,c are on the same circle => b,d,g,f are on the same circle; b,d,g,f are on the same circle => ∠dbg=∠dfg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; perp c f c d; coll d g e; coll c g a ? eqangle b d b g d f f g. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,f are on the same line; df⟂bc; a,d,g are on the same line; bg⟂ad. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,c,f are on the same line, df⟂bc, bg⟂ad => ∠bgd=∠bfd; ∠bgd=∠bfd => b,f,d,g are on the same circle; b,f,d,g are on the same circle => ∠dbg=∠dfg. 生成题目的FL: coll b c f; perp d f b c; coll a d g; perp b g a d ? eqangle b d b g d f f g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
