原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_68. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; cf⟂cd; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, cf⟂cd => the intersection angle of be and cf is equal to ∠gdc; cf⟂cd, bf⟂bd => ∠fbd=∠fcd; ∠fbd=∠fcd => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠fbc=∠fdc; da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fbc=∠bac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, cf⟂cd => ∠bcf=∠bac; ∠fbc=∠fdc, ∠fbc=∠bac, ∠bcf=∠bac => ∠bcf=∠fdc; ∠gdc equals the intersection angle of be and cf, ∠bcf=∠fdc => ∠gdf=∠ebc; ∠gdf=∠ebc, d,g,e are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ab is equal to the intersection angle of df and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp c f c d; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? eqangle d e a b d f b c. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_69. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; cf⟂cd; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, cf⟂cd => the intersection angle of be and cf is equal to ∠gdc; cf⟂cd, bf⟂bd => ∠fbd=∠fcd; ∠fbd=∠fcd => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠fbc=∠fdc; da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fbc=∠bac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, cf⟂cd => ∠bcf=∠bac; ∠fbc=∠fdc, ∠fbc=∠bac, ∠bcf=∠bac => ∠bcf=∠fdc; ∠gdc equals the intersection angle of be and cf, ∠bcf=∠fdc => ∠gdf=∠ebc; ∠gdf=∠ebc, d,g,e are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ab is equal to the intersection angle of df and bc. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp c f c d; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? eqangle a b d e b c d f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_70. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; cf⟂cd; bf⟂bd; d,g,e are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, cf⟂cd => the intersection angle of be and cf is equal to ∠gdc; cf⟂cd, bf⟂bd => ∠fbd=∠fcd; ∠fbd=∠fcd => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠dbc=∠dfc; db=dc => ∠dbc=∠bcd; ∠dbc=∠dfc, ∠dbc=∠bcd => ∠bcd=∠dfc; ∠gdc equals the intersection angle of be and cf, ∠bcd=∠dfc => the intersection angle of dg and bc is equal to the intersection angle of be and df; the intersection angle of dg and bc is equal to the intersection angle of be and df, d,g,e are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ab and df. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp c f c d; perp b f b d; coll d g e ? eqangle d e b c a b d f. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_74. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fba=∠bca; ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bca => ∠bca=∠bde; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, b,e,a are on the same line, ∠bca=∠bde => eb=ea; b,e,a are on the same line, eb=ea => e is the midpoint of a and b; d,e,g are on the same line, de⟂ab => ge⟂ba; e is the midpoint of a and b, ge⟂ba => gb=ga. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; perp b f b d ? cong g b g a. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B; circle O A B C, coll M B C, eqangle A B A C O B O M => midp M B C; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，M、B、C共线，且∠BAC = ∠BOM，那么M是BC的中点。【定理18的逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_75. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; d,e,g are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠gdb => the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf; da=db => ∠bad=∠dba; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf, ∠bad=∠dba => the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg; the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf, the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg => ∠gda=∠bdg; da=db, ∠gda=∠bdg => ∠dag=∠gbd; ∠dag=∠gbd, c,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ad and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle a d b g a c b d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_76. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; d,e,g are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ∠ebf=∠gdb => the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf; da=db => ∠bad=∠dba; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf, ∠bad=∠dba => the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg; the intersection angle of dg and be is equal to ∠dbf, the intersection angle of be and da is equal to the intersection angle of bf and dg => ∠gda=∠bdg; da=db, ∠gda=∠bdg => ∠dag=∠gbd; ∠dag=∠gbd, c,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ad and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle b g a d b d a c. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_77. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fba=∠bca; ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bca => ∠bca=∠bde; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, b,e,a are on the same line, ∠bca=∠bde => eb=ea; b,a,e are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line, de⟂ab => ∠aeg=∠geb; eb=ea, ∠aeg=∠geb => ∠eag=∠gbe; ∠eag=∠gbe, b,e,a are on the same line, c,g,a are on the same line => ∠bac=∠gba. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle a b a c b g a b. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, coll M B C, eqangle A B A C O B O M => midp M B C; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，M、B、C共线，且∠BAC = ∠BOM，那么M是BC的中点。【定理18的逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_43. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=da; a,d,b are on the same line; fa=fb; g,f,d are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; a,d,b are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, ab⟂df => ∠adg=∠gdb; db=da, ∠adg=∠gdb => ∠dag=∠gbd; ∠dag=∠gbd, a,d,b are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠bac=∠gba. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d a; coll a d b; cong f a f b; coll g f d; coll a g c ? eqangle a b a c b g a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_78. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line; bf⟂bd. 步骤: da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebf=∠gdb; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fba=∠bca; ∠ebf=∠gdb, b,e,a are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bca => ∠bca=∠bde; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, b,e,a are on the same line, ∠bca=∠bde => eb=ea; b,a,e are on the same line, d,g,e are on the same line, de⟂ab => ∠aeg=∠geb; eb=ea, ∠aeg=∠geb => ∠eag=∠gbe; ∠eag=∠gbe, b,e,a are on the same line, c,g,a are on the same line => ∠bac=∠gba. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll d g e; coll c g a; perp b f b d ? eqangle a c a b a b b g. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, coll M B C, eqangle A B A C O B O M => midp M B C; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，M、B、C共线，且∠BAC = ∠BOM，那么M是BC的中点。【定理18的逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_44. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=da; a,d,b are on the same line; fa=fb; g,f,d are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; a,d,b are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, ab⟂df => ∠adg=∠gdb; db=da, ∠adg=∠gdb => ∠dag=∠gbd; ∠dag=∠gbd, a,d,b are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠bac=∠gba. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d a; coll a d b; cong f a f b; coll g f d; coll a g c ? eqangle a c a b a b b g. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_31_83. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = angle_bisector f d e a, on_line f a d; g = on_line g e f, on_line g b d ? cong d f d g. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; bf⟂bd; cf⟂cd; d,g,e are on the same line; c,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, d,e,g are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂dg; be⟂dg, bf⟂bd => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf; d,g,e are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of dg and bf => ∠fbd=∠gea; da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δbac; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, cf⟂cd => ∠fcb=∠cab; cf⟂cd, bf⟂bd => ∠fbd=∠fcd; ∠fbd=∠fcd => b,f,d,c are on the same circle; b,f,d,c are on the same circle => ∠fdb=∠fcb; c,g,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line, ∠fcb=∠cab, ∠fdb=∠fcb => ∠fdb=∠gae; ∠fbd=∠gea, ∠fdb=∠gae => bf/bd = eg/ea; d is the circumcenter of Δbac, bf⟂bd => ∠fbc=∠bac; ∠fbc=∠bac, ∠bcf=∠bac => ∠bcf=∠fbc; ∠bcf=∠fbc => fb=fc; bf/bd = eg/ea, fb=fc => cf/bd = eg/ea. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; perp b f b d; perp c f c d; coll d g e; coll c g a ? eqratio c f b d g e e a. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 6

原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_0. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb. 步骤: c,e,a are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of c and a; b,f,d are on the same line, fd=fb => f is the midpoint of b and d; e is the midpoint of c and a, f is the midpoint of b and d => ce/ca = bf/bd; ce/ca = bf/bd, ec=ea => ae/ac = bf/bd. 生成题目的FL: coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b ? eqratio e a c a b f b d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_1. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb. 步骤: c,e,a are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of c and a; b,f,d are on the same line, fd=fb => f is the midpoint of b and d; e is the midpoint of c and a, f is the midpoint of b and d => ce/ca = bf/bd; ce/ca = bf/bd, ec=ea => ae/ac = bf/bd. 生成题目的FL: coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b ? eqratio c a e a b d b f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_2. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb. 步骤: c,e,a are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of c and a; b,f,d are on the same line, fd=fb => f is the midpoint of b and d; e is the midpoint of c and a, f is the midpoint of b and d => ec/fb = ca/bd; ec/fb = ca/bd, ec=ea => ea/bf = ca/bd. 生成题目的FL: coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b ? eqratio e a b f c a b d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_3. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb. 步骤: c,e,a are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of c and a; b,f,d are on the same line, fd=fb => f is the midpoint of b and d; e is the midpoint of c and a, f is the midpoint of b and d => ec/fb = ca/bd; ec/fb = ca/bd, ec=ea => ea/bf = ca/bd. 生成题目的FL: coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b ? eqratio b f e a b d c a. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): midp M A B, midp N C D => eqratio M A A B N C C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点是线段的中点，那么这个点将线段分成两个相等的部分。【中点的性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_5. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb; f,e,g are on the same line; g,a,d are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ea, fd=fb => ec/ea = fd/fb; ab∥cd, c,e,a are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, ec/ea = fd/fb => ef∥ab; e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ab => ba∥fg; ba∥fg, b,f,d are on the same line, g,a,d are on the same line => db/df = da/dg; db/df = da/dg, fd=fb => bd/bf = da/dg. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b; coll f e g; coll g a d ? eqratio b d b f a d d g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_6. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb; f,e,g are on the same line; g,a,d are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ea, fd=fb => ec/ea = fd/fb; ab∥cd, c,e,a are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, ec/ea = fd/fb => ef∥ab; e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ab => ba∥fg; ba∥fg, b,f,d are on the same line, g,a,d are on the same line => db/df = da/dg; db/df = da/dg, fd=fb => bd/bf = da/dg. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b; coll f e g; coll g a d ? eqratio b f b d d g a d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_7. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb; f,e,g are on the same line; g,a,d are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ea, fd=fb => ec/ea = fd/fb; ab∥cd, c,e,a are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, ec/ea = fd/fb => ef∥ab; e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ab => ba∥fg; ba∥fg, b,f,d are on the same line, g,a,d are on the same line => db/da = df/dg; db/da = df/dg, fd=fb => db/da = bf/dg. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b; coll f e g; coll g a d ? eqratio b d a d b f d g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_13. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb; f,e,g are on the same line; g,a,d are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ea, fd=fb => ec/ea = fd/fb; ab∥cd, c,e,a are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, ec/ea = fd/fb => ef∥ab; e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ab => ba∥fg; ba∥fg, b,f,d are on the same line, g,a,d are on the same line => fd/fb = gd/ga; fd/fb = gd/ga, fd=fb => gd=ga. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b; coll f e g; coll g a d ? cong g d g a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_16. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb; f,e,g are on the same line; g,a,d are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ea, fd=fb => ec/ea = fd/fb; ab∥cd, c,e,a are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, ec/ea = fd/fb => ef∥ab; e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ab => ba∥fg; ba∥fg, b,f,d are on the same line, g,a,d are on the same line => bd/ba = fd/fg; bd/ba = fd/fg, fd=fb => bd/ba = fb/fg. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b; coll f e g; coll g a d ? eqratio b d b a b f f g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_17. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb; f,e,g are on the same line; g,a,d are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ea, fd=fb => ec/ea = fd/fb; ab∥cd, c,e,a are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, ec/ea = fd/fb => ef∥ab; e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ab => ba∥fg; ba∥fg, b,f,d are on the same line, g,a,d are on the same line => bd/ba = fd/fg; bd/ba = fd/fg, fd=fb => bd/ba = fb/fg. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b; coll f e g; coll g a d ? eqratio b a b d f g b f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_32_27. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = on_line e b d; f = circle f d c e; g = on_pline g e a b, on_circle g f c ? cong g e c b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; c,e,a are on the same line; ec=ea; b,f,d are on the same line; fd=fb; f,e,g are on the same line; g,a,d are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ea, fd=fb => ec/ea = fd/fb; ab∥cd, c,e,a are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, ec/ea = fd/fb => ef∥cd; ab∥cd, c,e,a are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line, ec/ea = fd/fb => ef∥ab; f,e,g are on the same line, ef∥cd => cd∥eg; cd∥eg, g,a,d are on the same line, c,e,a are on the same line => da/dc = ga/ge; e,f,g are on the same line, ef∥ab => ba∥fg; ba∥fg, b,f,d are on the same line, g,a,d are on the same line => fd/fb = gd/ga; da/dc = ga/ge, fd/fb = gd/ga, fd=fb => da/dc = gd/ge. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; coll c e a; cong e c e a; coll b f d; cong f d f b; coll f e g; coll g a d ? eqratio c d a d e g d g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, eqratio6 m a m d n b n c, sameside m a d n b c => para m n a b; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，MA:MD = NB:NC，且M、A、D和N、B、C在同侧，那么MN平行于AB。【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_41. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: eb=ec; ea=eb; ef=ea; ∠fcb=∠acd; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠fcb => ∠acg=∠fcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acg=∠fcb => ag=fb. 生成题目的FL: cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e f e a; eqangle c f b c a c c d; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? cong a g f b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_63. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea=eb; eb=ec; ef=ea; ∠acf=∠dcb; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: ef=ea, ea=eb, eb=ec, eg=ec => eg=ef; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠dcb => ∠acf=∠gcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acf=∠gcb => af=gb; ea=eb, eg=ef, af=gb => ∠eaf=∠gbe. 生成题目的FL: cong e a e b; cong e b e c; cong e f e a; eqangle a c c f c d b c; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? eqangle a e a f b g b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_64. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea=eb; eb=ec; ef=ea; ∠acf=∠dcb; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: ef=ea, ea=eb, eb=ec, eg=ec => eg=ef; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠dcb => ∠acf=∠gcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acf=∠gcb => af=gb; ea=eb, eg=ef, af=gb => ∠eaf=∠gbe. 生成题目的FL: cong e a e b; cong e b e c; cong e f e a; eqangle a c c f c d b c; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? eqangle a f a e b e b g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_65. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea=eb; eb=ec; ef=ea; ∠acf=∠dcb; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: ef=ea, ea=eb, eb=ec, eg=ec => eg=ef; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠dcb => ∠acf=∠gcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acf=∠gcb => af=gb; ea=eb, eg=ef, af=gb => the intersection angle of ae and bg is equal to the intersection angle of af and be. 生成题目的FL: cong e a e b; cong e b e c; cong e f e a; eqangle a c c f c d b c; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? eqangle a e b g a f b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_75. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea=eb; eb=ec; ef=ea; ∠fcb=∠acd; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: ef=ea, ea=eb, eb=ec, eg=ec => eg=ef; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠fcb => ∠acg=∠fcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acg=∠fcb => ag=fb; ea=eb, eg=ef, ag=fb => the intersection angle of ae and bf is equal to the intersection angle of ag and be. 生成题目的FL: cong e a e b; cong e b e c; cong e f e a; eqangle c f b c a c c d; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? eqangle a e b f a g b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_82. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: eb=ec; ea=eb; ef=ea; ∠fcb=∠acd; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: eg=ec, eb=ec => eb=eg; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠fcb => ∠acg=∠fcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acg=∠fcb => ag=fb; ef=ea, eb=eg, ag=fb => ∠aef equals the intersection angle of ag and bf. 生成题目的FL: cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e f e a; eqangle c f b c a c c d; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? eqangle e f a e b f a g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_83. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line; ∠fca=∠bcd; ef=ea. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => f,a,c,b are on the same circle; f,a,c,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠afc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afc => ∠dbc=∠afc; ∠fca=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠afc => dc/db = ac/af; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, f,a,c,b are on the same circle => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠dcb => ∠acf=∠gcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acf=∠gcb => af=gb; dc/db = ac/af, af=gb => dc/db = ac/bg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e g e c; coll g d c; eqangle c f a c b c c d; cong e f e a ? eqratio d c b d a c b g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_84. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line; ∠fca=∠bcd; ef=ea. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => f,a,c,b are on the same circle; f,a,c,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠afc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afc => ∠dbc=∠afc; ∠fca=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠afc => dc/db = ac/af; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, f,a,c,b are on the same circle => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠dcb => ∠acf=∠gcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acf=∠gcb => af=gb; dc/db = ac/af, af=gb => dc/db = ac/bg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e g e c; coll g d c; eqangle c f a c b c c d; cong e f e a ? eqratio b d d c b g a c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_85. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line; ∠fca=∠bcd; ef=ea. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => f,a,c,b are on the same circle; f,a,c,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠afc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afc => ∠dbc=∠afc; ∠fca=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠afc => cd/ca = db/af; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, f,a,c,b are on the same circle => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠dcb => ∠acf=∠gcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acf=∠gcb => af=gb; cd/ca = db/af, af=gb => cd/ca = bd/bg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e g e c; coll g d c; eqangle c f a c b c c d; cong e f e a ? eqratio d c a c b d b g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_86. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line; ∠fca=∠bcd; ef=ea. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => f,a,c,b are on the same circle; f,a,c,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠afc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afc => ∠dbc=∠afc; ∠fca=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠afc => cd/ca = db/af; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, f,a,c,b are on the same circle => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠dcb => ∠acf=∠gcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acf=∠gcb => af=gb; cd/ca = db/af, af=gb => cd/ca = bd/bg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e g e c; coll g d c; eqangle c f a c b c c d; cong e f e a ? eqratio a c d c b g b d. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_87. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; ∠fca=∠bcd; ef=ea. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => f,a,c,b are on the same circle; f,a,c,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠afc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afc => ∠dbc=∠afc; ∠fca=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠afc => cd/cb = ca/cf. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; eqangle c f a c b c c d; cong e f e a ? eqratio d c b c a c f c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_88. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; ∠fca=∠bcd; ef=ea. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => f,a,c,b are on the same circle; f,a,c,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠afc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afc => ∠dbc=∠afc; ∠fca=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠afc => cd/cb = ca/cf. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; eqangle c f a c b c c d; cong e f e a ? eqratio b c d c f c a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_91. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; ∠fca=∠bcd; ef=ea; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => f,a,c,b are on the same circle; f,a,c,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠afc; b,a,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afc => ∠dbc=∠afc; ∠fca=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠afc => bd/bc = fa/fc; eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb, f,a,c,b are on the same circle => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acf=∠dcb => ∠acf=∠gcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acf=∠gcb => af=gb; bd/bc = fa/fc, af=gb => bd/bc = bg/fc. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; eqangle c f a c b c c d; cong e f e a; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? eqratio b d b c b g f c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_99. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; ef=ea; ∠fcb=∠acd; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠agc; a,b,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠agc, g,d,c are on the same line => ∠gad=∠dcb; g,c,d are on the same line, a,b,d are on the same line => ∠gda=∠cdb; ∠gad=∠dcb, ∠gda=∠cdb => ga/gd = bc/bd; g,a,b,c are on the same circle, eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠fcb => ∠acg=∠fcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acg=∠fcb => ag=fb; ga/gd = bc/bd, ag=fb => bf/gd = bc/bd. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e f e a; eqangle c f b c a c c d; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? eqratio b f g d b c b d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_33_100. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c b; e = foot e d a b; f = lc_tangent f d c; g = on_line g d f ? eqangle d f d a d a d e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; eb=ec; ea=eb; ef=ea; ∠fcb=∠acd; eg=ec; g,d,c are on the same line. 步骤: eb=ec, eg=ec, ea=eb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠agc; a,b,d are on the same line, ∠abc=∠agc, g,d,c are on the same line => ∠gad=∠dcb; g,c,d are on the same line, a,b,d are on the same line => ∠gda=∠cdb; ∠gad=∠dcb, ∠gda=∠cdb => ga/gd = bc/bd; g,a,b,c are on the same circle, eb=ec, ea=eb, ef=ea => a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle; g,d,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠fcb => ∠acg=∠fcb; a,b,f,g,c are on the same circle, ∠acg=∠fcb => ag=fb; ga/gd = bc/bd, ag=fb => bf/gd = bc/bd. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong e f e a; eqangle c f b c a c c d; cong e g e c; coll g d c ? eqratio g d b f b d b c. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B C P Q R, eqangle C A C B R P R Q => cong A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，如果两个圆周角相等，那么它们所对的弦相等; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_34_13. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = mirror d c b; e = on_circle e c a, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f b a b, on_line f a e; g = on_line g b f, on_line g d e ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ef⟂ac; b,g,a are on the same line; eg⟂ab. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, eg⟂ab => eg⟂bg; eg⟂bg, ef⟂ac => the intersection angle of eg and ca is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ef; the intersection angle of eg and ca is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ef, b,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of eg and ac is equal to the intersection angle of ab and ef. 生成题目的FL: perp e f a c; coll b g a; perp e g a b ? eqangle e g a c a b e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_34_16. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = mirror d c b; e = on_circle e c a, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f b a b, on_line f a e; g = on_line g b f, on_line g d e ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ef⟂ac; b,g,a are on the same line; eg⟂ab. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, eg⟂ab => eg⟂bg; eg⟂bg, ef⟂ac => ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca; ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca, b,g,a are on the same line => ∠gef=∠bac. 生成题目的FL: perp e f a c; coll b g a; perp e g a b ? eqangle e f e g a c a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_34_29. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = mirror d c b; e = on_circle e c a, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f b a b, on_line f a e; g = on_line g b f, on_line g d e ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,a,f are on the same line; ef⟂ac; b,g,a are on the same line; eg⟂ab. 步骤: c,f,a are on the same line, b,g,a are on the same line, eg⟂ab, ef⟂ac => ∠afe=∠age; ∠afe=∠age => e,g,a,f are on the same circle; e,g,a,f are on the same circle => ∠eag=∠efg; ∠eag=∠efg, b,g,a are on the same line => ∠eab=∠efg. 生成题目的FL: coll c a f; perp e f a c; coll b g a; perp e g a b ? eqangle a e a b e f f g. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_34_37. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = mirror d c b; e = on_circle e c a, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f b a b, on_line f a e; g = on_line g b f, on_line g d e ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; ef⟂ac; b,g,a are on the same line; eg⟂ab. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, eg⟂ab => eg⟂bg; eg⟂bg, ef⟂ac => ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca; b,g,a are on the same line, ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca => ∠egb equals the intersection angle of ef and ca; db=dc, da=db, de=da => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; b,g,a are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace => ∠gbe=∠ace; ∠egb equals the intersection angle of ef and ca, ∠gbe=∠ace => ∠geb=∠fec. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp e f a c; coll b g a; perp e g a b ? eqangle e g b e e f c e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_34_38. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = mirror d c b; e = on_circle e c a, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f b a b, on_line f a e; g = on_line g b f, on_line g d e ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; ef⟂ac; b,g,a are on the same line; eg⟂ab. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, eg⟂ab => eg⟂bg; eg⟂bg, ef⟂ac => ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca; b,g,a are on the same line, ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca => ∠egb equals the intersection angle of ef and ca; db=dc, da=db, de=da => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; b,g,a are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace => ∠gbe=∠ace; ∠egb equals the intersection angle of ef and ca, ∠gbe=∠ace => ∠geb=∠fec. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp e f a c; coll b g a; perp e g a b ? eqangle b e e g c e e f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_34_39. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = mirror d c b; e = on_circle e c a, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f b a b, on_line f a e; g = on_line g b f, on_line g d e ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; c,a,f are on the same line; ef⟂ac; b,g,a are on the same line; eg⟂ab. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, eg⟂ab => eg⟂bg; eg⟂bg, ef⟂ac => ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca; b,g,a are on the same line, c,f,a are on the same line, ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca => ∠egb=∠efc; db=dc, da=db, de=da => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠eba=∠eca; b,g,a are on the same line, c,f,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠eca => ∠ebg=∠ecf; ∠egb=∠efc, ∠ebg=∠ecf => eg/eb = ef/ec. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll c a f; perp e f a c; coll b g a; perp e g a b ? eqratio e g b e e f e c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_34_40. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = mirror d c b; e = on_circle e c a, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f b a b, on_line f a e; g = on_line g b f, on_line g d e ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; c,a,f are on the same line; ef⟂ac; b,g,a are on the same line; eg⟂ab. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, eg⟂ab => eg⟂bg; eg⟂bg, ef⟂ac => ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca; b,g,a are on the same line, c,f,a are on the same line, ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca => ∠egb=∠efc; db=dc, da=db, de=da => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠eba=∠eca; b,g,a are on the same line, c,f,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠eca => ∠ebg=∠ecf; ∠egb=∠efc, ∠ebg=∠ecf => eg/eb = ef/ec. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll c a f; perp e f a c; coll b g a; perp e g a b ? eqratio b e e g e c e f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_34_41. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = mirror d c b; e = on_circle e c a, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f b a b, on_line f a e; g = on_line g b f, on_line g d e ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; c,a,f are on the same line; ef⟂ac; b,g,a are on the same line; eg⟂ab. 步骤: b,g,a are on the same line, eg⟂ab => eg⟂bg; eg⟂bg, ef⟂ac => ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca; b,g,a are on the same line, c,f,a are on the same line, ∠gef equals the intersection angle of bg and ca => ∠egb=∠efc; db=dc, da=db, de=da => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠eba=∠eca; b,g,a are on the same line, c,f,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠eca => ∠ebg=∠ecf; ∠egb=∠efc, ∠ebg=∠ecf => eg/ef = eb/ec. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll c a f; perp e f a c; coll b g a; perp e g a b ? eqratio e g e f b e e c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_35_0. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a b d e; f = foot f a b c; g = on_line g a f, eqdistance g a b c ? perp g b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ec=eb; b,e,c are on the same line; ef=ec. 步骤: ec=eb, ef=ec => ef=eb; ef=eb => ∠efb=∠fbe; ∠efb=∠fbe, b,e,c are on the same line, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠efb=∠fba. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong e c e b; coll b e c; cong e f e c ? eqangle e f b f b f a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_35_1. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a b d e; f = foot f a b c; g = on_line g a f, eqdistance g a b c ? perp g b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ec=eb; b,e,c are on the same line; ef=ec. 步骤: ec=eb, ef=ec => ef=eb; ef=eb => ∠efb=∠fbe; ∠efb=∠fbe, b,e,c are on the same line, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠efb=∠fba. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong e c e b; coll b e c; cong e f e c ? eqangle b f e f a b b f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_35_4. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a b d e; f = foot f a b c; g = on_line g a f, eqdistance g a b c ? perp g b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ec=eb; ef=ec; af⟂ef; f,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: ec=eb, ef=ec => e is the circumcenter of Δfbc; f,a,g are on the same line, ef⟂af => ef⟂fg; e is the circumcenter of Δfbc, ef⟂fg => ∠gfb=∠fcb; ∠gfb=∠fcb, f,g,a are on the same line, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠afb equals the intersection angle of cf and ab. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong e c e b; cong e f e c; perp a f e f; coll f g a ? eqangle a f b f c f a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_35_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a b d e; f = foot f a b c; g = on_line g a f, eqdistance g a b c ? perp g b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ec=eb; ef=ec; af⟂ef; f,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: ec=eb, ef=ec => e is the circumcenter of Δfbc; f,a,g are on the same line, ef⟂af => ef⟂fg; e is the circumcenter of Δfbc, ef⟂fg => ∠gfb=∠fcb; ∠gfb=∠fcb, f,g,a are on the same line, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠afb equals the intersection angle of cf and ab. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong e c e b; cong e f e c; perp a f e f; coll f g a ? eqangle b f a f a b c f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_35_6. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a b d e; f = foot f a b c; g = on_line g a f, eqdistance g a b c ? perp g b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ec=eb; ef=ec; af⟂ef; f,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: ec=eb, ef=ec => e is the circumcenter of Δfbc; f,a,g are on the same line, ef⟂af => ef⟂fg; e is the circumcenter of Δfbc, ef⟂fg => ∠gfb=∠fcb; ∠gfb=∠fcb, f,g,a are on the same line, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠afc=∠fba. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong e c e b; cong e f e c; perp a f e f; coll f g a ? eqangle a f c f b f a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_35_7. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d e = square a b d e; f = foot f a b c; g = on_line g a f, eqdistance g a b c ? perp g b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ec=eb; ef=ec; af⟂ef; f,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: ec=eb, ef=ec => e is the circumcenter of Δfbc; f,a,g are on the same line, ef⟂af => ef⟂fg; e is the circumcenter of Δfbc, ef⟂fg => ∠gfb=∠fcb; ∠gfb=∠fcb, f,g,a are on the same line, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠afc=∠fba. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong e c e b; cong e f e c; perp a f e f; coll f g a ? eqangle c f a f a b b f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_1. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, e,b,g are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => bg/be = bd/bf. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; coll b d c; perp b c f e; coll b f c; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqratio b g e b b d b f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_2. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, e,b,g are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => bg/be = bd/bf. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; coll b d c; perp b c f e; coll b f c; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqratio e b b g b f b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_14. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, e,b,g are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => gb/gd = eb/ef. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; coll b d c; perp b c f e; coll b f c; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqratio g d b g e f e b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_15. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, b,d,f are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line => db/dg = fb/fe. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; coll b d c; perp b c f e; coll b f c; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqratio b d g d b f e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_16. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, b,d,f are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line => db/dg = fb/fe. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; coll b d c; perp b c f e; coll b f c; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqratio g d b d e f b f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_17. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => c,d,f are on the same line; ef∥ad, c,d,f are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => cd/cf = ca/ce. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; perp b c f e; coll b f c ? eqratio c d c f c a e c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_35. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; e,c,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂ad => bf⟂gd; e,a,c are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ec⟂ba; bf⟂gd, ec⟂ba => ∠fba equals the intersection angle of gd and ec; ∠fba equals the intersection angle of gd and ec, b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => ∠cba=∠dac. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll e c a; coll b f c; coll g d a ? eqangle b c a b a d a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_36. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; e,c,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂ad => bf⟂gd; e,a,c are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ec⟂ba; bf⟂gd, ec⟂ba => ∠fba equals the intersection angle of gd and ec; ∠fba equals the intersection angle of gd and ec, b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => ∠cba=∠dac. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll e c a; coll b f c; coll g d a ? eqangle a b b c a c a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_45. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: e,a,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac => ∠eab=∠bdg; b,d,c are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠dbg; ∠eab=∠bdg, ∠eba=∠dbg => ∠aeb=∠bgd; ∠aeb=∠bgd, e,c,a are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ac and be is equal to the intersection angle of be and ad. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqangle a c b e b e a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_57. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; ad⟂bc. 步骤: e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll b f c; perp b c f e; perp a d b c ? cong e a e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_67. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => c,d,f are on the same line; ef∥ad, e,c,a are on the same line, c,d,f are on the same line => ac/ad = ec/ef; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, ad∥ef => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; ec/ef = ac/ad, ea=ef => ec/ea = ac/ad. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; perp b c f e; coll b f c ? eqratio c a d a e c e a. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_68. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => c,d,f are on the same line; ef∥ad, e,c,a are on the same line, c,d,f are on the same line => ac/ad = ec/ef; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, ad∥ef => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; ec/ef = ac/ad, ea=ef => ec/ea = ac/ad. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; perp b c f e; coll b f c ? eqratio d a c a e a e c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_69. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, b,d,f are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line => bd/bf = gd/ef; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; gd/ef = bd/bf, ea=ef => gd/ea = bd/bf; ∠abe=∠ebc, e,c,a are on the same line => ea/ec = ba/bc; ea/ec = ba/bc, bf=ba => ea/ec = bf/bc; gd/ea = bd/bf, ea/ec = bf/bc => gd/ec = bd/bc. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll g d a; coll e b g; perp b c f e; coll b f c ? eqratio g d e c b d b c. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_70. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, b,d,f are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line => bd/bf = gd/ef; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; gd/ef = bd/bf, ea=ef => gd/ea = bd/bf; ∠abe=∠ebc, e,c,a are on the same line => ea/ec = ba/bc; ea/ec = ba/bc, bf=ba => ea/ec = bf/bc; gd/ea = bd/bf, ea/ec = bf/bc => gd/ec = bd/bc. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll g d a; coll e b g; perp b c f e; coll b f c ? eqratio e c g d b c b d. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_71. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; ∠eba=∠cbe; e,c,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; bd/bf = bd/bf; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠eba => ∠dbg=∠gba; ∠dbg=∠gba, g,d,a are on the same line => dg/db = ag/ab; g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, b,d,f are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line => dg/db = fe/fb; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; dg/db = ag/ab, dg/db = fe/fb, ea=ef, bf=ba => ea/bf = ga/bf; bd/bf = bd/bf, ea/bf = ga/bf => ea=ga. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b d c; perp a d b c; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll e c a; coll e b g; coll g d a; eqratio b d b f b d b f; perp b c f e; coll b f c ? cong e a g a. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_72. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠abe=∠ebc; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; g,d,a are on the same line, ef∥ad => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, e,b,g are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => be/bf = eg/fd; b,f,c are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line => c,d,f are on the same line; ef∥ad, c,d,f are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => fd/fc = ea/ec; ∠abe=∠ebc, e,c,a are on the same line => ea/ec = ba/bc; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, ad∥ef => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; fd/fc = ea/ec, ea/ec = ba/bc, bf=ba => bf/bc = fd/fc; be/bf = eg/fd, bf/bc = fd/fc => be/bc = eg/cf. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle a b b e b e b c; perp b c f e; coll b f c; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqratio e b b c e g c f. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_73. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠abe=∠ebc; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; g,d,a are on the same line, ef∥ad => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, e,b,g are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => be/bf = eg/fd; b,f,c are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line => c,d,f are on the same line; ef∥ad, c,d,f are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => fd/fc = ea/ec; ∠abe=∠ebc, e,c,a are on the same line => ea/ec = ba/bc; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, ad∥ef => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; fd/fc = ea/ec, ea/ec = ba/bc, bf=ba => bf/bc = fd/fc; be/bf = eg/fd, bf/bc = fd/fc => be/bc = eg/cf. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle a b b e b e b c; perp b c f e; coll b f c; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqratio b c e b c f e g. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_74. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠abe=∠ebc; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line; e,b,g are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; g,d,a are on the same line, ef∥ad => gd∥ef; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => b,f,d are on the same line; gd∥ef, e,b,g are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line => be/bf = eg/fd; b,f,c are on the same line, b,f,d are on the same line => c,d,f are on the same line; ef∥ad, c,d,f are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line => fd/fc = ea/ec; ∠abe=∠ebc, e,c,a are on the same line => ea/ec = ba/bc; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, ad∥ef => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; fd/fc = ea/ec, ea/ec = ba/bc, bf=ba => bf/bc = fd/fc; be/bf = eg/fd, bf/bc = fd/fc => eb/eg = cb/cf. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle a b b e b e b c; perp b c f e; coll b f c; coll g d a; coll e b g ? eqratio e b e g b c c f. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 4
