原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_79. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; bc⟂fe; b,f,c are on the same line. 步骤: bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => fe∥ad; b,f,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => c,d,f are on the same line; ef∥ad, e,c,a are on the same line, c,d,f are on the same line => ca/ce = da/ef; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, ad∥ef => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; ca/ce = da/ef, ea=ef => ca/ce = ad/ae; ∠abe=∠ebc, e,c,a are on the same line => ce/cb = ae/ab; ce/cb = ae/ab, bf=ba => ce/cb = ea/bf; ca/ce = ad/ae, ce/cb = ea/bf => ca/cb = da/bf; ca/cb = da/bf, ba=bf => ca/cb = ad/ab. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; perp b c f e; coll b f c ? eqratio b c c a b a d a. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_80. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; ad⟂bc. 步骤: e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; ea=ef, ba=bf => af⟂be. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll b f c; perp b c f e; perp a d b c ? perp a f b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_81. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; e,b,g are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; e,a,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac => ∠eab=∠bdg; b,d,c are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠dbg; ∠eab=∠bdg, ∠eba=∠dbg => ∠aeb=∠bgd; e,a,c are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, ∠aeb=∠bgd, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => ∠aeg=∠gef; ea=ef, ∠aeg=∠gef => ∠eag=∠gfe; ∠eag=∠gfe, e,c,a are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => ac∥fg. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll b f c; perp b c f e; coll e b g; coll g d a ? para a c f g. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_82. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; ad⟂bc; b,d,c are on the same line; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; e,b,g are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; e,a,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac => ∠eab=∠bdg; b,d,c are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠dbg; ∠eab=∠bdg, ∠eba=∠dbg => ∠aeb=∠bgd; e,a,c are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, ∠aeb=∠bgd, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => ∠aeg=∠gef; ea=ef, ∠aeg=∠gef => ga=gf. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; perp a d b c; coll b d c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll b f c; perp b c f e; coll e b g; coll g d a ? cong g a g f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_83. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; e,c,a are on the same line; ∠eba=∠cbe; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc => ∠bda=∠adc; b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂ad => bf⟂gd; e,a,c are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ec⟂ba; bf⟂gd, ec⟂ba => the intersection angle of bf and ec is equal to the intersection angle of gd and ba; c,b,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of bf and ec is equal to the intersection angle of gd and ba, b,f,c are on the same line, e,c,a are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠acd; ∠bda=∠adc, ∠bad=∠acd => bd/ba = ad/ac; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ba=bf; bd/ba = ad/ac, ba=bf => bd/bf = ad/ac. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll e c a; eqangle b e a b b c b e; coll b f c; perp b c f e; coll g d a ? eqratio b d b f d a c a. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_95. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; e,c,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; ad⟂bc; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: c,b,f are on the same line, ab⟂ac, ad⟂bc, bc⟂fe => ∠cfe=∠bac; b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂ad => bf⟂gd; e,a,c are on the same line, ac⟂ab => ec⟂ba; bf⟂gd, ec⟂ba => ∠fba equals the intersection angle of gd and ec; e,a,c are on the same line, ∠fba equals the intersection angle of gd and ec, b,f,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => ∠cef=∠abc; ∠cfe=∠bac, ∠cef=∠abc => cf/ca = ce/cb. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll e c a; coll b f c; perp b c f e; perp a d b c; coll g d a ? eqratio c f c a e c b c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_36_99. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_circle c a b; d = on_circle d a b; e = on_circle e a b, on_pline e d b c ? cong d c e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; ∠abe=∠ebc; e,c,a are on the same line; b,f,c are on the same line; bc⟂fe; e,b,g are on the same line; g,d,a are on the same line. 步骤: e,b,g are on the same line, ∠ebc=∠abe => ∠ebc=∠abg; e,a,c are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, g,d,a are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac => ∠eab=∠bdg; b,d,c are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠dbg; ∠eab=∠bdg, ∠eba=∠dbg => ∠aeb=∠bgd; g,d,a are on the same line, e,g,b are on the same line, e,a,c are on the same line, ∠aeb=∠bgd => ∠agb=∠bec; ∠ebc=∠abg, ∠agb=∠bec => ga/gb = ec/eb; e,a,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line, ad⟂bc, ab⟂ac, bc⟂fe => ∠eab=∠bfe; b,f,c are on the same line, ∠eba=∠cbe => ∠eba=∠fbe; ∠eab=∠bfe, ∠eba=∠fbe => ea=ef; e,a,c are on the same line, e,b,g are on the same line, ∠aeb=∠bgd, g,d,a are on the same line, bc⟂fe, ad⟂bc => ∠aeg=∠gef; ea=ef, ∠aeg=∠gef => ga=gf; ga/gb = ec/eb, ga=gf => gf/gb = ec/eb. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll b d c; perp a d b c; eqangle a b b e b e b c; coll e c a; coll b f c; perp b c f e; coll e b g; coll g d a ? eqratio g f b g e c e b. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_2. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc. 步骤: ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c ? cong b d c a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_4. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da. 生成题目的FL: coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? para f g a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_9. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ce/ca = de/db; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ce/ca = de/db, bd=ca => ce/ca = ed/ca. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d ? eqratio c e c a e d c a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_10. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ce/ca = de/db; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ce/ca = de/db, bd=ca => ce/ca = ed/ca. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d ? eqratio c a c e c a e d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_11. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ae/ac = be/bd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ae/ac = be/bd, bd=ca => ae/ac = eb/ca. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d ? eqratio a e c a e b c a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_12. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ae/ac = be/bd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ae/ac = be/bd, bd=ca => ae/ac = eb/ca. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d ? eqratio c a a e c a e b. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_13. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ce/cd = ae/ab; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ce/cd = ae/ab, cd=ab => ce/ab = ae/ab. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d ? eqratio c e a b a e a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_26. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc. 步骤: ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => c,a,b,d are on the same circle; c,a,b,d are on the same circle => ∠cab=∠cdb; ∠cab=∠cdb, ab∥cd => ∠cab=∠abd. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c ? eqangle a c a b a b b d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_27. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc. 步骤: ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => c,a,b,d are on the same circle; c,a,b,d are on the same circle => ∠cab=∠cdb; ∠cab=∠cdb, ab∥cd => ∠cab=∠abd. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c ? eqangle a b a c b d a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_28. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => c,a,b,d are on the same circle; c,a,b,d are on the same circle => ∠cad=∠cbd; f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; ∠cad=∠cbd, fg∥ad, ad∥bc => the intersection angle of ac and fg is equal to the intersection angle of fg and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqangle a c f g f g b d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_29. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => ∠cba=∠cda; ∠cba=∠cda => c,a,b,d are on the same circle; c,a,b,d are on the same circle => ∠cad=∠cbd; f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; ∠cad=∠cbd, fg∥ad, ad∥bc => the intersection angle of ac and fg is equal to the intersection angle of fg and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqangle f g a c b d f g. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_30. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ca/db = ec/ed; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ca/db = ec/ed, bd=ca => ce=de. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d ? cong c e d e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_31. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ac/bd = ea/eb; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ac/bd = ea/eb, bd=ca => ae=be. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d ? cong a e b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_32. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab => ec=ea. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d ? cong e c e a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_57_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d a c b; e = on_line e b c; f = on_circle f d a, angle_bisector f a c e ? cong a f f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; dc∥ab; c,e,a are on the same line; b,e,d are on the same line. 步骤: ad∥bc, c,e,a are on the same line, b,e,d are on the same line => cb/ad = ec/ea; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => bc=da; cb/ad = ec/ea, bc=da => ec=ea. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; para d c a b; coll c e a; coll b e d ? cong e c e a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_33. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; fg∥ad, e,g,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => eg/ea = ef/ed; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ca/db = ec/ed; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; eg/ea = ef/ed, ge=ga, cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab, fe=fd, ca/db = ec/ed, bd=ca => ag/ce = fd/ce. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio a g c e f d c e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_34. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; fg∥ad, e,g,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => eg/ea = ef/ed; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ca/db = ec/ed; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; eg/ea = ef/ed, ge=ga, cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab, fe=fd, ca/db = ec/ed, bd=ca => ag/ce = fd/ce. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio c e a g c e f d. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_35. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; fg∥ad, e,g,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => eg/ea = gf/ad; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; eg/ea = gf/ad, ge=ga, cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab => ag/ce = gf/ad. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio a g c e g f a d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_36. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; fg∥ad, e,g,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => eg/ea = gf/ad; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; eg/ea = gf/ad, ge=ga, cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab => ag/ce = gf/ad. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio c e a g a d g f. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_37. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; fg∥ad, e,g,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => ge/gf = ae/ad; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ge/gf = ae/ad, ge=ga, cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab => ga/gf = ce/ad. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio a g g f c e a d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_38. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; fg∥ad, e,g,a are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => ge/gf = ae/ad; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ge/gf = ae/ad, ge=ga, cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab => ga/gf = ce/ad. 生成题目的FL: para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio g f a g a d c e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_39. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ab∥cd; ad∥bc; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; fg∥ad, e,f,d are on the same line, e,g,a are on the same line => fe/fg = de/da; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ca/db = ec/ed; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; fe/fg = de/da, fe=fd, ca/db = ec/ed, bd=ca => fd/fg = ce/ad. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a b c d; para a d b c; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio f d g f c e a d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_45. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ad∥bc; ab∥cd; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; ad∥bc, fg∥ad => gf∥cb; a,e,g are on the same line, c,a,e are on the same line => e,g,c are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => e,f,b are on the same line; gf∥cb, e,g,c are on the same line, e,f,b are on the same line => ce/cg = be/bf; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ac/bd = ea/eb; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ce/cg = be/bf, cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab, ac/bd = ea/eb, bd=ca => ce/cg = ce/fb. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a d b c; para a b c d; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio c e c g c e f b. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_46. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ad∥bc; ab∥cd; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; ad∥bc, fg∥ad => gf∥cb; a,e,g are on the same line, c,a,e are on the same line => e,g,c are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line, e,f,d are on the same line => e,f,b are on the same line; gf∥cb, e,g,c are on the same line, e,f,b are on the same line => ce/cg = be/bf; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => cd/ab = ec/ea; ab∥cd, c,a,e are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ac/bd = ea/eb; ab∥cd, ad∥bc => cd=ab; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ce/cg = be/bf, cd/ab = ec/ea, cd=ab, ac/bd = ea/eb, bd=ca => ce/cg = ce/fb. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a d b c; para a b c d; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? eqratio c g c e f b c e. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_37_47. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = nsquare c b a; d = psquare d a b; e = on_line e b d; f = foot f e b c; g = foot g e d c ? cong e a g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂bc; ad∥bc; ab∥cd; c,a,e are on the same line; e,b,d are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line; fe=fd; a,e,g are on the same line; ge=ga. 步骤: f,e,d are on the same line, fe=fd => f is the midpoint of e and d; g,e,a are on the same line, ge=ga => g is the midpoint of e and a; f is the midpoint of e and d, g is the midpoint of e and a => fg∥da; a,e,g are on the same line, c,a,e are on the same line => c,a,g are on the same line; e,f,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => f,b,d are on the same line; ad∥bc, fg∥ad => gf∥cb; fg∥ad, c,a,g are on the same line, f,b,d are on the same line, gf∥cb => ca/bd = cg/bf; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd => bc⟂cd; ab⟂bc, ab∥cd, bc∥ad => cd⟂da; bc⟂cd, cd⟂da, ab⟂bc => bd=ca; ca/bd = cg/bf, bd=ca => cg=bf. 生成题目的FL: perp a b b c; para a d b c; para a b c d; coll c a e; coll e b d; coll e f d; cong f e f d; coll a e g; cong g e g a ? cong c g b f. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): para a b c d, coll m a d, coll n b c, para m n a b => eqratio6 m a m d n b n c; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果AB平行于CD，M、A、D共线，N、B、C共线，且MN平行于AB，那么MA:MD = NB:NC。; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_54. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ed; ed=eb; eg=eb; g,a,c are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => eg=ec; eg=ec => ∠egc=∠gce; ∠egc=∠gce, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of eg and ac is equal to ∠ace. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e g e b; coll g a c ? eqangle e g a c a c c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_55. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ed; ed=eb; eg=eb; g,a,c are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => eg=ec; eg=ec => ∠egc=∠gce; ∠egc=∠gce, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of eg and ac is equal to ∠ace. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e g e b; coll g a c ? eqangle a c e g c e a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_66. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb. 步骤: dc=da, da=db => db=dc; ec=ed, ed=eb => eb=ec; db=dc, eb=ec => bc⟂de. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b ? perp b c d e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_73. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb. 步骤: dc=da, da=db => db=dc; ec=ed, ed=eb => eb=ec; db=dc, eb=ec => the intersection angle of bd and ce is equal to the intersection angle of be and cd. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b ? eqangle b d c e b e c d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_74. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb. 步骤: dc=da, da=db => db=dc; ec=ed, ed=eb => eb=ec; db=dc, eb=ec => the intersection angle of bd and ce is equal to the intersection angle of be and cd. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b ? eqangle c e b d c d b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_75. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠dbc=∠dfc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc => ∠dbc=∠bcd; ∠dbc=∠dfc, ∠dbc=∠bcd => ∠bcd=∠dfc; ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb, b,d,c,f are on the same circle => d,g,c,f are on the same circle; d,g,c,f are on the same circle => ∠gdc=∠gfc; ∠bcd=∠dfc, ∠gdc=∠gfc => ∠dfg equals the intersection angle of bc and dg. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; cong e g e b ? eqangle d f f g b c d g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_77. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠dbc=∠dfc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc => ∠dbc=∠bcd; ∠dbc=∠dfc, ∠dbc=∠bcd => ∠bcd=∠dfc; ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb, b,d,c,f are on the same circle => d,g,c,f are on the same circle; d,g,c,f are on the same circle => ∠gdc=∠gfc; ∠bcd=∠dfc, ∠gdc=∠gfc => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to ∠fgd. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; cong e g e b ? eqangle d f b c f g d g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_79. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bgd=∠bcd; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdg=∠bcg; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc => ∠dbc=∠bcd; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bgd=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠bcd, ∠bdg=∠bcg => ∠dga=∠bgd; b,d,c,g are on the same circle, ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => d,g,c,f are on the same circle; d,g,c,f are on the same circle => ∠dgc=∠dfc; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠dgc=∠dfc => the intersection angle of ga and cf is equal to ∠gdf; ∠dga=∠bgd, the intersection angle of ga and cf is equal to ∠gdf => the intersection angle of dg and cf is equal to the intersection angle of bg and df. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle d g c f b g d f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_81. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; a,b,f are on the same line; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠dbc=∠dfc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc => ∠dbc=∠bcd; ∠bcd=∠bfd, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠dbc=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠dfc => ∠dfc equals the intersection angle of ab and df; ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb, b,d,c,f are on the same circle => d,g,c,f are on the same circle; d,g,c,f are on the same circle => ∠dgc=∠dfc; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠dgc=∠dfc => the intersection angle of ga and cf is equal to ∠gdf; ∠dfc equals the intersection angle of ab and df, the intersection angle of ga and cf is equal to ∠gdf => the intersection angle of df and ga is equal to the intersection angle of ab and dg; the intersection angle of df and ga is equal to the intersection angle of ab and dg, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of df and ac is equal to the intersection angle of ab and dg. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; coll a b f; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle d f a c a b d g. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_43_4. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; e = midpoint e a c; d = on_circle d a c, on_line d a c; f = midpoint f b d ? cong b e b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,f,a are on the same line; df⟂ab; c,g,a are on the same line; dg⟂ac. 步骤: c,g,a are on the same line, ac⟂dg => cg⟂dg; b,f,a are on the same line, ab⟂df => bf⟂df; cg⟂dg, bf⟂df => the intersection angle of cg and df is equal to the intersection angle of dg and bf; the intersection angle of cg and df is equal to the intersection angle of dg and bf, c,g,a are on the same line, b,f,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ac and df is equal to the intersection angle of dg and ab. 生成题目的FL: coll b f a; perp d f a b; coll c g a; perp d g a c ? eqangle d f a c a b d g. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_85. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; a,b,f are on the same line; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc => ∠dbc=∠bcd; ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdg=∠bcg; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bcd=∠bfd, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠dbc=∠bcd, ∠bdg=∠bcg => ∠dga equals the intersection angle of ab and df; b,d,c,g are on the same circle, b,d,c,f are on the same circle => d,g,c,f are on the same circle; d,g,c,f are on the same circle => ∠dcg=∠dfg; dc=da => ∠cad=∠dca; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠dcg=∠dfg, ∠cad=∠dca => ∠gad=∠dfg; ∠dga equals the intersection angle of ab and df, ∠gad=∠dfg => the intersection angle of dg and ab is equal to the intersection angle of ad and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; coll a b f; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle d g a b a d f g. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_92. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; a,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: da=db => ∠dba=∠bad; ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; ∠bdc=∠bfc, a,b,f are on the same line => ∠bdc equals the intersection angle of ab and cf; ∠dba=∠bad, ∠bdc equals the intersection angle of ab and cf => the intersection angle of ad and cf is equal to the intersection angle of ab and cd. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; coll a b f ? eqangle a d c f a b c d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_94. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; a,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; ∠bdc=∠bfc, a,b,f are on the same line => ∠dba=∠dcf; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc, ec=ed, ed=eb => ∠dbe=∠cde; ∠dba=∠dcf, ∠dbe=∠cde => the intersection angle of cf and de is equal to ∠abe. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; coll a b f ? eqangle c f d e a b b e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_95. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; a,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; ∠bdc=∠bfc, a,b,f are on the same line => ∠dba=∠dcf; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc, ec=ed, ed=eb => ∠dbe=∠cde; ∠dba=∠dcf, ∠dbe=∠cde => the intersection angle of cf and de is equal to ∠abe. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; coll a b f ? eqangle d e c f b e a b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_96. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; ef=eb; a,b,f are on the same line. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; ∠bdc=∠bfc, a,b,f are on the same line => ∠dba=∠dcf; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc, ec=ed, ed=eb => ∠bde=∠dce; ∠dba=∠dcf, ∠bde=∠dce => ∠fce equals the intersection angle of ab and de. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; cong e f e b; coll a b f ? eqangle c f c e a b d e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_98. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; ec=ed; ed=eb; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bdc=∠bgc => ∠agb=∠cdb; dc=da => ∠cad=∠dca; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠cad=∠dca => ∠gad equals the intersection angle of dc and ga; ∠agb=∠cdb, ∠gad equals the intersection angle of dc and ga => the intersection angle of bd and ga is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ad; the intersection angle of bd and ga is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ad, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of bd and ac is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ad. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle b d a c b g a d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_99. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; ec=ed; ed=eb; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bdc=∠bgc => ∠agb=∠cdb; dc=da => ∠cad=∠dca; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠cad=∠dca => ∠gad equals the intersection angle of dc and ga; ∠agb=∠cdb, ∠gad equals the intersection angle of dc and ga => the intersection angle of bd and ga is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ad; the intersection angle of bd and ga is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ad, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of bd and ac is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ad. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle a c b d a d b g. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_100. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => eg=ec; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc, ec=ed, ed=eb => ∠bdc=∠dec; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bdc=∠bgc, ∠bdc=∠dec => ∠dec=∠bga; eg=ec => ∠egc=∠gce; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠egc=∠gce => the intersection angle of ec and ga is equal to ∠age; ∠dec=∠bga, the intersection angle of ec and ga is equal to ∠age => the intersection angle of de and ga is equal to ∠bge; the intersection angle of de and ga is equal to ∠bge, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ac is equal to ∠bge. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle d e a c b g e g. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_101. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => eg=ec; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc, ec=ed, ed=eb => ∠bdc=∠dec; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bdc=∠bgc, ∠bdc=∠dec => ∠dec=∠bga; eg=ec => ∠egc=∠gce; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠egc=∠gce => the intersection angle of ec and ga is equal to ∠age; ∠dec=∠bga, the intersection angle of ec and ga is equal to ∠age => the intersection angle of de and ga is equal to ∠bge; the intersection angle of de and ga is equal to ∠bge, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ac is equal to ∠bge. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle a c d e e g b g. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_102. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => eg=ec; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc, ec=ed, ed=eb => ∠bdc=∠dec; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bdc=∠bgc, ∠bdc=∠dec => ∠dec=∠bga; eg=ec => ∠egc=∠gce; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠egc=∠gce => the intersection angle of ec and ga is equal to ∠age; ∠dec=∠bga, the intersection angle of ec and ga is equal to ∠age => the intersection angle of de and ga is equal to ∠bge; the intersection angle of de and ga is equal to ∠bge, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ac and eg. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle d e b g a c e g. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_103. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => eg=ec; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc, ec=ed, ed=eb => ∠bdc=∠dec; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bdc=∠bgc, ∠bdc=∠dec => ∠dec=∠bga; eg=ec => ∠egc=∠gce; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠egc=∠gce => the intersection angle of ec and ga is equal to ∠age; ∠dec=∠bga, the intersection angle of ec and ga is equal to ∠age => the intersection angle of de and ga is equal to ∠bge; the intersection angle of de and ga is equal to ∠bge, g,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and bg is equal to the intersection angle of ac and eg. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? eqangle b g d e e g a c. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_104. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; a,b,f are on the same line; ef=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, ef=eb => b,d,c,f are on the same circle; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bcd=∠bfd; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠dbc=∠dfc; b,d,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bfc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc => ∠dbc=∠bcd; b,a,f are on the same line, ∠bcd=∠bfd, ∠dbc=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠dfc => ∠dfc=∠afd; da=db => ∠dba=∠bad; b,a,f are on the same line, ∠dba=∠bad, ∠bdc=∠bfc => ∠dcf=∠fad; ∠dfc=∠afd, ∠dcf=∠fad => fc=fa. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; coll a b f; cong e f e b ? cong f c f a. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_38_105. 原题FL: c a = segment c a; b = on_tline b c c a; d = foot d c a b ? eqangle a c a d c b c d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: dc=da; da=db; ec=ed; ed=eb; g,a,c are on the same line; eg=eb. 步骤: ec=ed, ed=eb, eg=eb => g,b,d,c are on the same circle; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bgd=∠bcd; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdg=∠bcg; g,b,d,c are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bgc; dc=da, da=db => db=dc; db=dc => ∠dbc=∠bcd; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bgd=∠bcd, ∠dbc=∠bcd, ∠bdg=∠bcg => ∠dga=∠bgd; dc=da => ∠dac=∠acd; a,c,g are on the same line, ∠bdc=∠bgc, ∠dac=∠acd => ∠dag=∠gbd; ∠dga=∠bgd, ∠dag=∠gbd => ga=gb. 生成题目的FL: cong d c d a; cong d a d b; cong e c e d; cong e d e b; coll g a c; cong e g e b ? cong g a g b. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_41. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; fa=fb; g,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; d,f,g are on the same line, df⟂ab => gd⟂ab; d is the midpoint of a and b, gd⟂ab => ga=gb. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; cong f a f b; coll g f d ? cong g a g b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_39_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = on_circle d a b, on_circle d c b; e = on_line e d a, on_circle e a d; f = on_line f d c, on_circle f c d ? coll e b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: e,a,c are on the same line; fe∥ab; b,f,c are on the same line; ge∥ad; d,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ab, b,f,c are on the same line, e,a,c are on the same line => cb/ca = cf/ce; eg∥ad, e,a,c are on the same line, d,g,c are on the same line => ce/cg = ca/cd; cb/ca = cf/ce, ce/cg = ca/cd => cf/cg = cb/cd. 生成题目的FL: coll e a c; para f e a b; coll b f c; para g e a d; coll d g c ? eqratio f c g c b c d c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_39_42. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = on_circle d a b, on_circle d c b; e = on_line e d a, on_circle e a d; f = on_line f d c, on_circle f c d ? coll e b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: e,a,c are on the same line; fe∥ab; b,f,c are on the same line; ge∥ad; d,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: ef∥ab, b,f,c are on the same line, e,a,c are on the same line => bc/bf = ac/ae; eg∥ad, e,a,c are on the same line, d,g,c are on the same line => ac/ae = dc/dg; bc/bf = ac/ae, ac/ae = dc/dg => dc/dg = bc/bf; dc/dg = bc/bf, d,g,c are on the same line, b,f,c are on the same line => db∥gf. 生成题目的FL: coll e a c; para f e a b; coll b f c; para g e a d; coll d g c ? para b d f g. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio O A A C O B B D, coll O A C, coll O B D, ncoll A B C, sameside A O C B O D => para A B C D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 若OA:AC = OB:BD，且O、A、C共线，O、B、D共线，A、B、C不共线，且A、O、C和B、O、D在同侧，则AB平行于CD【平行线分线段成比例定理+逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_26. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa. 步骤: da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bea=∠bdf. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a ? eqangle b e a e b d d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_27. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa. 步骤: da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bea=∠bdf. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a ? eqangle a e b e d f b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_28. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa. 步骤: da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠ebd equals the intersection angle of ae and df. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a ? eqangle b e b d a e d f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_38. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; be⟂ac; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂be; ab⟂df, ag⟂be => the intersection angle of df and be is equal to ∠bag; the intersection angle of df and be is equal to ∠bag, a,g,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of df and be is equal to ∠bac. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; perp b e a c; cong f b f a; coll a g c ? eqangle d f b e a b a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_42. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; fb=fa; a,b,f are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠acb=∠fdb; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠fdb=∠acb => ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc => ∠abd=∠ebc. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong f b f a; coll a b f; coll a g c ? eqangle a b b d b e b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_43. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; fb=fa; a,b,f are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠acb=∠fdb; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠fdb=∠acb => ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc => ∠abd=∠ebc. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong f b f a; coll a b f; coll a g c ? eqangle b d a b b c b e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_44. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; be⟂ac; de=da; fb=fa; a,b,f are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of ag and be; da=db, de=da => de=db; da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; de=db => ∠bed=∠dbe; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dbe equals the intersection angle of df and ae; ∠bed=∠dbe, ∠dbe equals the intersection angle of df and ae => the intersection angle of df and ae is equal to ∠bed; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of ag and be, the intersection angle of df and ae is equal to ∠bed => ∠bae equals the intersection angle of ag and de; ∠bae equals the intersection angle of ag and de, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠bae equals the intersection angle of ac and de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; cong f b f a; coll a b f; coll a g c ? eqangle a b a e a c d e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_48. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => bf=gf; bf=gf => ∠fgb=∠gbf; ∠fgb=∠gbf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of fg and be is equal to ∠eba. 生成题目的FL: perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle f g b e b e a b. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_49. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => bf=gf; bf=gf => ∠fgb=∠gbf; ∠fgb=∠gbf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of fg and be is equal to ∠eba. 生成题目的FL: perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle b e f g a b b e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_52. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; b,e,g are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; b,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, f,b,a are on the same line, ab⟂df, be⟂ac => ∠bgc=∠bfd; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bca=∠bdf; c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bca=∠bdf => ∠bcg=∠bdf; ∠bgc=∠bfd, ∠bcg=∠bdf => bg/bc = bf/bd; bg/bc = bf/bd, fb=fa, da=db, de=da => bg/bc = af/de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll b e g; coll a g c ? eqratio b g b c a f d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_53. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; b,e,g are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; b,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, f,b,a are on the same line, ab⟂df, be⟂ac => ∠bgc=∠bfd; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bca=∠bdf; c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bca=∠bdf => ∠bcg=∠bdf; ∠bgc=∠bfd, ∠bcg=∠bdf => bg/bc = bf/bd; bg/bc = bf/bd, fb=fa, da=db, de=da => bg/bc = af/de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll b e g; coll a g c ? eqratio b c b g d e a f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_54. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; b,e,g are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; b,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, f,b,a are on the same line, ab⟂df, be⟂ac => ∠bgc=∠bfd; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bca=∠bdf; c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bca=∠bdf => ∠bcg=∠bdf; ∠bgc=∠bfd, ∠bcg=∠bdf => bg/bf = bc/bd; bg/bf = bc/bd, fb=fa, da=db, de=da => bg/af = bc/de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll b e g; coll a g c ? eqratio b g a f b c d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_60. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; b,e,g are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; b,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, f,b,a are on the same line, ab⟂df, be⟂ac => ∠bgc=∠bfd; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bca=∠bdf; c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bca=∠bdf => ∠bcg=∠bdf; ∠bgc=∠bfd, ∠bcg=∠bdf => cb/cg = db/df; cb/cg = db/df, da=db, de=da => cb/cg = de/df. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll b e g; coll a g c ? eqratio b c c g d e d f. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_62. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; be⟂ac; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, f,b,a are on the same line, ab⟂df, be⟂ac => ∠age=∠afd; da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠aeb=∠adf; b,e,g are on the same line, ∠aeb=∠adf => ∠aeg=∠adf; ∠age=∠afd, ∠aeg=∠adf => ag/ae = af/ad; ag/ae = af/ad, de=da => ag/ae = af/de. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqratio a g a e a f d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_69. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; be⟂ac; de=da; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, f,b,a are on the same line, ab⟂df, be⟂ac => ∠age=∠afd; da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠aeb=∠adf; b,e,g are on the same line, ∠aeb=∠adf => ∠aeg=∠adf; ∠age=∠afd, ∠aeg=∠adf => ag/af = eg/df. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqratio a f a g d f e g. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
