原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_74. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; b,e,g are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; b,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, f,b,a are on the same line, ab⟂df, be⟂ac => ∠bgc=∠dfa; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bca=∠fda; c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bca=∠fda => ∠bcg=∠fda; ∠bgc=∠dfa, ∠bcg=∠fda => ∠gbc=∠daf; ∠gbc=∠daf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of be and ad is equal to ∠cba. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll b e g; coll a g c ? eqangle b e a d b c a b. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_75. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; b,e,g are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; b,e,g are on the same line, c,a,g are on the same line, f,b,a are on the same line, ab⟂df, be⟂ac => ∠bgc=∠dfa; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bca=∠fda; c,a,g are on the same line, ∠bca=∠fda => ∠bcg=∠fda; ∠bgc=∠dfa, ∠bcg=∠fda => ∠gbc=∠daf; ∠gbc=∠daf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line => the intersection angle of be and ad is equal to ∠cba. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll b e g; coll a g c ? eqangle a d b e a b b c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_76. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠aeb=∠acb; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠eac=∠ebc; c,a,g are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠acb=∠aeb => ∠gcb=∠aeg; b,e,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, ∠ebc=∠eac => ∠gbc=∠eag; ∠gcb=∠aeg, ∠gbc=∠eag => gc/ge = gb/ga. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqratio c g e g b g a g. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_77. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠aeb=∠acb; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠eac=∠ebc; c,a,g are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠acb=∠aeb => ∠gcb=∠aeg; b,e,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, ∠ebc=∠eac => ∠gbc=∠eag; ∠gcb=∠aeg, ∠gbc=∠eag => gc/ge = gb/ga. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqratio e g c g a g b g. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_81. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠bac=∠bec; c,a,g are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠ace=∠abe => ∠gce=∠abg; b,e,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, ∠bec=∠bac => ∠gec=∠bag; ∠gce=∠abg, ∠gec=∠bag => cg/ce = bg/ba. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqratio c e c g a b b g. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_82. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠bac=∠bec; c,a,g are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠ace=∠abe => ∠gce=∠abg; b,e,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, ∠bec=∠bac => ∠gec=∠bag; ∠gce=∠abg, ∠gec=∠bag => gc/gb = ce/ab. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqratio c g b g c e a b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_84. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠bac=∠bec; c,a,g are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠ace=∠abe => ∠gce=∠abg; b,e,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, ∠bec=∠bac => ∠gec=∠bag; ∠gce=∠abg, ∠gec=∠bag => eg/ec = ag/ab. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqratio e g c e a g a b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_85. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠bac=∠bec; c,a,g are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ∠ace=∠abe => ∠gce=∠abg; b,e,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, ∠bec=∠bac => ∠gec=∠bag; ∠gce=∠abg, ∠gec=∠bag => eg/ec = ag/ab. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqratio c e e g a b a g. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_86. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; de=da; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bea=∠bdf; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => bf=gf; bf=gf => ∠fgb=∠gbf; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠acb=∠fdb; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠fdb=∠acb => ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc => ∠abe=∠dbc; ∠fgb=∠gbf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠abe=∠dbc => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of be and fg; ∠bea=∠bdf, ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of be and fg => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ae and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle d f b c a e f g. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_87. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; de=da; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bea=∠bdf; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => bf=gf; bf=gf => ∠fgb=∠gbf; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠acb=∠fdb; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠fdb=∠acb => ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc => ∠abe=∠dbc; ∠fgb=∠gbf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠abe=∠dbc => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of be and fg; ∠bea=∠bdf, ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of be and fg => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ae and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle b c d f f g a e. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_88. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; de=da; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bea=∠bdf; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => bf=gf; bf=gf => ∠fgb=∠gbf; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠acb=∠fdb; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠fdb=∠acb => ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc => ∠abe=∠dbc; ∠fgb=∠gbf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠abe=∠dbc => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of be and fg; ∠bea=∠bdf, ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of be and fg => the intersection angle of df and ae is equal to the intersection angle of bc and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle d f a e b c f g. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_89. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; de=da; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, de=da => d is the circumcenter of Δeba; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δeba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠bea=∠bdf; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => bf=gf; bf=gf => ∠fgb=∠gbf; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠acb=∠fdb; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠fdb=∠acb => ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, ∠fdb equals the intersection angle of ag and bc => ∠abe=∠dbc; ∠fgb=∠gbf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠abe=∠dbc => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of be and fg; ∠bea=∠bdf, ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of be and fg => the intersection angle of df and ae is equal to the intersection angle of bc and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle a e d f f g b c. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_94. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; db=dc, da=db => dc=da; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ag; db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; dc=da => ∠acd=∠dac; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠dac, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd => ∠abe=∠bcd; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace, ∠abe=∠bcd => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce; ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ag, ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce => ∠bdc equals the intersection angle of df and ce. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c ? eqangle b d c d d f c e. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_95. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; db=dc, da=db => dc=da; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ag; db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; dc=da => ∠acd=∠dac; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠dac, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd => ∠abe=∠bcd; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace, ∠abe=∠bcd => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce; ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ag, ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce => ∠bdc equals the intersection angle of df and ce. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c ? eqangle c d b d c e d f. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_96. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; db=dc, da=db => dc=da; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ag; db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; dc=da => ∠acd=∠dac; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠dac, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd => ∠abe=∠bcd; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace, ∠abe=∠bcd => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce; ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ag, ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce => ∠bdf=∠dce. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c ? eqangle b d d f c d c e. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_97. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; be⟂ac; a,b,f are on the same line; fb=fa; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; db=dc, da=db => dc=da; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac => ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ag; db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; dc=da => ∠acd=∠dac; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠dac, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd => ∠abe=∠bcd; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace, ∠abe=∠bcd => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce; ∠dbc equals the intersection angle of df and ag, ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce => ∠bdf=∠dce. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; coll a b f; cong f b f a; coll a g c ? eqangle d f b d c e c d. 步骤长度: 15. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_100. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; de=da; fb=fa; a,b,f are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂be; ab⟂df, ag⟂be => the intersection angle of df and ag is equal to ∠abe; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => bf=gf; bf=gf => ∠fgb=∠gbf; db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠fgb=∠gbf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace => the intersection angle of ag and ce is equal to the intersection angle of be and fg; ∠abe equals the intersection angle of df and ag, the intersection angle of ag and ce is equal to the intersection angle of be and fg => the intersection angle of df and ab is equal to the intersection angle of ce and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; cong f b f a; coll a b f; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle d f a b c e f g. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_101. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; de=da; fb=fa; a,b,f are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂be; ab⟂df, ag⟂be => the intersection angle of df and ag is equal to ∠abe; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => bf=gf; bf=gf => ∠fgb=∠gbf; db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠fgb=∠gbf, b,e,g are on the same line, a,b,f are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace => the intersection angle of ag and ce is equal to the intersection angle of be and fg; ∠abe equals the intersection angle of df and ag, the intersection angle of ag and ce is equal to the intersection angle of be and fg => the intersection angle of df and ab is equal to the intersection angle of ce and fg. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; cong f b f a; coll a b f; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle a b d f f g c e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_102. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; db=dc; be⟂ac; de=da; fb=fa; a,b,f are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line; b,e,g are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂be; ab⟂df, ag⟂be => the intersection angle of df and ag is equal to ∠abe; db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠bac=∠bec; a,g,c are on the same line, b,e,g are on the same line, ac⟂be => ag⟂gb; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; ag⟂gb, f is the midpoint of b and a => af=gf; af=gf => ∠fga=∠gaf; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠bac=∠bec, ∠fga=∠gaf, a,b,f are on the same line => ∠agf=∠bec; ∠abe equals the intersection angle of df and ag, ∠agf=∠bec => ∠dfg equals the intersection angle of ab and ce. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d b d c; perp b e a c; cong d e d a; cong f b f a; coll a b f; coll a g c; coll b e g ? eqangle d f f g a b c e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; perp A B B C, midp M A C => cong A M B M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 在直角三角形中，斜边的中线等于斜边的一半。【直角三角形斜边中线性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 6

原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_108. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; be⟂ac; fb=fa; a,b,f are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; da=db, db=dc => dc=da; da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; dc=da => ∠acd=∠dac; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠dac, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd => ∠abe=∠bcd; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace, ∠abe=∠bcd => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc => ∠dag equals the intersection angle of df and bc; ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce, ∠dag equals the intersection angle of df and bc => the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to ∠cdf. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; cong f b f a; coll a b f; coll a g c ? eqangle c e a d c d d f. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_40_109. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = eqdistance e b a d, on_line e b c; f = on_line f a b, on_line f d e; g = on_line g b c, on_pline g d a b ? cong d f f e. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; be⟂ac; fb=fa; a,b,f are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => a,b,e,c are on the same circle; a,b,e,c are on the same circle => ∠abe=∠ace; da=db, fb=fa => ab⟂df; a,g,c are on the same line, be⟂ac, ab⟂df => the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag; da=db, db=dc => dc=da; da=db, db=dc => d is the circumcenter of Δcba; dc=da => ∠acd=∠dac; a,b,f are on the same line, fb=fa => f is the midpoint of b and a; d is the circumcenter of Δcba, f is the midpoint of b and a => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠acd=∠dac, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd; the intersection angle of ab and df is equal to the intersection angle of be and ag, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd => ∠abe=∠bcd; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠abe=∠ace, ∠abe=∠bcd => ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce; a,g,c are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of df and bc => ∠dag equals the intersection angle of df and bc; ∠bcd equals the intersection angle of ag and ce, ∠dag equals the intersection angle of df and bc => the intersection angle of ce and ad is equal to ∠cdf. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; cong f b f a; coll a b f; coll a g c ? eqangle a d c e d f c d. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_28. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bd⟂ac; eb=ec; ea=eb; ga=gd; gd=gc. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb => ea=ec; ga=gd, gd=gc => gc=ga; ea=ec, gc=ga => ac⟂eg; ac⟂eg, bd⟂ac => eg∥bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b d a c; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong g a g d; cong g d g c ? para e g b d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_30. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; eb=ec; hb=hd; hd=hc. 步骤: hb=hd, hd=hc => hc=hb; eb=ec, hc=hb => cb⟂eh; cb⟂eh, ad⟂bc => eh∥ad. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; cong e b e c; cong h b h d; cong h d h c ? para e h a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_32. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; fa=fb; fb=fd; ga=gd. 步骤: fa=fb, fb=fd => fd=fa; fd=fa, ga=gd => da⟂fg; da⟂fg, ad⟂bc => fg∥bc. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; cong f a f b; cong f b f d; cong g a g d ? para f g b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_34. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bd⟂ac; eb=ec; ea=eb; ga=gd; gd=gc. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb => ea=ec; ga=gd, gd=gc => gc=ga; ea=ec, gc=ga => ∠aeg=∠gec; ea=ec, gc=ga => ac⟂eg; ∠aeg=∠gec, ac⟂eg, bd⟂ac => the intersection angle of ae and bd is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ce. 生成题目的FL: perp b d a c; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong g a g d; cong g d g c ? eqangle a e b d b d c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_35. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bd⟂ac; eb=ec; ea=eb; ga=gd; gd=gc. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb => ea=ec; ga=gd, gd=gc => gc=ga; ea=ec, gc=ga => ∠aeg=∠gec; ea=ec, gc=ga => ac⟂eg; ∠aeg=∠gec, ac⟂eg, bd⟂ac => the intersection angle of ae and bd is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ce. 生成题目的FL: perp b d a c; cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong g a g d; cong g d g c ? eqangle b d a e c e b d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_36. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: eb=ec; ea=eb; ga=gd; gd=gc. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb => ea=ec; ga=gd, gd=gc => gc=ga; ea=ec, gc=ga => ∠eag=∠gce. 生成题目的FL: cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong g a g d; cong g d g c ? eqangle a e a g c g c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_37. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: eb=ec; ea=eb; ga=gd; gd=gc. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb => ea=ec; ga=gd, gd=gc => gc=ga; ea=ec, gc=ga => ∠gae=∠ecg. 生成题目的FL: cong e b e c; cong e a e b; cong g a g d; cong g d g c ? eqangle a g a e c e c g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_40. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bd⟂ac; ga=gd; gd=gc; eb=ec; ea=eb. 步骤: eb=ec, ea=eb => ea=ec; ga=gd, gd=gc => gc=ga; ea=ec, gc=ga => ∠ega=∠cge; ea=ec, gc=ga => ac⟂eg; ∠ega=∠cge, ac⟂eg, bd⟂ac => the intersection angle of bd and ag is equal to the intersection angle of cg and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp b d a c; cong g a g d; cong g d g c; cong e b e c; cong e a e b ? eqangle b d a g c g b d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_70. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; fa=fb; fb=fd; ga=gd. 步骤: fa=fb, fb=fd => fd=fa; fd=fa, ga=gd => ∠dfg=∠gfa; fd=fa, ga=gd => da⟂fg; ∠dfg=∠gfa, da⟂fg, ad⟂bc => the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to the intersection angle of bc and af. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; cong f a f b; cong f b f d; cong g a g d ? eqangle d f b c b c a f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_41_72. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; m = midpoint m a b; c = on_circle c m a; d = angle_mirror d a b c; e = midpoint e a d; f = on_line f b d, on_line f a c ? para c e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂bc; ga=gd; fa=fb; fb=fd. 步骤: fa=fb, fb=fd => fd=fa; fd=fa, ga=gd => ∠dgf=∠fga; fd=fa, ga=gd => da⟂fg; ∠dgf=∠fga, da⟂fg, ad⟂bc => the intersection angle of dg and bc is equal to the intersection angle of bc and ag. 生成题目的FL: perp a d b c; cong g a g d; cong f a f b; cong f b f d ? eqangle d g b c b c a g. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_43_13. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; e = midpoint e a c; d = on_circle d a c, on_line d a c; f = midpoint f b d ? cong b e b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cae=∠dab; b,f,a are on the same line; df⟂ab; c,g,a are on the same line; dg⟂ac. 步骤: c,g,a are on the same line, dg⟂ac => ∠cgd=∠dgc; b,f,a are on the same line, c,g,a are on the same line, dg⟂ac, df⟂ab => ∠dfa=∠dga; ∠dfa=∠dga => d,f,g,a are on the same circle; d,f,g,a are on the same circle => ∠dgf=∠daf; c,g,a are on the same line, ∠cae=∠dab, ∠dgf=∠daf, b,f,a are on the same line => ∠dgf equals the intersection angle of cg and ea; ∠cgd=∠dgc, ∠dgf equals the intersection angle of cg and ea => ∠cgf equals the intersection angle of dg and ea; ∠cgf equals the intersection angle of dg and ea, c,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ac and fg is equal to the intersection angle of dg and ae. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a e a d a b; coll b f a; perp d f a b; coll c g a; perp d g a c ? eqangle a c f g d g a e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_0. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fb=fc; fa=fb; fg=fc; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠agc=∠abc; ∠agc=∠abc, c,d,g are on the same line => the intersection angle of ag and cd is equal to ∠abc. 生成题目的FL: cong f b f c; cong f a f b; cong f g f c; coll c d g ? eqangle a g c d a b b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_1. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fb=fc; fa=fb; fg=fc; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠agc=∠abc; ∠agc=∠abc, c,d,g are on the same line => the intersection angle of ag and cd is equal to ∠abc. 生成题目的FL: cong f b f c; cong f a f b; cong f g f c; coll c d g ? eqangle c d a g b c a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fb=fc; fa=fb; fg=fc; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; ∠acg=∠abg, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠acd=∠abg. 生成题目的FL: cong f b f c; cong f a f b; cong f g f c; coll c d g ? eqangle c d a c b g a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_14. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, a,d,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠abe=∠dca. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; coll b h e ? eqangle a b b e c d a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_15. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, a,d,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠abe=∠dca. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; coll b h e ? eqangle b e a b a c c d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_16. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of cd and be. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; coll b h e ? eqangle a b a c c d b e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_17. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠bac equals the intersection angle of cd and be. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; coll b h e ? eqangle a c a b b e c d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => cd/ca = be/ba. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c ? eqratio c d a c b e a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_58. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,h are on the same line, d,a,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hda=∠hea; ∠hda=∠hea => a,h,d,e are on the same circle; a,h,d,e are on the same circle => ∠ahd=∠aed; ∠ahd=∠aed, c,d,h are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ah and cd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and de. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqangle a h c d a c d e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_65. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,h are on the same line, d,a,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hda=∠hea; ∠hda=∠hea => a,h,d,e are on the same circle; a,h,d,e are on the same circle => ∠ahe=∠ade; ∠ahe=∠ade, b,h,e are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line => ∠hab=∠bed. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqangle a b a h d e b e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_66. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => ac/ab = ad/ae; d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠bea; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠hbd=∠eba; ∠hdb=∠bea, ∠hbd=∠eba => dh/ae = bh/ba; ac/ab = ad/ae, dh/ae = bh/ba => ac/bh = da/dh. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio a c b h a d d h. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_67. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => ac/ab = ad/ae; d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠bea; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠hbd=∠eba; ∠hdb=∠bea, ∠hbd=∠eba => dh/ae = bh/ba; ac/ab = ad/ae, dh/ae = bh/ba => ac/bh = da/dh. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio b h a c d h a d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_68. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => cd/be = ac/ab; d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠bea; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠hbd=∠eba; ∠hdb=∠bea, ∠hbd=∠eba => bh/ba = bd/be; cd/be = ac/ab, bh/ba = bd/be => ac/bh = dc/db. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio a c b h c d b d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_69. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => cd/be = ac/ab; d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠bea; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠hbd=∠eba; ∠hdb=∠bea, ∠hbd=∠eba => bh/ba = bd/be; cd/be = ac/ab, bh/ba = bd/be => ac/bh = dc/db. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio b h a c b d c d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_70. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; fg=fc; c,d,g are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line; c,d,h are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; b,d,a are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, ∠acg=∠abg, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠gbd=∠dbh; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line => d,g,h are on the same line; ∠gbd=∠dbh, d,g,h are on the same line => dg/dh = bg/bh. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; cong f g f c; coll c d g; coll b h e; coll c d h ? eqratio d g d h b g b h. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 a b a d a d a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqratio6 d b d c a b a c; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点在角平分线上，那么这个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比.【角平分线定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_74. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? cong b g b h. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_75. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; b,h,e are on the same line; c,d,h are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; d,c,g are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠aeb; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; b,d,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, b,h,e are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠gbd=∠abe; ∠gdb=∠aeb, ∠gbd=∠abe => gd/ae = bg/ba; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh; gd/ae = bg/ba, bg=bh => dg/ae = bh/ba. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll b h e; coll c d h ? eqratio d g a e b h a b. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_76. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; b,h,e are on the same line; c,d,h are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; d,c,g are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠gdb=∠aeb; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; b,d,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, b,h,e are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠gbd=∠abe; ∠gdb=∠aeb, ∠gbd=∠abe => gd/ae = bg/ba; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh; gd/ae = bg/ba, bg=bh => dg/ae = bh/ba. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll b h e; coll c d h ? eqratio a e d g a b b h. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_87. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line; c,d,h are on the same line; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; d,c,g are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh => ∠gdb=∠hec; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; b,d,a are on the same line, c,d,h are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠gbd=∠hce; ∠gdb=∠hec, ∠gbd=∠hce => bg/bd = ch/ce; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh; bg/bd = ch/ce, bg=bh => bh/bd = ch/ce. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll b h e; coll c d h; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c ? eqratio b h b d c h c e. 步骤长度: 11. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_89. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line; c,d,h are on the same line. 步骤: a,c,e are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, be⟂ac => ∠aeb=∠hec; a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; c,d,h are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, a,d,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠abe=∠hce; ∠aeb=∠hec, ∠abe=∠hce => ea/eh = ab/ch. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll b h e; coll c d h ? eqratio a e h e a b c h. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_90. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line; c,d,h are on the same line. 步骤: a,c,e are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, be⟂ac => ∠aeb=∠hec; a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; c,d,h are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, a,d,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠abe=∠hce; ∠aeb=∠hec, ∠abe=∠hce => ea/eh = ab/ch. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll b h e; coll c d h ? eqratio h e a e c h a b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_93. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠ceh; a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, c,d,h are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca => ∠hbd=∠ech; ∠hdb=∠ceh, ∠hbd=∠ech => hd/he = hb/hc; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh; hd/he = hb/hc, bg=bh => hd/he = bg/ch. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio d h h e b g c h. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_94. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠ceh; a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, c,d,h are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca => ∠hbd=∠ech; ∠hdb=∠ceh, ∠hbd=∠ech => hd/he = hb/hc; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh; hd/he = hb/hc, bg=bh => hd/he = bg/ch. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio h e d h c h b g. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_97. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line; c,d,h are on the same line. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠hec; a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; a,d,b are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, c,d,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh => ∠cad=∠ehc; ∠cda=∠hec, ∠cad=∠ehc => cd/ce = ca/ch. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll b h e; coll c d h ? eqratio c e c d c h a c. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_100. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠agc=∠abc; b,d,a are on the same line, g,c,d are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc => ∠dbc=∠agd; a,d,b are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠dcb=∠gad; ∠dbc=∠agd, ∠dcb=∠gad => bd/bc = gd/ga. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c ? eqratio b d b c d g a g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_101. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠agc=∠abc; b,d,a are on the same line, g,c,d are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc => ∠dbc=∠agd; a,d,b are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠dcb=∠gad; ∠dbc=∠agd, ∠dcb=∠gad => bd/bc = gd/ga. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c ? eqratio b c b d a g d g. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_102. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠agc=∠abc; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; b,d,a are on the same line, g,c,d are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc => ∠dbc=∠agd; a,d,b are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠dcb=∠gad; ∠dbc=∠agd, ∠dcb=∠gad => db/dg = bc/ga; d,c,g are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, d,c,h are on the same line, cd⟂ab => ∠gdb=∠bdh; a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; b,d,a are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, ∠acg=∠abg, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠gbd=∠dbh; ∠gdb=∠bdh, ∠gbd=∠dbh => dg=dh; db/dg = bc/ga, dg=dh => db/dh = bc/ag. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio b d d h b c a g. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
