原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_106. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bac=∠bac; a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => ac/ab = ad/ae; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bac=∠bac => ∠dae=∠bac; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠dae=∠bac => da/de = ca/cb. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a c a b a c; coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c ? eqratio a d d e a c b c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_107. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bac=∠bac; a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => ac/ab = ad/ae; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bac=∠bac => ∠dae=∠bac; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠dae=∠bac => da/de = ca/cb. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a c a b a c; coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c ? eqratio d e a d b c a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_108. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bac=∠bac; a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => ac/ab = ad/ae; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bac=∠bac => ∠dae=∠bac; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠dae=∠bac => ad/ac = de/bc. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a c a b a c; coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c ? eqratio a d a c d e b c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_109. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bac=∠bac; a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => ac/ab = ad/ae; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bac=∠bac => ∠dae=∠bac; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠dae=∠bac => ad/ac = de/bc. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a c a b a c; coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c ? eqratio a c a d b c d e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_112. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; ∠eba=∠eba; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠bea; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠hbd=∠eba; ∠hdb=∠bea, ∠hbd=∠eba => bh/ba = bd/be; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠eba => ∠hba=∠ebd; bh/ba = bd/be, ∠hba=∠ebd => hb/ha = db/de; a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh; hb/ha = db/de, bg=bh => bg/ah = db/de. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; eqangle b e a b b e a b; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio b g a h b d d e. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5

eqratio a h b g d e b d. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_118. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; fg=fc. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cdb=∠ceb; ∠cdb=∠ceb => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; b,c,d,e are on the same circle => ∠bce=∠bde; a,d,b are on the same line, ∠bce=∠bde, a,c,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ac is equal to the intersection angle of ad and bc; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠cag=∠cbg; the intersection angle of de and ac is equal to the intersection angle of ad and bc, ∠cag=∠cbg => the intersection angle of de and ag is equal to the intersection angle of ad and bg; the intersection angle of de and ag is equal to the intersection angle of ad and bg, a,d,b are on the same line => the intersection angle of de and ag is equal to ∠abg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; cong f g f c ? eqangle d e a g a b b g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_120. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line; fb=fc; fa=fb; fg=fc; c,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠agc=∠abc; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cdb=∠ceb; ∠cdb=∠ceb => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; b,c,d,e are on the same circle => ∠bce=∠bde; d,c,h are on the same line, d,a,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hda=∠hea; ∠hda=∠hea => a,h,d,e are on the same circle; a,h,d,e are on the same circle => ∠ahd=∠aed; ∠agc=∠abc, c,d,g are on the same line, ∠bce=∠bde, a,c,e are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠ahd=∠aed, c,d,h are on the same line => the intersection angle of cd and ah is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd; a,d,b are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠dcb=∠gad; the intersection angle of cd and ah is equal to the intersection angle of ag and cd, ∠dcb=∠gad => ∠cda equals the intersection angle of ah and bc; ∠cda equals the intersection angle of ah and bc, a,d,b are on the same line => the intersection angle of cd and ab is equal to the intersection angle of ah and bc. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll c d h; coll b h e; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; cong f g f c; coll c d g ? eqangle c d a b a h b c. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

eqangle a b c d b c a h. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_122. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; ∠eba=∠eba; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => cd/be = ac/ab; d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠bea; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠hbd=∠eba; ∠hdb=∠bea, ∠hbd=∠eba => bh/ba = bd/be; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠eba => ∠hba=∠ebd; bh/ba = bd/be, ∠hba=∠ebd => ah/ab = ed/eb; cd/be = ac/ab, ah/ab = ed/eb => ac/ah = dc/de. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; eqangle b e a b b e a b; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio a c a h c d d e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_123. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; ∠eba=∠eba; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => cd/be = ac/ab; d,c,h are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠hdb=∠bea; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line => ∠hbd=∠eba; ∠hdb=∠bea, ∠hbd=∠eba => bh/ba = bd/be; b,e,h are on the same line, b,d,a are on the same line, ∠eba=∠eba => ∠hba=∠ebd; bh/ba = bd/be, ∠hba=∠ebd => ah/ab = ed/eb; cd/be = ac/ab, ah/ab = ed/eb => ac/ah = dc/de. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; eqangle b e a b b e a b; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqratio a h a c d e c d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_124. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc. 步骤: d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => cd/be = ad/ae; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠agc=∠abc; b,d,a are on the same line, g,c,d are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc => ∠dbc=∠agd; a,d,b are on the same line, ∠agc=∠abc, c,d,g are on the same line => ∠dcb=∠gad; ∠dbc=∠agd, ∠dcb=∠gad => cd/cb = ad/ag; cd/be = ad/ae, cd/cb = ad/ag => ae/ag = be/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c ? eqratio a e a g b e b c. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_132. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bac=∠bac; a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; a,c,e are on the same line; be⟂ac; b,h,e are on the same line; c,d,h are on the same line. 步骤: a,c,e are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line, be⟂ac => ∠aeb=∠hec; a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca; c,d,h are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of ad and bh is equal to ∠dca, a,d,b are on the same line, b,h,e are on the same line => ∠abe=∠hce; ∠aeb=∠hec, ∠abe=∠hce => ea/eh = ab/ch; d,a,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, be⟂ac, cd⟂ab => ∠cda=∠aeb; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠cad=∠eab; ∠cda=∠aeb, ∠cad=∠eab => ac/ab = ad/ae; a,d,b are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bac=∠bac => ∠dae=∠bac; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠dae=∠bac => ed/ea = bc/ba; ea/eh = ab/ch, ed/ea = bc/ba => ch/cb = eh/ed. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a c a b a c; coll a d b; perp c d a b; coll a c e; perp b e a c; coll b h e; coll c d h ? eqratio c h b c h e d e. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5

eqratio b c c h d e h e. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_135. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh; d,c,g are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, d,c,h are on the same line, cd⟂ab => ∠gdb=∠bdh; g,c,d are on the same line, d,c,h are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgd=∠dhb; ∠gdb=∠bdh, ∠bgd=∠dhb => ∠dbg=∠hbd; b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dbg=∠hbd, a,d,b are on the same line => ∠hba=∠abg; bg=bh, ∠hba=∠abg => ∠bha=∠agb; ∠bha=∠agb, b,h,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of be and ag is equal to the intersection angle of ah and bg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqangle b e a g a h b g. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C, cong A B P Q => contri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角和夹边以外的一个边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等。; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_44_136. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; f = circle f a b c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c; p = on_circle p f a, on_line p a a1; q = on_circle q f a, on_line q a s ? para b c p q. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; cd⟂ab; be⟂ac; fb=fc; fa=fb; c,d,g are on the same line; fg=fc; c,d,h are on the same line; b,h,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂cd => ad⟂cd; b,e,h are on the same line, be⟂ac => bh⟂ac; ad⟂cd, bh⟂ac => ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh; fb=fc, fg=fc, fa=fb => a,c,g,b are on the same circle; a,c,g,b are on the same circle => ∠acg=∠abg; c,d,h are on the same line, c,d,g are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgh=∠ghb; ∠bgh=∠ghb => bg=bh; d,c,g are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, d,c,h are on the same line, cd⟂ab => ∠gdb=∠bdh; g,c,d are on the same line, d,c,h are on the same line, b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dac equals the intersection angle of cd and bh, a,d,b are on the same line, ∠acg=∠abg => ∠bgd=∠dhb; ∠gdb=∠bdh, ∠bgd=∠dhb => ∠dbg=∠hbd; b,e,h are on the same line, ∠dbg=∠hbd, a,d,b are on the same line => ∠hba=∠abg; bg=bh, ∠hba=∠abg => ∠bha=∠agb; ∠bha=∠agb, b,h,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of be and ag is equal to the intersection angle of ah and bg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; perp c d a b; perp b e a c; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll c d g; cong f g f c; coll c d h; coll b h e ? eqangle a g b e b g a h. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C, cong A B P Q => contri2 A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角和夹边以外的一个边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等。; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_39. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=da; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; h,e,f are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, ef⟂ac => hf⟂ga; db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; d,f,g are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, df⟂ab => gf⟂ha; hf⟂ga, gf⟂ha => ∠hfg=∠gah; ∠hfg=∠gah, h,f,e are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line => ∠efd=∠cab. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d a; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll a g c; coll g f d; coll h f e; coll h a b ? eqangle e f d f a c a b. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_40. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=da; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; h,e,f are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, ef⟂ac => hf⟂ga; db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; d,f,g are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, df⟂ab => gf⟂ha; hf⟂ga, gf⟂ha => ∠hfg=∠gah; ∠hfg=∠gah, h,f,e are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line => ∠efd=∠cab. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d a; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll a g c; coll g f d; coll h f e; coll h a b ? eqangle d f e f a b a c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_42. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; h,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; h,f,e are on the same line, ef⟂ac => he⟂ac; e is the midpoint of a and c, he⟂ac => ha=hc. 生成题目的FL: coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll h f e ? cong h a h c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_45. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=da; a,d,b are on the same line; fa=fb; g,f,d are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; a,d,b are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, ab⟂df => ∠adg=∠gdb; db=da, ∠adg=∠gdb => ∠agd=∠dgb; ∠agd=∠dgb, a,g,c are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ac and df is equal to the intersection angle of df and bg. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d a; coll a d b; cong f a f b; coll g f d; coll a g c ? eqangle a c d f d f b g. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_46. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=da; a,d,b are on the same line; fa=fb; g,f,d are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; a,d,b are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, ab⟂df => ∠adg=∠gdb; db=da, ∠adg=∠gdb => ∠agd=∠dgb; ∠agd=∠dgb, a,g,c are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ac and df is equal to the intersection angle of df and bg. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d a; coll a d b; cong f a f b; coll g f d; coll a g c ? eqangle d f a c b g d f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_47. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ea; a,e,c are on the same line; fa=fb; fb=fc; h,f,e are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; c,a,e are on the same line, h,f,e are on the same line, ac⟂ef => ∠ceh=∠hea; ec=ea, ∠ceh=∠hea => ∠ech=∠hae; ∠ech=∠hae, a,e,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line => ∠ach=∠bac. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e a; coll a e c; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll h f e; coll h a b ? eqangle a c c h a b a c. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_48. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ec=ea; a,e,c are on the same line; fa=fb; fb=fc; h,f,e are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; c,a,e are on the same line, h,f,e are on the same line, ac⟂ef => ∠ceh=∠hea; ec=ea, ∠ceh=∠hea => ∠ech=∠hae; ∠ech=∠hae, a,e,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line => ∠ach=∠bac. 生成题目的FL: cong e c e a; coll a e c; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll h f e; coll h a b ? eqangle c h a c a c a b. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_51. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; a,d,b are on the same line; fa=fb; g,f,d are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, fa=fb => da/db = fa/fb; da/db = fa/fb, a,d,b are on the same line => ∠afd=∠dfb; d,f,g are on the same line, ∠dfb=∠afd => ∠gfb=∠afg; fa=fb, ∠gfb=∠afg => ∠fbg=∠gaf; ∠fbg=∠gaf, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠fbg=∠caf. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; coll a d b; cong f a f b; coll g f d; coll a g c ? eqangle b f b g a c a f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 d b d c a b a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqangle6 a b a d a d a c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比，那么这个点在角平分线上。【角平分线的逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_58. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ea=ec; a,e,c are on the same line; fa=fb; fb=fc; h,f,e are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line. 步骤: fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ea=ec, fa=fc => ea/ec = fa/fc; ea/ec = fa/fc, a,e,c are on the same line => ∠afe=∠efc; h,e,f are on the same line, ∠afe=∠efc => ∠afh=∠hfc; fc=fa, ∠afh=∠hfc => ∠fch=∠haf; ∠fch=∠haf, h,a,b are on the same line => the intersection angle of cf and ab is equal to the intersection angle of ch and af. 生成题目的FL: cong e a e c; coll a e c; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll h f e; coll h a b ? eqangle a b c f a f c h. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 d b d c a b a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqangle6 a b a d a d a c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比，那么这个点在角平分线上。【角平分线的逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_59. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; g,f,d are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; h,f,e are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, ab⟂df, ac⟂ef => ∠hea=∠adg; h,a,b are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠hae=∠dag; ∠hea=∠adg, ∠hae=∠dag => he/ha = gd/ga; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; h,f,e are on the same line, ef⟂ac => he⟂ac; e is the midpoint of a and c, he⟂ac => ha=hc; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; d,f,g are on the same line, df⟂ab => gd⟂ab; d is the midpoint of a and b, gd⟂ab => ga=gb; he/ha = gd/ga, ha=hc, ga=gb => he/hc = gd/gb. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll g f d; coll a g c; coll h f e; coll h a b ? eqratio h e h c g d b g. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_60. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; g,f,d are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; h,f,e are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, ab⟂df, ac⟂ef => ∠hea=∠adg; h,a,b are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠hae=∠dag; ∠hea=∠adg, ∠hae=∠dag => he/ha = gd/ga; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; h,f,e are on the same line, ef⟂ac => he⟂ac; e is the midpoint of a and c, he⟂ac => ha=hc; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; d,f,g are on the same line, df⟂ab => gd⟂ab; d is the midpoint of a and b, gd⟂ab => ga=gb; he/ha = gd/ga, ha=hc, ga=gb => he/hc = gd/gb. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll g f d; coll a g c; coll h f e; coll h a b ? eqratio h c h e b g g d. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_68. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; g,f,d are on the same line; a,g,c are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; h,f,e are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, ab⟂df, ac⟂ef => ∠hea=∠adg; h,a,b are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line => ∠hae=∠dag; ∠hea=∠adg, ∠hae=∠dag => ah/ae = ag/ad; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; h,f,e are on the same line, ef⟂ac => he⟂ac; e is the midpoint of a and c, he⟂ac => ha=hc; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; d,f,g are on the same line, df⟂ab => gd⟂ab; d is the midpoint of a and b, gd⟂ab => ga=gb; ah/ae = ag/ad, ha=hc, ga=gb => hc/ae = bg/ad. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll g f d; coll a g c; coll h f e; coll h a b ? eqratio a e h c a d b g. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_69. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; fa=fb, fb=fc => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂df, ac⟂ef => ∠feg=∠hdf; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, e is the midpoint of a and c => ∠bcf equals the intersection angle of ab and ef; fb=fc => ∠fbc=∠bcf; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠fbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac; d,f,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, h,e,f are on the same line, ∠bcf equals the intersection angle of ab and ef, ∠fbc=∠bcf, ∠fbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac => ∠fge=∠dhf; ∠feg=∠hdf, ∠fge=∠dhf => fe/fg = fd/fh. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll a g c; coll g f d; coll h a b; coll h f e ? eqratio f e g f f d h f. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_72. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; fa=fb, fb=fc => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂df, ac⟂ef => ∠feg=∠hdf; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, e is the midpoint of a and c => ∠bcf equals the intersection angle of ab and ef; fb=fc => ∠fbc=∠bcf; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠fbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac; d,f,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, h,e,f are on the same line, ∠bcf equals the intersection angle of ab and ef, ∠fbc=∠bcf, ∠fbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac => ∠fge=∠dhf; ∠feg=∠hdf, ∠fge=∠dhf => fe/fd = fg/fh. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll a g c; coll g f d; coll h a b; coll h f e ? eqratio f d f e h f g f. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_78. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line; h,a,b are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; fa=fb, fb=fc => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂df, ac⟂ef => ∠feg=∠hdf; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, e is the midpoint of a and c => ∠bcf equals the intersection angle of ab and ef; fb=fc => ∠fbc=∠bcf; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠fbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac; d,f,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, h,e,f are on the same line, ∠bcf equals the intersection angle of ab and ef, ∠fbc=∠bcf, ∠fbc equals the intersection angle of df and ac => ∠fge=∠dhf; ∠feg=∠hdf, ∠fge=∠dhf => gf/ge = hf/hd. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; coll a g c; coll g f d; coll h a b; coll h f e ? eqratio g e g f h d h f. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_79. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fa=fb; fb=fc; the intersection angle of df and ac is equal to the intersection angle of df and ac; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; fa=fb, fb=fc => fc=fa; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, g,f,d are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, ab⟂df, ac⟂ef => ∠feg=∠gda; d,f,g are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, the intersection angle of df and ac is equal to the intersection angle of df and ac => ∠fge=∠dga; ∠feg=∠gda, ∠fge=∠dga => fe/fg = ad/ag; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; d,f,g are on the same line, df⟂ab => gd⟂ab; d is the midpoint of a and b, gd⟂ab => ga=gb; fe/fg = ad/ag, ga=gb => fe/fg = ad/bg. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f a f b; cong f b f c; eqangle d f a c d f a c; coll a g c; coll g f d ? eqratio f e g f a d b g. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_89. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fb=fc; fa=fb; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fa=fb => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠acb=∠afd; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠fac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, g,d,f are on the same line, ∠acb=∠afd, bc∥de => ∠ged=∠afg; g,f,d are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to ∠fac, bc∥de => ∠gde=∠fag; ∠ged=∠afg, ∠gde=∠fag => eg/ed = fg/fa; eg/ed = fg/fa, fa=fb => eg/ed = fg/fb. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll a g c; coll g f d ? eqratio g e e d g f b f. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_93. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fb=fc; fa=fb; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fa=fb => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠acb=∠afd; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠fac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, g,d,f are on the same line, ∠acb=∠afd, bc∥de => ∠ged=∠afg; g,f,d are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to ∠fac, bc∥de => ∠gde=∠fag; ∠ged=∠afg, ∠gde=∠fag => dg/de = ag/af; db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; d,f,g are on the same line, df⟂ab => gd⟂ab; d is the midpoint of a and b, gd⟂ab => ga=gb; dg/de = ag/af, ga=gb, fa=fb => dg/de = bg/bf. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll a g c; coll g f d ? eqratio g d e d b g b f. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_94. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fb=fc; fa=fb; a,g,c are on the same line; g,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fa=fb => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠acb=∠afd; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, d is the midpoint of a and b => ∠fac equals the intersection angle of df and bc; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; a,g,c are on the same line, a,e,c are on the same line, g,d,f are on the same line, ∠acb=∠afd, bc∥de => ∠ged=∠afg; g,f,d are on the same line, a,g,c are on the same line, the intersection angle of df and bc is equal to ∠fac, bc∥de => ∠gde=∠fag; ∠ged=∠afg, ∠gde=∠fag => dg/de = ag/af; db=da, fa=fb => ab⟂df; d,f,g are on the same line, df⟂ab => gd⟂ab; d is the midpoint of a and b, gd⟂ab => ga=gb; dg/de = ag/af, ga=gb, fa=fb => dg/de = bg/bf. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll a g c; coll g f d ? eqratio e d g d b f b g. 步骤长度: 13. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_95. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fb=fc; fa=fb; h,a,b are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fa=fb => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; fb=fc, fa=fb => fc=fa; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, e is the midpoint of a and c => ∠abc=∠afe; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, e is the midpoint of a and c => ∠fab equals the intersection angle of ef and bc; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; h,a,b are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, h,e,f are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afe, bc∥de => ∠hde=∠afh; h,f,e are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ef and bc is equal to ∠fab, bc∥de => ∠hed=∠fah; ∠hde=∠afh, ∠hed=∠fah => hd/he = hf/ha; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; h,f,e are on the same line, ef⟂ac => he⟂ac; e is the midpoint of a and c, he⟂ac => ha=hc; hd/he = hf/ha, ha=hc => hd/he = hf/hc. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll h a b; coll h f e ? eqratio h d h e h f h c. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_45_100. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; b1 = midpoint b1 c a; c1 = midpoint c1 b a; o = circle o a b c ? perp o a1 b1 c1. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,d,b are on the same line; db=da; a,e,c are on the same line; ec=ea; fb=fc; fa=fb; h,a,b are on the same line; h,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: fb=fc, fa=fb => f is the circumcenter of Δbca; fb=fc, fa=fb => fc=fa; a,e,c are on the same line, ec=ea => e is the midpoint of a and c; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, e is the midpoint of a and c => ∠abc=∠afe; f is the circumcenter of Δbca, e is the midpoint of a and c => ∠fab equals the intersection angle of ef and bc; a,d,b are on the same line, db=da => d is the midpoint of a and b; d is the midpoint of a and b, e is the midpoint of a and c => de∥bc; h,a,b are on the same line, a,d,b are on the same line, h,e,f are on the same line, ∠abc=∠afe, bc∥de => ∠hde=∠afh; h,f,e are on the same line, h,a,b are on the same line, the intersection angle of ef and bc is equal to ∠fab, bc∥de => ∠hed=∠fah; ∠hde=∠afh, ∠hed=∠fah => eh/ed = ah/af; ec=ea, fc=fa => ac⟂ef; h,f,e are on the same line, ef⟂ac => he⟂ac; e is the midpoint of a and c, he⟂ac => ha=hc; eh/ed = ah/af, ha=hc, fa=fb => eh/ed = hc/bf. 生成题目的FL: coll a d b; cong d b d a; coll a e c; cong e c e a; cong f b f c; cong f a f b; coll h a b; coll h f e ? eqratio e d h e b f h c. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): midp E A B, midp F A C => para E F B C; circle O A B C, midp M B C => eqangle A B A C O B O M; midp M A B, perp O M A B => cong O A O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 三角形的中位线平行于第三边【中位线定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心且M是BC的中点，那么∠BAC = ∠BOM。; 垂直平分线上的点到线段两端的距离相等。【垂直平分线的性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_16. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bad=∠dac; a,c,e are on the same line; de⟂ac; a,d,g are on the same line; bg⟂ad. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, de⟂ac, bg⟂ad => ∠bga=∠dea; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bag=∠dae; ∠bga=∠dea, ∠bag=∠dae => bg/ba = de/da. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a d a d a c; coll a c e; perp d e a c; coll a d g; perp b g a d ? eqratio b g a b e d a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_36. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,c,f are on the same line; df⟂bc; a,d,g are on the same line; bg⟂ad. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,c,f are on the same line, df⟂bc, bg⟂ad => ∠bgd=∠bfd; ∠bgd=∠bfd => b,f,d,g are on the same circle; b,f,d,g are on the same circle => ∠bfg=∠bdg; ∠bfg=∠bdg, b,c,f are on the same line, a,d,g are on the same line => the intersection angle of bc and fg is equal to ∠bda. 生成题目的FL: coll b c f; perp d f b c; coll a d g; perp b g a d ? eqangle b c f g b d a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_47. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,c,e are on the same line; de⟂ac; b,c,f are on the same line; df⟂bc. 步骤: c,f,b are on the same line, c,a,e are on the same line, de⟂ac, df⟂bc => ∠cfd=∠ced; ∠cfd=∠ced => c,e,f,d are on the same circle; c,e,f,d are on the same circle => ∠cef=∠cdf; ∠cef=∠cdf, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠acd=∠efd. 生成题目的FL: coll a c e; perp d e a c; coll b c f; perp d f b c ? eqangle c d a c d f e f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_48. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠dca=∠bcd; a,c,e are on the same line; de⟂ac; b,c,f are on the same line; df⟂bc. 步骤: c,a,e are on the same line, c,f,b are on the same line, df⟂bc, de⟂ac => ∠dec=∠cfd; c,a,e are on the same line, c,f,b are on the same line, ∠dca=∠bcd => ∠dce=∠fcd; ∠dec=∠cfd, ∠dce=∠fcd => de=df; ∠dec=∠cfd, ∠dce=∠fcd => ce=cf; de=df, ce=cf => ef⟂cd. 生成题目的FL: eqangle c d a c b c c d; coll a c e; perp d e a c; coll b c f; perp d f b c ? perp e f c d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_49. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bad=∠dac; a,c,e are on the same line; de⟂ac; a,d,g are on the same line; bg⟂ad. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, de⟂ac, bg⟂ad => ∠bga=∠dea; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bag=∠dae; ∠bga=∠dea, ∠bag=∠dae => ab/ad = ag/ae; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bad=∠gae; ab/ad = ag/ae, ∠bad=∠gae => ∠abd=∠age; ∠abd=∠age, a,d,g are on the same line => ∠abd equals the intersection angle of ad and eg. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a d a d a c; coll a c e; perp d e a c; coll a d g; perp b g a d ? eqangle a b b d a d e g. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_61. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠dca=∠bcd; a,c,e are on the same line; de⟂ac; b,c,f are on the same line; df⟂bc; bg⟂ad. 步骤: c,a,e are on the same line, c,f,b are on the same line, df⟂bc, de⟂ac => ∠dec=∠cfd; c,a,e are on the same line, c,f,b are on the same line, ∠dca=∠bcd => ∠dce=∠fcd; ∠dec=∠cfd, ∠dce=∠fcd => de=df; ∠dec=∠cfd, ∠dce=∠fcd => ce=cf; de=df, ce=cf => ef⟂cd; ef⟂cd, bg⟂ad => the intersection angle of ef and bg is equal to ∠cda. 生成题目的FL: eqangle c d a c b c c d; coll a c e; perp d e a c; coll b c f; perp d f b c; perp b g a d ? eqangle e f b g c d a d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_65. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bad=∠dac; de⟂ac; a,c,e are on the same line; bg⟂ad; a,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: de⟂ac, bg⟂ad => the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ed and ac; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of de and ac => ∠bga=∠dea; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bag=∠dae; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bad=∠gae; ∠bga=∠dea, ∠bag=∠dae => ab/ad = ag/ae; ab/ad = ag/ae, ∠bad=∠gae => ∠bda=∠gea; ∠bda=∠gea, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠bda equals the intersection angle of eg and ac; the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ed and ac, ∠bda equals the intersection angle of eg and ac => ∠gbd=∠deg. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a d a d a c; perp d e a c; coll a c e; perp b g a d; coll a d g ? eqangle b g b d d e e g. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_66. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bad=∠dac; de⟂ac; a,c,e are on the same line; bg⟂ad; a,d,g are on the same line. 步骤: de⟂ac, bg⟂ad => the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ed and ac; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of de and ac => ∠bga=∠dea; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bag=∠dae; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bad=∠gae; ∠bga=∠dea, ∠bag=∠dae => ab/ad = ag/ae; ab/ad = ag/ae, ∠bad=∠gae => ∠bda=∠gea; ∠bda=∠gea, a,c,e are on the same line => ∠bda equals the intersection angle of eg and ac; the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ed and ac, ∠bda equals the intersection angle of eg and ac => ∠dbg=∠ged. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a d a d a c; perp d e a c; coll a c e; perp b g a d; coll a d g ? eqangle b d b g e g d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_46_67. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; a1 = midpoint a1 c b; n = on_line n a a1; g = foot g n a b; h = foot h n a c; s = on_aline s a b c a a1, on_line s b c ? perp g h a s. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠bad=∠dac; de⟂ac; a,c,e are on the same line; b,c,f are on the same line; df⟂bc; a,d,g are on the same line; bg⟂ad. 步骤: a,g,d are on the same line, b,c,f are on the same line, df⟂bc, bg⟂ad => ∠bgd=∠bfd; ∠bgd=∠bfd => b,f,d,g are on the same circle; b,f,d,g are on the same circle => ∠bdf=∠bgf; de⟂ac, bg⟂ad => the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ed and ac; the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of ed and ac, ∠bad=∠dac => the intersection angle of bg and de is equal to ∠bad; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of bg and ad is equal to the intersection angle of de and ac => ∠bga=∠dea; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bag=∠dae; a,g,d are on the same line, a,c,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠dac => ∠bad=∠gae; ∠bga=∠dea, ∠bag=∠dae => ab/ad = ag/ae; ab/ad = ag/ae, ∠bad=∠gae => ∠abd=∠age; the intersection angle of bg and de is equal to ∠bad, ∠abd=∠age, a,d,g are on the same line => the intersection angle of bd and eg is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ed; ∠bdf=∠bgf, the intersection angle of bd and eg is equal to the intersection angle of bg and ed => the intersection angle of df and eg is equal to the intersection angle of fg and de. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a b a d a d a c; perp d e a c; coll a c e; coll b c f; perp d f b c; coll a d g; perp b g a d ? eqangle d f e g f g d e. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】. 知识点数量: 5

原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_2. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; be∥cd; bc∥de. 步骤: bc⟂cd, cd∥be => cb⟂be; bc⟂cd, bc∥de => ed⟂dc; bc⟂cd, cb⟂be, ed⟂dc => db=ce. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b e c d; para b c d e ? cong d b c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_8. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; bc∥de; be∥cd; f,b,d are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, f,b,d are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bf/bd = cf/ce; bc⟂cd, cd∥be => cb⟂be; bc⟂cd, bc∥de => ed⟂dc; bc⟂cd, cb⟂be, ed⟂dc => db=ce; bf/bd = cf/ce, db=ce => bf/ce = cf/ce. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d; coll f b d; coll c f e ? eqratio b f c e c f c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_9. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; bc∥de; be∥cd; f,b,d are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, f,b,d are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bf/bd = cf/ce; bc⟂cd, cd∥be => cb⟂be; bc⟂cd, bc∥de => ed⟂dc; bc⟂cd, cb⟂be, ed⟂dc => db=ce; bf/bd = cf/ce, db=ce => bf/ce = cf/ce. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d; coll f b d; coll c f e ? eqratio c e b f c e c f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_10. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; bc∥de; be∥cd; f,b,d are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, f,b,d are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => df/db = ef/ec; bc⟂cd, cd∥be => cb⟂be; bc⟂cd, bc∥de => ed⟂dc; bc⟂cd, cb⟂be, ed⟂dc => db=ce; df/db = ef/ec, db=ce => fd/ce = ef/ec. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d; coll f b d; coll c f e ? eqratio f d c e e f c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_11. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; bc∥de; be∥cd; f,b,d are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, f,b,d are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => df/db = ef/ec; bc⟂cd, cd∥be => cb⟂be; bc⟂cd, bc∥de => ed⟂dc; bc⟂cd, cb⟂be, ed⟂dc => db=ce; df/db = ef/ec, db=ce => fd/ce = ef/ec. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d; coll f b d; coll c f e ? eqratio c e f d c e e f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_12. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc∥de; be∥cd; f,b,d are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, f,b,d are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bf/bc = df/de; bc∥de, be∥cd => bc=de; bf/bc = df/de, bc=de => bf/ed = df/de. 生成题目的FL: para b c d e; para b e c d; coll f b d; coll c f e ? eqratio b f e d f d e d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_13. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc∥de; be∥cd; f,b,d are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, f,b,d are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bf/bc = df/de; bc∥de, be∥cd => bc=de; bf/bc = df/de, bc=de => bf/ed = df/de. 生成题目的FL: para b c d e; para b e c d; coll f b d; coll c f e ? eqratio e d b f e d f d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_20. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; be∥cd; bc∥de; c,f,e are on the same line; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: be∥cd, c,f,e are on the same line, f,b,d are on the same line => cf/ce = df/db; bc⟂cd, cd∥be => cb⟂be; bc⟂cd, bc∥de => ed⟂dc; bc⟂cd, cb⟂be, ed⟂dc => db=ce; cf/ce = df/db, db=ce => cf/ce = fd/ce. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b e c d; para b c d e; coll c f e; coll f b d ? eqratio c e c f c e f d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_27. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc=cd; bc∥de; be∥cd. 步骤: bc∥de, be∥cd => bc=de; bc∥de, be∥cd => cd=eb; bc∥de, be∥cd => ∠deb=∠bcd; bc=de, bc=cd => cd=de; bc=cd, cd=eb => eb=bc; be∥cd => ∠dbe=∠bdc; ∠deb=∠bcd, ∠dbe=∠bdc => cb/cd = ed/eb; cb/cd = ed/eb, bc=cd => ed=eb; cd=de, bc=cd, eb=bc, ed=eb => ∠dce=∠ecb. 生成题目的FL: cong b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d ? eqangle c d c e c e b c. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A C C B, cong C B B D, cong B D D A, cong D A A C => eqangle B C B A B A B D; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 四条边都相等的四边形是菱形，若四边形ACBD为菱形，则∠ABC=∠ABD【菱形的每一条对角线平分一组对角】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_28. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc=cd; bc∥de; be∥cd. 步骤: bc∥de, be∥cd => bc=de; bc∥de, be∥cd => cd=eb; bc∥de, be∥cd => ∠deb=∠bcd; bc=de, bc=cd => cd=de; bc=cd, cd=eb => eb=bc; be∥cd => ∠dbe=∠bdc; ∠deb=∠bcd, ∠dbe=∠bdc => cb/cd = ed/eb; cb/cd = ed/eb, bc=cd => ed=eb; cd=de, bc=cd, eb=bc, ed=eb => ∠dce=∠ecb. 生成题目的FL: cong b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d ? eqangle c e c d b c c e. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A C C B, cong C B B D, cong B D D A, cong D A A C => eqangle B C B A B A B D; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 四条边都相等的四边形是菱形，若四边形ACBD为菱形，则∠ABC=∠ABD【菱形的每一条对角线平分一组对角】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_29. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; bc∥de; be∥cd. 步骤: bc⟂cd, bc∥de, cd∥be => ∠deb=∠dcb; ∠deb=∠dcb => b,d,c,e are on the same circle; b,d,c,e are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bec; ∠bdc=∠bec, be∥cd => ∠bdc=∠dce. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d ? eqangle b d c d c d c e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_30. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; bc∥de; be∥cd. 步骤: bc⟂cd, bc∥de, cd∥be => ∠deb=∠dcb; ∠deb=∠dcb => b,d,c,e are on the same circle; b,d,c,e are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bec; ∠bdc=∠bec, be∥cd => ∠bdc=∠dce. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d ? eqangle c d b d c e c d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_31. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc⟂cd; bc∥de; be∥cd; f,b,d are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, f,b,d are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bd/ce = fb/fc; bc⟂cd, cd∥be => cb⟂be; bc⟂cd, bc∥de => ed⟂dc; bc⟂cd, cb⟂be, ed⟂dc => db=ce; bd/ce = fb/fc, db=ce => bf=cf. 生成题目的FL: perp b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d; coll f b d; coll c f e ? cong b f c f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; perp A B B C, perp B C C D, perp D A A B => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 四个内角都为直角的四边形是长方形，若四边形ABCD为长方形，则AC=BD【长方形的对角线相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_33. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc∥de; be∥cd; f,b,d are on the same line; c,f,e are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, f,b,d are on the same line, c,f,e are on the same line => bc/de = fb/fd; bc∥de, be∥cd => bc=de; bc/de = fb/fd, bc=de => fb=fd. 生成题目的FL: para b c d e; para b e c d; coll f b d; coll c f e ? cong f b f d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_34. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bc=cd; bc∥de; be∥cd. 步骤: bc∥de, cd∥be => ∠deb=∠bcd; be∥cd => ∠dbe=∠bdc; ∠deb=∠bcd, ∠dbe=∠bdc => cb/cd = ed/eb; cb/cd = ed/eb, bc=cd => ed=eb; ed=eb, bc=cd => bd⟂ce. 生成题目的FL: cong b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d ? perp b d c e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_35. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; bc=cd; bc∥de; be∥cd; c,f,e are on the same line; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, cd∥be => ∠deb=∠bcd; be∥cd => ∠dbe=∠bdc; ∠deb=∠bcd, ∠dbe=∠bdc => cb/cd = ed/eb; cb/cd = ed/eb, bc=cd => ed=eb; ed=eb, bc=cd => bd⟂ce; c,f,e are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂ac, bd⟂ce => ∠cfb=∠cab; ∠cfb=∠cab => f,b,c,a are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d; coll c f e; coll f b d ? cyclic f b c a. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_47_44. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_bline d a b; e = on_line e c d, on_line e a b ? cong a e e b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; bc=cd; bc∥de; be∥cd; c,f,e are on the same line; f,b,d are on the same line. 步骤: bc∥de, cd∥be => ∠deb=∠bcd; be∥cd => ∠dbe=∠bdc; ∠deb=∠bcd, ∠dbe=∠bdc => cb/cd = ed/eb; cb/cd = ed/eb, bc=cd => ed=eb; ed=eb, bc=cd => bd⟂ce; c,f,e are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂ac, bd⟂ce => ∠cfb=∠cab; ∠cfb=∠cab => f,b,c,a are on the same circle; f,b,c,a are on the same circle => ∠fcb=∠fab; ∠fcb=∠fab, c,f,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cba. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; cong b c c d; para b c d e; para b e c d; coll c f e; coll f b d ? eqangle c e a f b c a b. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_48_4. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = on_circle e c d, on_line e b c ? cong a e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; df=de; e,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: de=da, df=de, db=dc, da=db => c,e,f,b are on the same circle; b,e,c,f are on the same circle => ∠bce=∠bfe; ∠bce=∠bfe, e,f,d are on the same line => ∠bce equals the intersection angle of bf and de. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; cong d f d e; coll e f d ? eqangle b c c e b f d e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
