原始题号:update_pics1/output_48_59. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = on_bline c a b; d = on_line d a c; e = on_circle e c d, on_line e b c ? cong a e b d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da=db; de=da; be⟂ac; df=de; e,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: da=db, de=da, df=de => d is the circumcenter of Δebf; d is the circumcenter of Δebf, e,f,d are on the same line => eb⟂bf; eb⟂bf, be⟂ac => bf∥ac. 生成题目的FL: cong d a d b; cong d e d a; perp b e a c; cong d f d e; coll e f d ? para b f a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_49_13. 原题FL: c b = segment c b; d = midpoint d c b; a = free a; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c a; g = on_line g a d, on_line g e f ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: af⟂ab; cg⟂ce; b,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,g are on the same line, ab⟂af => bg⟂af; cg⟂ce, bg⟂af => the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of cg and af; the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of cg and af, b,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and ab is equal to the intersection angle of cg and af. 生成题目的FL: perp a f a b; perp c g c e; coll b g a ? eqangle c e a b c g a f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_49_14. 原题FL: c b = segment c b; d = midpoint d c b; a = free a; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c a; g = on_line g a d, on_line g e f ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: af⟂ab; cg⟂ce; b,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,g are on the same line, ab⟂af => bg⟂af; cg⟂ce, bg⟂af => the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of cg and af; the intersection angle of ce and bg is equal to the intersection angle of cg and af, b,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and ab is equal to the intersection angle of cg and af. 生成题目的FL: perp a f a b; perp c g c e; coll b g a ? eqangle a b c e a f c g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_49_15. 原题FL: c b = segment c b; d = midpoint d c b; a = free a; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c a; g = on_line g a d, on_line g e f ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: af⟂ab; cg⟂ce; b,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,g are on the same line, ab⟂af => bg⟂af; cg⟂ce, bg⟂af => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cgb; the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cgb, b,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to the intersection angle of cg and ab. 生成题目的FL: perp a f a b; perp c g c e; coll b g a ? eqangle c e a f c g a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_49_16. 原题FL: c b = segment c b; d = midpoint d c b; a = free a; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c a; g = on_line g a d, on_line g e f ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: af⟂ab; cg⟂ce; b,g,a are on the same line. 步骤: b,a,g are on the same line, ab⟂af => bg⟂af; cg⟂ce, bg⟂af => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cgb; the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cgb, b,g,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to the intersection angle of cg and ab. 生成题目的FL: perp a f a b; perp c g c e; coll b g a ? eqangle a f c e a b c g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_49_29. 原题FL: c b = segment c b; d = midpoint d c b; a = free a; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c a; g = on_line g a d, on_line g e f ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: c,e,f are on the same line; af⟂ab; b,g,a are on the same line; cg⟂ce. 步骤: c,e,f are on the same line, g,b,a are on the same line, af⟂ab, cg⟂ce => ∠fcg=∠fag; ∠fcg=∠fag => c,g,a,f are on the same circle; c,g,a,f are on the same circle => ∠cag=∠cfg; ∠cag=∠cfg, b,g,a are on the same line, c,e,f are on the same line => ∠cab equals the intersection angle of ce and fg. 生成题目的FL: coll c e f; perp a f a b; coll b g a; perp c g c e ? eqangle a c a b c e f g. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_49_37. 原题FL: c b = segment c b; d = midpoint d c b; a = free a; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c a; g = on_line g a d, on_line g e f ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; c,e,f are on the same line; af⟂ab; b,g,a are on the same line; cg⟂ce. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠aec; c,e,f are on the same line, b,a,g are on the same line, ∠aec=∠abc => ∠aef=∠gbc; b,a,g are on the same line, ab⟂af => bg⟂af; cg⟂ce, bg⟂af => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cgb; c,e,f are on the same line, g,b,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cgb => ∠afe=∠bgc; ∠aef=∠gbc, ∠afe=∠bgc => ∠eaf=∠gcb. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll c e f; perp a f a b; coll b g a; perp c g c e ? eqangle a e a f c g b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_49_38. 原题FL: c b = segment c b; d = midpoint d c b; a = free a; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c a; g = on_line g a d, on_line g e f ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; c,e,f are on the same line; af⟂ab; b,g,a are on the same line; cg⟂ce. 步骤: db=dc, da=db, de=da => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠abc=∠aec; c,e,f are on the same line, b,a,g are on the same line, ∠aec=∠abc => ∠aef=∠gbc; b,a,g are on the same line, ab⟂af => bg⟂af; cg⟂ce, bg⟂af => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cgb; c,e,f are on the same line, g,b,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to ∠cgb => ∠afe=∠bgc; ∠aef=∠gbc, ∠afe=∠bgc => ∠eaf=∠gcb. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll c e f; perp a f a b; coll b g a; perp c g c e ? eqangle a f a e b c c g. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_49_51. 原题FL: c b = segment c b; d = midpoint d c b; a = free a; e = midpoint e b a; f = midpoint f c a; g = on_line g a d, on_line g e f ? cong e g g f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: db=dc; da=db; de=da; c,e,f are on the same line; af⟂ab; b,g,a are on the same line; cg⟂ce. 步骤: c,e,f are on the same line, g,b,a are on the same line, af⟂ab, cg⟂ce => ∠fcg=∠fag; ∠fcg=∠fag => c,g,a,f are on the same circle; c,g,a,f are on the same circle => ∠cag=∠cfg; db=dc, da=db, de=da => b,e,a,c are on the same circle; b,e,a,c are on the same circle => ∠bec=∠bac; ∠cag=∠cfg, b,g,a are on the same line, c,e,f are on the same line, ∠bec=∠bac => ∠bec equals the intersection angle of gf and ce; ∠bec equals the intersection angle of gf and ce => be∥gf. 生成题目的FL: cong d b d c; cong d a d b; cong d e d a; coll c e f; perp a f a b; coll b g a; perp c g c e ? para b e f g. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_1. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; fc⟂fd, da⟂bd => the intersection angle of fc and da is equal to ∠fdb; the intersection angle of fc and da is equal to ∠fdb, f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ∠cad equals the intersection angle of df and bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle a c a d d f b c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_2. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; fc⟂fd, da⟂bd => the intersection angle of fc and da is equal to ∠fdb; the intersection angle of fc and da is equal to ∠fdb, f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line => ∠cad equals the intersection angle of df and bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle a d a c b c d f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_3. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,a,e are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂ed; fc⟂fd, be⟂ed => the intersection angle of fc and be is equal to ∠fde; the intersection angle of fc and be is equal to ∠fde, f,c,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠fde. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle a c a b d f d e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_13. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab. 步骤: b,c,d are on the same line, b,a,e are on the same line, de⟂ab, ad⟂bc => ∠bda=∠aed; b,e,a are on the same line => ∠bad=∠ead; ∠bda=∠aed, ∠bad=∠ead => bd/ba = de/da. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll b e a; perp d e a b ? eqratio b d b a e d d a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_29. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fed=∠fad; ∠fed=∠fad, f,c,a are on the same line => ∠fed=∠cad. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle e f d e a c a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_30. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fed=∠fad; ∠fed=∠fad, f,c,a are on the same line => ∠fed=∠cad. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle d e e f a d a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_31. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fed=∠fad; ∠fed=∠fad, f,c,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ef and ac is equal to ∠eda. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle e f a c d e a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_33. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fea=∠fda; ∠fea=∠fda, b,e,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ef and ab is equal to ∠fda. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle e f a b d f a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_34. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fea=∠fda; ∠fea=∠fda, b,e,a are on the same line => the intersection angle of ef and ab is equal to ∠fda. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle a b e f a d d f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_35. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fea=∠fda; ∠fea=∠fda, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠efd=∠bad. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle e f d f a b a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_36. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fea=∠fda; ∠fea=∠fda, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠efd=∠bad. 生成题目的FL: coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqangle d f e f a d a b. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_37. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab. 步骤: b,a,e are on the same line, de⟂ab => ∠bed=∠dea; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; b,a,e are on the same line, ab⟂de => be⟂ed; da⟂bd, be⟂ed => the intersection angle of da and be is equal to ∠bde; b,c,d are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of da and be is equal to ∠bde => ∠bde=∠dae; ∠bed=∠dea, ∠bde=∠dae => be/bd = de/da. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll b e a; perp d e a b ? eqratio b e b d e d d a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_41. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac => ∠dfc=∠afd; c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; fc⟂fd, da⟂bd => the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda; b,d,c are on the same line, f,a,c are on the same line, the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda => ∠dcf=∠adf; ∠dfc=∠afd, ∠dcf=∠adf => fd/fc = fa/fd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqratio f d f c f a f d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_42. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac => ∠dfc=∠afd; c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; fc⟂fd, da⟂bd => the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda; b,d,c are on the same line, f,a,c are on the same line, the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda => ∠dcf=∠adf; ∠dfc=∠afd, ∠dcf=∠adf => fd/fc = fa/fd. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqratio f c f d f d f a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_44. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac => ∠dfc=∠afd; c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; fc⟂fd, da⟂bd => the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda; b,d,c are on the same line, f,a,c are on the same line, the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda => ∠dcf=∠adf; ∠dfc=∠afd, ∠dcf=∠adf => cd/cf = da/df. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqratio f c d c f d d a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_45. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; fc⟂fd, da⟂bd => the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda; b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fea=∠fda; b,a,e are on the same line, f,a,c are on the same line, the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠fea=∠fda => ∠feb=∠fcb; ∠feb=∠fcb => f,b,e,c are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? cyclic f b e c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_46. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cab=∠cab; b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; fc⟂fd, da⟂bd => the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda; b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fea=∠fda; b,a,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda, f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠fea=∠fda => ∠fea=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line, ∠cab=∠cab => ∠fae=∠cab; ∠fea=∠acb, ∠fae=∠cab => fe/fa = bc/ba. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a b a c a b; coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqratio f e f a b c b a. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_50_51. 原题FL: a b = segment a b; c = midpoint c b a; d = on_circle d c a; e = lc_tangent e d c, on_line e a b; f = foot f a d e ? eqangle a f a d a d a b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ∠cab=∠cab; b,d,c are on the same line; ad⟂bc; b,e,a are on the same line; de⟂ab; f,c,a are on the same line; df⟂ac. 步骤: c,a,f are on the same line, ac⟂df => fc⟂fd; b,c,d are on the same line, ad⟂bc => da⟂bd; fc⟂fd, da⟂bd => the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda; b,a,e are on the same line, c,a,f are on the same line, df⟂ac, de⟂ab => ∠aed=∠afd; ∠aed=∠afd => f,e,d,a are on the same circle; f,e,d,a are on the same circle => ∠fea=∠fda; b,a,e are on the same line, the intersection angle of fc and bd is equal to ∠fda, f,c,a are on the same line, b,d,c are on the same line, ∠fea=∠fda => ∠fea=∠acb; f,c,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line, ∠cab=∠cab => ∠fae=∠cab; ∠fea=∠acb, ∠fae=∠cab => ef/ea = cb/ca. 生成题目的FL: eqangle a c a b a c a b; coll b d c; perp a d b c; coll b e a; perp d e a b; coll f c a; perp d f a c ? eqratio e a f e c a b c. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_0. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; fi=fc. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ied=∠icd; ∠ied=∠icd, a,e,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ei and ad is equal to ∠icd. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong f i f c ? eqangle e i a d c i c d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_1. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; fi=fc. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ied=∠icd; ∠ied=∠icd, a,e,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ei and ad is equal to ∠icd. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong f i f c ? eqangle a d e i c d c i. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_2. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; fi=fc. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ied=∠icd; ∠ied=∠icd, a,e,d are on the same line => ∠eic=∠adc. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong f i f c ? eqangle e i c i a d c d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_4. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; fi=fc. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ide=∠ice; ∠ide=∠ice, a,e,d are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠ida=∠icb. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong f i f c ? eqangle d i a d c i b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_8. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; fi=fc. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠idc=∠iec; ∠idc=∠iec, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠idc equals the intersection angle of ei and bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong f i f c ? eqangle d i c d e i b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,c are on the same line; fd=fe; fc=fd. 步骤: fd=fe, fc=fd => fc=fe; fc=fe => ∠fce=∠cef; ∠fce=∠cef, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠fcb equals the intersection angle of bc and ef. 生成题目的FL: coll b e c; cong f d f e; cong f c f d ? eqangle c f b c b c e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_48. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fd=fe; fc=fd; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fd=fe, fc=fd, fi=fc => fi=fe; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => gi=ge; fi=fe, gi=ge => ei⟂fg. 生成题目的FL: cong f d f e; cong f c f d; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? perp e i f g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_49. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fd=fe; fc=fd; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fd=fe, fc=fd, fi=fc => fi=fe; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => gi=ge; fi=fe, gi=ge => ∠ifg=∠gfe. 生成题目的FL: cong f d f e; cong f c f d; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqangle f i f g f g e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_50. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fd=fe; fc=fd; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fd=fe, fc=fd, fi=fc => fi=fe; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => gi=ge; fi=fe, gi=ge => ∠ifg=∠gfe. 生成题目的FL: cong f d f e; cong f c f d; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqangle f g f i e f f g. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_51. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: fd=fe; fc=fd; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fd=fe, fc=fd, fi=fc => fi=fe; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => gi=ge; fi=fe, gi=ge => ∠fig=∠gef. 生成题目的FL: cong f d f e; cong f c f d; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqangle f i g i e g e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, cong C A R P, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的三边对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_57. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; a,b,h are on the same line; d,c,h are on the same line; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ied=∠icd; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iea=∠iba; b,a,h are on the same line, d,c,h are on the same line, ∠ied=∠icd, a,e,d are on the same line, ∠iea=∠iba => ∠ibh=∠ich; ∠ibh=∠ich => i,b,c,h are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; coll a b h; coll d c h; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? cyclic i b c h. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_58. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; a,b,h are on the same line; d,c,h are on the same line; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠idc=∠iec; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iab=∠ieb; a,h,b are on the same line, c,d,h are on the same line, ∠idc=∠iec, b,e,c are on the same line, ∠iab=∠ieb => ∠iah=∠idh; ∠iah=∠idh => i,a,d,h are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; coll a b h; coll d c h; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? cyclic i a d h. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_59. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ied=∠icd; a,d,e are on the same line, ∠ied=∠icd => ∠cie equals the intersection angle of dc and ae; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iea=∠iba; a,d,e are on the same line, ∠iea=∠iba => ∠eib=∠eab; ∠cie equals the intersection angle of dc and ae, ∠eib=∠eab => ∠cib equals the intersection angle of cd and ab. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqangle c i b i c d a b. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_61. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,c are on the same line; a,e,d are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ide=∠ice; b,c,e are on the same line, a,d,e are on the same line, ∠ide=∠ice => the intersection angle of ic and be is equal to the intersection angle of id and ae; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iae=∠ibe; the intersection angle of ic and be is equal to the intersection angle of id and ae, ∠iae=∠ibe => ∠cib=∠dia. 生成题目的FL: coll b e c; coll a e d; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqangle c i b i d i a i. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_62. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,e,c are on the same line; a,e,d are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ide=∠ice; b,c,e are on the same line, a,d,e are on the same line, ∠ide=∠ice => the intersection angle of ic and be is equal to the intersection angle of id and ae; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iae=∠ibe; the intersection angle of ic and be is equal to the intersection angle of id and ae, ∠iae=∠ibe => ∠cib=∠dia. 生成题目的FL: coll b e c; coll a e d; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqangle b i c i a i d i. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle a b c d m n p q, eqangle c d e f p q r u => eqangle a b e f m n r u; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两对直线的夹角分别相等，那么这两对直线的夹角具有传递性.【夹角的传递性】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_63. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; gi=ga; fi=fc. 步骤: ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iea=∠iba; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iab=∠ieb; fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ied=∠icd; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠idc=∠iec; ∠iea=∠iba, a,e,d are on the same line, ∠ied=∠icd => ∠icd=∠iba; ∠iab=∠ieb, b,e,c are on the same line, ∠idc=∠iec => ∠cdi=∠bai; ∠icd=∠iba, ∠cdi=∠bai => ib/ia = ic/id. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong g i g a; cong f i f c ? eqratio b i a i i c i d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_64. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; gi=ga; fi=fc. 步骤: ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iea=∠iba; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iab=∠ieb; fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ied=∠icd; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠idc=∠iec; ∠iea=∠iba, a,e,d are on the same line, ∠ied=∠icd => ∠icd=∠iba; ∠iab=∠ieb, b,e,c are on the same line, ∠idc=∠iec => ∠cdi=∠bai; ∠icd=∠iba, ∠cdi=∠bai => ib/ia = ic/id. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong g i g a; cong f i f c ? eqratio a i b i i d i c. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_65. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; gi=ga; fi=fc. 步骤: ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iea=∠iba; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iab=∠ieb; fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ied=∠icd; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠idc=∠iec; ∠iea=∠iba, a,e,d are on the same line, ∠ied=∠icd => ∠icd=∠iba; ∠iab=∠ieb, b,e,c are on the same line, ∠idc=∠iec => ∠cdi=∠bai; ∠icd=∠iba, ∠cdi=∠bai => ib/ic = ia/id. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong g i g a; cong f i f c ? eqratio b i i c a i i d. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_73. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ide=∠ice; ∠ide=∠ice, a,e,d are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠ida=∠icb; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iae=∠ibe; ∠iae=∠ibe, a,e,d are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠iad=∠ibc; ∠ida=∠icb, ∠iad=∠ibc => di/da = ci/cb. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqratio i d a d i c b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_75. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ide=∠ice; ∠ide=∠ice, a,e,d are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠ida=∠icb; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iae=∠ibe; ∠iae=∠ibe, a,e,d are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠iad=∠ibc; ∠ida=∠icb, ∠iad=∠ibc => id/ic = ad/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqratio i d i c a d b c. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_51_76. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d b a c; e = foot e a b c; f = foot f b d e ? eqangle b a b d b c b f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: a,e,d are on the same line; b,e,c are on the same line; fc=fd; fd=fe; ge=gb; gb=ga; fi=fc; gi=ga. 步骤: fc=fd, fi=fc, fd=fe => i,d,e,c are on the same circle; i,d,e,c are on the same circle => ∠ide=∠ice; ∠ide=∠ice, a,e,d are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠ida=∠icb; ge=gb, gb=ga, gi=ga => i,a,e,b are on the same circle; i,a,e,b are on the same circle => ∠iae=∠ibe; ∠iae=∠ibe, a,e,d are on the same line, b,e,c are on the same line => ∠iad=∠ibc; ∠ida=∠icb, ∠iad=∠ibc => id/ic = ad/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll a e d; coll b e c; cong f c f d; cong f d f e; cong g e g b; cong g b g a; cong f i f c; cong g i g a ? eqratio i c i d b c a d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_52_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = foot e b a c; f = foot f c a b ? eqangle a b a c e f e d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bd⟂bc; ce⟂de. 步骤: ce⟂de, bd⟂bc => ∠dbc=∠dec; ∠dbc=∠dec => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; b,c,d,e are on the same circle => ∠bdc=∠bec. 生成题目的FL: perp b d b c; perp c e d e ? eqangle b d c d b e c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_52_39. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = midpoint d c b; e = foot e b a c; f = foot f c a b ? eqangle a b a c e f e d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ad⟂ac; bd⟂bc; ce⟂de. 步骤: ad⟂ac, bd⟂bc => ∠dbc=∠dac; ∠dbc=∠dac => d,b,c,a are on the same circle; ce⟂de, bd⟂bc => ∠dbc=∠dec; ∠dbc=∠dec => b,c,d,e are on the same circle; d,b,c,a are on the same circle, b,c,d,e are on the same circle => b,d,a,e are on the same circle; b,d,a,e are on the same circle => ∠dbe=∠dae. 生成题目的FL: perp a d a c; perp b d b c; perp c e d e ? eqangle b e b d a e a d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_8. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=ca; ad=ac; ba=be; ba=ae. 步骤: cd=ca, ba=be => cd/ca = ba/be; ad=ac, ba=ae, eb=ba => ad/ac = ea/eb; cd/ca = ba/be, ad/ac = ea/eb => ∠cda=∠eab. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c a; cong a d a c; cong b a b e; cong b a a e ? eqangle c d a d a e a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=ca; ad=ac; ba=be; ba=ae. 步骤: cd=ca, ba=be => cd/ca = ba/be; ad=ac, ba=ae, eb=ba => ad/ac = ea/eb; cd/ca = ba/be, ad/ac = ea/eb => ∠cda=∠eab. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c a; cong a d a c; cong b a b e; cong b a a e ? eqangle a d c d a b a e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_18. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=ca; ad=ac; ab=ae; eb=ba. 步骤: cd=ca, ab=ae => cd/ca = ab/ae; ad=ac, ba=ae, eb=ba => ad/ac = eb/ea; cd/ca = ab/ae, ad/ac = eb/ea => the intersection angle of cd and ab is equal to the intersection angle of ad and be. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c a; cong a d a c; cong a b a e; cong e b b a ? eqangle c d a b a d b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_19. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=ca; ad=ac; ab=ae; eb=ba. 步骤: cd=ca, ab=ae => cd/ca = ab/ae; ad=ac, ba=ae, eb=ba => ad/ac = eb/ea; cd/ca = ab/ae, ad/ac = eb/ea => the intersection angle of cd and ab is equal to the intersection angle of ad and be. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c a; cong a d a c; cong a b a e; cong e b b a ? eqangle a b c d b e a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=ca; ad=ac; ae=ab; be=ba. 步骤: cd=ca, ae=ab => cd/ca = ae/ab; ad=ac, be=ba => ad/ac = be/ba; cd/ca = ae/ab, ad/ac = be/ba => ∠dab equals the intersection angle of ac and be. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c a; cong a d a c; cong a e a b; cong b e b a ? eqangle a d a b a c b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_21. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: cd=ca; ad=ac; ae=ab; be=ba. 步骤: cd=ca, ae=ab => cd/ca = ae/ab; ad=ac, be=ba => ad/ac = be/ba; cd/ca = ae/ab, ad/ac = be/ba => ∠dab equals the intersection angle of ac and be. 生成题目的FL: cong c d c a; cong a d a c; cong a e a b; cong b e b a ? eqangle a b a d b e a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_22. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=ad; cd=ca; ba=ae; be=ba. 步骤: cd=ca, be=ba => cd/ca = be/ba; ad=ac, ae=ab => ad/ac = ae/ab; cd/ca = be/ba, ad/ac = ae/ab => ∠dae=∠cab; ca=ad, ba=ae, ∠dae=∠cab => ∠acb=∠ade. 生成题目的FL: cong c a a d; cong c d c a; cong b a a e; cong b e b a ? eqangle a c b c a d d e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_23. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=ad; cd=ca; ba=ae; be=ba. 步骤: cd=ca, be=ba => cd/ca = be/ba; ad=ac, ae=ab => ad/ac = ae/ab; cd/ca = be/ba, ad/ac = ae/ab => ∠dae=∠cab; ca=ad, ba=ae, ∠dae=∠cab => ∠acb=∠ade. 生成题目的FL: cong c a a d; cong c d c a; cong b a a e; cong b e b a ? eqangle b c a c d e a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_53_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = on_line e a b, on_circle e a c; d = angle_bisector d b a c, on_line d b c; f = on_pline f e b c, on_line f a c ? eqangle e d e c e c e f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=ad; cd=ca; ba=ae; be=ba. 步骤: cd=ca, be=ba => cd/ca = be/ba; ad=ac, ae=ab => ad/ac = ae/ab; cd/ca = be/ba, ad/ac = ae/ab => ∠dae=∠cab; ca=ad, ba=ae, ∠dae=∠cab => bc=ed. 生成题目的FL: cong c a a d; cong c d c a; cong b a a e; cong b e b a ? cong b c e d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqratio6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_1. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: bd⟂ab; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe, b,f,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and ce is equal to the intersection angle of bd and ef. 生成题目的FL: perp b d a b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqangle a b c e b d e f. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_7. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, ca=cb => ca=ce; ca=ce => ∠cae=∠aec; ∠cae=∠aec, b,a,c are on the same line, d,a,e are on the same line => ∠bad equals the intersection angle of ad and ce. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; cong c e c b; coll d a e ? eqangle a b a d a d c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_8. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line. 步骤: ce=cb, ca=cb => ca=ce; ca=ce => ∠cae=∠aec; ∠cae=∠aec, b,a,c are on the same line, d,a,e are on the same line => ∠bad equals the intersection angle of ad and ce. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; cong c e c b; coll d a e ? eqangle a d a b c e a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_9. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; ∠fba=∠bea, b,f,d are on the same line, d,a,e are on the same line => ∠dba equals the intersection angle of be and ad. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; cong c e c b; coll d a e; coll b f d ? eqangle b d a b b e a d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_10. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; ∠fba=∠bea, b,f,d are on the same line, d,a,e are on the same line => ∠dba equals the intersection angle of be and ad. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; cong c e c b; coll d a e; coll b f d ? eqangle a b b d a d b e. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_14. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; ∠feb=∠eab, d,a,e are on the same line => ∠feb=∠dab. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; cong c e c b; coll d a e; perp e f c e ? eqangle b e e f a b a d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_15. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; ∠feb=∠eab, d,a,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ef and ad is equal to ∠eba. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; cong c e c b; coll d a e; perp e f c e ? eqangle e f a d b e a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_16. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; ∠feb=∠eab, d,a,e are on the same line => the intersection angle of ef and ad is equal to ∠eba. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; cong c e c b; coll d a e; perp e f c e ? eqangle a d e f a b b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_17. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ce, bd⟂ab => ∠fbc=∠fec; ∠fbc=∠fec => b,f,c,e are on the same circle; b,f,c,e are on the same circle => ∠bcf=∠bef; ∠bcf=∠bef, b,a,c are on the same line => the intersection angle of ab and cf is equal to ∠bef. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; perp b d a b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqangle a b c f b e e f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_24. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, ef⟂ce, bd⟂ab => ∠fbc=∠fec; ∠fbc=∠fec => b,f,c,e are on the same circle; b,f,c,e are on the same circle => ∠bfc=∠bec; ∠bfc=∠bec, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠dbe=∠fce. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; perp b d a b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqangle b e b d c e c f. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_25. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, b,a,c are on the same line => be⟂ea; be⟂ea, d,a,e are on the same line => be⟂ad; ba⟂bf, be⟂ad => ∠abe equals the intersection angle of bf and da; ∠abe equals the intersection angle of bf and da, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠abe=∠bda. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; cong c e c b; coll d a e; coll b f d ? eqangle a b b e b d a d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_26. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, b,a,c are on the same line => be⟂ea; be⟂ea, d,a,e are on the same line => be⟂ad; ba⟂bf, be⟂ad => ∠abe equals the intersection angle of bf and da; ∠abe equals the intersection angle of bf and da, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠abe=∠bda. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; cong c e c b; coll d a e; coll b f d ? eqangle b e a b a d b d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_27. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; ce=cb; d,a,e are on the same line; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; b,d,f are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab, d,a,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea => ∠fbe=∠bef; ∠fbe=∠bef => fb=fe. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; cong c e c b; coll d a e; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? cong f b f e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_28. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠bfe=∠ace; ce=cb, ca=cb => ca=ce; ce=cb, ca=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; ca=ce => ∠cae=∠aec; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cae=∠aec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠bef=∠aec; ∠bfe=∠ace, ∠bef=∠aec => bf/be = ac/ae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; b,d,f are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab, d,a,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea => ∠fbe=∠bef; ∠fbe=∠bef => fb=fe; bf/be = ac/ae, fb=fe, ca=cb => ef/eb = bc/ae. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio f e b e b c a e. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_29. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠bfe=∠ace; ce=cb, ca=cb => ca=ce; ce=cb, ca=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; ca=ce => ∠cae=∠aec; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cae=∠aec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠bef=∠aec; ∠bfe=∠ace, ∠bef=∠aec => bf/be = ac/ae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; b,d,f are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab, d,a,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea => ∠fbe=∠bef; ∠fbe=∠bef => fb=fe; bf/be = ac/ae, fb=fe, ca=cb => ef/eb = bc/ae. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio b e f e a e b c. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_30. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠bfe=∠ace; ce=cb, ca=cb => ca=ce; ce=cb, ca=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; ca=ce => ∠cae=∠aec; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cae=∠aec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠bef=∠aec; ∠bfe=∠ace, ∠bef=∠aec => bf/ac = eb/ea; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; b,d,f are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab, d,a,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea => ∠fbe=∠bef; ∠fbe=∠bef => fb=fe; bf/ac = eb/ea, fb=fe, ca=cb => fe/bc = eb/ea. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio f e b c b e a e. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_31. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠bfe=∠ace; ce=cb, ca=cb => ca=ce; ce=cb, ca=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; ca=ce => ∠cae=∠aec; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cae=∠aec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠bef=∠aec; ∠bfe=∠ace, ∠bef=∠aec => bf/ac = eb/ea; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; b,d,f are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab, d,a,e are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea => ∠fbe=∠bef; ∠fbe=∠bef => fb=fe; bf/ac = eb/ea, fb=fe, ca=cb => fe/bc = eb/ea. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio b c f e a e b e. 步骤长度: 14. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 5
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_32. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠dfe=∠bce; ce=cb => ∠cbe=∠bec; ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠def=∠bec; ∠dfe=∠bce, ∠def=∠bec => df/de = bc/be. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio f d d e b c b e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_33. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠dfe=∠bce; ce=cb => ∠cbe=∠bec; ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠def=∠bec; ∠dfe=∠bce, ∠def=∠bec => df/de = bc/be. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio d e f d b e b c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_34. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠dfe=∠bce; ce=cb => ∠cbe=∠bec; ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠def=∠bec; ∠dfe=∠bce, ∠def=∠bec => fd/bc = ed/eb. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio f d b c d e b e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_35. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠dfe=∠bce; ce=cb => ∠cbe=∠bec; ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠def=∠bec; ∠dfe=∠bce, ∠def=∠bec => fd/bc = ed/eb. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio b c f d b e d e. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_38. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; ca=cb; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line; ef⟂ce. 步骤: b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => ba⟂bf; ba⟂bf, ef⟂ce => the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe; b,d,f are on the same line, b,c,a are on the same line, the intersection angle of ba and ce is equal to ∠bfe => ∠dfe=∠bce; ce=cb => ∠cbe=∠bec; ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, ef⟂ce => ∠feb=∠eab; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠cbe=∠bec, b,a,c are on the same line, ∠feb=∠eab => ∠def=∠bec; ∠dfe=∠bce, ∠def=∠bec => ed/eb = ef/ec; ∠dfe=∠bce, ∠def=∠bec => cb/ce = fd/fe; ed/eb = ef/ec, cb/ce = fd/fe, ce=cb => ed/eb = fe/bc. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c a c b; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d; perp e f c e ? eqratio b e d e b c f e. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_39. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠bed=∠dba; a,d,e are on the same line => ∠bde=∠bda; ∠bed=∠dba, ∠bde=∠bda => be/bd = ab/ad. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d ? eqratio b e b d b a d a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_40. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠bed=∠dba; a,d,e are on the same line => ∠bde=∠bda; ∠bed=∠dba, ∠bde=∠bda => be/bd = ab/ad. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d ? eqratio b d b e d a b a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_41. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠bed=∠dba; a,d,e are on the same line => ∠bde=∠bda; ∠bed=∠dba, ∠bde=∠bda => be/ba = db/da. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d ? eqratio b e b a b d d a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_43. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠bed=∠dba; a,d,e are on the same line => ∠bde=∠bda; ∠bed=∠dba, ∠bde=∠bda => eb/ed = ba/bd. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d ? eqratio b e d e b a b d. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_44. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠bed=∠dba; a,d,e are on the same line => ∠bde=∠bda; ∠bed=∠dba, ∠bde=∠bda => eb/ed = ba/bd. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d ? eqratio d e b e b d b a. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2
