原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_46. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb; b,f,d are on the same line. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; b,c,a are on the same line, b,d,f are on the same line, ab⟂bd => cb⟂bf; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, cb⟂bf => ∠fba=∠bea; d,e,a are on the same line, ∠fba=∠bea, b,f,d are on the same line => ∠bed=∠dba; a,d,e are on the same line => ∠bde=∠bda; ∠bed=∠dba, ∠bde=∠bda => be/ba = de/db. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; coll d a e; cong c e c b; coll b f d ? eqratio b a b e b d d e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_47. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; ∠bad=∠bad; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, b,a,c are on the same line => be⟂ea; d,e,a are on the same line, bd⟂ab, be⟂ea => ∠bea=∠abd; d,a,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠bad => ∠bae=∠bad; ∠bea=∠abd, ∠bae=∠bad => be/bd = ae/ab. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; eqangle a b a d a b a d; coll d a e; cong c e c b ? eqratio b e b d a e b a. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_54_48. 原题FL: a b c d = isquare a b c d; e = on_line e b d, on_circle e b c; f = on_tline f e b d, on_line f d c ? cong e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; bd⟂ab; ∠bad=∠bad; d,a,e are on the same line; ce=cb. 步骤: ca=cb, ce=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δbae; c is the circumcenter of Δbae, b,a,c are on the same line => be⟂ea; d,e,a are on the same line, bd⟂ab, be⟂ea => ∠bea=∠abd; d,a,e are on the same line, ∠bad=∠bad => ∠bae=∠bad; ∠bea=∠abd, ∠bae=∠bad => be/bd = ae/ab. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; perp b d a b; eqangle a b a d a b a d; coll d a e; cong c e c b ? eqratio b d b e b a a e. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_55_2. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = circumcenter e a b c; d = on_line d a b, angle_bisector d a c b; f = on_tline f c c e, on_pline f d a c ? cong c f d b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; cd=ca. 步骤: ca=cb, cd=ca => cd=cb; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; ∠cdb=∠dbc, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠cdb=∠dba. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; cong c d c a ? eqangle c d b d b d a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_55_3. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = circumcenter e a b c; d = on_line d a b, angle_bisector d a c b; f = on_tline f c c e, on_pline f d a c ? cong c f d b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; b,a,c are on the same line; cd=ca. 步骤: ca=cb, cd=ca => cd=cb; cd=cb => ∠cdb=∠dbc; ∠cdb=∠dbc, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠cdb=∠dba. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; coll b a c; cong c d c a ? eqangle b d c d a b b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_55_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = circumcenter e a b c; d = on_line d a b, angle_bisector d a c b; f = on_tline f c c e, on_pline f d a c ? cong c f d b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: b,a,c are on the same line; cd=ca; ∠dab=∠ead. 步骤: cd=ca => ∠cad=∠adc; ∠dab=∠ead, ∠cad=∠adc, b,a,c are on the same line => ∠cda=∠ead; ∠cda=∠ead => cd∥ea. 生成题目的FL: coll b a c; cong c d c a; eqangle a d a b a e a d ? para c d a e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_55_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; e = circumcenter e a b c; d = on_line d a b, angle_bisector d a c b; f = on_tline f c c e, on_pline f d a c ? cong c f d b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ca=cb; cd=ca; ∠bad=∠dae; de⟂cd. 步骤: cd=ca, ca=cb => c is the circumcenter of Δdab; c is the circumcenter of Δdab, de⟂cd => ∠eda=∠dba; ∠bad=∠dae, ∠eda=∠dba => ea/ed = da/db. 生成题目的FL: cong c a c b; cong c d c a; eqangle a b a d a d a e; perp d e c d ? eqratio e a e d d a b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_56_0. 原题FL: d a b = r_triangle d a b; c = midpoint c b a; e = circle e a c d; f = circle f b d c ? perp e d d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; c,d,a are on the same line; b,e,d are on the same line; ae⟂bd. 步骤: b,e,d are on the same line, ae⟂bd => ea⟂be; c,a,d are on the same line, ab⟂ac => ba⟂cd; ea⟂be, ba⟂cd => ∠eab equals the intersection angle of be and cd; ∠eab equals the intersection angle of be and cd, b,e,d are on the same line, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠eab equals the intersection angle of bd and ac. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll c d a; coll b e d; perp a e b d ? eqangle a e a b b d a c. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_56_15. 原题FL: d a b = r_triangle d a b; c = midpoint c b a; e = circle e a c d; f = circle f b d c ? perp e d d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; c,d,a are on the same line; b,e,d are on the same line; ae⟂bd. 步骤: e,b,d are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line, ab⟂ac, ae⟂bd => ∠aed=∠dab; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ∠ade=∠adb; ∠aed=∠dab, ∠ade=∠adb => ae/ab = de/da. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll c d a; coll b e d; perp a e b d ? eqratio b a e a d a e d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_56_16. 原题FL: d a b = r_triangle d a b; c = midpoint c b a; e = circle e a c d; f = circle f b d c ? perp e d d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd; b,e,d are on the same line; ae⟂bd. 步骤: e,b,d are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line, ab⟂ac, ae⟂bd => ∠aed=∠dab; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ∠ade=∠adb; ∠aed=∠dab, ∠ade=∠adb => de/da = da/db; de/da = da/db, cd=da => de/dc = dc/db; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd => ∠cdb=∠cde; de/dc = dc/db, ∠cdb=∠cde => ∠dcb=∠ced; ∠dcb=∠ced, c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,d are on the same line => ∠acb equals the intersection angle of ce and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll c d a; cong d c d a; eqangle a c b d a c b d; coll b e d; perp a e b d ? eqangle a c b c c e b d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_56_17. 原题FL: d a b = r_triangle d a b; c = midpoint c b a; e = circle e a c d; f = circle f b d c ? perp e d d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd; b,e,d are on the same line; ae⟂bd. 步骤: e,b,d are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line, ab⟂ac, ae⟂bd => ∠aed=∠dab; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ∠ade=∠adb; ∠aed=∠dab, ∠ade=∠adb => de/da = da/db; de/da = da/db, cd=da => de/dc = dc/db; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd => ∠cdb=∠cde; de/dc = dc/db, ∠cdb=∠cde => ∠dcb=∠ced; ∠dcb=∠ced, c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,d are on the same line => ∠acb equals the intersection angle of ce and bd. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll c d a; cong d c d a; eqangle a c b d a c b d; coll b e d; perp a e b d ? eqangle b c a c b d c e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_56_18. 原题FL: d a b = r_triangle d a b; c = midpoint c b a; e = circle e a c d; f = circle f b d c ? perp e d d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd; b,e,d are on the same line; ae⟂bd. 步骤: e,b,d are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line, ab⟂ac, ae⟂bd => ∠aed=∠dab; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ∠ade=∠adb; ∠aed=∠dab, ∠ade=∠adb => de/da = da/db; de/da = da/db, cd=da => de/dc = dc/db; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd => ∠cdb=∠cde; de/dc = dc/db, ∠cdb=∠cde => ∠dcb=∠ced; ∠dcb=∠ced, c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,d are on the same line => ∠ace=∠cbd. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll c d a; cong d c d a; eqangle a c b d a c b d; coll b e d; perp a e b d ? eqangle a c c e b c b d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_56_25. 原题FL: d a b = r_triangle d a b; c = midpoint c b a; e = circle e a c d; f = circle f b d c ? perp e d d f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ab⟂ac; c,d,a are on the same line; dc=da; the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd; b,e,d are on the same line; ae⟂bd. 步骤: e,b,d are on the same line, d,a,c are on the same line, ab⟂ac, ae⟂bd => ∠aed=∠dab; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line => ∠ade=∠adb; ∠aed=∠dab, ∠ade=∠adb => de/da = da/db; de/da = da/db, cd=da => de/dc = dc/db; c,a,d are on the same line, e,b,d are on the same line, the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to the intersection angle of ac and bd => ∠cdb=∠cde; de/dc = dc/db, ∠cdb=∠cde => bc/bd = ce/cd; bc/bd = ce/cd, dc=da => bc/bd = ce/da. 生成题目的FL: perp a b a c; coll c d a; cong d c d a; eqangle a c b d a c b d; coll b e d; perp a e b d ? eqratio b d b c d a c e. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q R Q P, eqangle6 C A C B R Q R P, ncoll A B C => simtri2 A B C P Q R; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_57_12. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = circumcenter d a c b; e = on_line e b c; f = on_circle f d a, angle_bisector f a c e ? cong a f f b. 原题的知识点: . 前提: da∥bc; dc∥ab; b,e,d are on the same line; c,e,a are on the same line. 步骤: ad∥bc, b,e,d are on the same line, c,e,a are on the same line => be/bc = de/da; ad∥bc, cd∥ab => bc=da; be/bc = de/da, bc=da => be/da = de/da. 生成题目的FL: para d a b c; para d c a b; coll b e d; coll c e a ? eqratio b e d a e d d a. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; para A C B D, para A D B C => cong A C B D. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 两组对边分别平行的四边形是平行四边形，若四边形ACBD为平行四边形，则AC=BD【平行四边形的对边相等】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_5. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ac=ad => ad=ab; ad=ab => ∠adb=∠dba; ∠adb=∠dba, a,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to ∠dba. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d ? eqangle a c b d b d a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_6. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ac=ad => ad=ab; ad=ab => ∠adb=∠dba; ∠adb=∠dba, a,c,d are on the same line => the intersection angle of ac and bd is equal to ∠dba. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d ? eqangle b d a c a b b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_9. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; ce⟂ac. 步骤: ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, ce⟂ac => ∠ecd=∠cbd; ∠ecd=∠cbd, a,c,d are on the same line => ∠eca=∠cbd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp c e a c ? eqangle c e a c b c b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; ce⟂ac. 步骤: ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, ce⟂ac => ∠ecd=∠cbd; ∠ecd=∠cbd, a,c,d are on the same line => ∠eca=∠cbd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp c e a c ? eqangle a c c e b d b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_15. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; be⟂ab. 步骤: ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠ebd=∠bcd, a,c,d are on the same line => ∠ebc equals the intersection angle of bd and ac. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp b e a b ? eqangle b e b c b d a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_16. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; be⟂ab. 步骤: ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠ebd=∠bcd, a,c,d are on the same line => ∠ebc equals the intersection angle of bd and ac. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp b e a b ? eqangle b c b e a c b d. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_19. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠eba=∠eca; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠eac=∠ebc. 生成题目的FL: perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqangle a e a c b e b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_20. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠eba=∠eca; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠eac=∠ebc. 生成题目的FL: perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqangle a c a e b c b e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_21. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠eba=∠eca; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠aec=∠abc. 生成题目的FL: perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqangle a e c e a b b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_22. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠eba=∠eca; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠aec=∠abc. 生成题目的FL: perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqangle c e a e b c a b. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_23. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠eba=∠eca; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠eab=∠ecb. 生成题目的FL: perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqangle a e a b c e b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_24. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠eba=∠eca; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠eab=∠ecb. 生成题目的FL: perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqangle a b a e b c c e. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; ce⟂ac. 步骤: ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, a,c,d are on the same line => bd⟂bc; ce⟂ac, bd⟂bc => the intersection angle of ce and bd is equal to ∠acb. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp c e a c ? eqangle c e b d a c b c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_26. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; ce⟂ac. 步骤: ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, a,c,d are on the same line => bd⟂bc; ce⟂ac, bd⟂bc => the intersection angle of ce and bd is equal to ∠acb. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp c e a c ? eqangle b d c e b c a c. 步骤长度: 3. 使用的知识点(英文): circle O A B C, coll O A C => perp A B B C; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H. 使用的知识点(中文): 在圆中，直径所对的圆周角是直角。【圆周角定理之一】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; a,c,d are on the same line; ac=ad; ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠ceb=∠cab; a,d,c are on the same line, ∠cab=∠ceb => ∠dab=∠ceb; ac=ab, ac=ad => ad=ab; ac=ab, ac=ad => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; ad=ab => ∠adb=∠dba; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠adb=∠dba, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ebd=∠bcd => ∠cbe=∠dba; ∠dab=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dba => da/db = ce/cb. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll a c d; cong a c a d; perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqratio a d d b e c b c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_29. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; a,c,d are on the same line; ac=ad; ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠ceb=∠cab; a,d,c are on the same line, ∠cab=∠ceb => ∠dab=∠ceb; ac=ab, ac=ad => ad=ab; ac=ab, ac=ad => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; ad=ab => ∠adb=∠dba; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠adb=∠dba, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ebd=∠bcd => ∠cbe=∠dba; ∠dab=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dba => da/db = ce/cb. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll a c d; cong a c a d; perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqratio d b a d b c e c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; a,c,d are on the same line; ac=ad; ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠ceb=∠cab; a,d,c are on the same line, ∠cab=∠ceb => ∠dab=∠ceb; ac=ab, ac=ad => ad=ab; ac=ab, ac=ad => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; ad=ab => ∠adb=∠dba; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠adb=∠dba, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ebd=∠bcd => ∠cbe=∠dba; ∠dab=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dba => ad/ec = bd/bc. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll a c d; cong a c a d; perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqratio a d e c d b b c. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_31. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; a,c,d are on the same line; ac=ad; ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠ceb=∠cab; a,d,c are on the same line, ∠cab=∠ceb => ∠dab=∠ceb; ac=ab, ac=ad => ad=ab; ac=ab, ac=ad => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; ad=ab => ∠adb=∠dba; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠adb=∠dba, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ebd=∠bcd => ∠cbe=∠dba; ∠dab=∠ceb, ∠cbe=∠dba => ad/ec = bd/bc. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll a c d; cong a c a d; perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqratio e c a d b c d b. 步骤长度: 8. 使用的知识点(英文): perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B; eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】; 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; be⟂ab; ce⟂ac. 步骤: ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠eba=∠eca; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠eac=∠ebc; ∠ebd=∠bcd, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠eac=∠ebc => ∠eac equals the intersection angle of db and ac; ∠eac equals the intersection angle of db and ac => ae∥db. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp b e a b; perp c e a c ? para a e b d. 步骤长度: 7. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle A B P Q C D P Q => para A B C D; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条直线被第三条直线所截，且内错角相等，那么这两条直线平行.; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.. 知识点数量: 4
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_33. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠ace=∠abe; ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, ce⟂ac => ∠ecd=∠cbd; ∠ace=∠abe, ∠ecd=∠cbd, a,c,d are on the same line => ∠dbc=∠abe; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠eab=∠ecb; d,c,a are on the same line, ∠ecd=∠cbd, ∠eab=∠ecb => ∠eab=∠cdb; ∠dbc=∠abe, ∠eab=∠cdb => eb/ea = cb/cd; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠ebd=∠bcd, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ecd=∠cbd => ∠ecb=∠cbe; ∠ecb=∠cbe => eb=ec; eb/ea = cb/cd, eb=ec => ec/ea = cb/cd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqratio e c a e b c d c. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠ace=∠abe; ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, ce⟂ac => ∠ecd=∠cbd; ∠ace=∠abe, ∠ecd=∠cbd, a,c,d are on the same line => ∠dbc=∠abe; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠eab=∠ecb; d,c,a are on the same line, ∠ecd=∠cbd, ∠eab=∠ecb => ∠eab=∠cdb; ∠dbc=∠abe, ∠eab=∠cdb => eb/ea = cb/cd; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠ebd=∠bcd, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ecd=∠cbd => ∠ecb=∠cbe; ∠ecb=∠cbe => eb=ec; eb/ea = cb/cd, eb=ec => ec/ea = cb/cd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqratio a e e c d c b c. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 6
原始题号:update_pics1/output_58_35. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = eq_triangle d a b; e = eq_triangle e a c; f = eq_triangle f c b ? para e d c f. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; ac=ad; a,c,d are on the same line; ce⟂ac; be⟂ab. 步骤: ce⟂ac, be⟂ab => ∠ace=∠abe; ac=ad, ac=ab => a is the circumcenter of Δcdb; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, ce⟂ac => ∠ecd=∠cbd; ∠ace=∠abe, ∠ecd=∠cbd, a,c,d are on the same line => ∠dbc=∠abe; ∠eba=∠eca => a,e,b,c are on the same circle; a,e,b,c are on the same circle => ∠eab=∠ecb; d,c,a are on the same line, ∠ecd=∠cbd, ∠eab=∠ecb => ∠eab=∠cdb; ∠dbc=∠abe, ∠eab=∠cdb => be/bc = ea/cd; a is the circumcenter of Δcdb, be⟂ab => ∠ebd=∠bcd; ∠ebd=∠bcd, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ecd=∠cbd => ∠ecb=∠cbe; ∠ecb=∠cbe => eb=ec; be/bc = ea/cd, eb=ec => ce/cb = ae/dc. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; cong a c a d; coll a c d; perp c e a c; perp b e a b ? eqratio e c b c a e d c. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 C A C B R P R Q, ncoll A B C => simtri A B C P Q R; eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; cyclic A B P Q => eqangle P A P B Q A Q B; circle O A B C, perp O A A X => eqangle A X A B C A C B; perp A B C D, perp E F G H, npara A B E F => eqangle A B E F C D G H; eqangle6 A O A B B A B O, ncoll O A B => cong O A O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两角对应相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 在同一个圆中，同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等.; 如果O是三角形ABC的外接圆的圆心，且OA垂直于AX，那么∠BAX = ∠BCA。【圆周角定理的推论】; 如果两条直线分别垂直于另外两条直线，且这两条直线不平行，那么它们的夹角相等.【垂直线的夹角性质】; 如果一个三角形的两个角相等，那么这个三角形是等腰三角形。【等腰三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 6

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_10. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ca/cb = da/de; ca/cb = da/de, ac=ab => ba/bc = da/de. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a ? eqratio b a c b d a e d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_11. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ca/cb = da/de; ca/cb = da/de, ac=ab => ba/bc = da/de. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a ? eqratio c b b a e d d a. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1
原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_12. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ac/ad = cb/de; ac/ad = cb/de, ac=ab => ab/ad = cb/ed. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a ? eqratio b a d a c b e d. 步骤长度: 4. 使用的知识点(英文): eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 1

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_14. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; e,b,a are on the same line; ae=ad. 步骤: ae=ad => ∠ade=∠dea; ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; a,e,b are on the same line, a,c,d are on the same line, ∠ade=∠dea, ∠acb=∠ade => ∠cbe=∠cde; ∠cbe=∠cde => e,c,d,b are on the same circle. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; coll e b a; cong a e a d ? cyclic e c d b. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): eqangle6 P A P B Q A Q B, ncoll P Q A B => cyclic A B P Q; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; cong O A O B, ncoll O A B => eqangle O A A B A B O B. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个角相等，并且它们的顶点在同一条直线上，那么这两个角的顶点和它们的边的交点共圆.【定理4的逆定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 在等腰三角形中，底角相等。【等腰三角形的基本性质之一】. 知识点数量: 3
原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_15. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line; e,f,c are on the same line; f,d,b are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => fc/fe = fb/fd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a; coll e f c; coll f d b ? eqratio f c e f f b f d. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_24. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line; e,f,c are on the same line; f,d,b are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => cf/cb = ef/ed. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a; coll e f c; coll f d b ? eqratio c b f c e d e f. 步骤长度: 5. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_25. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, c,d,a are on the same line, e,b,a are on the same line => ac/ab = cd/be; ac/ab = cd/be, ac=ab => cd=be. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a ? cong c d b e. 步骤长度: 6. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】. 知识点数量: 2
原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_28. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line; e,f,c are on the same line; f,d,b are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cae=∠dab; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ca/cb = da/de; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => cb/cf = ed/ef; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => ce/bd = fc/fb; ac=ab, ae=ad, ∠cae=∠dab => ec=db; ed/ef = cb/cf, ce/bd = fc/fb, ec=db => ed/ef = bc/bf; ca/cb = da/de, ed/ef = bc/bf => da/ef = ca/fb; da/ef = ca/fb, ac=ab, ce/bd = fc/fb, ec=db => da/ef = ba/fc. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a; coll e f c; coll f d b ? eqratio d a e f b a f c. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqratio a b c d m n p q, eqratio c d e f p q r u => eqratio a b e f m n r u. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果两个比例相等，且它们的中间项也相等，那么可以通过比例的传递性来证明其他比例的相等关系.【比例的传递性】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_30. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line; e,f,c are on the same line; f,d,b are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cae=∠dab; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ac/ad = cb/de; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => fc/fe = cb/ed; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => ec/db = fe/fd; ac=ab, ae=ad, ∠cae=∠dab => ec=db; fc/fe = cb/ed, ac/ad = cb/de, ac=ab, ec/db = fe/fd, ec=db => ac/ad = fc/fd; ac/ad = fc/fd, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠cfa=∠afd; ∠cfa=∠afd, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => the intersection angle of ce and af is equal to the intersection angle of af and bd. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a; coll e f c; coll f d b ? eqangle c e a f a f b d. 步骤长度: 12. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 d b d c a b a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqangle6 a b a d a d a c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比，那么这个点在角平分线上。【角平分线的逆定理】. 知识点数量: 4

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_32. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line; e,f,c are on the same line; f,d,b are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ac/ad = cb/de; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => fe/fc = ed/cb; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => fe/fc = fd/fb; ac/ad = cb/de, ac=ab, fe/fc = ed/cb, fe/fc = fd/fb => fd/fb = ad/ab; fd/fb = ad/ab, f,d,b are on the same line => ∠daf=∠fab; ∠daf=∠fab, c,d,a are on the same line => ∠caf=∠fab. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a; coll e f c; coll f d b ? eqangle a c a f a f a b. 步骤长度: 10. 使用的知识点(英文): para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; eqratio6 d b d c a b a c, coll d b c, ncoll a b c => eqangle6 a b a d a d a c. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到三角形两边的比等于这两边的比，那么这个点在角平分线上。【角平分线的逆定理】. 知识点数量: 3

原始题号:update_pics1/output_59_34. 原题FL: a b c = triangle a b c; d = foot d a b c; e = circumcenter e b a c; f = angle_bisector f b a c, on_circle f e a ? eqangle e a a f f a a d. 原题的知识点: . 前提: ac=ab; c,d,a are on the same line; ad=ae; e,b,a are on the same line; e,f,c are on the same line; f,d,b are on the same line. 步骤: ac=ab, ad=ae => ac/ab = ad/ae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cab=∠dae; c,d,a are on the same line, b,e,a are on the same line => ∠cae=∠dab; ac/ab = ad/ae, ∠cab=∠dae => ∠acb=∠ade; ∠acb=∠ade, c,d,a are on the same line => bc∥de; bc∥de, e,f,c are on the same line, f,d,b are on the same line => ce/bd = fc/fb; ac=ab, ae=ad, ∠cae=∠dab => ec=db; ce/bd = fc/fb, ec=db => cf=bf; ac=ab, cf=bf => bc⟂af. 生成题目的FL: cong a c a b; coll c d a; cong a d a e; coll e b a; coll e f c; coll f d b ? perp b c a f. 步骤长度: 9. 使用的知识点(英文): cong A B P Q, cong B C Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => contri* A B C P Q R; para A B C D, coll O A C, coll O B D => eqratio3 A B C D O O; eqratio6 B A B C Q P Q R, eqangle6 B A B C Q P Q R, ncoll A B C => simtri* A B C P Q R; cong A P B P, cong A Q B Q => perp A B P Q. 使用的知识点(中文): 如果两个三角形的两边和夹角对应相等，那么这两个三角形全等.【全等三角形的判定定理】; 如果两条平行线被两条相交线所截，那么所形成的对应线段的比相等【平行线分线段成比例定理】; 如果两个三角形的两边对应成比例，且夹角相等，那么这两个三角形相似.【相似三角形的判定定理】; 如果一个点到线段两端的距离相等，那么这个点在线段的垂直平分线上。【垂直平分线逆定理】. 知识点数量: 4
